Summary: A piece of paradise in the canyons yet close to the beach. Top notch staff from front desk to room service to pool drink service. The spa is quaint and heavenly. Rooms are super comfortable and well-maintained. Second time here with more visits in the future.
Manager Response: Curious617048,  We are grateful for your continued support! Like you mentioned, the canyon location of our resort within walking distance to the beach provides a unique coastal setting in paradise. We look forward to welcoming you back for your third visit!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lovely weekend celebrating a birthday! Beautiful property with a emphasis on sustainability and farm to table dinning plus the beds and accommodations were just to our liking. We slept well, ate well, exercised and enjoyed the closeness to the beach as well as the pool and hot tub. They have many special things to do, we did yoga and wanted to sky watching, but the sky was cloudy and we'll have to come back for that one.
Manager Response: David C,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate a birthday with a stay at our resort. It sounds like you made the most of your experience with taking advantage of a variety of activities and amenities. Like you mentioned, our resort demonstrates sustainable tourism leadership through actions and impact that also provide a great guest experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Only downside, Location Wi-fi Only, no cellular service - Be prepared; although understand goal to encourage you to unplug, not quite realistic in today's life. A tad pricey in comparison However, Lovely
Manager Response: Samanthacrockett,  It is great to hear that you had a lovely experience and we thank you for staying with us! Regarding cellular service, we recommend that our guests activate Wi-Fi calling on compatible devices prior to their arrival.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed at the Ranch since we love the Harvest restaurant, stayed in Bldg 11 which was wonderfully appointed 'cottage style' room with great patio opening up into courtyard.  Patio and room is in shade which was fine for us.  Bed was comfortable, little bit tall. This weekend was not very busy so overall property was quiet. Had wonderful guitarist, singer on the patio on Sat night. Breakfast was via room service which was prompt and food was hot and good.  Cinnamon roll with bacon, pecan topping is a must.
Manager Response: SunnyPatsFan,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at our resort! We appreciate your detailed recap of your experience and love hearing how much you enjoyed it!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I came here to escape LA. We always live in LA for a month n needed a change. It’s like being in Montana near the beach. Temps are 10 degrees cooler but you drive your car n in 2 minutes your at the beach. Staff is excellent, well informed and the restaurant is very good. But place still has a motel feeling which it was in its former life. Spa is very small, no real facilities like u would get at other resorts that say spa. If there’s an event/wedding don’t book a massage because the music goes straight into the spa so u feel like your at the wedding. Gym is too small and no bathroom. Lastly we had a suite and you park your car next to your room and they charge $25 day for overnight parking. I was already paying $1,200 night and you must have a car there. Found
Manager Response: PBG2,  Thank you for staying with us. It is disappointing to hear that your expectations were not exceeded as our goal is for our guests to return home with lifelong memories. Guest feedback is very important to our operations and we appreciate that you took the time to provide it.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Excellent place to relax - even in February!
Summary: My wife and I needed some downtime and the Ranch was just the place. There is something about being in a canyon next to the Pacific that restores your soul.  Highly recommend.  Plus the food is outstanding.
Manager Response: Matt07924,  We are thrilled to hear that our resort was just the place for you and your wife to relax and enjoy some downtime! Thanks for highly recommending us to others and for staying with us! Please visit us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: very quaint resort hidden in south laguna with amazing food, amenities and staff. the grounds are well manacured and you can walk down to the local beach to enjoy the ocean and grab a snack. We left the kids with gramma and snuck away for a perfect 24hrs.
Manager Response: Steve M,  We are thrilled to hear that you were able to leave the kids with gramma and sneak away to enjoy a local getaway at our resort! Like you mentioned, walking down to Aliso Beach and enjoying food & drinks at Lost Pier Cafe is a great way to relax in paradise! Please visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our anniversary weekend was perfect and The Ranch over exceeded our expectations. The setting is beautiful and the staff is wonderful. Harvest restaurant was amazing and we loved hanging out on The Patio. We were sad to leave and look forward to going back-even if it’s just for dinner! Well done, Ranch Staff!
Manager Response: Pattidempster,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it at our resort! It is great to hear that you had a glorious experience and that our team helped make it memorable! We look forward to welcoming you back for dinner at Harvest or live music at The Porch!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The staff was wonderful and accommodated everyone on our business trip. We required a conference room, hotel rooms for everyone and accommodating everyones diverse food requirements. The staff went above and beyond to make it a great experience for everyone.
Manager Response: Erin W,  Thank you for hosting your business trip at our resort! Our team understands the importance of doing the best we can to accommodate the needs of our guests and it is great to hear that our team went above and beyond for everyone in your group! We hope that you choose to visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fantastic Location, Golf available.  Friendly Service.  Great dining experience.  We would visit again.  Easy access to the town of Laguna and beaches.  30 minutes to Santa Ana airport.  Shuttle available to town and shops
Manager Response: Johnarizini,  Thank you for spending time visiting our resort and it is great that you plan to visit again! We appreciate the kind words!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property. We wish we could have stayed longer. The staff was very helpful and the quick walk to the beach was pleasant. Great food and drinks at the pool, Lost Pier and private dining room. The offer guided walks including one for birds of prey that live in the box canyon.
Manager Response: 232george,  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a great time and that you wish that you could have stayed longer! Thanks for visiting and we look forward to welcoming you back again!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a breath of fresh air and authenticity compared to the sea of sameness, with so many hotels having been corporatized by the travel industrial complex. The Ranch at Laguna Beach has a soul. It's just a few blocks off the PCH and proximate to all that Laguna Beach has to offer, and a world away in the canyon where it's situated. The curation of artists playing live music by the fire pits, the deer prancing through the property, the tasteful decor, and the yummy bites are what make this one of our favorite places to stay. I've stayed at the best hotels all over the world, and have to say that luxury can't hold a candle to authenticity. I highly recommend The Ranch!
Manager Response: Nic0Mont,  We greatly appreciate that you highly recommend our resort to others! Thank you for your detailed recap of your experience. Like you mentioned, we understand the importance of authenticity in the way we serve our guests! We look forward to welcoming you back for future visits!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I lived in this area for a few years and never had the opportunity to stay at the Ranch until recently. The property is private and well maintained. The associates were very attentive and friendly. We had breakfast, I ordered the pancakes, my wife had the short rib breakfast burrito, both were Fantastic.
Manager Response: Claywalker2023,  We are thrilled that your first opportunity to stay at our resort was fantastic! Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great Stay.  Great Atmosphere. Really Good Food.The Golf course is really nice in the middle of Laguna Beach. Beautiful wild life. Grass Fed Ny Steak for the win!  Take your family here for a relaxing stay!
Manager Response: ChrisLowdn,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and appreciate the recommendation to others! Our team always loves reading reviews about our guests having a great experience! Please visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A getaway with my husband the resort is beautiful and comfortable great location I can’t say enough about the staff all of them excellent they have live music out on the patio every night we highly recommend you stay with them
Manager Response: S7147HAlisaf,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us on a getaway with your husband. It is great to hear that our team provided excellent service that helped make your experience memorable. The daily live music on The Porch is a relaxing way to spend your time in paradise. Please visit us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Property has character but is somewhat overpriced for basic rooms. Food is good and restaurant is well done.  parking leaves a lot to be desired as does recognition of IHG members. That leaves a negative feeling with me.
Manager Response: Terryquinn2022,  Thank you for staying with us over the Christmas holiday. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your dining experience. We appreciate the feedback regarding parking as it helps improve our operations. We hope that you choose to stay with us again.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful place but not so great guest service
Summary: We had a terrible experience at the patio - we were told that we could only use the fire pit section if we were planning to spend at least $200 on food/drinks. This is after our dinner at the Harvest where we spent way more than $200. Such a terrible way of treating guests who pay on average of $3K to stay at this resort.
Manager Response: Ezmanagement,  Thank you for staying with us and for your feedback about your experience at The Porch. This has been passed along to our Food & Beverage management as guest feedback helps improve our operations.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is off the beaten path, which is hard to find in south Orange County. Close enough to the beach, but set back in the canyon so you don't hear the sound of the busy highway. It's been renovated and updated with a coastal design. I thought the rooms were large and clean. The vibe was mellow and relaxing, just as a getaway should be.
Manager Response: 702tim,  It is always great to hear about our guests enjoying a relaxing and peaceful/quiet experience in the canyon. The resort was designed with décor that provides an authentic Laguna Beach experience for our guests. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our third visit to The Ranch for a holiday getaway from Atlanta. We love the local vibe, the relaxed atmosphere and attentive staff. The hotel restaurant and bar were very good. It’s also a great location just outside of downtown Laguna Beach, away from the tourist area.
Manager Response: Greenfox2,  We greatly appreciate your continued support of our resort! Like you mentioned, it is such a naturally relaxing atmosphere here in the canyon! We look forward to welcoming you back for your fourth visit!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a magical location tucked away in a quiet canyon, and only a 5-minute walk to a state beach. Located in south Laguna, with downtown and many great restaurants a short drive away.  Beyond the gorgeous surroundings, every aspect of The Ranch has been designed for the comfort of guests, and the staff is beyond friendly and helpful: everyone seems to truly enjoy working here.  I've traveled extensively over the last 20 years for work and family vacations, and this is truly one of the nicest places I've ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Matthew E,  We are thrilled to hear that our resort is one of the nicest places you've ever stayed at! Thanks for the kind words! Our team members are bonded like family and our goal is to make our guests feel at home away from home. We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and look forward to hopefully welcoming you back!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We just stayed here for Thanksgiving weekend and had a spectacular time.  If you are a golfer you will love it here.  It is also quiet, relaxed and service it top notch.  Beach access, close proximity to downtown Laguna.  Great staff too!
Manager Response: ChicagoGalNative,  We appreciate that you highly recommend our resort to others and we are thrilled that you had a spectacular time. Thanks for spending your Thanksgiving weekend with us and please visit us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Such a special property. Walking distance to the beach, but feels like you are in a tranquil oasis on the resort. Room, food, drinks, pool was all amazing. Live music at the Porch was so relaxing. Couldn't have asked for a better Anniversary trip! Big shout out to Yesenia, Laura, and Alain at The Porch who made our stay perfect.
Manager Response: Fgarza1010,  We are thrilled that you couldn't have asked for a better Anniversary trip and that you had such a wonderful visit! Congrats and thanks for celebrating with us! Please visit us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Cute getaway in the Laguna canyons
Summary: I had a week-long conference hosted here recently and truly enjoyed the location. The program was held entirely on the property so I can comment on a wide array.  GUEST ROOMS: *Quiet, comfortable and appointed well.  *The housekeeping staff was excellent and kept my room well stocked twice a day with fresh fluffy towels and high-quality skin and hair care products (mounted on the walls).  *Bed was comfortable and kept me warm at night.  *HVAC is extremely quiet, so you never know when it's on. However, the room got warm quickly with the thermostat allowing you 2-degree increments (ie, 70, 72, 74 degrees)  CULINARY: *Truly excellent. Every meal was robust with taste and of high quality.  *Banquet service was highly attentive and helpful. *Varied menu that can accommodate dietary
Manager Response: MooshLA,  We appreciate your detailed feedback that touched on a variety of resort amenities during your week long stay at the resort! It is always great to hear about guests having such a great time in the canyon! Please visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I love the Ranch. Before my stay, I had only dined there. Their restaurant Harvest is amazing. My stay lived up to my expectations. Beautiful property surrounded by mountains, but also steps away from beach and Pacific Ocean. This is a must see and stay resort.
Manager Response: DerekIsHereNow,  We are thrilled to hear that you love our resort and that your stay lived up to your expectations. Thank you for the continued support and recommendation to others! We hope to welcome you again either for dining or another stay soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Way too much money for what you get
Summary: The property is nice, but only one pool!  Keys are like a poker chip, coffee maker was so cheap, only powdered creamer, water bottles in the room will cost you another $5.00 and no wine glasses in the room.  Not very posh, kinda felt like we were roughing it for $1,000+ per day!
Manager Response: Mthuston63,  Thank you for staying with us. We are sorry to hear that you did not find the value during your trip as we understand the importance of that to our guests.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a different kind of resort nestled in a valley with a calm vibe...but just a 5 minute walk to the beach and easy access to highway and lots of restaurants.  Not luxury, but staff is friendly, available and accomodating.  There's a nice outdoor area for drinks or meals and an indoor bar as well.  Harvest was good, but we had better meals in the town of Laguna.  Restaurant/bar close down pretty early.   DO pay attention to your room assigment at checkin.  The Canyon rooms are nice with two rocking chairs outside to enjoy the views, and we planned to do that since this was a chill, getaway vacation.  The rooms are all the same price, and most of them have really nice "expansive views" as they say in online, but a couple are truly awful...an ugly building 20 feet away that
Manager Response: Clams5,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and happy to hear that our team provided friendly service and was accommodating with getting you assigned to the right room for your liking!  We hope to welcome you back for a future return visit!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of the most unique properties you will ever visit. Beautiful Canyon vibe with easy access to the beach and super nice stuff. So many things to do nearby from nature walks to great restaurants to a variety of other things
Manager Response: Matt R,  We appreciate the kind words and that you chose to stay with us! Like you mentioned, there are nearly 20,000 acres of outdoor trails in the Laguna Beach area! It is great to hear that you took advantage of a variety of things to do nearby. Please visit us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Details: we were here for work and did not have to pay for the room.  We loved our two nights at the Ranch.  The room (1006) was a large two-bedroom duplex that was recently renovated (it felt like we were the first guests).  The staff could. Or have been nicer all around, and our breakfast at Harvest was on-point.  Also, we loved our other breakfast at The Lost Pier.  The only negative I can really find at The Ranch is what one would do for an extended vacation.  The golf course looked great (we didn’t play it) but it is only 9 holes so it isn’t really a golf resort.   The pool is lovely, but how much time can you spend at the pool before it becomes repetitive.  It isn’t on the beach so you sort of have to plan going to the beach rather than just walking out of your room.  They
Manager Response: NKBNYC,  It is great to hear that you enjoyed a lovely visit and that our team delivered a high level of personalized service that enhanced your experience. We appreciate that you stayed with us and look forward to your return visit!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lovely spot that feels hidden but isn’t. Comfortable beds and rooms. Staff was helpful and kind. It’s mostly a place to golf 9 holes but has other activities.  Close walk to a small public beach was nice.  Parking was plentiful and easy at resort
Manager Response: MelaniepL9519NB,  We are grateful that you chose to spend some time at the resort. The natural quietness of the property is so important to our guests enjoying a relaxing experience. Please visit us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Who are  writing these reviews?  Are they all generated by bots?  Maybe I can’t trust CNTraveler anymore? For $1k/nt - crowded, noisy, tired room (ours a suite) with a stale odor and sad brown furniture, dirty carpets, sloppy, etc not scenic, not relaxing, not luxury which one would expect for the room rate  - in October!!  Wow, feeling ripped off, misled, and really bummed.  We’re moving down the road to another hotel. “Luxury” and “5 Star” are meaningless in hospitality anymore.
Manager Response: JFMCCAT,  We apologize for the experience you had and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch is a hidden gem perfect for couples
Summary: My girl and I absolutely had a blast at The Ranch. The hotel is exquisite and our stay truly reminded us of how much we love each other. All in all, The Ranch is a MUST for relationship maintenance :)
Manager Response: Jamesbarren,  We are stoked that you both had a blast at our resort! Like you mentioned, it allows our guests to escape from the normal hustle & bustle and focus on relaxing. Thanks for choosing to spend some quality time with us and we look forward to your return visit!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Food Poisoning, Private Events, and No Direct Beach Access
Summary: Incompetent service, excessive pricing, no direct access to the beach.  Throughout our $1500/night stay many areas were closed due to a private event, the food sickened my family, the pool is small, and the service was marginal.
Manager Response: 35000ft,  We apologize for the quality of your experience and understand that our Assistant General Manager has reached out and the two of you are discussing this further.  Sincerely,  The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed  for 2 nights which we booked last minute. Probably the best hotel of our fortnight’s stay in California.  Appeared a little pricey when booking but probably felt best value for money in comparison to other 4/5 star hotels during our stay. Staff v polite and efficient, accommodation was v clean and rooms really tastefully decorated.  Enjoyed the food both evening and breakfast meals. A nice hotel and stay to end our holiday.  Would recommend!
Manager Response: Suzannewright2,  We are thrilled to hear that your stay at our resort was the best out of all your stays in California and appreciate the recommendation to others! Hope next time you visit California that you choose to stay with us again! Thanks for visiting us and safe travels!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Relaxing, chill vibe with luxury accommodations.
Summary: The bed and sheets were so amazing I didn't want to leave. My husband usually sleeps 6-7 hours, but slept 9 here. Excellent food at Harvest and great service by friendly staff. We are local and will be back just to dine at Harvest. It was that incredible.
Manager Response: 941anads,  It is great to hear that you and your husband enjoyed a relaxing stay at the resort. We understand the importance of a good night's sleep! Thank you for visiting and for your continued support going forward!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Just a beautiful place, tucked right off Pacific Coast Highway, close to the town of Laguna Beach, right across from the beach.  But--hidden!  Private!  Good pool and amenities and the rooms are pretty with some real touches of beauty.  Very good restaurant that is also responsible for the pool food, so that's great too.  So relaxing and pretty.  Cell phone coverage is zero and that might too be counted as a plus!
Manager Response: DianebZ7711XO,  It is great to hear that you enjoyed a quiet retreat in the canyon and that our team delivered outstanding service to help make your experience even more special! We appreciate the kind words regarding the amenities and design of the resort. Our recommendation is that our guests activate Wi-Fi Calling on their devices. Thanks for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Highly recommended. The views are unbeatable. It is very relaxing and off the hustle and bustle of the Laguna Beach strip. The Harvest restaurant was delicious due to the farm-to-table food and the staff was friendly. We will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Gallagherraymondt,  Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others! We agree that one of the best features of the resort is being secluded in the canyon away from the hustle and bustle, yet only walking distance to the beach. Having the 1/2 acre garden on-site is key to our ingredients in the Harvest kitchen. Please visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here for my wife's birthday and the photos really sold us on this place. I was disappointed that our balcony had no privacy and led to a walkway. The service was not the best and we had to wait several times for our requests to be fulfilled. The pool was just average and didn't have anything special about it. I don't think I would stay here again given the service, room quality, and resort amentities.
Manager Response: Shoreline801,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us in celebration of your wife's birthday and we apologize for the quality of your experience. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Too many teens working here.. The use of plastic and take away containers at the pool bar is not sustainable by any means. It’s lazy & bad for the environment. Be sure to make reservations at the restaurant or they will give you a hard time, even as a hotel guest.
Manager Response: Alanalawrence2022,  We are sorry to hear that you experience did not exceed your expectations and I would like to speak with you further if you can please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lovely resort in a great location but overpriced for what it is..very few amenities (outside golf). Pool is ok and staff are very helpful. Some unexpected additional charges at checkout (parking?) Would be tempted to stay closer to town centre next time we visit.
Manager Response: EGM101,  We are sorry to hear that your experience fell short of your expectations as we want to our guests to leave with lifelong memories. Regarding the parking fee, we do have it listed on our website and on third party websites as the goal is to be fully transparent with our guests prior to arrival, but since we are not sure how you booked, we cannot speak to the specific booking channel you used. Please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay was perfect!!!! We loved the food and the pool was the best ever.  I would highly recommend the Resort to anyone at any age.  I have also golfed there too and it is a great little 9 hole course.
Manager Response: J2552TGmikel,  We are thankful that you stayed with us and thrilled that you loved the food plus relaxing at the pool! Recommendations to others is always appreciated! Please visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a work event
Summary: I stayed here for a work event. The location was perfect for connecting with colleagues, relaxing by the pool and using the facilities. The food was divine here! All the staff were very pleasant and welcoming. It is such a beautiful place.
Manager Response: Nataliemccormack,  We are grateful that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort for a work event and hope that the company you work for will be back again soon for another event!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I think it was better before the pandemic. The rooms are clean and nice.I make this trip regularly, for the money I think I will try something different next time. It seems they are focusing on big events.
Manager Response: ChadWAlbert,  We appreciate your continued support and apologize that your recent stay did not exceed your expectations. Can you please reach to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Unique spot just off the beach and up the canyon
Summary: Like the title says, the property is just off the beach and up the canyon.  So no ocean views but nice open space ina ranch style setting.  No horses or anything but the buildings are nice low rise ranch style that provides for a relaxed setting with easy access the the beach as a price far below The Montage:)
Manager Response: DanaLosAngeles,  Like you mentioned, the resort offers an exclusive, unique blend of canyon and sea so our guests can enjoy both a naturally peaceful experience in the canyon while also enjoying fun at the beach! We hope that you visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Bad communication, Cold & slow staff, front desk deny their own wrong doings.
Summary: The whole reason why I picked this hotel was because this hotel agreed to customize food for my family member who had health-related dietary restriction.  Before arriving at the hotel, I even received email from the GM asking about my needs.  I told him into details about his dietary restrictions.  Given the hotel's rating, I thought we were in good hands.  However, when I arrived at the hotel, I found out no one knew about my family member's dietary restrictions.  I needed to remind the waiters every time I took my family member to dine at the restaurant.  Still, from time to time, they would have the item he was not supposed to have on his plates.  I ended-up food-checking for him every morning during the breakfast. I tried to be as polite as possible, but a couple waiters
Manager Response: TravelingRedPanda,  We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience. After reviewing your stay details, it looks like your family stayed with us twice within a week period with the first booking being made direct and the second booking being made through a third party website. It looks like the confusion about the promotion stemmed from the third party booking. We apologize for your experience and please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice setting, busy restaurants , no beach views. 9 hole golf course, A net driving range.  Unexperienced or very slow staff.  Extremely noisy , not worth it.  I came to rest only to find out you can hear all other guests in their rooms, not to mention gardening at 6 Am with a blower for 30 min outside my door. Very noisy hotel
Manager Response: Ernesto B,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We are sorry to hear about the unnecessary noise that you experienced and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Golf Centric Resort is nice change of pace
Summary: This is a tiny resort just South of Laguna proper.  Set in a valley with great views of a small surrounding mountain range.  If you are looking for beach views this is not your place - although a short walk to the ocean, not visible at all from the resort.  Best feature by far is the 9 hole Ben Brown golf course, which is constantly packed with all manner of golfers.  The course is a must play - easily walkable with incredibly relaxed atmosphere.  Music and a party of some description always seem to greet you after the 9th green.  It’s a fantastic scene - grab your AM coffee and hot muffin and watch the stream of foursomes tee off from #1 - never gets old.  The Resort itself - Harvest is a beautiful space that is not exactly matched by the quality of the fare - would give the
Manager Response: BartbP4324CF,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us! Like you mentioned, our resort offers a nice change of pace away from the normal hustle and bustle. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities during your stay! Ben Brown's offers such breathtaking scenic views of the canyon and creek on each hole. Please visit us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I stayed for two nights at the Ranch at Laguna Beach in December of 2021, and had a very good experience.  This was a Covid-era visit, so there were some understanble restrictions, but nothing to impair the enjoyment of the hotel.    Here's the good news.  The hotel is beautiful, with elegant common spaces and very nice rooms.  It's low-slung and comfortable, like staying at a resort.  They have music on the outdoor patio in the afternoons, and a a beautiful deck for breakfast in the mornings.  They have a nice pool, which we didn't use becasue it was winter, a spa that we also didn't use, and a golf course which we didn't use, not being golfers, but which was popular with others.    There's really very little bad news.  The hotel is on the outskirts of the cute
Manager Response: Familytraveller31,  We are thrilled that you had a wonderful two night stay at the resort with your wife! Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon allows our guests to enjoy a laid back and relaxing experience in paradise. Unfortunately, Laguna Beach doesn't have a boardwalk or a bike lane as it is mainly known for mountain biking rather than road biking or the use of beach cruisers. Thank you for the kind words and please join us again soon!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Well the staff at the restaurant is rude, the food menu is very basic and lacks of options, and the food is not tasty. The harvest restaurant, the cafe at the beach, the deck restaurant and in room dining they all have same menu.  They took 50 mins to bring me fork and knife that I requested to my room.  The spa is very small, specially the locker room/ bathrooms, but the massages are good.  The 2 bedroom cottages are very noisy, they are not equipped with basic things like glasses or table wear or even tea. They should do better
Manager Response: Freedom39599057605,  We apologize for the experience you had as it is always disappointing when the expectations of our guests are not exceeded. Guest feedback helps us improve our operations.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A must destination to visit while in Orange County!!
Summary: The Jewel of Laguna Beach.  I have visited The Ranch many times before for golf before they renovated this resort.  The staff, the grounds, the accommodations, absolutely superb!!!    We did not play golf this time but walked the course early in the morning, and the greens, fairways are true to form.  The spa has trained professionals and my partner loved her experience.  What she requested she received, tender loving care that made her feel her absolute best!!  Definitely will return in the near future!!!   A must visit for both visitors that live around here and out-of-towners!!  And yes, the rates are reasonable!!
Manager Response: 652bobp,  We really appreciate your continued support over the years and the kind words + recommendation to others! We look forward to your return visits!     Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, okay accommodations, and disappointing service
Summary: I had a very mixed experience at The Ranch.   The valley in which the Ranch is located is very pretty with a well kept golf course and it is walking distance to a really beautiful beach. Laguna Beach in general is a great little community that feels like a getaway even though it is so close to Los Angeles and other urban spots in Orange County.  What made the experience mixed were really the service and the rooms.   My wife and I spent one night there and it was both the first night we had taken away from our two and a half year old and a mini-baby moon before our second comes shortly. The room was nice but definitely in an old structure that had been revamped, so the walls were really thin. Our room was also unfortunately next door to a room with a toddler that started
Manager Response: AJDyb,  We apologize for the experience that you had and can understand your disappointment. Can you please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Serene setting with nothing but first-class everything. The decor is perfect SoCal and the setting is calming and beautiful. Now, the best part...waking up early and going to get THE BEST cinnamon bun at the restaurant and eat it with the sunrise next to a fire pit
Manager Response: Devin-jean M,  Thank you for celebrating your birthday with a stay at our resort! We are thrilled to hear that your trip was such a memorable experience! The décor reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance as we want our guests to feel like a local. Dining at sunrise is a great way to start your day in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Afternoons at The Ranch at Ben Browns
Summary: Perfect place to meet friends in the afternoon for drinks and appetizers! Beautiful guitar playing and singers every afternoon while looking out over the golf course pine trees and mountains! Incredible that it feels like the Alps, with deer coming out at dusk, yet just next to a fun beach cove too!!! So relaxing. Great for friends and families alike! Cozy fire pits, s’mores available, cornhole toss, and of course, a lovely 9 hole golf course that even a ‘once or twice a year’ player like me can enjoy, without feeling intimidated! Haha. I swear, the course feels like I’m in Hawaii as you turn up the lush canyon, surrounded by steep mountains, and even the rushing stream has tortoises sunning themselves! Just gorgeous!  Harvest Restaurant has a wonderful indoor and outdoor patio
Manager Response: Suzannester,  We appreciate your continued support of the resort and that you took the time to provide detailed feedback of your experiences! Like you mentioned, the daily live music is an excellent way to relax in paradise. We look forward to your return visits!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Really a somewhat hidden gem. The awesome 9 hole golf course,friendly staff, and great little beach breakfast spot, make this a great getaway. Just the right size to have all the amenities, but still small. Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Sunsetguy2021,  We are stoked that you love our resort and that you had an awesome first experience. Thanks for visiting and we can't wait for you to return too!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: WOW! This resort's service is out of this world!
Summary: We were traveling to this amazing resort with 4 other couples for my best friend's 40th birthday party this past weekend.  We travelled from all over the country.  Olivia (our concierge) was amazing and helped us coordinate all the rooms and blocked us all together.  She also helped me set up the room to surprise my best friend!!  This resort has it together on customer service! Above and beyond.  Harvest Restaurant was one of the best restaurants we went to in Laguna.  The golf course was also gorgeous and really fun!  Pool was heated and awesome to use on chilly nights.  Even though it's not on the beach, they basically have a golf cart that takes you to one.   I really can't say enough good things about this resort!  Thanks so much for an amazing experience!
Manager Response: Laura B,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your best friend's 40th birthday at our resort! It is great to hear that you had an amazing experience and that Olivia went above and beyond to ensure your group had a truly memorable stay. We appreciate the kind words and hope to welcome you back in the future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I along with 2 of our friends were at the Ranch on the 14h of Aug. in the evening around 7pm. Just wanted to enjoy the view of the golf course and they were nice enough to give us the corner table which has large glass windows that actually slide open to allow the evening breeze in...REALLY nice! Our waiter was Phlippi and he was fun and personable...until he had to go over some previously stated info about something on the menu. I had to ask him 3x to get a 2nd drink. The real rub was: right below us on the lower level, just outside the window, there was an "Event" going on for a surfer related awards and auction. Naturally they've got an AUCTIONEER, and he's on a LOUD microphone doing his "auctioneering". All you can hear guy screaming into a mic at about 90
Manager Response: Roger B,  Thank you for dining with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had and can understand your disappointment & frustration. We understand that our guests want to enjoy a relaxing ambiance and have a conversation over dinner and we are sorry that it was so noisy. We hope that you will give us another try at some point.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I have responded multiple times to your systems and not been contacted by anyone at your hotel. This is just ridiculous now. Do I have to count this a loss? Your hotel needs a rehaul in customer service. Respond when you get this please (949)689-4748.  Thank you.  Johnathan
Manager Response: John W,  We apologize for the delay in our response. I have confirmed that you spoke with someone on our team a few days ago. Please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com if I can be of further assistance.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a beautiful, relaxing retreat for all ages! Our family enjoyed the pool, Harvest Restaurant, the beach and the accommodations. Access to the beach was easy and everyone enjoyed the beauty of the resort!
Manager Response: Passport56003852175,  We are thrilled that you got to spend some amazing family time together at the resort and that you really enjoyed the experience. Thanks for visiting and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom cabin. It was clean and the bathrooms were great/updated. The beds were rutted/old and the furniture (including decks) was uncomfortable. The cottage location and decks were not serene with loud gas/diesel golf carts used by staff going by all day, loud carpet cleaning vans, golfers talking, etc. The staff vibe was not friendly or helpful. It seems training is needed. I am giving a 3 as the property is beautiful. Everything else fell short, we did not get value for money and we will not be going back.
Manager Response: Carie M,  Thank you for providing feedback regarding your experience at the resort. It is always disappointing when the expectations of our guests are not exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com to discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: We can’t wait to come back!
Summary: There’s not enough great things to say about this property! Everything from the rooms, the staff, the food and the entire resort. Everything is exceptional and worth every single dollar. The food was phenomenal from breakfast to dinner. They have an amazing kids meal which makes it great when traveling with the children. The beds were so comfortable and the housekeeping was done perfectly every time. We will definitely be back and cannot wait to stay again!
Manager Response: Heatherg134,  Thank you for the kind words and we are thrilled that everything about your experience was exceptional. We can't wait for you to stay again too!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property with a fabulous restaurant. We enjoyed walking to the beach, golf and total relaxation. An added bonus for us was that it was only an hour drive away, but it felt like another universe.
Manager Response: Karenkkwhite,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and stoked to hear that you enjoyed total relaxation during your visit. The surrounding canyon provides a different perspective of a California coastal getaway. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: LOVE the sweet extra touches-beautiful room fixtures & decor, chocolates on pillows, espresso machine, amazing smelling soaps by Malin & Goetz, sustainability efforts are evident, beautiful property, thoughtful employees, will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Becherbert7,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the décor reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance as we want our guests to feel like a local. Our team understands how much of a positive impact that extra touches have on the quality of the experience. As stewards of an incredible natural landscape, our resort is committed to being at the forefront of sustainability efforts in our region. We are thrilled to hear that you will definitely be back and we look forward to your return visit.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: PROS Great place for family with children. We were able to enjoy Laguna Beach in the day and hide away from all the busyness at the resort. The staffs were all super friendly and we particularly enjoyed the farm tour with farmer Leo. He was absolutely phenomenal and the passion he had for farming made my family and I want to start growing our own garden. The food at Harvest was also very good. It’s also very environmentally conscious, which we appreciate.  CONS The resort itself was a bit pricey since our five night stay costed more than our week stay at the Hilton in Kauai, yet with the pandemic, it’s nice to avoid the airport. Most of the resort is a golf course, it looks big yet it’s not really that big since if you do not golf, you cannot access the scenic part of the
Manager Response: Sophorn C,  We are stoked that you and your family had a wonderful stay. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort allows our guests to escape from the busyness of downtown Laguna Beach. Our goal is for our guests to return home with lifelong memories, so it is great to hear that the passion that Farmer Leo displayed during the garden tour has inspired you to start growing your own garden. We want to apologize for the condition of the guest room floor and also that our team did not reach back out to you regarding your laptop case as both scenarios do not reflect our standards. Can you please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I stayed a week at The Ranch. We don’t have a single negative thing to say. Everyone was polite, respectful, and overly helpful. The Ranch is gorgeous and all of the food was excellent! It’s a short walk to beach which they provide chairs and umbrellas as a courtesy. We will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Chrispick2021, ﻿   We are grateful that you stayed with us for a week and that you highly recommend our resort to others! Our team focuses on providing a high level of personalized service by going above and beyond to ensure the expectations of our guests are exceeded and that our guests return home with lifelong memories. We are thrilled that you will definitely be returning and appreciate your support. ﻿   Sincerely, ﻿ Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The staff is friendly, the rooms are immaculate, and the ambiance is wonderful. It was a wonderful place to take our family and we would definitely return. The swimming pool was clean and spacious and being placed in front of their local volleyball court was a bonus for us. One of the best places in Newport Beach that was able to suit our family's needs.
Manager Response: Millycarmenm,  It is great to hear that you had a wonderful visit and that the resort suited your family's needs. Like you mentioned, the naturally peaceful and quiet vibe of the canyon provides an amazing ambiance. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a spectacular wedding venue, Everything is close and accessible for family and friends. The rooms are beautifully appointed and comfortable. The service is great including golf cart pick up. There's a wonderful cafe on the ocean operated by The Ranch. The food is great for breakfast or lunch. The wedding ceremony was held in a beautiful grove of trees with the reception on the patio overlooking the golf course and canyon walls, Food was outstanding. Don't hesitate to block ample rooms. The tree house for the wedding couple was unbelievably wonderful--a complete venue in and of itself,
Manager Response: Kathy F,  Thank you for sharing this detailed feedback on the spectacular wedding experience at our resort and for the recommendation to others. We are grateful that our resort was chosen to host the wedding and that lifelong memories were taken home not only by the bride and groom, but also those in attendance. Hopefully we can welcome you back for a leisure vacation sometime in the near future.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: As good as it gets in OC
Summary: Best place to getaway in Laguna. We've been coming out here for a golf charity for the past 9 years and my only regret is we didn't find The Ranch at Laguna Beach sooner.   Service is impeccable in every part of the resort.   I'm looking forward to coming back!  The golf course was perfect!
Manager Response: U1300WKmattp,  We are thrilled that you had such a wonderful first visit and that our resort is your favorite place to getaway in Laguna! Thanks for the kind words and we are looking forward to you coming back too!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We went there for my birthday celebration couple weeks ago.  We stayed during the week and it was not too crowded.  The check-in process was easy and efficient.  We had to go back to the entrance to activate the wifi calling as they don't have signals in the canyon, so that part of a little inconvenient. The room is well-appointed, the decor is fresh and has a farm house feel.  The bathroom is huge, and the bed is very comfy.  We had dinner at the restaurant (Harvest) and it was a very nice meal, although, the hostesses there are not too friendly.  When we initially made the reservation, it felt a bit like they were being bothered. Expect much better level of service from a restaurant that calibre (though they are not directly affiliated with the hotel per staff).  We also had
Manager Response: 248jenl,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday at the resort and for the detailed feedback on your experience. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We apologize for the miscommunication regarding the hot tub during your stay dates and it will be a learning lesson for our team. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing staycation and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It’s extremely overpriced. Room was noisy, the pool was so crowded that they didn’t have a chair for us. Not chic at all! Not worth your money, might as well stay in another hotel and just visit the Ranch for a drink or something.
Manager Response: Kim S,  We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience. Our goal is for every guest to have a peaceful and relaxing visit and we are disappointed that it was not the case during your time at the resort. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I live in Laguna Beach. I was having work done on my house, so I took the opportunity to spend a few days at Ranch. What a perfect stay it was. The canyon setting is awesome. My room was beautiful and I particularly enjoyed the rocking chairs on the patio. I was met with a friendly greetings by staff members at every turn. I look forward to returning to my home away from home.
Manager Response: Susanwadeartstudio,  Thank you for staying with us while you were getting some work done on your house. Like you mentioned, our team works hard to ensure that our guests feel at home away from home and it is great to hear that you experienced that. Sitting in the rocking chairs and enjoying the fresh canyon air with the breathtaking canyon views sounds like a wonderful way to relax in paradise. We also look forward to your return visits!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The hotel purports and rooms were nice, but for the price, I expected better service all around. Also the pool is small, and the hot tub was closed. They said the pool was heated but we were still really cold which made it uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Laurenkm83,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is always disappointing when the expectations of our guests are not exceeded as our goal is for every guest to return home with lifelong memories. Our standards are to deliver a high level of service and we apologize that it was not delivered during your visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a special place this is! Beautiful setting combined with superb service in every way possible. We were touched by your special anniversary wine, too! The restaurant, Harvest, has excellent choices and a high quality wine list only matched by amazing personal service(Thank you, Phillip). The room and bathroom are are nice in size (double size shower)and the bed was very comfortable. The very walkable 9 hole golf course was matched by a beautiful sunny day.  Thank you, Staff and Management(shout out to RJ Bear, F and B manager for great anniversary desserts) for a wonderful time! We will be back soon.
Manager Response: Sjmacsd1952,  Congrats on your anniversary and thanks for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at our resort. It is great to hear that our team made the occasion truly special and memorable. We look forward to your return visits!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great Family Trip in the Treehouse!
Summary: We did a joint family trip with another couple that also has a toddler. We decided to stay at the Treehouse so we could get resort amenities but also be able to stay in a common space so the parents could still hang out while the kids slept. Between the food, the amenities, the service, and overall vibe, this hotel really delivered on what we were looking for when seeking a “fun family friendly” spot.   We ate at Harvest two nights and the food was phenomenal both times. We also did a dinner by the fire pits one night which was also fun.   The staff was very friendly and incredibly attentive. Special shout out to Jenn and Chase who were great and really showed amazing customer service.   We look forward to many more family trips here in the future.
Manager Response: Jnzhansen,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed a great family trip in The Treehouse and that the resort delivered what you were looking for. Thank you for staying with us and we are looking forward to the many more trips your family plans on making in the future!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The staff was very friendly, fast and efficient. Food was great and the setting was serene. We loved it! While we were there we went to the beach and hiking, all walking distance from the hotel. We will definitely stay at the Ranch at Laguna Beach again.
Manager Response: Dear 248janiek, We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay at our beautiful resort. It was our team's pleasure to serve you. We are happy you enjoyed so many of the nearby activities available for all guests. We look forward to welcoming you back soon! Thank you, Kylie & The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We have visited The Ranch at Laguna Beach several times. Although we don't golf, the serenity of this property is why we choose to return. The rooms are large, clean, and well appointed. The property is situated in a canyon and has a 9 hole golf course, a high end spa, fitness center and swimming pool. The beach is a quick, nice walk away. The Ranch will also take guests there in one of their golf carts. The empolyees are incredibly helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Jennifer W,  Thank you for your continued support as it means a lot to us! Like you mentioned, the serenity of the resort being surrounded by the canyon allows our guests to relax in paradise. It sounds like you made the most of your time by enjoying a variety of amenities. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful property and setting with excellent service!
Summary: I've just spent 3 nights at this beautiful, charming and peaceful oasis and enjoyed every minute of my stay. From the moment I arrived the valet made me feel warmly welcomed and happy to have me at the hotel. The comfortable, well designed room was quiet with an excellent bed so consequently I slept very well. I only had 2 breakfasts and a dinner but all were well prepared, delicious and with perfect service. I didn't play golf but would enjoy doing so as the course and setting are so beautiful.  I shall look forward to my return this summer. Bravo and Well Done to the entire staff!
Manager Response: O3924JCdong,  We appreciate that you spent three nights at the resort and are thrilled that you enjoyed every minute of your stay. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome as that sets the foundation for the quality of the overall experience. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visit this summer!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: if you are looking for a luxurious relaxing experience and you are not a golfer, this is NOT your destination. the staff was not welcoming at all (at least not for what you expect from a 5 star resort staff). the website is WAY overpromising, and most of the things you see and dream about looking at the website are not realistic. a few examples: 1) the beautiful green yards, you cannot access them unless you are a golfer, 2) the beach is a public and crowded beach, the only benefit you get being a guest of the resort is that they lend you chairs and sun umbrella. 3) the complementary snacks and sunscreen are non-existent, 3) the vanity and beauty little samples in the bathroom are a joke (there were no bath slippers, which again I expect from a luxury resort) 4) the pool is very
Manager Response: 304vitop,  Thank you for staying with us and for the feedback. We apologize for the service that you received from our team as it does not reflect our standards. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful hotel.  Small boutique hotel with all the luxuries.  Did a great job at feeling like you were far away from society in the mountains but only 10 walk to the beach and very close to all that Laguna has to offer.
Manager Response: O8754HZjill,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and happy to hear that you enjoyed a great getaway. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort provides the best of both worlds by offering a peaceful vibe while still being within walking distance to the beach and a short drive from downtown. Laguna Beach has such a variety of experiences along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed here because our first choice of hotel in Dana Pt was booked. Rooms were nicely decorated, very clean. A little noisy. The property was packed with people. So busy with golfers it did not feel safe at times during pandemic. There were no restaurant reservations available for any meal the entire weekend. We ordered room service one night which was awkward to eat in a small room and had a cold pizza the next night from the take out window. Bad cold pizza. Breakfast our only option was to walk across the street to the beach and have burritos at a beach place (associated with the hotel). The staff were polite but at times uppity. This place is very overpriced. Do not stay here unless you play golf. Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello mbhaack, We sincerely appreciate you taking your time to provide feedback on your recent stay. We are so sorry to hear you were disappointed with elements of your time at our resort. We are so sorry there were no reservations at the restaurant available for you. Since we had to close our indoor dining, we relocated our restaurant outdoors with very limited seating and we always do our best to accommodate our guests but it does present it challenges with the limited availability. Golf will be less impactful for our guests once we can get the patio back, right now all the golfers gather on the sidewalk and really choke up the area.  Not a good thing,  but they have nowhere else to wait to tee off. With that in mind, we hope to redeem ourselves in the future if that opportunity is possible.  Please feel free to email our team with any additional notes or if there is any way we can redeem ourselves, frontdesk@ranchlb.com. Kindly, Kylie & The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The property is located in the canyon, we felt like we were truly away from the city, traffic and crowds.  Check in and check out staff were professional and friendly, offering information and answered all our questions.  Our accommodations in a Creekside Studio Suite exactly as shown on the website, was spacious and very clean.  We had rocking chairs and table on our patio and we had a beautiful view of the canyon.  Loved the bed, super comfortable. We were on the first floor and did hear the family above us walking around. We had all our meals at The Harvest restaurant for breakfast and dinner.  Every meal was delicious, had excellent service except for dinner on our last night.  Our main server, he was not attentive and we were disappointed with the service. Our other meals
Manager Response: TravelsfromOC,  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing weekend getaway at the resort. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location is a nice escape from the normal hustle and bustle. It sounds like you made the most of your time by getting a well rounded experience. We are looking forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a very special place, gorgeous location, close to everything - beaches, trails, and so much more. The accommodations were spacious and lovely and the staff very nice as well! We would definitely go back (and we live down the street!)
Manager Response: Christinee778,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you were able to enjoy a relaxing local staycation at our resort and that our team made you feel at home away from home. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great stay, beautiful property, a few opportunities
Summary: We had a great stay and sincerely appreciated the late checkout. The tree house was impeccably clean and the canyon views were stunning. Food was delicious and grounds were so beautiful to walk around. Felt safe with Covid and that mask wearing was well-adopted and encouraged by signs posted around property.   We loved the easy access to the beach and food at Lost Pier is delicious. It was easy to get beach chairs from the beach cafe too. Getting to tour the farm in the canyon with Leo was a special treat. You really get a feel that the owners care about the property, sustainability, and continuing to evolve the resort.   Had a few misses worth sharing- staff reached out via email to see if we had any special requests and if we were celebrating anything. Requested a pack and
Manager Response: Cantada22,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Thank you for sharing some constructive feedback as opportunities for our team to learn from going forward. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: No idea how this place has such a high review rating. The service, in general is good, and it does have a great location near the beach. However, the property itself is lacking. We stayed in a suite room and the walls and floors are paper thin. We could clear the conversations from the guests next to us and also all the clicking from someone walking around in the unit upstairs. The building that we stayed at was on the “creek side” ... it’s more like an irrigation dump. Truly. The buildings look like a camping site. The pool is small and outdated. Overall, the photos are very deceiving. This place needs a Major remodel. The only good thing about it was the food at their main restaurant.
Manager Response: Nothingtowear,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are bummed to hear about your experience and would love to speak with you further. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The property was beautiful, well kept, and in a terrific location with an exquisitely furnished room with a very comfortable king size bed and walk-in shower. Noise from the neighboring rooms was evident.
Manager Response: Andrew P,  We appreciate the kind words and that you chose to stay with us. The rooms were designed to reflect an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance as we want our guests to feel like a local. Regarding the noise from neighboring rooms, our guest services team is happy to resolve that for you. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I would not call this place a 5 star hotel. Maybe a 3.5 star hotel. They really need to work on customer service. Not much effort is needed to get to the quality rating of a 4 or 5 star hotel so it's a bit strange (in my opinion) that they don't make the effort. Here are some issues my husband and I faced during our stay. This was meant to be a relaxing romantic Valentine's Day getaway. I want to preface this review by saying that my husband and I are not high maintenance and that if only one or two of the below situations occurred,  I would not be writing a negative review. Overall, it's a nice enough place but if you are expecting 4 or 5 stars, you should save your money. This place is waaaaaay overpriced for the amenities it offers.  Our package came with a complimentary
Manager Response: Verangelo,  Thank you for providing feedback on your stay at the resort. We apologize for the quality of your experience and can understand your disappointment. Like you mentioned, your visit should have been a relaxing and romantic getaway and it is clear that this is a learning experience for our team. Can you please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very quick drive to downtown. Within walking distance of beach and many nice trails. I stayed in one of the houses so it was very safe. The food was good for a hotel! It was very easy to avoid seeing people, and we loved watching the sunset each night. The balconies had a phenomenal view.
Manager Response: 502chayaj,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. The health and comfort of our guests is paramount to our team and we are truly honored by the trust that our guests place in us each time they stay. It is great to hear that you took advantage of walking to Aliso Beach and also exploring the local trails, especially since Laguna Beach has about 20,000 acres of wilderness. Like you mentioned, watching the sunset is absolutely breathtaking. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful, but unfriendly and not much to do outside of golfing.
Summary: The title captures it, but, it's a nice place with front desk staff that makes you feel like a burden.  The rest of the staff was friendly, but at the price you pay, it's odd to have it run by mean headmaster types.  Also, very little to do right now outside of golfing, so a little challenging to justify the price.
Manager Response: DavidtD817HY,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the service that you received as our goal is to treat all of our guests like family and for our guests to return home with lifelong memories.   Unfortunately, it is out of our control that certain amenities are closed as this is due to current government restrictions. The health and safety of our guests and team members comes first. We are very transparent on our website in addition to the confirmation & pre-arrival emails what is currently open so that way our guests know what the current experience is like as the "full" experience is not currently available.  If you can please reach out to sean@ranchlb.com to discuss your experience further, I would greatly appreciate it.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our 1st and only vacation in 2020. My mom & I enjoyed a much-needed relaxing girls getaway over Thanksgiving weekend. Even with Covid concerns, The Ranch had a great plan and everyone wore masks and properly social distanced. The fun stuff:   Cons: The room was initially disappointing as it didn't seem large enough or upscale enough for the price but the coastal decor grew on me, even at only 25% capacity the pool area was noisy but we didn't use it, our heater (in building 600) was noisy but I had ear plugs.   Pros: beautiful peaceful location, the daily 10 minute walks to the beach was exactly the exercise we wanted, the fluffy marshmallow bed was HEAVENLY for naps and sleeping, loved the rocking chairs on our tiny but private patio, the service was stellar (thank you Tristan
Manager Response: CS670,  We are thrilled that you and your mom enjoyed a much-needed relaxing getaway as our canyon setting is the ideal spot for that. The safety of our guests and team members is our first priority by promoting a safe environment. A daily walk to Aliso Beach is a nice way to soak in breathtaking views of the coastline. It is great to hear that our team (especially Tristan and Jason) made your stay extra special by delivering a high level of personalized service. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. We hope that your experience will lead to many return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful no denying, We stood for 1 night 11/28/20 to 11/29/20 we were so excited because Laguna is beautiful but at first we tried to call for additional blanket and phone was not hooked up so called for second time and not until late 3rd call they sent a us a shawl thin blanket my husband called 3 times we could not get the heat to work finally at 6am we called please send someone it was freezing. Next time better to go when its warmer
Manager Response: zs032366,  We are sorry that the temperature of your accommodation affected your experience and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss this further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Peaceful retreat away from the city
Summary: Beautiful and exclusive setting. Attention to guest was very good. Everyone make your stay very enjoyable and special. Facilities are super clean and new. It is a great place to stay in Laguna beach and close by all restaurants and beach.
Manager Response: Dear Flefloch1,  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach! Thank you for choosing to stay at our hidden gem in the canyon. It sounds like you were able to make the most of your stay by enjoying the beautiful setting, resort amenities, and nearby restaurants and beaches. Please join us again soon!  Kindly, Kylie & The Ranch LB Team

Summary: If you want a real getaway to relax with your significant other, then I highly recommend The Ranch. We felt very comfortable during COVID as well because they took all of the necessary protocols to make us feel safe. Most of the rooms are single level which is great because you have very limited noise from guests (basically no noise at all). They play live music outdoors every afternoon for Happy Hour though about 8PM which was very relaxing. Their salt water pool was open for a limited number of guests and they had food and drink service as well. The beach is a quick 10-15 minute walk or a 3 minute shuttle ride and they provide chairs and umbrellas for their guests at the beach. I can't wait to go back to The Ranch soon!
Manager Response: Shannon D,  Thank you for staying with us and for the detailed feedback regarding your experience. The health and safety of our guests and team members will always come first. It is great to hear that you took advantage of a variety of amenities such as the live music, beach and pool. We can't wait to welcome you back either.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at the Ranch for the first time and were amazed to see what a wonderful property it is.  You are surrounded by beautiful canyon mountains and the sea.  The staff were excellent in all areas:  front desk; valet; golf shop; Harvest restaurant; Ben's pantry - even the nice gentlemen who gave us rides in the golf carts to go down to the beach.  Even at the beach, the Lost Pier employees were great!  Our room was clean, beautiful and looked just like the pictures.  The balcony with the rocking chairs gave it that comfort feel.  The pool was a real pool - 8 ft deep with lovely lounge chairs and plenty of towels to go around.  We just can't say enough about how absolutely wonderful the Ranch is and what a great stay we had.  We are making reservations to go back soon!
Manager Response: Suzanne B,  We are stoked to hear that you had an absolutely wonderful first experience at the resort. It is great to hear that our team was excellent in all areas and that they made you feel at home by delivering a high level of personalized service. It sounds like you made the most of your first time by taking advantage of a variety of the amenities. We hope this was the first of many future visits and thanks for choosing to stay with us!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We have been going to Laguna Beach for years, but just discovered this hidden gem. It is located in a secluded canyon, but only a 10 minute walk from Laguna/s great beaches. The service was great and the Harvest Restaurant was a treat.
Manager Response: EasyRider15,  We are thrilled that you recently discovered our resort and happy to hear that you had such a wonderful first experience. It sounds like you felt at home away from home. Hopefully this was the first of many stays in the canyon. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Still Great After All These Years
Summary: I used to go to The Ranch way back in the 60's with my parents when the whole complex was known as Ben Brown's.  Now only the golf course bears that name.  I knew it had been closed for years and was surprised when I learned that it had re-opened under new ownership.  Having been there before, I knew it was a perfect place for a COVID getaway as the rooms are spread out in numerous buildings, and there is so much outdoor space where one can enjoy the property at a distance from others. We arrived and were checked in promptly by the front desk.  The first evening we met local Orange County friends and enjoyed a drink of the patio of Ben's Pantry.  We then had dinner on the patio at Harvest; the food was excellent, and the service was friendly and professional.  We had two
Manager Response: Canncan,  Thank you for sharing your story about how you used to visit the property back in the 60's with your parents. That is really special to hear about your memories here and that you got to experience the re-imagined resort recently. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We hope that this is the first of many return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This has become one of my favorite places in town. The food and service are consistently quite good and the view/atmosphere can't be beat! I prefer daytime--either breakfast or lunch--so I can enjoy the pastoral setting. Their avocado toast is the best I've had anywhere.
Manager Response: Hello Leeek,  Thank you for stopping by The Ranch at Laguna Beach! We are delighted to hear our oasis in the canyon has become a favorite of yours. Please join us again soon for some avocado toast and beautiful views!   Kindly, Kylie and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Me and my wife visited the Ranch for a romantic 3 day trip. This is my first time staying in a ranch-resort-style accommodation. I usually have very high standards and so it is a big deal when I say that this resort scored right at the top in every aspect. First and foremost, as we are in the middle of a pandemic, I really appreciated that they took every precaution they could - all staff members (restaurant, housekeeping, etc) were always masked, they seemed to politely remind anyone not wearing a mask to wear one, etc. All staff members were very polite. The resort location was awesome (only 10 min walk to Aliso beach where you can get beach chairs and umbrella, 20 min walk to Treasure Island beach). The grounds were absolutely stunning with the golf course, mountains, etc.
Manager Response: Vijay2155,  Thank you for staying with us for a three day romantic getaway with your wife. It is great to hear that you had a fantastic impression of the resort that produced a lot of wonderful memories and that we scored right at the top in every aspect by exceeding your expectations. We hope that this was the first of many visits and we look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We have stayed here several times before over the past 20 or so years, but this was our first time since it has been completely refurbished.  Our room was lovely and had a large patio.  Because of Covid restrictions we had to request maid service, but they happily complied.  The landscaping around the entire resort is something to be enjoyed!  Seem to have lots of exotic plants perfectly maintained.  My husband says this is his favorite golf course in the world.  While this trip I didn't see any deer, he did on the golf course.  We did have a bunny and birds on our patio.  Fabulous restaurant.
Manager Response: SandraAl,  Thank you for the continued support over the past 20 years. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your first visit to the resort since the re-imagination and also to hear that your husband said our resort is home to his favorite golf course in the world! Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team
