Summary: This is a diamond in the ruff, i have lived in Laguna for 20 years and have never been here.  What a find, great hotel, great location tucked away from everything.  Thoroughly recommend this . We stayed here for 3 nights and will definitely be back again
Manager Response: Aussietrip77,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed a three night staycation at our resort and that you had an excellent first experience. Hopefully you can join us for live music and dining in the near future. Thank you for visiting us and for the recommendation to others.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I just returned from a two-night stay with my family. I am very impressed.   The setting is stunning - it reminded me a little of Utah, with the mountains all around us, and the beach was only a 10-minute walk!   Accommodations: We stayed in the studio room. Beautiful, with a great patio overlooking the creek and with a view of the mountain. Two adults, two little children, with a pull-out bed - it felt spacious, not at all cramped. The resort spreads the accommodations throughout, in different buildings holding around 5-15 rooms each. As a result, you park near your building. I actually loved this, because with small children, we bring a lot of stuff, and it is nice to be able to use the car for extra space, and we were only about 20 feet from the car, making travel very easy.
Manager Response: Michael B,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and for the detailed feedback regarding your two night stay with your family. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. It is great to hear that you returned home with lifelong memories and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Not the best place to relax
Summary: It was my first time at this resort but I found a few things that made my stay uncomfortable. The Rooms were great and clean but a few things I did not enjoy. 1. The only restaurant they have on the resort is always booked, no matter if you call a week in advance which isn't cool because you want to enjoy a nice morning or dinner and you can't get in. Hostess are not very inviting, snobby. They should really consider first come first serve.   2. Pool is a bit small and gets pretty crowded at 12PM to a point that you can't even sit anywhere.   3. No extended checkouts, even for rooms that cost $1,500 per night, not so cool!   Other than that, the resort is very clean and nice!
Manager Response: Z9476FJdaniel,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Due to COVID-19 restrictions set in place by the governor of California, both the pool and restaurant are limited to the seating capacity allowed. We understand how frustrating this can be for our guests, but we must obey the restrictions. We do offer in-room dining as a dining alternative. Regarding late check-outs, due to occupancy levels, our housekeeping team must prepare the room for the next guests arriving. If you would like to discuss your experience further, please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: We’re hooked, now a monthly get away!
Summary: Caution, long review 🤓  My husband and I first visited for golf in June. We had such a wonderful time! The nine hole golf course is challenging enough for “real” golfers (our playing partners) but not discouraging for beginners. After a fun round with lots of wildlife the four of us had lunch on The Harvest patio overlooking the first hole. Sadly the day the day wound down and it was time for us to drive back to Redondo Beach and our family to head back to San Diego - but not without the four of us planning a follow up date a month later 😊 The second trip we stayed overnight because we were drawn by the outdoor patio and live music as well as an opportunity to golf two days in a row. The third trip we stayed two nights because there was more stuff we wanted to do! Each visit
Manager Response: RachelBross,  We appreciate your continued support and are thrilled that what started out with a round of golf led to some return visits with overnight stays. It sounds like you have enjoyed all aspects of the resort and it is great to hear that our team has delivered a high level of service to make you feel welcomed and at home. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were so excited about our family trip to Laguna Beach and staying at a National Geographic Lodge! Having stayed at many of those in the past, we expected a unique and remarkable hotel in a beautiful setting. The Ranch at Laguna Beach delivered the latter. Yes, the canyon is gorgeous. But the hotel is depressing. Our room--a two-bedroom "cottage"--is really a dark and unattractive condo. The decor is heavy and bland--how this was chosen for a sunny, beachy place I don't know--the ceilings low, the shower slow-to-drain. Ugh. Since we were staying during the pandemic, the Harvest restaurant was fully booked (at half-capacity) which required us to simply hang out in that dreary room and order room service. We couldn't bring ourselves to eat in that kitchen so we dragged furniture
Manager Response: Dear Esmereldaw.,  We are deeply disappointed to read your review. Our resort was handpicked by National Geographic because of our deep commitment to an exceptional guest experience and sustainable practices, in addition of course to the beautiful canyon location which we are happy to hear you enjoyed. However, we are sad to hear you were disappointed by other elements of your stay. While great thought was put into our hotel design, we have had to rethink our guest rooms by temporarily eliminating multi-use amenities to keep our guests safe during Covid. We apologize if anything did not meet your expectations because we always want our guests to leave happy with their stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach. We are open to discussing this further with you if that is a possibility and welcome any additional feedback you have or details on what occurred during your stay. Please do not hesitate to reach out to our Director of Operations, Chris Wylie at Chris@ranchlb.com or 949-715-1388.  Kindly, Kylie and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: So happy I chose The Ranch @ Laguna Beach
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Ranch! The room was beautiful and it was very clean. During these times, I appreciated the cleanliness and attention to this detail. Staff was very courteous and professional. The dinner at the Harvest Restaurant was excellent. I loved the French onion soup and loved my scallops. I am ready to go back!! —monica w.
Manager Response: Dear Monica W.,  Thank you for joining us at The Ranch at Laguna Beach! We appreciate your kind words. Our team works tirelessly with CDC approved sanitizers to ensure guests are safe and everything is clean. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your Harvest dining experience, too. The French onion soup and scallops are some of our favorite items on the menu. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!  Kindly, Kylie and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful anniversary weekend.Room was beautifully decorated and staff was attentive and accommodating. The shower in our room (703) was the best I've experienced. We have stayed at many resorts all over the world and this was one our favorites. Harvest restaurant was delicious!
Manager Response: Dear Danielle S.,  Congratulations on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate at our resort! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and time in Laguna Beach. It sounds like you were truly able to soak up all The Ranch has to offer with our beautiful rooms, attentive staff, and one-of-a-kind signature restaurant Harvest. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!  Kindly, Kylie and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: 4-5 ster prices, 2 star performance.Staying 2 nights , could not get a dinner reservation before 8:30 at night No attempt to help. Room upgrade promised , yet room was fine and clean but with a 1/2 full resort, could have been more thoughtful choice
Manager Response: HBvisitor2020,  Thank you for staying with us. We apologize for the experience that you had and can understand your disappointment. Regarding dining, due to COVID restrictions, our restaurant has limited outdoor seating. We do offer in-room dining as an alternative for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: It was nice, better without the flees
Summary: The facilities are nice, feels very relaxing and miles away from everything else but there were flees in the room, massage was terrible, food is good despite a rude host, overall good, could be much better though
Manager Response: DrLinares,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had and would like to speak with you further. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is our first time staying at the resort.  From the time we checked in, the valet, front desk, restaurant servers, pro shop, pool side to house cleaning, every staff was consistent across in terms of their service and knowledge.  Definitely first class establishment and would love to come back another time.
Manager Response: Alex L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled that you had an excellent first impression of the resort. Our team understands the importance of consistently delivering a high level of service and it is great to hear that it enhanced the quality of your experience. We would love for you to come back another time too.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: You want a tranquil, rustic, canyon resort atmosphere, you got it. You want to get some golf in, you got it. You want quick access to multiple, lovely beaches, you got that too. I went here with my wife and 3 teenage sons, she did her Yoga on the picturesque grounds, while my sons and I got some golf in. Then we would spend the day together at the local beaches. The resort food was good, the place was clean and spacious, and the customer service was outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear dcjohnson26,  Thank you for choosing The Ranch at Laguna Beach as your destination! We are delighted to hear you and your family had a wonderful stay. It sounds like you were able to fully enjoy all the amenities and activities our resort and location has to offer. Like you mentioned, there is truly something for everyone at our hidden gem in the canyon. We look forward to welcoming your family back to The Ranch soon!  Kindly, Kylie and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful Location, Service Like a Highway Motel
Summary: I would say the quality of service was like a motel near the highway. They must teach basics of hospitality, professionalism, respect towards the guest, and manner to their staff. Never seen this much rudeness. Their agent forgot to run my credit card upon checking-in, then on the last day, in the middle of the dinner, I received a very rude call from their reception threatening me to lock our room, if I don't go to the front office, immediately!!! It was a huge shock, I felt harassed,  the whole reservation was prepaid and it was their own fault that they forgot to run my card, their rude behavior, not only ruined our dinner, but also ruined the whole weekend for us. Extremely disappointed.  Also, in the times of COVID-19 outbreak, their claimed health and social distancing
Manager Response: Dear Sinify,  We are deeply disappointed to read your review and hear about your negative experience. We sincerely apologize for any misunderstanding during the check-in process. Our team always wants to provide the best service possible and we are so sorry you did not experience that. Please know we are taking all Covid19 related measures and CDC/State guidelines very seriously. We have reduced our outdoor dining seating by ½ per state mandate and we regularly sanitize every surface and touch point with CDC approved sanitizers. We never want you or any guests to feel unsafe at any point as the health and safety of our guests and employees is our top priority. Furthermore, if there is a possibility to discuss your stay in further detail with you and make this right, please reach out to our Director of Operations, Chris Wylie at Chris@ranchlb.com or 949-715-1388.  Kindly, Kylie and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Perfect place to relax and recharge
Summary: A turn off Coast Highway lead to another world.  Beautiful walls of the green canyon surround the gem of a resort and golf course. the front desk staff was welcominging and very helpful.  The lobby cozy and filled with flowers grown on the hotel property.  The room were spotless and large and decorated in a beach elegant, but extremely comfortable style.  I would have liked to take to pillows and bed home with me, I slept much better than usual.  Dinner at the outdoor restaurant was excellent.  The portions large, the views from the deck breathtaking and the service perfect.  We returned to our rooms to a peaceful quiet setting and used the outdoor rocking chairs until late into the evening.  I would have loved to spend more time, but will have to settle with a return visit
Manager Response: Mgoldsmith2020,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort allows our guests relax and recharge as the off-the-beaten path location is an escape from the normal hustle and bustle. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome as it sets the foundation for the quality of a guest stay. Sitting outdoors on the patio of your accommodation is a great way to enjoy some peace and quiet in paradise. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: If you are looking for a chance to grab a fews days of R&R, I would recommend The Ranch.  Beautiful location, quiet setting and peaceful ambiance.  The onsite and Lost Pier food is good too.  We enjoyed the pool and the beach.  The golf course looked like fun but we didn't play this time.  It's close to home but felt like a nice break.
Manager Response: X9037JDmarys,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled that you enjoyed a restful staycation. Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon offers a naturally peaceful and quiet ambiance. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was our first time traveling (locally within SoCal) since COVID-19 began for a brief, belated anniversary getaway. I was so pleased with the experience. The location is great, nestled in the beauty and quiet of the canyons but just a short 5-minute walk from the beach. Our room was modern, comfortable, and very clean; the bath products smelled amazing too. The hotel's efforts to enforce social distancing, masks, and overall cleanliness were excellent, from my observations over 48 hours; there were some people not wearing masks, but I saw staff tell people they needed to wear them. We really enjoyed our meal at Harvest and the staff seated us outside, socially distant from other tables, and wore masks the whole time. I also appreciated the personal touches like a note with a
Manager Response: Becky N,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at our resort. Like you mentioned, the property offers the best of both worlds with being carved into canyon (quiet and peaceful vibe), but yet only walking distance to the beach. The guestrooms were designed with decor that reflects the ambiance of Laguna Beach. Our team understands the importance of personal touches that create extra special moments for our guests. We appreciate the feedback on your experience at the pool as that helps us improve our operations. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful resort but it wasn’t worth the money. There were so many families that dumped their ill mannered kids at the pool, and did nothing to keep the kids from screaming and running around. The parents were just as bad by allowing this horrible behavior. There needed to be a manger of sorts down at the pool to do something about it.
Manager Response: 429marniem,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had as we understand the importance of enjoying a relaxing and peaceful visit. Suggestions like yours help us to improve our operations and we appreciate that you let us know.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Yummy food, excellent service and great amenities. Gym is 24 hours and there's a beach access. The jacuzzi wasn't warm though. The view is amazing and an overall 5 star experience. Thank you. Keep it up!
Manager Response: Sherpa14311129746,  We appreciate the two thumbs up and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a five star experience. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Resort that doesn’t understand pandemic threat
Summary: Spent 5 nights here for $700 per night. Shocking how the clientele at this resort is not complying with state public health mandates and the hotel is not enforcing them either. This includes no one wearing face masks even though the resort provides free bandannas, 6-8 people packed into a hot tub when the sign clearly states only 3 people at a time, no disinfecting of pool lounge chairs once people get up, guests openly laughing off restrictions— all this while another Covid resurgence spikes in California. I’m a physician, so I see risks differently, but this hotel could be the next OC outbreak with clientele that are uninformed, careless or both.
Manager Response: SophiaPatel88,  We are adhering to all State and Local Guidelines and taking the enforcement of the guidelines very seriously – we do indeed understand the threat of the pandemic. We have even asked guests to leave our resort due to non-adherence of mask and social distancing guidelines. We have zero tolerance for non-adherence of the mask and social distancing mandates – of which we agree with wholeheartedly. Our team has implemented the following wellbeing practices: http://www.theranchlb.com/wellbeing-practices  We do have team members sanitizing all surfaces before and after each guest use at all areas of the resort. We have team members from each department scheduled specifically for this task. We take this seriously and appreciate any concerns and feedback.  Thanks for taking the time to discuss this with us in person this morning. We hope we have helped with your concerns as we do take them seriously.  Sincerely,  The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location, quiet and peaceful, in between the canyon and the ocean.  Don’t miss the Lost Pier Cafe, just a 10 minute walk and the food is delicious!  Will have to try the spa and the gym next time.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Vacationer47728,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon offers a naturally peaceful and quiet vibe. It allows our guests to relax by unplugging from the normal hustle and bustle. Lost Pier Cafe is a great way to dine in paradise with views of the ocean and coastline. We look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: First time getting out of town since Covid came into our lives.  The staff was extremely professional and made us feel confident that the rooms were sanitized, cleaned and they were doing everything possible to make people feel comfortable.  Easy walk to the beach & the in-room tablet offered a morning hike with some of the best views of laguna.  Would love to came back when they're back up and running 100%, as I'm sure the restaurant is wonderful.    Highly recommend anyone that comes to laguna stay here! The rooms are nicely equipped and have a very charming esthetic.
Manager Response: Shawn P,  We are stoked that you had a great Memorial Day weekend getaway at the resort. The health and safety of our guests and staff are always our highest priority. Our team has worked extremely hard on developing/executing sanitizing and cleaning procedures. The resort restaurant, Harvest just opened up on June 1, so we would love to have you come back to dine and stay. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. We look forward to welcoming you back.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay was exceptional.  The Staff was super friendly and it was walking distance to the beach and shopping. There is onsite golf and the view from the restaurant is breathtaking.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Scottsellsvegas,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and we are thrilled that you had an exceptional experience. Like you mentioned, the view of the surrounding canyon is breathtaking and having beach access allows our guests to enjoy the best of both worlds (canyon and ocean). Our team works hard to go above and beyond for our guests as our goal is for each guest to return home with lifelong memories. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Darren Chaker Review of The Ranch Laguna Beach
Summary: I frequent Laguna Beach and have always enjoyed The Ranch. Its proximity to the beach, endless views, and courteous staff only compliment the meticulously landscaped property and views that seem to go on forever!  I have visited very few resorts that can match The Ranch in Laguna Beach. Safe travels, Darren Chaker
Manager Response: DarrenChaker_CA,  We appreciate your continued support and kind words. It means a lot to us. Our team wants every guest to feel like family and to return home with lifelong memories. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a wonderful place.  My wife and I spent six memorable days at the Ranch in late February.  We had a creek one bedroom which was generous in size and well appointed.  From the time, we arrived until the moment we left all was good.  The reception staff were always friendly and helpful; the Harvest Restaurant is first rate in every way; the outside casual eating area with evening fire pits was a favorite of ours and the golf course was a joy to play.  The beach shack was a perfect place for breakfast, lunch and an evening brew.   We had mentioned we were celebrating a special anniversary (50th!) and to our delight when we opened the door to our suite there was a bottle of Champaign, chocolates, and cookies.  Thank you to the Ranch.  And, lastly our compliment on
Manager Response: GeorgeF213,  Congrats and thank you for choosing to spend six days at the resort in celebration of your 50th anniversary! We are thrilled that it was a good experience from the moment you arrived until the moment you left. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Our team works hard to ensure that each guest returns home with lifelong memories and it is great to hear that was the case with your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Put it on your bucket lis. The views alone are priceless. Restaurant's great, spa incredible, 9-hole golf curse fun yet challenging. Unrivaled hospitality, and the rooms were flush with A+ design accents.
Manager Response: Ted242,  We are stoked that you had an excellent experience in the canyon. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. The rooms were designed with the purpose of an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance as we want our guests to feel like a local. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location and nice facility, except the patio of our room had a view of two large bushes that were overgrown so we could not see around them.  Do not stay in room 602 - it is for some reason the only room with this odd landscaping feature.
Manager Response: Paul M,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. We apologize for the landscaping inconvenience by your guestroom patio and will ensure that our team makes the necessary enhancements. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent customer service and very accommodating staff. We stayed in the two story, two-bedroom suite and it was wonderful and recently updated. The amenities were lovely (robes were so soft!) and the beds were very comfortable. The Harvest restaurant served delicious food and the ambiance is very nice and relaxing. I didn’t have cell service (Verizon), but it was a wonderful opportunity to unplug for the weekend. The cliffs surrounding the property make you feel like you have been transported to a different time and place. Highly recommend for families — the spaciousness of the two-story suite is perfect!
Manager Response: Khkcali,  It is great to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful getaway at the resort. The surrounding canyon provides a different perspective of a coastal setting. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is highly recommended for families due to the spacious two-story 1,125 sq. ft. layout. Regarding cell phone service, our Wi-Fi allows guests with compatible devices to active Wi-Fi calling. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We booked the two bedroom, one king, one queen. Two story town home set up with your own entrance, which was great! Easy access to nearby outdoor parking lot. It was very clean, appears newly renovated, well thought out beachy ranch decor. Second floor master bedroom has beautiful view of golf course, as did first floor patio area. There was one large bathroom with shower and dual sinks on second floor, queen bedroom on second floor. Both rooms had a small walk in closet. Two plush bathrobes provided as well as shampoo, soap, cotton balls, nail file, body wash. First floor has a small dining area with dining table with four chairs, microwave, two coffee makers, and sparkling water ($3 a bottle). Each floor had its own heater/AC unit.   There is a powder room downstairs with
Manager Response: Findjch,  We are grateful that you stayed with us. Thank you for the detailed feedback - we love the enthusiastic description you gave of your experience at the resort. It is always great to hear about our guests going home with lifelong memories. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We came to this resort on our wedding anniversary.  No question, this property is beautiful.  It’s a nice break from the hustle and bustle of city life.. work and all.  Also a good place to be with your partner as it gives a romantic vibe.  The vast expanse of the property including the golf course, restaurant and rooms were very nice.  Unfortunately they fell short on customer service.    First, when we arrived, I asked the valet if there’s a charging station and if he could just park my car there.  He then replied that I could park my car over there and just plug it myself.  I told him that my car doesn’t have to be plugged, I just need to valet the car. He said it’s a lot better if I do it myself and just gave me direction.  I didn’t want to make a scene so I just followed
Manager Response: Bor_ocsave,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the experience that you had as it does not reflect our standards. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My daughter and I booked two nights here, but after our second night, we loved it so much we booked an additional 3 nights.  The place is immaculate and the service is top notch.  When we arrived, check in had pre assigned our room, so it was such a nice surprise to pull up and see our lovely situated room with two rocking chairs and such a lovely view and fresh decor.  The pool and hot tub was amazing and we loved the outdoor area with music and  fire pits, as well as the lovely Harvest restaurant.  To get to the beach you can just call and be escorted in a golf cart and you even receive  beach chairs and an umbrella.   We will definitely stay here again!!!!
Manager Response: Doris B,  We are thrilled to hear that you extended your stay because you loved the experience so much. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. The canyon and beach are great places to relax in paradise. Our team designed the rooms with decor that reflect an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance as we want our guests to feel like a local. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel is very special, and must be experienced to understand how special it is. The location is pure magic, in a secluded canyon opening up to one of South Laguna's iconic beaches, all within a short private walk. The dining and common areas are also special. Live music on the patio in the evening, a top notch dining experience, and a very attentive staff made our stay very special. And the hotel room was very nice. Upscale with a craftsman style attention to detail. All in all, we felt very spoiled. We hope you have as great a time at The Ranch as we did!
Manager Response: Rickbanner,  We are stoked that you had a truly wonderful experience at the resort. The decor reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance as we want our guests to feel like a local. Like you mentioned, the daily live music is a great way to relax in paradise. Thank you for the recommendation to others and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Another perfect vacation. We had the joy of  celebrating our 52 anniversary at The Ranch and, like our stay before,
Summary: everything was excellent. The service was excellent and the room very comfortable though the bed is still too high for me (I'm 5/1and confined to a wheelchair.).Perfection is The Ranch. We recommend this to any family who wants a get away with peace and quiet available to all as well as fun and games for all.  %%
Manager Response: Brenda Jane U,  Congrats on your 52nd anniversary and thank you for celebrating it with a stay at the resort. We appreciate your continued support as it means a lot to us. It is great to hear that our team made you feel like family by delivering a high level of service. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We spent a long weekend at the Ranch.  It was our second time there.  SO relaxing. The Ranch combines casual and elegant, which is a wonderful combination.  Rooms are beautifully decorated and spacious, food is terrific, and service is also top notch.  The setting is spectacular.  We can't wait for our next time.
Manager Response: Antoniad805,  Thank you for spending a long weekend at our resort. We appreciate your continued support by staying with us multiple times. It is great to hear that you had a relaxing experience that was enhanced by our team delivering a high level of service. We can't wait for your next visit either.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: From our booking to the incredible stay at this wonderful accommodation in the canyon, we could not have been more pleased. A special thanks to Madison Powers who from over a year ago when we first were fortunate to have been at The Ranch the first time to the present for our return made every effort to ensure that this was our home away from home! She represents what excellence is all about. The staff and everyone who works here were kind, helpful and over the top. We will be back! Joey and Marsha Bloomfield Hills, Michigan
Manager Response: Joseph F,  We appreciate your continued support and kind words. Like you mentioned, we want all of our guests to feel at home away from home at the resort. It is great to hear that Madison provided excellent service that enhanced your experience. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your next visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A Hidden Gem in Orange County
Summary: Absolutely love this place.  The beaches and hustle and bustle along the PCH are drowned out but only a 5 minute walk away.  Just an absolutely serene setting in a wooded canyon.   We stayed in a two bedroom unit as a family of four on this trip and the lodging was perfect and so very cozy.  They have three different restaurants on the property, form the main restaurant which is always bustling, the laid back outdoor bar and grill which always had live music, and also the beach restaurant at Aliso Beach (run by the Ranch) can't be beat for brunch.    The staff couldn't be nicer here, everyone we interacted with was so genuine and warm.  This place is about a different style of luxury - it's not ostentations at all, more down to earth.    Perfect for a couples getaway or a family
Manager Response: MrBones22,  We are thrilled that you love our resort. Like you mentioned, the canyon location allows our guests to escape the hustle and bustle and yet still enjoy the best of both worlds with having beach access. It sounds like you dined at a variety of our outlets and made the most of your time. Our team understands the importance of ensuring each guest returns home with lifelong memories. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My sister and I treated ourselves to a night at the Ranch last night as a Pre-Christmas treat.  I wanted to love this place.  The website and reviews made it sound like a wonderful oasis.  I have to admit it is a cozy and cute property, but I found my stay disappointing.  First of all, it was raining when I checked in and with the self parking, all my luggage and I were soaked by the time I got into my room since I only have 2 hands and didn't have a third for an umbrella.  No, there was no help that was offered from the front desk when I checked in.  Once in my room, I discovered that they was no cell reception due to the location in the canyon.  Unfortunately, the wifi was too weak for mobile calling and texting in my pixel 3 phone.  The wifi was also too weak to cast any
Manager Response: HelenK632,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had and can understand your disappointment. I will be reaching out to you directly so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We’re from the area but moving apartments and needed a place to stay overnight. For a great rate, the Ranch seemed like a no-brainer. While we’ve played golf there a bunch, we’d never seen the hotel rooms. We were instantly impressed by the hotel service, staff, food and accommodations. Quiet, premium, and lovely. The hotel is just perfect for a stay in Laguna. Also, the Harvest restaurant is very good- the Duck wings are a must! The wine list is extensive, and the restaurant staff is exceptional. The one and only downside is small, there’s no minibar in the room so BYOB. Enjoy your stay!
Manager Response: D0lphin44,  It is great to hear that after golfing at the resort a bunch, you got to experience an overnight stay that delivered an excellent first impression. Like you mentioned, the naturally quiet vibe of the canyon allows our guests to relax and unplug. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Lovely resort making it One of my top places to stay!!
Summary: I’ve already written a review for this place and it hasn’t changed. This place is awesome. I’ve stayed here multiple times and I never leave disappointed. It’s a beautiful clean resort and the restaurant is great!
Manager Response: Nursehedda,  We appreciate the kind words and your continued support. It means a lot to us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We are regulars at Ben browns pantry for drinks and music and  tonight the service was outstanding . Zach, our server was so attentive and friendly he really made an impression on us .  Great service always makes the experience so much better and Zach knocked  it out of the park tonight . We will be back !!
Manager Response: Dianew471,  We appreciate your continued support by being regulars at the resort. It is fantastic to hear that Zach delivered a high level of service that left a great impression. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Staycation paradise at The Ranch in Laguna Beach
Summary: Great food, relaxing atmosphere, you feel a million miles away from the city. Totally one of my favorite places.  The spa services and serene atmosphere transport you away from your daily hustle. The canyon location provides the ideal spot to enjoy the stars in the evening and the beach in the morning.
Manager Response: JennTanaka,  We are thrilled to hear that our resort is one of your favorite places. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Stargazing in the evenings is a great way to relax in paradise. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property with a very cool vibe. Service is outstanding - live music most nights on the patio.   Don’t miss the spa and the large pool tucked away on the property. No cell service but who cares!
Manager Response: Denverjeff,  It is great to hear that you cherished the natural beauty of the surrounding canyon. Like you mentioned, the daily live music is a great way to relax in paradise. Wi-Fi calling can be activated on compatible devices to help with cell phone service. Thanks for joining us and we look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing Experience from Top to Bottom: Hospitality on Point.
Summary: Stayed at The Ranch at Laguna Beach last month and let me tell you.  Amazing.  From the moment of arrival to our departure the staff, property, F and B were awesome.  Can't say enough great things about our experience.    My wife and I stayed here many years ago when it was the Aliso Creek Inn.  incredible transformative redevelopment of the property.  we enjoyed the restaurant, pool area, and short walk to the beach.  Our room was well appointed and comfortable.  The staff was gracious and accommodating.  They made us feel special and important.    I would highly recommend staying at this property.  We will be back in the near future.
Manager Response: ModernTraveler10,  We are thrilled that from the moment of arrival through departure, you had an amazing experience. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome as it sets the foundation for the quality of the guest stay. It is great to hear that you stayed with us before and after the renovation, so that way you got to cherish the re-imagination of the resort. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. Please join us again soon!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Photos don’t tell the whole story.. BEWARE!
Summary: We stayed here on honeymoon and absolutely loved Laguna beach! We chose this hotel over surf and sand, and loved it apart from one very key element (incidentals policy).  Pros: Scenery incredible, idyllic location Bar, valet and restaurant staff so friendly and welcoming  Firepits SO relaxing and romantic (although be there early to grab one!) We had two amazing dinners at harvest the on site restaurant - which I will write a seperate review for!  Cons  Canyon room- adequate for a 5* resort. No view. They seem to pride themselves on their grounds and not their accommodations and guests experience (it is mainly a golf club).  Incidentals policy- I am unsure why no reviews mention this however I feel it’s unfair to customers if they don’t know about this up front. My first memory
Manager Response: Twodoves2019,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for any miscommunication regarding our incidentals policy. After speaking with Chris, he advised that $200 was authorized at check-in, followed by additional authorizations of $100 per night to cover your remaining balances throughout the stay due to the amount of charges that you posted to your room. After settling the folio, any remaining authorization amount was released at check-out. Please know that we did our best to work with you regarding the billing. If you would like to discuss this further, please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a way to spend a day, highest level of service with a smile. Harvest was an amazing three course B-Day dinner experience. If there is a downside its that I have ti leave, will return on any BDay.
Manager Response: RealONeill,  Thank you choosing to stay at the resort in celebration of your birthday. It is great to hear that our team delivered a high level of service that made your birthday truly memorable. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This lovely "Ranch at Laguna Beach" is a secret hideaway so close to urban Orange County, but it feels as if it's miles away. Set in a small valley, it has much to offer:  golf, a fitness center, a pool, multiple restaurants, entertainment on the patio and most importantly beautifully appointed rooms with luxurious linens, toiletries and special treats like salted chocolate, wonderful wooden adirondack rockers on your private patio. It was a delightful birthday treat!
Manager Response: Cam4234,  We are thrilled to hear that your stay at the resort was a delightful birthday treat. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Like you mentioned, the property offers a different perspective of a coastal setting. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Recently stayed at The Ranch with my family. It was nice and relaxing, when we asked for house keeping to make up the kids beds they arrived very quickly. The restaurant was fantastic and service impeccable. The bar outside had music every night which is great however some staff lacked in the speed and detail which makes it really hard to want to tip given it’s just a custom in this country. Not really a place for kids. The s’mores at night isn’t really what is promoted on the website, you buy a pack of s’mores and hope that you have scored a seat at a fire place otherwise you are interrupting others to roast a marshmallow. This could be done better. Another person staying at the resort said the same thing. Rooms were massive, we had a creek view and it was nice sitting on the
Manager Response: Fljngordo,  We are thrilled that you and your family enjoyed a relaxing stay at the resort. It is great to hear that the restaurant and housekeeping teams delivered a high level of service that enhanced the quality of your visit. We apologize for the experience that you had regarding s'mores on the patio and appreciate that you brought it to our attention so we can address it internally. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful hideaway hidden right under your nose!
Summary: We recently visited The Ranch to celebrate a bachelorette party and the property was amazing. Our bellman provided excellent service the moment I pulled in, helping me with my bags, letting me know that he was aware of the party I was meeting, and he didn't make me feel bad about the condition of my recently broken car that I left him to care for. A little uncomfortable with the idea that we couldn't park our own cars (complimentary valet only), therefore we didn't have our cars (or anything that we had forgotten inside) anywhere near our room. Our suite was spacious and beautiful, but I was surprised to find that there was no tub, considering the price of the rooms. The pool bar closed rather early (around 5pm), but we're thankful for the bartender that still made us drinks
Manager Response: Happiness_kat,  We are thrilled that your group had an amazing experience while celebrating a bachelorette party at the resort. Our team understands the importance of treating our guests like family and it is great to hear that the high level service we delivered made the visit truly memorable. A warm welcome sets the foundation for the quality for the stay. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Third trip to the Ranch was phenomenal.
Summary: The Ranch is tucked away in a beautiful valley with a golf course and wildlife.  The amenities are abundant....love the pool. Love the bartenders.  Gourmet seafood food! THe bar area was great for Sunday afternoon football.  I have seen weddings taking place during all three trips.  A top notch environment for couples.
Manager Response: Ada G,  Thank you for the continued support by staying with us for the third time. It is great to hear that the experience was phenomenal and that you loved a variety of amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Visited patio after golf.  Nice ambience with live jazz.   Beautiful location.   Food was good, but had run out of many items on Labor Day.    Nice cocktails.  Service was so so.   Worth a visit for happy hour for sure.
Manager Response: SMac64,  Thank you for joining us for a round of golf followed by happy hour and live music on the Porch. We apologize that some items had sold out and were not available. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: No soup for you! (or in this case, fries).
Summary: We decided to stop by on our way home for a drink, nibbles and some jazz (6:30 pm).  The Jazz was good.  The service not so much.  We sat for quite awhile, watching other tables be attended to multiple times (same tables, checked on many times), until someone came by.  I explained our experience to the waitress.  She was kind, understanding and apologetic.  She stated that she would take care of us exclusively for the remainder of the evening (more on that later!).  We ordered a couple drinks, a salad and french fries (a la carte).  Well, it turns out that even though fries are offered on the menu as a side to the burger selection, patrons may not order them a la carte.  Apparently, as it was explained to me by the nice waitress, even though the management realizes that they are
Manager Response: Max P,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience you had and will use it as a learning lesson. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com as we would like to ensure that we help with dry cleaning for the clothes that got the drink spilled on them?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: First of all, the Ranch is not at the beach in Laguna. It in fact is tucked away a short distance from Aliso Beach in a canyon which is the beauty of this property. Although only a 10 minute walk to the beach when sitting on the porch you will not hear car traffic, honking horns or sirens... only crickets.   My wife and I were celebrating our anniversary, a nice bottle of wine and a hand written card greeted us in our room, very classy touch.  The staff in all job positions are fantastic, everyone seemed genuinely happy to be there and were very helpful.  Parking is free and plentiful on the property.  The food is excellent, I had the pork chop for dinner (superb), not quite farm to table but they work hard to supplement what they can with fresh, property grown produce and it
Manager Response: Blaker777,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We appreciate the detailed feedback and it sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. It is great to hear that our team helped make your stay truly special. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The grounds are lush , green , pristine.   Great gold course.  Didn’t stay overnight, so my review is for the Restaurant and grounds.    Harvest Restaurant has the best lemon drops I’ve tried.  The food is so fresh, tasty.  Service is top notch.  It’s a great place for quality r and r.
Manager Response: Venezia1LosAngeles,  Thank you for dining at the resort. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the property is a great hideaway from the normal hustle and bustle. The surrounding scenery is lush due to the amount of rain we had earlier this year. Our team understands the importance of delivering a high level of service and we are thrilled to hear that it enhanced your experience. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Wonderful facility; super nice people--all of them! This is what "hospitality" means! Quiet and relaxing but fun for all
Summary: My  only concern was the height of the bed. The room was accessible in all ways but the bed height. The bed, once I got in, was very comfortable. Could a lower one be used in accessible rooms? This will be an unforgettable and wonderful birthday, thank you!!
Manager Response: Brenda Jane U,  Thank you for staying with us in celebration of a birthday. We are glad to hear that it was filled with wonderful memories and that the high level of service our team delivered enhanced your experience. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort allows our guests to relax in a quiet and peaceful setting. Regarding the height of the beds, they are lower in the ADA Mobility accessible room types. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family and I were staying at The Ranch for a family wedding.  Soon after we arrived we realized our AC was not working.  We called twice and complained.  Maintenance was sent both times, fiddled with the thermostat and said it was fixed.  It was not.  We could not be moved because there were no other rooms available.  We finally had to ask for fans because it was so warm we couldn't be inside without sweating.   We had to open the door/windows and use the fans to make it tolerable.  I didn't feel safe doing this at night because anyone could have come into our room but it was the only way to cool the room down enough to sleep.  Other people staying there said their rooms were so cold that they opened their doors to WARM their room.  We had to settle our bill the night before
Manager Response: LoveClearBlueWater,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences during your stay followed by the miscommunication. I have followed up with our team and confirmed that all the proper adjustments have been made. We are sorry that is was not handled more promptly. Please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent service. The 2 bedrooms Villa was perfect for me, my husband, and my sons. Very clean. Great place for enjoying the nature and a good landscape for playing golf. Good access to the beach. I would definitively stay here again!!!
Manager Response: AnaliaLan,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you had an excellent experience. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular due to the spacious layout. The beach path from the resort allows quick access to Aliso Beach and Lost Pier Cafe. Ben Brown's Golf Course provides exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not visible from other areas of the property. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I got married at The Ranch last year and came back for our 1st Anniversary. The way the light hits the canyon in the morning and at Sunset is always worth it. We also enjoyed walking down to the beach on the private path to the new Lost Pier Cafe :)
Manager Response: Rob S,  Congrats on your one year wedding anniversary and thank you for celebrating it with a stay with us. We are thrilled that you got married at the resort last year and that our property holds a special place in your hearts. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the walk to Aliso Beach and also dining at Lost Pier Cafe. It truly is an amazing experience. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Loved the Ranch but the bar needs some assistance
Summary: Beautiful property, lovely rooms perfectly appointed.  Grounds are clean and beautiful.  Customer service was excellent. Our only issue was that the various drinks we ordered from the bar that overlooks the golf course were "off".  This included everything from mixed drinks to sodas to morning coffee.  We ordered Aperol Spritz, Coke, Gin drinks, and morning coffee.  Everything was flat or bitter.  Not sure what the problem was but with this gorgeous venue - drinks are important.
Manager Response: MIkerry,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family as it is our goal for each guest to return home with lifelong memories. It is great to hear that the high level of service our team delivered enhanced your experience. We apologize for the quality of the drinks from Ben's Pantry as it does not reflect our standards and I will pass this along to our Director of Food & Beverage. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What an amazing property! Stunning views of the canyon. We stayed in a canyon room. It was beautiful decorated, the shower was awesome, the bed so comfy, great view! Service was exceptional. I wish I could stay another night!
Manager Response: Manasquanboe,  Congrats on this special time in your life and thank you for choosing to spend your honeymoon at our resort. Like you mentioned, the canyon provides breathtaking views and a different perspective on a coastal setting. Our team understands the importance of treating our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is an upper mid-scale hotel at luxury hotel prices. The best thing about this hotel is the high design quality of the rooms, which have an upscale beach theme. But they're set in unattractive motel-style rows that have little separation or seclusion from the crowds, cars, and one another. The hotel does not offer evening turn-down service, a mini-bar, or excellent service (rude bar staff), all which should come standard at this market tier. And there is little to no cell phone service on the property.
Manager Response: Andrew D,  Thank you for staying with us. It is always disappointing when the expectations of our guests are not exceeded. Like you mentioned, the guest rooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Regarding the cell phone service, Wi-Fi calling can be activated on compatible devices. We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience as guest feedback is important to our operations.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was really looking forward to my visit, and to decompress for a weekend. However, from the minute I turned into the resort and my phone cut out (there is no cellular service) things haven’t been what was advertised. While the grounds of the hotel are beautiful, The Ranch advertised not only the canyon in which it was built, but also its own beach - and its restaurant on the beach.  Turns out that both the beach and the restaurant are for the public at large. The hotel staff will take you only as far as PCH where they dump you to cross the road and walk through a children’s playground and public beach parking lot to get to the beach restaurant.  To get back, you have to ask the restaurant staff to call the hotel for the golf cart (because...no cell service) and you have to
Manager Response: QuietTraveller199,  Thank you for staying with us. We apologize for the inconveniences during your stay and can understand your disappointment, especially since it was not the peaceful and quiet experience you were looking forward to. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was completing a local move and utterly miserable all still in boxes and couldn’t  stay at the new place so made a reservation almost randomly at this place. MAGIC! The minute I drove up I could’t believe the physical beauty, the ambiance, the employees who could not have been more gracious and friendly. After a drink (or 2) and dinner at the restaurant happy hour a delightful employee named Fred drove my car to my room, grabbed my bag, opened my door .... WHAT A GORGEOUS room. What a magnificent vibe. Beach meets exclusive golf resort meets country club meets California flow. You’re steps from the beach but tucked into the mountains. DO stay here if you can !!!!
Manager Response: Fussyveryfussy,  Thank you for staying with us while completing a local move. We are thrilled that you had an excellent first experience at the resort and that our team made sure that you felt at home. Like you mentioned, the physical beauty of the surrounding canyon is breathtaking. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location! Such an amazing property. Surrounded by bees and hummingbirds in a breath taking canyon. This is a great value for the area. Walk out to the beach and have lunch at their restaurant on the beach.
Manager Response: Love2travelwithphil,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon offers a breathtaking view and a different perspective on a coastal setting. It is great to hear that you took advantage of walking to Aliso Beach and dining at Lost Pier Cafe. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fabulous! Fabulous! Fabulous! There are no words to describe how wonderful this place is for vacationing whetherr as a couple or a family.  They make you feel pampered for the time when you check in to the time when you check out.  My family and I stayed here for five nights and we were first welcome with gifts chocolate, cookies,tapenade, and wine.    The rooms were the immaculate and clean.  they offered you turn them service every evening and left chocolates on your bed or pillow.   The staff goes out of the way to make sure that your stay is enjoyable with you and your family.    They offer a wonderful saltwater pool that may not be as big as other hotels, but it is sufficiently sized for the resort. As a guest you can order snacks or meals along with beverages at the pool
Manager Response: Mae7328,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide detailed feedback. We are stoked that you had a fabulous experience and that it was one of your favorite vacations with your family. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Our team understands the importance of going above and beyond for our guests as our goal is for every guest to return home with lifelong memories. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wow this place was beyond my expectations. When we vacation in this area we usually stay at the Ritz Carlton or Monarch Beach Resort (formally the St. Regis) but I wanted to experience something different. The photos online makes this place look very woodsy and scenic. You would think the beach is far away but it's actually right across the street! They have a golf cart shuttle that takes you to the street and you just walk underground thru the tunnel to cross the street and the beach as well as a children's playground is right there!  My daughter and I did a little stay-cation here this past weekend. We are from San Diego and it was a short easy drive to the ranch approx. 45 min! We arrived Friday morning around 10am and did not expect our room to be ready and waiting for
Manager Response: Dtravelgal,  Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled that your experience was beyond your expectations. It is great to hear that you got to spend some good quality time with your daughter in paradise. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome upon arrival as it sets the foundation for the overall experience.   The guest rooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Brussels sprouts are definitely a guest favorite when dining.   Like you mentioned, in addition to the 20+ beaches in town, there is over 15,000 acres of trails for hiking, biking or running. Guest feedback is very important to our operations, so we appreciate your comments on the pool area.   Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a wonderful and relaxing honeymoon. We swam, enjoyed the spa and the staff is amazing. Highly recommend The Ranch for vacation, honeymoon or even family time with kids. There’s something for everyone.
Manager Response: SusieQ1522,  Congrats on this special moment in your life and thank you for choosing to spend your honeymoon at our resort. It is great to hear that you had a wonderful experience and got to relax in the canyon. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: 70th Birthday stay, dinner and early morning golf
Summary: We live local in Dana Point, my wife wanted to do a staycation, she decided on the Ranch.  The rooms have been thoroughly remodeled, the dinner was exquisite, and the 9 hole course in great  shape  Tucked in the Canyon off Coast Hwy, secluded enough, yet a golf car ride to Aliso Beach to enjoy fun in the sun.  The staff is very accommodating, helpful and courteous.  There is music on the patio every evening from 4:00 - 8:00 with table service for drinks and lite dinner fare. A fun evening, before of after dinner, for a causal nite out.  Give it a try, it's a hidden gem on the beach in the OC.
Manager Response: Paapaa11,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate a birthday with a staycation at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your celebration by taking advantage of a variety of activities and amenities. Like you mentioned, the daily live music is a popular way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My fiancé and I absolutely love The Ranch at Laguna Beach . The staff is always friendly and housekeeping is superb. We find it hard to leave at checkout . If you get a chance eat at Harvest and ask for Indi and Gabe , five stars on their service and attention to detail .
Manager Response: Culture34995898543,  We are thrilled to hear that you and your fiancé absolutely love the resort. Our team understands that delivering a high level of service and attention to detail are both very important to the quality of a guest experience. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers a peaceful and quiet vibe. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a great vacation here with my husband and my parents for 3 nights. Felt very peaceful surrounded by green hills and trees. Rooms are very spacious and comfortable. The main restaurant was fantastic- all the dishes we ordered were delicious and we went 2 nights in a row!  Only negative was golf course. It was just average compared to other facilities.  It was great overall and will come back one day!
Manager Response: Kshim86,  Thank you for choosing to spend 3 nights at the resort. We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience. It is great to hear that you got to relax in the peacefulness of the canyon and also dine at Harvest 2 nights in a row. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had the pleasure of staying here for an Anniversary celebration. We LOVED it.  It was so relaxing and beautiful. We took advantage the of SPA and had a couples massage.  We had the best massages ever by Nadia and Penny.  They were both very good.  We loved the Harvest restaurant.  The food was delicious.  It was great to drive in and be hidden by the surrounding mountains yet be right across the street from the beach.  We enjoyed going on walks at the beach.  It is a great and beautiful place to stay and would love to go back.  I recommend it for couples and adults.
Manager Response: Busybeeebeauty,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled that you loved your time and had a wonderful experience. It is great to hear that you took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. The walk to Aliso Beach is very popular among our guests, especially since dining is available at Lost Pier Cafe. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A hidden gem in lovely Laguna Beach
Summary: We stayed three nights at The Ranch and enjoyed every minute. The hotel is located in the middle of the canyon within a short drive to downtown Laguna Beach and a few minutes walk to the beach. The rooms are decorated very well with all required amenities. We stayed in a 1 bedroom with a large king size bed and a sofa-sleeper that fits a family of 4 very well. The pool might not be huge but with the Jacuzzi it is a very nice spot to relax for a few hours. The gym is fantastic with all the latest equipment. WiFi is very strong across the entire hotel. We also had breakfast and lunch at the Harvest and really enjoyed. Staff members are all very friendly and attentive.   There were only two small negative experiences we made. A.) charging a service fee of USD 5.—for having a drink
Manager Response: MontyStoller,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us for three nights and thrilled to hear that you enjoyed every minute. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being located in the canyon and yet only walking distance to the beach and a short drive from downtown. Lost Pier Cafe will be extending their hours in the near future. We will pass your feedback regarding the pool bar to the department manager. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We came here for an outdoor wedding with maybe 100 people.    What a beautiful setting!  Surrounded by oak hills, beautiful green grass lawn.  Service and coordination was impeccable.    All parking is valet.    The only negative was the food.   Several of us that ordered the steak found it so salty, it burned the mouth and throat.   I found it inedible,  but others soaked it in some water and were able to eat it.   Otherwise, it was a very nice cut.    Over salting is one of the only ways to ruin a flat iron steak.   I still give this 5 star, because of the beautiful location, and impeccable execution (except the food)
Manager Response: Lacheng,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. It is great to hear that the service and coordination was impeccable. Like you mentioned, the canyon provides a breathtaking backdrop for a ceremony. We apologize for the quality of the food that was delivered to some of the guests. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Hidden Gem of the Valley
Summary: Do ever want to stay silent about a place?  Its so wonderful that you don't want anyone else to discover your find.  Well, The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a true Gem with the nicest staff, friendliest staff, wonderful food, clean and comfortable rooms, family friendly, warm and inviting, beautiful and one of the best resorts we have been to ever!  Can't say enough about this spot.  Yes, you have to walk to the ocean, but the little valley the resort is in!!!  Amazing!!  Go, go and then go again to enjoy before the rest of the world discovers this spot.
Manager Response: Beth G,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our resort is one of the best resorts you have ever been to. We appreciate the kind words as it means a lot to us. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We held a company all day meeting at the Ranch. What a great little find. We had a well appointed meeting room right off the 9hole green.  It was a great relaxing day. With relaxing views of the coarse and surrounding canyons.  The staff was very accommodating to our needs. We had lunch at the restaurant on site which will be in anther review. As we finished our day we had drinks on the balcony watching deer walk right past us in the hills.  The place was surprisingly busy. It is hard to find off PCH and then the drive in is a little deceiving, but keep going till you come to the hotel and golf coarse. This is a hidden gem that you won’t be disappointed with.
Manager Response: Davek705,  We are grateful that your company chose to host a business meeting at the resort. Like you mentioned, the view of the canyon and golf course from Ben's Boardroom is breathtaking. Our team works hard to be accommodating and to exceed the expectations of our guests so that they take lifelong memories home. The local mule deer love to greet our guests and we are thrilled that you got to experience that too. Thank you for also dining at Harvest for lunch during your meeting break. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We haven't taken a vacation in Laguna Beach for many years however were looking for a place not too far a drive from home, and not interested in flying for a short trip. This place is a VERY short drive from Coast Hwy. Absolutely serene. They completed a two year renovation about three years ago. All you could want in a resort. quiet, great and helpful staff experience. (not such a great restaurant however there is always Nick's up the coast a few short miles away. And we did not go there for the food, but rather the relaxation.) They had great activities within the property. One night, Martini night with a little bluesy jazz band. Another night had Vino and Vinyl, which we did not have a chance to get to but I am sure that we would have enjoyed it. The only thing that could
Manager Response: Allan S,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and appreciate the detailed feedback. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced with ordering food and drinks by the pool. I will share this with our Food & Beverage management team as an area for improvement. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The 9 hole course is one of my golf loving husband’s favorites. A few 4 par holes and the rest 3 pars. We love the hills, greenery, the view of the course from the communal seating area and the restaurant/bar. It’s also walking (or golf cart ride) distance to a fabulous beach. Rooms were all recently upgraded/remodeled so they’re like new. The restaurant and bar are great! I love the food, service, wine selection and view of the course. There is NO ocean view from anywhere on the property. There is a pool and spa which I’ve not been to. You can walk or get a lift up to the highway to catch the free Laguna trolley that runs everyday in summer season and on weekends the rest of the year. Shops and restaurants are not really walking distance from this place but it is it’s own
Manager Response: 317denisel,  Thank you for visiting the resort. We are stoked that Ben Brown's Golf Course is one of your husband's favorite courses to play. Walking to Aliso Beach is very popular among our guests, especially since they can dine at Lost Pier Cafe while watching the waves crash on the shoreline. The Laguna trolley is a great way to explore the variety of experiences offered along the 7.1 miles of coastline. We appreciate the kind words regarding the re-imagination of the property and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The website does not do this place justice. My little family spent four amazing days there eating great food at Harvest, relaxing at the pool and enjoying mornings and evenings at the beach. The service was beyond phenomenal - both at the font desk and within the restaurant. Our small children were treated like adults and never talked down too. We stayed in a super comfortable room (1001) with two bedrooms and large sitting room overlooking the golf course. It was quiet and beautiful. We didn't leave in a car other than to fetch a few things at the local grocery (Gelsan's - also great!). Thanks RLB for an amazing stay.
Manager Response: Mypeeko,  We are thrilled that your family had an amazing four day stay and that the high level of service our team delivered enhanced your experience. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family as our goal is for our guests to return home with lifelong memories. Relaxing at the pool and the beach are great ways to spend your time in paradise. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are popular due to the spacious layout over the 1,125 sq. ft. Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Ideal for brunch, super menu, everything so tasty, valet parking. Only Country Club serving Farm 2 table I know of in So CA or nation. Unique decor, & private canyon for golfing. Off PCH. Try the juices on the menu, the Ginger Lemon is  unique, Homemade A-Z. Take home boxes 2. Need padding on seats for outdoors dining.
Manager Response: Spacetourist,  Thank you for visiting the resort and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. Like you mentioned, herbs, fruits and vegetables and other ingredients on the Harvest menu are grown on our own half-acre garden. The resort was designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My Wife and I stayed 4/12-4/14. I am thrilled to report that The Ranch at Laguna Beach exceeded my expectations. We thoroughly enjoyed this hotel. From the moment we arrived we were treated to excellent customer service. The food was a great value. For the price you DID receive a great amount of food and the quality of the food was excellent. The room was very nice and clean. We had zero issues with noise. The double vanity, LARGE and plenty of hot water shower, clean and nice bed, and excellent overall room were wonderfully appreciated.   The room had curtains to drown out the sun and provided us a dark room for sleeping in. The AC in the room was excellent. We like it cold at night, and the AC accomplished the job.   Each room apparently has an "ipad" tablet type device.
Manager Response: Alex C,  Thank you for staying with us and for the detailed feedback. We are thrilled that your expectations were exceeded. Our team understands the importance of an excellent welcome upon arrival as it sets the foundation for the quality of a guest stay. Thank you for sharing the specific examples of when our team went above and beyond to assist during your visit. It sounds like you returned home with lifelong memories. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wow, this place really under performed. The pool is a joke. More like a kids community pool. Do not pay over $200 for these rooms, $150 is more like it. They are decent inside, but small. Almost zero view in most of them of the beautiful valley the hotel is set in. The little happy hour deck is nice up top and the restaurant looks decent but I’m not gonna take my chances having dinner there. The rooms are way over priced. One positive is that the staff has been phenomenal.
Manager Response: Alexakos1,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A hidden paradise in Laguna Beach
Summary: Laguna Beach is on the top of the list for people who live in Los Angeles and who want to get away for a short stacation. The Ranch exceeded all my expectation. Located right in the middle of the canyon, surrounded by mountains, it has a very comfy local vibe but also attracts a lot of international tourists. Needles to say that it’s the perfect place for golf lovers. The Ranch features a lot of local performers. Music is a big part of the vibe. The rooms are beautiful and clean, the staff is super friendly. The location is perfect for celebrations and weddings.
Manager Response: Natalie_Aley,  We are stoked that all of your expectations were exceeded during your visit to the resort. Like you mentioned, the daily live music is very popular among both the locals and hotel guests, especially since it features a lot of local performers.
