The surrounding canyon provides a breathtaking backdrop for a wedding ceremony or event. Ben Brown's Golf Course offers a unique experience on each of the nine holes. Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a wonderful place to stay in Orange County.  This is a beautiful and quiet hotel located in a stunning canyon setting. The rooms are decorated very well and are a good size and good value, we stayed in a 2 Bedroom suite and it was perfect for a family of four, but I think the Studio Suites would be fine as well for a family. All of the staff were so nice and accommodating, they seemed happy to be working at this hotel. The shuttle to the beach is easy and it is just a quick walk under PCH in a tunnel to get to a really nice beach. I do wish that the Lost Pier cafe was open past 3 pm because we were not able to get beach chairs and towels by the time we arrived at the beach, or perhaps have them available to take from the resort to the beach. We drove
Manager Response: JoSto19,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers a peaceful and quiet vibe that allows our guests to relax by unplugging from the normal hustle and bustle. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our goal was to reflect an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and accommodate the needs of our guests and it is great to hear that we delivered excellent service that enhanced your experience. We apologize for the issue regarding beach chairs and towels and will pass it along to our management team. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: All perfect!  Service from the moment we arrived, gorgeous room (got an upgrade to a one bedroom suite), views, stunning property, amazing restaurant.  Can’t wait to return.  A most relaxing stay.  Well done!
Manager Response: Kideye808,  We are stoked that you enjoyed a fabulous and relaxing stay at the resort. Our team understands the importance of delivering high service levels from the moment our guests arrive as that sets the foundation for the quality of a guest experience. Thank you for staying with us and we can't wait for you to return either.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful Location and a High Level of Service
Summary: We stayed as a family for three nights in a two bedroom cottage. The cottages are beautifully decorated, have lots of space, including storage space and walk-in closets.   The entire setting is unique and located between two canyon walls and with a creek running through. I highly recommend the golf course view. It’s hard to describe the atmosphere, but it’s luxury in an otherwise rustic setting. While it recently achieved AAA Four Diamond status, I think the Ranch at Laguna Beach is close to a Five Diamond status (I use the AAA Four Diamond as a benchmark for accommodations).   Staff members were attentive and housekeeping did a consistently good job. I usually feel the need to re-clean everything. I didn’t need to do that. It was very clean.   The only thing I really missed was
Manager Response: KimmyKit,  We are thrilled that your three night stay at the resort was a highlight of your two week family trip. Your detailed feedback means a lot to us and you did a great job describing the location & atmosphere. It sounds like you made the most of your time. Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Such a great get away (and so close)
Summary: Has the pleasure of staying at The Ranch at Laguna Beach over the weekend (March 29/30).     The rooms are really well done, plenty of room, with great ammenties.      If you can time it right, afternoon cocktails at the Golf Clubhouse bar, with live music, is a must.  Have fun.
Manager Response: Dkwetz,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. The goal was to design the property with decor that reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. The daily live music and happy hour is definitely a great way to relax in paradise. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at that ranch for four days and absolutely loved it!  The grounds are stunning, the staff is exceptional  and  the rooms are beautifully decorated and well appointed.   We ate at the harvest restaurant every night and found everything to be wonderful...  A few highlights the brussels sprouts are a must and the salmon was delicious.   The ocean is a quick walk down 5-6mins max or you can take a ride on a golf cart by the staff.  We will be back soon and would recommend it without question.
Manager Response: AmyGertie,  Thank you for staying at the resort for four days. We are stoked that you loved your experience. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. The Brussels sprouts are definitely a guest favorite. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Old time beach charm with modern amenities. I plan on coming back with my family, so close the Beach and yet so far away! The quiet canyon environment is quite and soothing. If you like Laguna without the crowds this is for you!
Manager Response: Mike P,  Thank you for staying with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort allows our guests to escape from the crowds and unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. The resort was designed to pay homage to early California, while still reflecting an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visit with your family.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is amazing. We live close but have stayed here a couple times for a weekend getaway. The staff is amazing and very helpful. The atmosphere is so relaxed and just lets you rejuvenate. I got a chance to play golf this time and although it's a shorter 9 hole course, it's in great shape and very challenging. The happy hour can't be beat with live music on the patio overlooking the course. We will be back again soon!
Manager Response: Curious58652242177,  Thank you for your continued support. We are thrilled that you have had many amazing experiences at the resort. Like you mentioned, the daily happy hour and live music is a great way to relax in paradise. The off-the-beaten path canyon location allows our guests to rejuvenate and recharge. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Wonderful gem "hidden" a few minutes from the beach.
Summary: This little gem of a natural golf resort hide away is everything you can wish for if calmness is more important than buzz and fancy. Lovely and clean rooms, great tasting simple dishes and a laid back atmosphere. Loved it. At half the price of Montage, this is a no brainier. On top, it's two minutes to the best beach, Table Top.
Manager Response: ChrisBraathen,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you loved your experience. Like you mentioned, the resort is situated in a ideal location for a peaceful and relaxing vibe. Many of our guests cherish the best of both worlds by walking to Aliso Beach. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location, resort and food. It’s nestled in the mountains, no cell reception at first concerning but warmed up to the idea that no one can reach me. Walking distance to the beach but yet driving to places was close. We enjoyed our time there .. Victoria beach to see the Pirate Tower, walking PCH, amazing food at the resort at Harvest and local spots such as Urth Cafe and the Deck for dinner and cocktails. In addition the spa at the resort. We had facials and it was absolutely relaxing. Our room was clean and cutely decorated. The bed nice and comfy. I liked that there was a small microwave and fridge. Overall, great experience.
Manager Response: Ccastr047,  Thank you for staying with us. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline, so it is great to hear that you took advantage of exploring the local area. Like you mentioned, facials at Sycamore Spa by Hudson sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Regarding cell phone reception, due to our unique canyon environment, service may be spotty. Therefore, we encourage all guests to enable the Wi-Fi Calling function on your cell phones prior to your arrival at the resort. This will enable your cell phone to function normally throughout the resort. Our team also offers other solutions. We are thrilled that you had a great overall experience and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We just returned from a beautiful family holiday at then Ranch. The setting is absolutely sublime and the vibe couldn’t be more welcoming.  We have two young sons who enjoyed the heated pool and we all relaxed in the hot tub enjoying the epic sunsets.  We would highly recommend happy hour and nightly live music, it was one of the highlights of our trip, sitting outside and soaking up the magic of the property.  We were only meant to visit for a couple days but instead ended up extending our stay for a few additional days as we didn’t want to leave!  Thanks to the Ranch at Laguna Inn for such an amazing stay - will be recommending it to all our friends!
Manager Response: Amandabblakley,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you had a beautiful family holiday at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Thank you for the recommendation to others as it means a lot to us. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Positive - The bed was super comfy. High water pressure. Nice grounds & greenery.  Negatives - I didn't like being in Building #1. Our Room (103) was right next to the road and we can hear the cars & people pass by. For the amount we paid, we weren't very happy. For that price, we could've gotten an ocean view at another hotel. Also, most water bottles in hotels are complimentary (just as tea & coffee are complimentary), so I was surprised to see that water was $3 per bottle. Again, for what we paid, it was disappointing. I felt like being nickel & dimed. Other than that, the grounds are nice...but it did have this nice summer camp feel to it for adults. I expected more based on all the reviews.
Manager Response: EvainDubai,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your experience as our goal is for all of our guests to have their expectations exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a wonderful 3 day stay (buy 2 nights get the 3rd free) at this beautiful resort hidden in a canyon just off Pacific Highway.  Rooms decorated like Pottery Barn.  Pet free and smoke free which was wonderful! Especially enjoyed the happy hours by the fire pits complete with heaters for the cool evenings and an umbrella for the rain!
Manager Response: Dream04454075921,  We are stoked that you got to take advantage of the special offer and enjoy a three night stay at the resort. The fire pits on the porch are a great way to relax and keep warm during the cooler evenings. The rooms were decorated in a way that makes our guests live like a local. Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Unique hide away close to Laguna Beach
Summary: We held a business seminar at the hotel and it was very unique - not what I would have expected. Set back in a canyon from Laguna Beach it is a little off the beaten track. It looks like a smaller hotel built around the 60's set on a golf course that has been completely redone into a luxury unique hotel set around a pool. The staff are amazing and the service is great. The restaurant located on site is also very good and not terribly expensive. The hotel is not that large so it does have an intimate feel to it. The rooms are nicely appointed and I had one of the two level rooms with two bedrooms which would be very nice for a family with a great living room space below that opens out to the pool. What is nice is that the hotel is very eco-friendly with unique touches everywhere.
Manager Response: MillionMiler17,  Thank you for holding a business seminar at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property is very unique due to the off-the-beaten path canyon location. We are thrilled to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. Our property participates in many sustainable and eco-friendly programs, such as using reclaimed water for irrigation purposes, crushing every glass bottle on property into sand and sifted to be repurposed to fill bunkers on our golf course, using only paper straws at all of our food & beverage outlets and wooden and bamboo room keys instead of the standard plastic material. Regarding the cell phone service, we do our best to assist our guests with Wi-Fi calling and other options. We appreciate the feedback as it is very important to our operations.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Not what we expected. Spend your money elsewhere. Not impressed with the spa or with the service. Spend your money at pelican hill or another upscale property. I do not anticipate we will be returning.
Manager Response: Adventure32881524869,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. It is always disappointing when the expectations of our guests are not met and exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Such an amazing place!!  It's got canyon / mountain views, not ocean views, but you can walk to the ocean in less than 10 minutes (or a golf cart can drive you there in 2 minutes).  The rooms are beautiful, clean, and modern.  The thing that made this so incredible though was the service.  I've traveled a ton and this service was top notch.  It's the best I've ever had.  The resort would be great for couples, a girls getaway, a guys weekend away, and of course families too.  They have something great to offer everyone.
Manager Response: MoiRenee,  Thank you for staying with us. It is great to hear that you had a phenomenal experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the canyon and yet only walking distance from the beach. Our team understands that a high level of service is the key to the quality of a guest stay and it is our goal for our guests to leave with lifelong memories. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: So hard for me to rate this place because the grounds are so beautiful and we loved our room. They could definitely improve the cleaning and touch ups on the room. For it being such a highly rated hotel you wouldn't expect there to be so many scuffs on the walls and the bathroom to look like it hasn't been deep cleaned in a while. Aside from that we had a great stay the first night we never wanted to leave however the second night was pretty terrible.    Unfortunately, we had neighbors who decided to have a party. They were blasting music, extremely rowdy and people coming in an out all night until the early morning. We called the front office to voice our complaints a few times and it was never resolved. We were planning to have breakfast in the morning at the Harvest and
Manager Response: Pioneer54514052548,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are so sorry for the experience that you had at our resort and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I loved this place, I have been dreaming of a place like this and words cant Express it all. We only stayed for 2 nights and it wasn't enough. Will be back soon. They are so cute with their details and their decor is beautiful
Manager Response: Global288984,  We are stoked that you enjoyed a relaxing and peaceful two night stay. It is great to hear that you were dreaming of a place like our resort. The resort was designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. The goal is for our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We spent two nights at The Ranch with our family of four, and we couldn't recommend a better experience than we had. Every single person on staff is incredibly helpful, kind, and joyful to be there. The rooms are gorgeously decorated. Everything is top notch.
Manager Response: Compass57883436386,  Thank you for spending two nights at the resort with your family. We are stoked that you couldn't recommend a better experience than you had. Our team works hard to ensure each guest stay is filled with lifelong memories and it is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I stayed at the Ranch for a Girls weekend get away.  The room was large and very comfortable.  We had great service whenever we called for any service.  The restaurant  service wasn’t as amazing but it was a nice atmosphere.  The spa was also just ok. There isn’t much to it visually.  I omyself didn’t have a massage but my 3 friends did and they said the massages were good
Manager Response: Lanifisher,  Thank you for staying at the resort for a girls weekend getaway. We are stoked to hear that our team provided great service whenever it was requested. A treatment at Sycamore Spa by Hudson is definitely a wonderful way to relax in paradise. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The location, nestled in a valley, but within a short walking distance to the shore, is ideal. The restaurant is excellent and it's a good thing, because a car is needed to go anywhere else. The rooms were very appealing, and well-appointed. They are all at street level, so access was very easy. Because it was still Winter, the room costs were very reasonable, and thus excellent value, but not sure I would pay the usual rates for the summer season.
Manager Response: Nottooparticular,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being located in the canyon and yet only walking distance to the beach. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful rooms in an absolutely beautiful setting.   Harvest is a great restaurant, and Lost Pier was perfect for breakfast after a surprisingly short walk to the beach.   At every turn, we were surprised at how much thought had been put into every decision. The furnishings, the public spaces - all met or exceeded expectations. We will be back soon.
Manager Response: Resort12032633230,  We are stoked that your experience exceeded your high expectations. Our team works hard to go above and beyond to assist our guests in enjoying a stay filled with lifelong memories. It is great to hear that you took advantage of dining at Lost Pier Cafe at Aliso Beach as it is just a short walk from the resort. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was traveling with my good friend who is a quadriplegic. He had a small accident on the sheets and I was charged $150+.   Charged a smoking fee for smoking on my balcony. Complaints about music even though o was trying to drown out the unsupervised children in the room next door.
Manager Response: NicolecY86OP,  You are correct that you had additional charges on your folio at check-out. These were due to a number of issues that we experienced with you and your guests during your visit. First and foremost there was a considerable mess in the room upon check-out including smoke residue, ashes, destroyed linens, marijuana smoke odor, and very badly stained carpets. Due to this we had to put the room out of order for several days to deep clean and make the room rentable again. In addition, we had complaints from every single guest that lodged near you during your visit due to the excessive noise coming from your room. Our front desk team had to put the rooms around you out of order so that we could save other guests from having their stays impacted. The suspicious activity of multiple unregistered guests in and out of the room through all hours of the day along with large quantity of marijuana found in your room at check-out was also a major bother to our other guests. Furthermore, our front desk team did give a courtesy call reminder to your guests that we are a non-smoking property – this was ignored and your guests continued to smoke in the room as well as on the patio where the smell of marijuana was bothersome to other guests. Due to these issues as well as others there were extra cleaning fees added to your account. These fees covered the excessive damage to the room as well as to help cover the refunds that were given to other upset guests. Please do reach out to me at Chris@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further and per our discussion on the phone you are no longer allowed here on property.   Sincerely,  Christopher and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I loved our visit! So many ways to feel and be pampered. There was even a tablet in the room for things like services- including requesting ice delivery! The robes were amazing, the restaurant was fantastic, THE VIEW was wonderful. Being tucked away in the canyon gave the feeling of being in the mountains and it was so quiet! Then we requested a ride to the property’s edge where all we had to do was cross through a tunnel and we were at a gorgeous beach. For families, there’s a playground right on the sand and the river outlets there so it’s nice shallow water to play in. We got a room by the creek which had a studio with a pull out sofa, huge walk in closet, microwave, keurig AND Nespresso machines, two sinks, large shower, and porch with a couple of chairs. We went away for
Manager Response: Safari12610142828,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for celebrating it with a stay at the resort. We are stoked that you loved your visit. Like you mentioned, the in-room tablet is very useful as it allows our guests to request a variety of services. Aliso Beach is very popular among families due to the playground, bonfire pits and also Lost Pier Cafe. Overall, it sounds like you made the most of your time. Your kids would definitely enjoy the fire pits and corn hole on the porch. We look forward to your return visits with the rest of your family.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Rooms were very noisy because of parking lot traffic going over boards that were there to protect the hoses used for golf course flooding.   We were there for three nights and the weather was very cool.  So we could not use any of the resort services, so I was not happy about paying the daily resort fee.
Manager Response: Daydream31067713047,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had and can understand your disappointment. Someone from our management team will be reaching out to you to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fun place tucked away in the Laguna Canyon.  Rooms were very comfortable and felt like separate cottages.  Good for couples, families, group parties.  Views are amazing.  The restaurant gets really packed so make sure to get your reservations in advance!
Manager Response: Kurtk44,  Thank you for staying with us. Like you mentioned, there are a lot of fun things to do in the canyon. Harvest is very popular among both the locals and hotel guests, so we always recommend to make dining reservations in advance. Our reservations team does assist our hotel guests with dining reservations and other concierge related items during the pre-arrival phone calls and emails. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife surprised me with a weekend getaway for my birthday from Oceanside to Laguna Beach. We have always stayed right on the beach until now but The Ranch has changed all that. This eco-friendly place feels like you are away in the mountains but yet a short stroll to the beach or optional complimentary cart ride by the resort. Nestled in the canyon and surrounded by towering cliffs, it is an absolutely stunning setting that you don’t get anywhere else in this area.   There is a heated salt water pool, jacuzzi, and full service spa. There is also a spectacular 9-hole golf course that we unfortunately didn’t get to play due to recent heavy rains damaging it. However, it was scheduled to re-open in a few days so we will come back to play a round for sure.  The restaurant and bar
Manager Response: Sean92056,  We are thrilled that your wife surprised you with a weekend getaway at our resort. Thank you so much for the detailed feedback of your experience. Hearing about experiences like yours is very inspirational to our team as they work hard to create lifelong memories for our guests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Enjoyed my stay, beautiful location & sharp well decorated rooms with excellent service both at front desk as well as the ranch hands. The restaurant menu and wait staff are also very good. The Ranch may want to extend its restaurant kitchen and room service hours as 930pm shutdown is way too early for a resort
Manager Response: Voyager36450362333,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that the front desk, culinary and guest services teams delivered excellent service that enhanced your experience. The guestrooms were designed with decor that reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. Thank you for your feedback as we always appreciate it. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Our new favorite place to get away
Summary: We loved the feel of the place and the location. They had live music when we were there and games on the patio and multiple fire pits. We took the free shuttle into town. The staff was very friendly. We will defiantly go back. I have told many of our friends about it.
Manager Response: Carole C,  We are thrilled that our resort is your new favorite place to get away. Like you mentioned, the happy hour and live music is a great way to spend your time in paradise. It is great to hear that you took the trolley into downtown as Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: So Cal is not my favorite travel destination, but family brings me back. That said, the Ranch was a delightful surprise - beautiful serenity tucked into the canyon. The weather was a bit cool and rainy, but we still were able to enjoy peaceful afternoons on the patio in front of the fire listening to the live acoustic music.  The rooms were kept meticulously clean and included all the little details that are often absent.
Manager Response: Cruiser35772155314,  We are stoked that you had a lovely stay in the canyon and that the resort was a delightful surprise. Like you mentioned, the surrounding nature offers a peaceful vibe. It is great to hear that you got to enjoy happy hour and live music on the patio as that is a wonderful way to relax in paradise. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very nice place. Meet our total expectations.  Very good food in your restaurant. Nice Bar area.  Did not golf due to rain. Will next time.  We will be coming back for sure with some friends.  Have been recommending your place to everyone we know.  Great getaway for us.
Manager Response: Curious36116374485,  Thank you for staying with us. We are stoked that you enjoyed a great getaway at the resort. Our team works hard to exceed the expectations of our guests by delivering excellent service that creates lifelong memories. We appreciate the recommendation to others and it means a lot to us. We look forward to your return visits with some friends.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful rooms. Stayed in the Creekside studio and had a lovely time. Excellent room service. Right across the street from our favorite beach. The food was great as well. A little pricey but tasty. We will go again!
Manager Response: Curiosity42055042017,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. The setting allows our guests to enjoy peaceful relaxation in paradise. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of the premier, old line resorts in Laguna Beach.  Unique because it has a lightly used golf course ($35-$45 on weekends).  Also a large restaurant in case you don’t want to drive into the wide selection of in town restaurants.  Rooms are OK but not overwhelming.  My wife liked the spa.  Nice 10 minute walk to the beach. Friendly staff. But all of this comes with a price- pretty high.
Manager Response: Mgerhardt,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. Like you mentioned, our resort is the home to the only golf course in Laguna Beach. It is great to hear that your wife enjoyed a spa treatment and that you walked to the beach. Hopefully you dined at Lost Pier Cafe at Aliso Beach. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Absolutely the place for a smaller business meeting get away. Clean rooms, nice staff, good room service, quiet and beautiful surroundings are all part of the package. Cell phone service was not the best but then again you are nestled in between some beautiful hiking hills!
Manager Response: Trek13449815521,  Thank you for hosting a business meeting at the resort. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path location allows our guests to relax by unplugging from the normal hustle & bustle. Due to our unique canyon environment, cell phone service may be spotty. Therefore, we encourage all guests to enable the Wi-Fi Calling function on their cell phones prior to their arrival at the resort. This will enable cells phone to function normally throughout the resort. Our team can also assist with other solutions. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a fantastic time at the Ranch. We introduced the resort to our best friends whom we have annually gone away with to celebrate birthdays. Loved the whole weekend. We'll be back for sure. Thanks for the extra touches.
Manager Response: Nicole G,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort for your annual best friends getaway and also in celebration of birthdays. We are thrilled that you loved the whole weekend experience. Our team understands the importance of going above and beyond for our guests and it is great to hear that the extra touches our team provided made your visit memorable. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It is tucked away in the canyon, just off the beaten path.  We were there for a charity event so my husband golfed while I was able to take a day off and go to the spa and relax in the room.  The spa is small but comfortable.  My body scrub and massage were amazing! The pool is quite large (although it was too cold to go). The rooms seem recently renovated and are so inviting.  I was able to relax in my spa robe on the supremely cozy and comfortable bed.  I have not had a day like that in many years.  It is a beautiful, peaceful place. I only ate breakfast in the restaurant but it a large space, all windows with a huge stone fireplace surrounded by comfortable furniture.  They have shuttles to the beach if you want to do that as well.  Also a very nice work out room.  Not large
Manager Response: IAmStill17,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a peaceful, calm and relaxing experience at the resort, especially since you had not had a day like that in many years. It sounds like you both found excellent ways to spend your time in paradise by golfing, dining, going to Aliso Beach and getting a spa treatment. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch was Fantastic!! Loved it from the first moment we arrived.  The valet welcomed us with a smile and the front desk was just as welcoming.  The room was charming and had lots of character.  The rain for the weekend put a damper on our stay but luckily it held off on Friday night for us to enjoy the magnificent live music and happy hour on the Porch!!  The firepits, appetizers,fabulous sangria, and scenery were phenomenal.  The dinner at the Harvest was another pleasant surprise.  The food and staff were great!!!
Manager Response: Km Z,  We are thrilled that you had a fantastic experience and that you loved the resort from the first moment you arrived. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome as that sets the foundation for the quality of a guest stay. Like you mentioned, live music and happy hour on the Porch is a wonderful way to relax in paradise. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The best and coolest place in Laguna Beach!
Summary: This place is so cool and beautiful! The staff was more than amazing celebrating a special birthday for my wife. The views are amazing. The life entertainment was awesome! The restaurant was amazing. An all in one resort a block from the beach. The rooms are so awesome, far better than most any huge name chain that we've stayed at. We are coming back for sure!
Manager Response: Vacation27213838857,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your wife's birthday with a stay at the resort. Our team works hard to make the experience full of lifelong memories for our guests. Like you mentioned, the daily live music is a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Exceeded our expectations in every way!
Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach exceeded our expectations in every way! The ambiance of the rooms and the restaurant (Harvest) was classy, cozy and coastal and we found it very relaxing. The staff were so helpful and accommodating to special requests. We were pleasantly surprised by how quiet our room was, especially given the fact that there was a busy wedding event held there during our stay. Not once did we hear doors slam or voices of neighbors. Our bed was so comfortable and our room spotless. What a rejuvenating and relaxing experience our stay was! Love this place and hope to return in the very near future!
Manager Response: Alm2222,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. Our goal is to exceed the expectations of all of our guests and it is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced the quality of your visit. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort allows our guests to relax and recharge by unplugging from the normal hustle and bustle. We are thrilled that you loved the resort and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is the place you want to be - feels a million miles away but one 5 minutes to the heart of Laguna.  Drinks on the patio at sunset are the best!   The staff is amazing, the rooms are large and feel brand new.  You’ll be glad you stayed here but might not want to leave.
Manager Response: ChrisdR4020EY,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you had an amazingly relaxing experience. Like you mentioned, the canyon location provides a different perspective of Laguna Beach as Aliso Beach is within walking distance and downtown is only a short drive away. Watching the sunset reflect off the canyon walls is truly breathtaking, especially while enjoying drinks and live music. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a wonderful place to stay for anyone, singles, couples, families.  Close to beach, homey, yet very elegant atmosphere. Great service.  Loved  the room and the location.  We look forward to coming back.  Spacious, wonderfully furnished room.
Manager Response: Antonia D,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a wonderful experience and that you loved the canyon location of the resort. Like you mentioned, the guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. The goal was to design the property with decor that reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent comfortable and spacious rooms and a very relaxed atmosphere. Nestled in a small canyon, but an easy walk  - or very short drive - to the Pacific Coast Highway and the restaurants and facilities of Laguna Beach. The restaurant was good - both food and service - and the large outdoor terrace area was a nice spot for evening cocktails and casual dining.
Manager Response: RNPSHP,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the 87-acre property is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal setting as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. The daily live music is a great way to enjoy food & drink while relaxing in paradise. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Lovely hideaway so close to the beach
Summary: Overall, a lovely place. The 2 bedroom cottage is not a true cottage, but is spacious and roomy. There is a lovely dining area, living room area and 1/2 bath on the first floor and then two bedrooms with roomy closets on the second floor. Only one shower for the whole place though. The beds are very nice. Staff overall are nice, but the spa ladies were not super helpful. The fitness center is small but really the fun and beauty is outside. The pool is nice and the service people there were very attentive and friendly.
Manager Response: Pioneer57143928750,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and stoked that you had an overall lovely experience. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback as it is important to our operations. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout like you mentioned. We apologize for the service that you received at the spa as it does not reflect our standards. Our team hopes that you choose to stay with us again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I can't say enough good things about The Ranch at Laguna Beach. The property is in the middle of this gorgeous canyon and you can smell the salty ocean air nearby. It feels almost like an adult summer camp, in the best way. The rooms were gorgeous and always clean, the golf course was gorgeous, and the drinks and food at Harvest were innovative and delicious. Can't wait to come back!!
Manager Response: Taylorp449,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate that you can't say enough good things about our resort. It is always great to hear when our guests have an amazing experience. Ben Brown's Golf Course offers exclusive views of both the canyon and creek that are not visible from other areas of the property. The seasonal menus at Harvest provide new and exciting options throughout the year. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A restful oasis golf or no gold
Summary: This property is getting all the points right.  Refurbished nondescript buildings set in a beautiful canyon and garden setting.  The rooms are perfectly appointed; staff extremely friendly and helpful.  The Harvest Restaurant food is terrific and served in a delightful setting.  We enjoyed happy hour on the deck outside the pro shop.  We are not golfers but the course seemed busy all three and a half days we stayed.  The closest thing to a downside would be the 8 minute walk to the beach.  I look forward to a return soon.
Manager Response: Jacksbud,  We appreciate that you stayed with us and took the time to provide feedback on your experience. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Our team works hard to  deliver excellent service as we understand that is the main key to the overall quality of the experience. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch was just a short drive up along Aliso Creek yet worlds away from he hustle and bustle of PCH. I enjoyed my stay a lot. It is a beautiful property. One thing is that There should be something done about the golfers taking the parking spaces for overnight guests.
Manager Response: Safari01571782434,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path location of the property allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. The location offers the best of both worlds by being carved into the canyon and yet only walking distance from the beach. The resort is very popular among hotel, golf, restaurant and spa guests, so we offer both valet and self-parking to accommodate the best we can. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with our overnight stay at The Ranch. We are local and I took my daughter for a girls night and stayed on a Saturday in January. Everything was so kid friendly and lively. We enjoyed the live music, she ran around on the grass with other kids, played corn hole, made s’mores, ordered room service and more. We loved the restaurant for both breakfast and dinner, and just had a great time. We are looking forward to doing it again soon.
Manager Response: Shenanae,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a staycation at the resort. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the live music and games as that is a relaxing way to spend an evening in paradise. Since you are local, hopefully this was the first of many future visits. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your first impression of the property.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It's a beautiful property. If you are looking for a peaceful and calm environment, just be aware that there are lots of families with small children and the dining room is quite noisy. The location is great and the rooms are very nice.
Manager Response: Z8056CJsharonm,  Thank you for staying with us. The resort is popular among solo, couples, families and a variety of other types of travelers. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline that attracts guests to visit. We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: went for faculty retreat , was overwhelmed with how cool this place is . I live in SJC and won't hesitate to recommend this place.  What a gem! I wish to be accurate and concise therefore the last part of this review is meaningless achieving my 200 word limit
Manager Response: Companion37579772348,  Thank you for joining us during a faculty retreat. It is great to hear that you live close by, so hopefully that means that you will visit us more often. We really appreciate the recommendation to others.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a lovely place to get away from the hustle of everyday life in the OC.  I surprised my husband for his 40th birthday with a staycation at the resort...we enjoyed a round of golf at Ben Brown's, cocktails and live music for happy hour, a delicious dinner with friends and breakfast the following morning at Harvest.  The rooms are beautifully designed with a rustic, modern decor and the landscaping throughout the property is stunning.  This was an adult-friendly visit but I can't wait to go back with our children to experience the many activities they have for kids and families.
Manager Response: Seaside58146211212,  Thank you for surprising your husband for his 40th birthday with a stay at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of the celebration by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Our team designed the guestrooms with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor that reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. We look forward to welcoming you back when you bring your children to experience the fun in the canyon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Love this resortand location, nestled between mountains. It's super relaxing and the bungalows are romantic and beautiful. Having brunch at the Harvest restaurant is a must do as well as a spa treatment. Spa is small but the services are excellent! Love coming here when in Laguna.
Manager Response: Calleyne,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience. Like you mentioned, the canyon location allows our guests to relax and recharge. A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa and dining at Harvest are definitely both great ways to spend your time in paradise. Thank you for the recommendation to others and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Relaxing January break at The Ranch
Summary: We’ve just returned from 4 nights at The Ranch in early January. This  was part of a SoCal road trip so we spent some time researching OC options before settling on The Ranch. Happily this was a great decision, lovely setting, great comfortable room (2 bed cottage), the kids even manage 2 days in the pool. Just a quick shout out to the guys running the pool bar, so helpful and friendly. We had breakfast at Harvest each day and it was great, plenty to choose from. Also the walk across the creek to the beach was easy and convienent. We had a great stay and the kids (12,9 yrs) are already planning our return!
Manager Response: Britchick123,  Thank you for staying with us for four nights during your Southern California road trip. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular due to the spacious layout. It is great to hear that you enjoyed daily breakfast at Harvest and also took advantage of walking to Aliso Beach. We are thrilled that you are already planning your return visit and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I love this place.  Not your typical Orange County Resort.  The canyon is beautiful.  The rooms and service were amazing. I would return here for business or with my family.  I plan on coming back many times in the future.
Manager Response: Explore23416941283,  We are thrilled that you love the property. Like you mentioned, the 87-acre resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal setting as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back many times in the future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great business stay. very exceptional staff and very nice rooms!
Summary: My stay at The Ranch was for a 2 day business meeting.  The room was very nicely furnished and the staff exceptional.  The property is beautiful and well maintained.  And the walk to the beach was really nice and close.  Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Inspire15651240844,  Thank you for staying with us during a two day business meeting. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family to ensure the home away from home experience. We appreciate the recommendation to others and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We wanted a hotel that was quiet and out of the tourist bustle, and the Ranch certainly delivers on that. Our room was beautiful and comfortable, and I appreciated the eco-friendly focus (however, the "pod" style coffee machine isn't in line with that). i'm not sure what the extra 'resort fee' was for. We loved the late afternoon live music and cocktails on the terrace - a nice touch.
Manager Response: NickyFan,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort allows our guests to escape from the normal hustle and bustle. We strongly focus on sustainability and being eco-friendly through a variety of programs such as using reclaimed water for irrigation which saves 21.2 million gallons of water annually. The daily live music is a great way to enjoy food & drinks while soaking in breathtaking views of the surrounding canyon. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property, perfect location, great staff. Quiet area but close enough to the beach and busier parts of town. Spent an afternoon at the beach and then stayed the night. Food was amazing as well!
Manager Response: Wander27149411840,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you cherished the naturally quiet vibe of the canyon. The off-the-beaten path location allows our guests to escape and relax. Aliso Beach is a popular spot for our guests to visit, especially since dining is available at Lost Pier Cafe. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It’s the most beautiful location with matching amenities. The restaurant is excellent, the golf course is well maintained and the ambience is transformative. You feel like you are in a beautiful lodge in the mountains yet you are steps away from the beach.
Manager Response: Discover06225325547,  We are thrilled that you felt at home away from home during your stay at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family to ensure that the experience is filled with lifelong memories. Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon offers a very unique ambiance. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing place, didn't want to leave!
Summary: We traveled with another couple, and booked rooms at The Ranch last minute.  When driving in, the buildings don't look like much, but the rooms are gorgeous!!  The hotel was very busy the night we arrived, due to a private event.  Parking and getting luggage to our room was a little crazy, but not a huge deal.  Check-in itself was very easy.  We went to our rooms and then decided to dine at the restaurant on site.  We had to get a later reservation but were able to enjoy apps on the patio while we waited for dinner.  After dinner, the bed was super comfy.  I didn't want to leave the next day!  Our friends loved it so much they have already made another trip back.  This place is a hidden gem, and truly delightful!
Manager Response: Carolinesc7,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities like the live music and happy hour on the patio. We are stoked to hear that since your friends loved their experience so much, they already booked their return stay. We hope that you do the same.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The grounds were beautiful. The rooms were beautiful and clean. We loved how close it was to the beach, yet secluded. Golf course was hard for us but we don't golf so we don't have much to compare with. Still was a lot of fun! Everyone was very kind and helpful. Our only real complaint was the Harvest restaurant. The service was a bit lacking. We had to wait one morning a solid 10 minutes before someone FINALLY came over to ask if we'd like coffee. We also noticed each time we dined there that the waiter or waitress tended to disappear for prolonged periods of time, which was frustrating if we needed something. Our final poor experience was when we ordered the cinnamon roll to go, specifically saying NO BACON, which the waitress duly noted. So we did not think to check our roll
Manager Response: Sadab7,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. It is great to hear that you had a wonderful hotel experience. We apologize for the experience that you had at Harvest and can understand your disappointment. The service you received does not reflect our standards. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Within a short walking distance to the beach but world's away from the hustle and bustle of Laguna, The Ranch is a real gem.  If you don't need an ocean view, this is the place to stay.  The Aliso Creek running alongside the property is home to waterfowl and runs to (from?) the ocean.  Rooms here are elegant and comfortable and the entire staff is friendly and at your service.
Manager Response: Worldly2,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. The setting allows our guests to enjoy peaceful relaxation in paradise. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We'd driven by the entrance to this beautiful property dozens of times but had never been onsite.  A last-minute decision to spend New Year's Eve there was wise and wonderful.  e stayed in one of the basic rooms (building 9) and it was lovely:  comfortable king sized bed, spotlessly clean, nice bathrobes and a cute patio with teak rocking chairs to sit just outside our room.  The team was able to secure a reservation for us at the Harvest Restaurant where we enjoyed a delicious meal.  The patio lounge area just above the golf course was the perfect place for a before dinner cocktail.
Manager Response: Kbranman,  Thank you for making a last minute decision to celebrate New Year's Eve with a stay at the resort. We are stoked that you finally got to experience the property after driving by the entrance dozens of times. It sounds like you had an excellent first impression and got to enjoy a variety of amenities. We hope that this was the first of many visits. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great escape in Laguna Beach. Close to downtown but not in the midst of traffic and tourists. Rooms were updated and comfortable. Quiet resort oasis. Fun escape at the patio bar with jazz band. Would go back.
Manager Response: FarAway39270430670,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed a great escape in Laguna Beach. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort is ideal because it allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle, but is still close to beach access and a short drive from downtown. Live music is offered seven days a week and is very popular among both resort guests and the locals. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay - stayed over Christmas at the recommendation of my sister, who is a local and hosted our family this year.  Great room, beautiful property, super friendly service, very solid breakfast/burger/salads at Harvest, nice spa and small but totally functional fitness center.  Housekeeping left a little to be desired but generally an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Carolinel2018,  Thank you for staying with us over the Christmas holiday. We are thrilled that you stayed with us based upon the recommendation of your sister and that you really enjoyed your experience. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced the quality of your visit. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful hidden gem in Southern California
Summary: When you live in a tourist city, like San Diego or Los Angeles, where do you go to get away for a long weekend that isn't a large metropolis and a four hour drive? The answer - Laguna Beach. The terrain keeps urbanization away so Laguna Beach is a small, mostly one-road-by-the-beach town, that is a very wealthy, quaint beach community. The Ranch is enclosed in a beautiful quiet canyon a short walk from the beach. The room we stayed in was cabin-like (purposefully) and very luxurious; we enjoyed it for the amenities and the few steps to the heated pool and hot tub. The restaurant was very good, though not exceptional like everything else on the property. There is a golf course and spa though we didn't try them out. There is live music every day on a bluff that overlooks the golf
Manager Response: Odyssey28138819407,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and that you took the time to leave such detailed feedback. Like you mentioned, Laguna Beach is a wonderful place to visit for a peaceful and relaxing getaway. There are such a variety of experiences offered along the 7.1 miles of coastline. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. The live music is offered seven days a week and is very popular among resort guests and the locals. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A unique experience, 5 stars all the way
Summary: We had an amazing anniversary at the Ranch. When we checked into our room, we were surprised with a plate of macarons, dark chocolate and a bottle of wine. Loved sitting by the fire pits for dinner and drinks. The entire hotel - room, grounds, restaurant - was beautiful. Such a lush experience!
Manager Response: Freedom17904757279,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for celebrating it with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled to hear that the welcome amenity added a special touch to your visit. Like you mentioned, sitting around the fire pits while enjoying food & drink is a great way to spend a relaxing evening in the canyon. It is always our goal to provide our  guests with a five star experience. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This property is amazing.  The grounds and the rooms are immaculate.  The restaurant is spacious, and the food is of the highest caliber.  Aliso Beach is within walking distance from the property.  The spa is professionally maintained and offers a wide variety of services to guests.  I will definitely stay hear the next time I'm in the area!
Manager Response: Paula B,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and are thrilled that you had an amazing experience at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. We look forward to your return visit next time you are in the area.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Lovely Tranquil Place & Great Customer Service
Summary: We spent a lovely couple of nights at The Ranch in mid December and throughly enjoyed ourselves. Beautiful creekside room, walking distance to the beach and so close to everything in Laguna Beach. The staff were terrific and a special 'shout out' to Lauren on the front desk who went above and beyond to help me get a Christmas package sent. She was amazing! We'll be back.
Manager Response: Mary G,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and are stoked that you thoroughly enjoyed your experience. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being secluded in the canyon and yet only walking distance to the beach and a short drive from downtown. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Our team works hard to go above and beyond for our guests and it is great to hear that Lauren assisted in getting the Christmas package sent. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We are always trying new hotels and traveling and this hotel had the best service, views, food, comfort, cleanliness, friendly staff all in one, thank you we will be returning again. We highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Connector18616461118,  Thank you for staying at our resort. We are thrilled that you had such an excellent first experience and appreciate the recommendation to others. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and ensure that each stay is memorable. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Right off the beach, yet tucked beneath huge mountains, The Ranch at Laguna is the perfect weekend get away. We felt like we were in Utah, or something, but then a short walk, and we were at the beach. The service was amazing; when we ordered room service for breakfast, they brought us a plate full of pastries on the house. And the check in was so fast and helpful. Harvest restaurant is delicious and all farm to table. Also reasonably priced! And they comped our wine because it was a birthday. We stayed in a two bedroom cottage (girls weekend), and it was the perfect amount of space and comfort. Such a great deal too (get 3rd night free). Seriously couldn't have been any nicer and more relaxing.
Manager Response: Tenley H,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us for a girls weekend to celebrate a birthday. It sounds like it was a very memorable visit. Our team understands the importance of delivering excellent service and it is great to hear that it enhanced your experience. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Dont want to but have to share the love!!
Summary: How much do we love this place!! From our fave guy Memo to the beautiful grounds, the  live music, golf course and amazing rooms and the view!!! As much as we want to keep this place a secret, have to share the love of this amazing property. Book it already!! You're welcome:)
Manager Response: Tennis1031,  We are stoked to hear about how much you love the resort. It means a lot to us when our guests share their experience with others and recommend a visit to our property. Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our weekend stay in the Ranch canyon setting felt like were far from home even though only 35 miles away.  A wonderful escape at this unpretentious resort that is artfully designed to feel homey and comfortable yet with all the nice amenities, and services you would expect from a high end resort. with considerate, helpful and efficient staff. Fantastic dining opportunities at the Harvest Restaurant,  outdoors Ben's Pantry and beach sides Lost Pier Cafe.  Love that canyon setting and views of the golf course meandering back into the canyon.  The Sycamore Spa was the icing on the cake.  As comfortable as the rooms and excellent staff.
Manager Response: DayTrip35984939540,  We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities during your stay. Like you mentioned, the location of the property offers a different perspective of Laguna Beach. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is such a peaceful place to get away from the daily grind.The rooms are spacious and comfortable and very quiet.The pace is relaxed so you can slow down.Guest services are available when needed and help is always available.For families there is a pool and of course the beach is within walking distance.
Manager Response: Flyer651255,  Thank you for staying with us over the holidays. Our team is here to assist in making the stay of our guests truly memorable. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location allows our guests to relax by unplugging from the normal hustle and bustle. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I've never stayed at a resort with friendlier and more attentive staff! Amazing!
Summary: I was in awe of how friendly everyone was, and the level of attentiveness and service was over-the-top! I will be staying at The Ranch at Laguna Beach again! Golf was a beautiful walking experience in a serene canyon. Food was to die for. Outside deck with fire-pits and live music was a really enjoyable way to spend the evening. Loved it all.
Manager Response: Coastal16824349733,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our team understands the importance of going above and beyond for our guests to ensure that lifelong memories are taken home. It sounds like you made the most of your time and took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: should be 5 stars but service wasnt great.
Summary: Stayed here on a whim yesterday. The room was beautiful, and front desk staff very friendly.  The walls are pretty thin, so I did have to turn on a white noise app on my phone, and was still awakened by our neighbor talking loudly and then again when their room service came. I would have given this hotel 5 stars if it wasn't for the staff at the Harvest restaurant. We went in Saturday evening 2 hours before they closed, we had to ask to order at the bar, service was horrible and we were totally ignored. at 10:30 they just started cleaning up and never asked us if we even wanted anything else. We thought it was just a one time issue, so we went back there for breakfast. This time sat a table and not the bar. We had the same issue. Service was very poor and extremely slow. Our
Manager Response: LLLauraLLL,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the service that you received at Harvest, especially since it happened on multiple occasions. It is always disappointing when we do not exceed the expectations of our guests. Someone from our management team will be reaching out shortly to discuss further.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: There were 14 of us for a girls weekend.  We had a fantastic time. Everyone is so welcoming and happy. I had the hot/cold stone massage and it was amazing! Best massage I've had in years. The beds are insanely comfortable. We will be back! It's a little on the pricey side but worth every penny! This would be great for couples or a family trip as well as there are so many fun things for everyone to do!
Manager Response: Tourist66991545804,  Thank you for staying at the resort for a girls weekend. We are thrilled that everyone had a fantastic time. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome as it sets the foundation for the quality of a guest stay. A massage at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We look forward to having you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lovely time here, nestled in the canyon across PCH. Very walkable grounds, including a dedicated foot path to beach. Only minor complaint would be room hadn't been turned down upon arrival as requested.
Manager Response: Hjarta5,  We are stoked that you had a lovely time at the resort. Like you mentioned, the walking path to Aliso Beach is very popular, especially since our guests can watch the waves crashing on the shoreline while dining at Lost Pier Cafe. We apologize that we did not provide the requested turndown service as we understand the importance of exceeding the expectations of our guests. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Absolutely loved staying here. We live in Los Angeles so this will be a quick getaway for the future. Great hotel with great staff, fabulous food, and many amenities. Can't wait to come back in the summer and sit by the pool!
Manager Response: Chadwickkate,  Thank you for staying with us. We are stoked that you absolutely loved your experience at the resort. It is great to hear that you live close enough for future getaways. We look forward to your return visit in the summer.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: didn't sleep there but did enjoy the 9 hole golf and great food at lunch and dinner. viennie was a great waiter, friendly and professional. good views to relax too. there are often dear families walking around on the golf course... they also have outside seating with a guy playing music.
Manager Response: GeoBuilders,  Thank you for playing a round of golf at Ben Brown's and for dining at Harvest. Those are both great ways to relax in paradise. The local mule deer love to greet our guests and we are glad that you got to experience that too. Live music is offered seven days a week on the patio. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My Fiancée and I have stayed at the Ranch multiple times, this is our favorite resort in California. We've been to all the big resorts that are two or three times as expensive, and the ranch wins every time. I highly recommend you stay here!
Manager Response: Benjamin B,  We are stoked that our resort is your favorite in California. Thank you for the continued support. It means a lot to us. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It doesn't get more beautiful than The Ranch. Gorgeous views and it is peaceful at all hours of the day. Service wasn't 100% but everyone was friendly and it didn't get in the way of us having a wonderful time. We hope to visit again!
Manager Response: Venture56267494714,  Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled that you cherished the beauty of the surrounding nature throughout the resort. Our team understands the importance of going above and beyond for our guests to enhance the quality of their experience. We hope that you can visit again too.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our first stay at the property and we were impressed by our beautiful two bedroom suite next to the pool.  All the amenities including a Keurig coffee maker and an espresso machine. We entertained clients for a business meeting and they were equally impressed by the property. We enjoyed dinner at the Harvest Restaurant on the property our first night (bbq ribs fell off the bone). We also enjoyed room service lunch and dinner served by Jaime, a friendly room service steward. The Ranch is definitely off the beaten path in a secluded canyon, but a short walk to the beach. A beautiful outdoor pool, indoor spa and 9 hole golf course are also on the property. We will return in the near future.
Manager Response: Don H,  Thank you for staying with us. We are stoked that you and your clients were impressed during your first experience at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time and took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our bed was uncomfortable and the sheets weren’t soft and smelled like chemicals. The room reeked of chlorine and was stuffy. Few amenities includes for the price. Bath products are made in China. They gave a key that didn’t work so we were locked out of our room at one point after we went to pool. This is not a four star hotel, just a four star price.
Manager Response: Triggs81,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had. It is always disappointing when the expectations of our guests were not met and exceeded. Our team wants to ensure that our guests have a comfortable and enjoyable visit. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is beautiful! So close to the water, but nestled in the canyon. We are from Orange County, but have now found our new little get away. What a wonderful lodge for families or couples! Our kids loved. We loved it. We will be back.
Manager Response: Amber E,  We are grateful that you stayed with us and stoked that you found your new local getaway. It is great to hear that your entire family loved your experience in the canyon. Especially now that Lost Pier Cafe is open at Aliso Beach, our guests enjoy dining with front row seats to the coastline. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Amazing ombiance, great food. Love the outdoor live music with fire pits. The rooms are so comfortable and spacious. The spa was very mediocre. It was small with no amenities. Service in the spa was great. Just no extra perks.
Manager Response: Journey12702492585,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the view of the surrounding canyon enhances the ambiance. Live music is now offered seven days a week and is very popular among resort guests and the locals. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family and I truly loved this hotel! The hotel grounds were beautiful. My boys enjoyed walking to the beach close by. I enjoyed a beautiful hike to see the views of Laguna and Dana Point. The room was spacious and perfect! A wonderful quiet location perfect for a beach get away!!
Manager Response: CoryM1255,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and stoked that your family loved the resort. The walk to the beach is short and allows our guests to eat at Lost Pier Cafe while watching the waves crash on shore. The hiking in Laguna Beach is incredible and offers breathtaking views. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a quiet and relaxing getaway. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Our get away Place in Laguna
Summary: Great relaxing and friendly atmosphere.  Great Bar to sit and have a glass of wine and have some appetizers.  Great views of the golf course and an occasional deer running across the fairway.   Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: JohnnK3110VR,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing experience in the canyon. We are thrilled that our resort is your getaway place in Laguna Beach. Like you mentioned, the local mule deer love to greet our guests. We can't wait for you to return either.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It's hard to review a place without saying at least a few things that are not quite right about it.  The review isn't really believable if all you do is rave. But I was there alone on business. Met some associates for dinner and everyone was simply thrilled with Harvest Restaurant.  Worth a trip to the restaurant alone when in Laguna Beach. The rooms of the hotel are laid out in a bit of a peculiar way but this was due to the site's interesting topography and ecological and zoning restrictions.  However, the rooms are truly 5 star designed rooms. Interesting furniture and accessories, books and magazines; very large and spacious and luxe.  Something I didn't expect before I opened the door! Staff are incredible and due to the size of the property, are linked by radio and they
Manager Response: Ronbb2016,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us during your business trip. Dining at Harvest while enjoying breathtaking views of the canyon and golf course sounds like a wonderful way to relax in paradise. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home. It is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I can not say enough good things about this place! I love that its tucked away in the canyon and you wouldn't even know you're right across the street from the beach and downtown Laguna Beach. The rooms are gorgeous and the costumer service is excellent.
Manager Response: Explore57604224362,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and stoked that you cannot say enough good things about your visit at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property offers a unique coastal experience with being carved into the canyon and yet only walking distance from Aliso Beach. Our team designed the guestrooms with decor that reflects an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. It is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced the quality of your stay. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team
