Summary: The setting is beautiful, never thought I would see deer roaming free in Laguna Beach!  the food was superb at the Harvest Restaurant as well as at the beach cafe where we enjoyed gourmet tasting fish tacos.  The staff was very friendly and attended to our needs quickly when we requested wine glasses and help with the thermostat.  The rooms were spacious, comfortable and inviting.
Manager Response: Calioc,  Thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled that everything about your experience was outstanding. Like you mentioned, the local mule deer love to greet our guests. The weather has been fantastic so far this fall, so enjoying fish tacos at Lost Pier Cafe sounds like a great way to spend your time in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is the perfect place to getaway without fully getting away lol.  Its a great place to disconnect and recharge.  The onsite amenities are great and you dont even need to leave.  One of my favorite spots in OC.
Manager Response: Natalie E,  We are stoked that you love the resort and that it is one of your favorite spots in OC. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the onsite activities and amenities during your visit as there is such a variety of things to do. Like you mentioned, the resort is a great place to recharge by relaxing in paradise. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: First time visitor to the Ranch but I will absolutely be back! Excellent experience across the board - fantastic facility, wonderful setting, and even better people/service! The property's location provides an idyllic mix of remote and "off the beaten path" combined with the nearby excitement of Laguna Beach...and it all just works!! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Safari00867274716,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you had such an excellent first impression at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property has the best of both worlds with offering an off-the-beaten path vibe and still being nearby the fun activities along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A little R&R at the Ranch at LB
Summary: If you're looking for a chill, tucked away experience but still be close to the beach and nice restaurants, The Ranch at LB should be your destination.  My canyon room was beautifully appointed and super comfortable and quiet.  Front desk, bellhop, housekeeping staff was nothing short of excellent.  I am a super duper hotel snob and very persnickety about service and I was 100% pleased with the Ranch at LB.  If I were to get super picky, I would suggest a hotel car or shuttle for short jaunts into town and back.
Manager Response: Kittkatt24,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team delivered excellent service throughout your visit. We understand the importance of going above and beyond for our guests to enhance the experience. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very attentive staff, beautiful setting, spacious meeting rooms, cozy cottages, tranquil swimming pool and hot tub, delicious food and drink...A great spot to either get away from the hustle and bustle, or host a work retreat. It was a truly wonderful and relaxing stay.
Manager Response: Wander53901858213,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to make our guests feel at home away from home. Like you mentioned our guests get to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle due to the off-the-beaten path canyon location. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were here on our honeymoon and everything was so lovely and perfect. From the restaurant to the location and care for wildlife and nature, we were absolutely pleased. The in-room service was amazing, as was the valet and front desk. It would be nice if their tablets contained a little more information about poolside bar hours, spa information, etc. But the people at the front desk were very helpful as well, I just didn't want to call continuously with questions!
Manager Response: Discover46251267504,  Congrats on this special occasion in your life and thank you for choosing to spend your honeymoon at the resort. It is great to hear that our Guest Services team delivered excellent service throughout your stay and enhanced the experience. We appreciate the suggestion regarding the in-room tablets as guest feedback is important to our operations. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great place to spend a romantic weekend. Way better than I expected!
Summary: This was my first time at this resort. I took my wife for her 50th birthday for some rest and relaxation. Upon our arrival we were greeted with a complimentary bottle of wine and some macaroons in our clean and spacious Cottage Suite. We were going to spend time at the spa but decided to other things with our time, such as spend it at the beach, and do some hiking. The place is beautiful and great to just lay low, love the views. The Harvest restaurant served great breakfast and dinner, and had the ambiance to go with it. Also, enjoyed the bar at Harvest as well. Highly recommend this resort!
Manager Response: R L,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your wife's 50th birthday with a stay at the resort. We are stoked that you had such a great first impression. It sounds like you made the most of your time but taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We loved our stay at the ranch! The customer service was really attentive and helpful right from our arrival. We loved the room and had plenty of space and a super comfortable bed! We loved the ambiance here especially the live music by the fire at night! Perfect!
Manager Response: Daydream31990297676,  We are stoked that you loved your stay at the resort. Our team understands the importance of a warm welcome as it lays the foundation for the guest experience. Like you mentioned, the ambiance is enhanced while listening to the live music by the fire pits with breathtaking canyon and golf course views in the background. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Charming setting in canyon, close to beaches, large rooms and good restaurant.  Only issue was that the bed was very soft......prefer firm mattress.  Staff was very friendly, attentive and well trained.
Manager Response: NorthStar691039,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a weekend retreat in the canyon, while also exploring the local beaches. Our housekeeping team understands the importance of a good night's rest and is more than happy to make the proper bedding arrangements based upon the requests of our guests to ensure comfortability. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A great stay that was very quiet yet  short walk to a beautiful beach.  Staff was amazingly efficient and attentive.  Only minus is rate advertised was increased by $100 per day with taxes and fees but still a great stay.
Manager Response: Joe K,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. It is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. Regarding the rate increase, we are not aware of what you are referring to. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss and look into this further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The perfect Couples Getaway for Locals
Summary: If you want an excellent couples getaway, make The Ranch at Laguna Beach your choice.  You won't regret it.  Book a Couples Canyon Massage, and then kick back at the pool/hot-tub and talk to some guests.  Then grab an exquisite dinner @ The Harvest.
Manager Response: Josh M,  We are thrilled that you had an excellent couples getaway at the resort. Like you mentioned, a couples massage at Sycamore Spa followed by relaxing at the pool and dinner at Harvest is a great way to spend your time in paradise. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at The Ranch on the advice of the friends we were traveling with.  The rooms are large, comfortable and very well appointed.  The staff is great, from the valet to the housekeepers, to the the waitstaff.  Enjoy Harvest restaurant, we had breakfast and dinner there, the food was excellent and the menu has something for everyone.Enjoy your stay!
Manager Response: Isabel S,  We appreciate that you followed the advice of your friends and stayed with us. It is great to hear that you dined at Harvest for breakfast and dinner and also that you enjoyed your accommodation. Our team works hard to go above and beyond for our guests and we are thrilled that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I travel very frequently around the country for work, and The Ranch is absolutely one of my favorite places to stay in the entire country. Beautiful unexpected canyon surroundings in the heart of Laguna Beach, incredible amenities, and fantastic staff.
Manager Response: Freedom794434,  We are stoked that our resort is one of your favorite places to stay in the country and that you loved your time in the canyon. Our team works hard to ensure that our guests take lifelong memories home with them and it is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced the quality of your experience. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Very nice place for a wedding!
Summary: Enjoyed a brief stay here earlier in the month for a wedding event.  Were able to check in early which was great as it helped to be able to have more than 90 minutes (4PM check in time, 5:30 event) to get ready for the wedding.  Rooms are spread around the property, some with nice views, like of the pool, other of parking lots.  Building 6 is where we were with nice pool views, although it could get loud there I guess.  Wedding ceremony was held in a grove on the golf course, reception in one of their main function rooms.  Service and food were excellent.    Parking might be tough to find near your building late at night, especially if there's an event attracting non-guests.
Manager Response: Northern_Traveler00,  Thank you for staying with us while attending a wedding. Like you mentioned, the canyon provides a breathtaking backdrop for a wedding ceremony and reception. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was only here for one night but the staff and environment and facilities make me want to return for a week's vacation.Laguna Beach was really charming and the hotel captures its atmosphere.The rooms are beautifully decorated - a 5 star look and feel - and immaculately cared for.I would have loved to play golf on the 9 hole course which is right in the middle of the grounds.
Manager Response: Ron970447,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a brief, but wonderful experience at the resort. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Thank you for staying with us and we agree that you need to return for a week long vacation as Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is BY FAR our favorite place to stay.  Building 14's rooms are Amazing and each individual staff/team member was friendly, helpful & professional at all times.  I would highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Cosmopolitan732293,  We are stoked to hear that our resort is by far your favorite place to stay. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family by making them feel at home. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here for a friends wedding. It is a great property for the value. Secluded canyon location with great beach access. Nice live music happy hour overlooking the golf course canyon. It does get at least 10 degrees colder back in there.
Manager Response: Janellew203,  Thank you for staying with us for a friend's wedding. We understand the importance of providing value to our guests to enhance their experience. Live music is offered seven days a week and is a great way to relax while soaking in breathtaking views of the canyon. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We loved our stay here!  Excellent service, beautiful property and great food. Thank you to the staff for going above and beyond what was necessary to make our birthday weekend such a nice celebration.
Manager Response: BaileyKL,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate a birthday with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled that you loved your experience. Our team understands the importance of going above and beyond as we want our guests to take home lifelong memories. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: We're not golfers but loved it!
Summary: We have stayed at a few other places in Laguna and this was our favorite.  I thought the cottages were set up really nicely for a family.  They left out a bottle of wine and crackers and an olive spread for us.  It was so nice.  Our teenagers loved it. The beach is a short walk (about 5-10 minutes).  The pool is nice. It's right by the spa.  Boys loved the bocci ball.  Views of the golf course are beautiful.  Loved having the double balconies.  I can't say enough good things.  The breakfasts were delicious.
Manager Response: 128sacks,  We are stoked that our resort is your favorite place to stay in Laguna. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among families due to the spacious layout (1,125 sq. ft.). It is great to hear that you took advantage of walking on the path to Aliso Beach. The weather has been fantastic, so both the pool and beach have been common spots for our guests to relax. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We recently returned from a two week trip along the west coast between San Francisco and San Diego and here are our list of bests:  Best Accommodation - The Ranch at Laguna Beach, Best Steak Dinner - John's Grill, San Francisco, Best Breakfast/Brunch - Mama's on Washington Square, San Francisco, Best Server - Phil at Harvest Restaurant, Laguna Beach, Best Entertainment Value - Hearst Castle at San Simeon.  We stayed at one other well known five star hotel along the way, and there was no comparison between it and The Ranch at Laguna Beach, as The Ranch came out ahead in every category.  We loved our room at Laguna Beach, the quietly stunning setting in the canyon, and the special dessert Phil managed to sneak out of the kitchen.  Thanks Phil!
Manager Response: Doug H,  Thank you for staying with us during your two week trip along the west coast. You definitely visited some amazing places along the way. We are honored to be named the "Best Accommodation" and to have Phil be named the "Best Server" on your West Coast "Bests" list. We really appreciate your kind words and support. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Rooms, food, and staff outstanding. My wife and I stayed at the Ranch for a wedding.It was a wonderful experience   We had Friday dinner Saturday dinner and Sunday brunch all delicious and first rate we loved our experience
Manager Response: Rabnreb5238,  Thank you for staying at the resort while attending a wedding. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals throughout your visit and that our team delivered outstanding service. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed as a stop over to break up a long drive north from San Diego. What a treat! It’s a lovely property with stunning views and a quality feel to the whole site. My wife and I got an upgrade to a two bedroom cottage which was superb. Far more space than we needed but the downstairs living area was classy and comfy with views over the golf course and up the hills. The upstairs is equally great with huge beds you could sleep for weeks in. We also dined at their ‘Harvest’ restaurant and had a delicious meal. If you need accommodation in the area, or just want to treat yourself, check out the Ranch!
Manager Response: James M,  Thank you for staying with us during your travels north. It is great to hear that your accommodation was superbly comfy and that you appreciated the upgrade. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are very popular due to their spacious layout. We are grateful for the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed a weekend at the Ranch and had a wonderful experience. There were nine family members and our rooms were next door to each other which was very convenient. The rooms are comfortable and nicely decorated to fit the beach atmosphere. We enjoyed breakfast and dinner at the Harvest and had wonderful service and meals. The golf course was fun and not too crowded. We never had to wait or feel rushed. We even saw deer grazing on the fairway! Beautiful course!
Manager Response: Peggym485,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are stoked that your nine family members had such a wonderful experience and that the accommodations were adjoining, allowing everyone to conveniently spend time with each other. The local mule deer love to greet our guests and it is great that you got to experience that too. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Family stay at the Ranch was amazing. Fun for kids adults and golfing very enjoyable. Love the food and music and drinks
Summary: We enjoyed the music in the canyon playing golf, dinner was amazing room service fantastic and overall a fantastic stay  loved the added amenities in the room and local wine  walks to the beach and loved having the kids play bocce ball. Front desk amazing service
Manager Response: LauramB8176SP,  We are stoked that your family had an amazing experience at the resort. It sounds like you all had a lot of fun taking advantage of the different activities and amenities throughout your visit. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The special atmosphere invites you at slow down.
Summary: After the first part on a heavy biz travel on Europe and the US, I choose Laguna Beach for two days of recovery before continuing my travel. This was a great choice! And The Ranch @ Laguna Beach only made it better.  Starting for the place, surrounded by the mountains and all the green of a 9 holes golf course. You easier start to move slower, feeling the sea air, the vegetation and the power of the mountains.  The room is great, very tastefully decorated and with an incredible bed. No pretentious and that is the best part. It is, what it is. Cleaning service: very good. It has a nice pool (which I didn’t use) and a good fitness center. The food and service at Harvest are better for breakfast (special thanks to Antonio), for dinner, instead, I feel a little oily the options and
Manager Response: Gustavoarg,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you got to spend some time relaxing in the canyon between your business trips. Like you mentioned, the atmosphere of the surrounding nature invites our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. It is great to hear that you are already looking forward to coming back. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nestled into a picturesque scenery of coziness, class, and comfort in the canyon with every amenity thoughtfully executed.  This was definitely a SURPRISE find tucked away along the beautiful coastline of California, located in the heart of Laguna Beach with a mountain retreat feel yet only a short scenic pathway walk from the beach. Definitely a home away from home feel, and so deserving of boasting the "National Geographic Unique Lodges of the World's" prestige!  Well done Ranch...I WILL be back!
Manager Response: 204dh,  Thank you for staying with us. We are stoked that you had such an excellent first experience at the resort. It is great to hear that you cherished the best of both worlds, with the property being situated in the canyon and yet only walking distance to the beach. Like you mentioned, our team works hard to make our guests feel at home away from home. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A Hidden Gem for a perfect SoCal StayCation!
Summary: I was whisked away from San Diego to stay here over an extended 3-day weekend for a romantic getaway. I could not have been more surprised or more pleased with the experience at The Ranch.   If someone blindfolded you and brought you here, and then removed the blindfold, you would have NO IDEA that you were about 1/2 mile from the ocean and the hustle and bustle of Laguna Beach. It's very peaceful and secluded, tightly nestled back into a canyon that you would never know is there. The one and only drawback to this seclusion is that there is ZERO cell phone reception. To compensate, they do have a phenomenal wifi network so you can use all your devices, but for the purposes of my little getaway, I didn't mind the fact that my phone wasn't ringing.   The resort is centered on the
Manager Response: JFshooter,  Thank you for staying with us for a romantic getaway. We appreciate that you took the time to provide detailed feedback on your experience. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We booked this hotel for our wedding weekend and this is an an absolutely romantic place to book if you want a complete off line vacation, No pun intended. We had zero cell reception which was an issue since we were getting married that weekend and needed to be in contact with family members and vendors but we ultimately managed. Customer Service and valet were impeccable. One tip: Please upgrade your mattresses. Ours felt very old and saggy and uncomfortable and we paid top dollars for our stay for our wedding weekend.
Manager Response: Sylvia S,  Congrats on the special occasion and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that your experienced during your stay. In speaking with our Guest Services team, the above inconveniences that you mentioned were not brought to our attention as we are here to assist in making our guests at home. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. As for the beds, we have newer Serta bedding that provides extraordinary comfort of our guests. Most of our guests rave about the comfort of the bed, but every person is different and we are always happy to make adjustments to the bedding set up for each guests individual comfort if requested.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing Resort with great vibes and atmosphere
Summary: Went here for one night for a couples trip. Pool was not super crowded and was able to easily find 4 chairs. Room was great and bed was super comfortable. Ate at their restaurant and everything from food to drinks was on point. Even got to play a quick 9 holes. Pace of play was quick and got to walk the course for some exercise. Highly recommend!!!!
Manager Response: Chandlos23,  Thank you for staying with us for a couples trip. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. The weather has been fantastic this year, so the pool has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. Like you mentioned, the golf course is about a 1.5 mile walk and is very scenic. Hopefully some of the local mule deer greeted you during the round. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a peaceful, secluded property in a lovely canyon.  We had a great two days enjoying fantastic food, a fun 9 hole golf course, massages, and relaxation!  The terrace is a great place to read, have live entertainment and take in the view.
Manager Response: Funinthesunlady,  We are stoked that you had a great two day stay at the resort. It sounds like you found a lot of great ways to relax in paradise by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I was a bit nervous because I was not familiar with the location BUT I will never stay anywhere else in Laguna Beach!
Summary: I was concerned because I had never seen the property.  Tucked away on the opposite side of the PCH from the beach, just a half mile in and you feel like a world away.  The welcome was warm and the front desk helped me get wifi calling up and running because the Ranch is located in a canyon.  The rooms are in a series of buildings and they are gorgeous.  The room was immaculate, the bathroom was large and bed and linens perfect.  I stayed three nights and was not disappointed once - not with the service, the housekeeping, the valet, the bartender.  Excellent staff and excellent location!
Manager Response: Susan C,  Thank you for staying with us for three nights and for taking the time to provide feedback. We understand the importance of a warm welcome as that sets the foundation for the guest experience. It sounds like you had an excellent first impression of the resort and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed 2 nights; the final 2 nights of a three week stint in USA.  Whilst the Ranch was good, it was not as good as some other cheaper places that we stayed at in California and it was a bit of a disappointment.  The rooms are nice and clean, with plenty of space near the bathroom, but not spectacular.  The rows of rooms feel very close together and the patio outside the room lacked privacy.  There was never a parking space near the room, which meant that I needed to valet the car and then walk back down to the room each time.  This in itself wasn't that big an issue, but it was very frustrating when I noted that a number of workers/contractors had parked their cars outside the rooms.  The hot tub and gym are good (but for the resort fee I expected slightly more).  Proximity
Manager Response: Arab_joe,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the inconveniences that you encountered. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. Can you please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The restaurant at this golf course is fantastic.  Very quiet, relaxing atmosphere. Great place for lunch.  I had the half sandwich and soup.  The carrot ginger soup was incredible.  The half sandwich was very large and filling.  If you want to get away from the hustle and bustle this is the place to go.
Manager Response: Kevh938,  Thank you for dining with us at Harvest and for playing a round of golf at Ben Brown's. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great atmosphere, simply beautiful surroundings, truly a hidden gem in Laguna Beach well worth the visit.  Enjoy cocktails on the patio with evening music or in the bar...canyon and golf course views from both are stunning! Super fun course to play too! A friend stayed at the resort so I saw the rooms...exceptional!
Manager Response: Agavepr,  We are stoked that you enjoyed a spectacular date night at the resort. Like you mentioned, the view of the canyon and golf course enhances the ambiance. Live music is now offered 7 days a week and is very popular among the locals and hotel guests. It is great to hear that you also got to enjoy a round of golf at Ben Brown's. Hopefully some of the mule deer greeted you during the round. Thank you for the kind words and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: If you want a serene So Cal experience, this is your place. It is set back in a beautiful canyon and yet a short walk to the beach. Loved our stay and we will be back. Don’t miss the live music on the patio with drinks and appetizers. Try the tasty Brussel Sprouts, they are delicious.
Manager Response: Luckyme570,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you loved your experience. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. The live music is now offered 7 days a week and it is very popular among the hotel guests and the locals. The Brussels sprouts are definitely a guest favorite at Harvest and it is great to hear that you enjoyed them too. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We previously lived in San Clemente and never knew that this resort was in our backyard.  Such a magical experience!  Rooms, grounds, food and entertainment were all beautiful!  Definitely will be back and highly reccomend to others.
Manager Response: Cindy S,  Thank you for staying with us. It is great to hear that you had such a wonderful experience. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of activities and amenities. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a fantastic vibe this little hidden gem is. Great energy, super clean, and a smart and friendly staff. It's a fabulous place to meet friends or business associates for a "just right" dinner and a "just right" atmosphere. If you stay the night a restful nights sleep is in store for you. Comfortable beds, beautiful linens, and super clean.
Manager Response: DJCJR_11,  We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort offers a peaceful and relaxing vibe. Thank you for the the kind words and the recommendation to others. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We really enjoy weekend getaways to Laguna/Orange County (from San Diego) and were hoping to love The Ranch as much as we do other nearby resorts. Unfortunately when there is an event at The Ranch, it pretty much takes over. Upon check-in there was a large event which made guest parking difficult (if not impossible), and the event could be heard from every corner of the resort. The 2-story/2-bedroom suits are nice and spacious, and the decor is inviting. The next morning we stood in line for coffees at the cafe with kids in tow and encountered much more "colorful" language than we could have anticipated as the golf crews in front of and behind us were ordering beers and bloody marys prior to teeing off. Golfers dominate common area/patio weekend mornings, so as a guest you
Manager Response: LightPacker782203,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback as it is very important to our operations. We apologize that the events impacted your experience and that a high level of service was not delivered throughout the stay. We are sorry that this occurred and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is one of our favorite spots to visit. We stayed there for 3 nights for our anniversary. Upon arrival our room wasn’t ready so we were treated to 2 complimentary drinks while waiting. Once we got to our room we were then treated to a bottle of wine and a box of crackers and spread with a sweet note. First impressions are important and we were definitely won over. The resort itself is top notch.  It’s super close to the beach but tucked into the canyon. The rooms are super cute. The harvest restaurant is amazing for breakfast and dinner. We quickly became obsessed with their cinnamon roll and Brussels sprouts. So delicious! And on the beach they have a sister hole in the wall cafe which also has amazing food! At night they have live music and drink specials and deer gazing
Manager Response: Nursehedda,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled that the resort is one of your favorite spots to visit and that you had a fantastic first impression. It sounds like you made most of your time at the resort. The cinnamon rolls and Brussels sprouts are definitely guest favorites at Harvest. Live music, which is offered 7 days a week, is very popular among both hotel guests and the locals. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The ranch is unbelievable could not ask for a better location it’s unbelievable the views are outstanding and the staff is top notch awesome location we will definitely be back thanks again My only issue was that we should have stayed longer
Manager Response: Adamdholloway76,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the views of the canyon are breathtaking. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family by making them feel at home away from home and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I stayed at the ranch last night booking my room through hotels tonight.   The hotel made the mistake of authorizing my card twice the amount  what it said it would $394 instead of $200 after the room and tax being paid in full through a 3rd party.   I contacted the hotel at which point no manager was on duty. They claim they left a message to my room, after I asked for a manager to call me back on my cell.   After check out I called the hotel to find resolution to this issue as banks take 3-5 business days to release funds. Upon calling the hotel the jr manager I spoke with proceeded to yell at me over the phone. I then Asked to speak with a general manager. They assured me he would call me back in 20 minutes following his meeting.   After of 3 hours ago no one has contacted
Manager Response: Ambassador402115,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your experience. We apologize for the inconvenience and can understand your frustration. I followed up on this and both our Front Office Manager and Director of Rooms let me know that they spoke to you regarding this. We are sorry that this occurred and did everything we could to work with your bank to rectify the situation.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We didn’t like Laguna Beach town as most galleries are located along the busy highway. Newport Beach was great. Glad we stayed at the Ranch as it is away from all the traffic and noise. Rooms were clean and very comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Exploration814285,  Thank you for staying with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: As a family of 4 we chose to stay in a 2 bedroom suite for 3 nights, giving us some time and space to recover from a long flight in to LA. Overall a very positive experience, check in was a bit underwhelming at first but we got there. The suite was large and very comfortable, the grounds are beautiful and our boys loved the pool / hot tub. The food and service at Harvest restaurant was exceptional, however the more casual Ben’s Pantry was hit or miss with slow service and missed orders. I would assume they were under staffed. Would consider staying again especially if golfing was a priority - the course looked magnificent.
Manager Response: Travelbug2018511,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us for 3 nights. It is great to hear that you got to enjoy some time relaxing in the canyon and that you had a very positive overall experience. Like you mentioned, The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We apologize for some of the service inconveniences that occurred as it does not reflect our standards. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Why go to Laguna if you can't see the sea?
Summary: The rooms are spacious and the bathrooms are beautiful, but they provided only two bath towels!  Perhaps if you enjoy golfing, this place is wonderful, but I would prefer staying closer to the ocean if I am paying this kind of price.
Manager Response: Freedom803079,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. Even though the property is not oceanfront, it offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. The setting allows our guests to enjoy peaceful relaxation in paradise. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss your stay further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Not impressed for the price - Could be much better
Summary: For the price, I expect more. I really wanted to love this place and was staying here as part of a large group. It just does not have the feel of a  high end resort. Service was friendly, but out coffee maker was broken, we had a clogged sick drain, and limited parking close to our room as there were always delivery trucks blocking spots. On two occasions late at night when we arrived and early in the morning when we departed, there was no one at valet. First we parked out car ourselves, and when we checked out we were handed out keys and told to find our car. Again, this is just not the kind of experience I would expect for a place with this price and a resort fee. We live in Hawaii and are well accustomed to the hospitality industry.  I killed three decent size bugs the moment
Manager Response: Alijune,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience at the resort and we apologize for the inconveniences that occurred. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The rooms are renovated, attractive and functional.  You get the benefit of a beach location without the crowds with excellent beach access.  Food and drink are abundant and the service is just fine. Outdoor live entertainment was an added pleasure.  We can't wait to return with the grandchildren.
Manager Response: MikeLewisRealtor,  Thank you for staying at the resort. The canyon location of the property allows our guests to escape the crowds and enjoy some quiet relaxation. Like you mentioned, the live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. We look forward to your return visits with the grandchildren too.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I arrived mid-afternoon and enjoyed a nice pool while waiting for our room. It was a short wait for a really nice boutique hotel suite, almost a private cottage as we never heard our neighbors despite a full house. Every parking space was full. This 2 bedroom suite was charming, clean and had large TVs, comfy beds and great bath amenities. I went for a beach run before dinner as the resort has a short trail to the ocean. (maybe 1/4 mile from the surf) I played golf first thing in the morning on a gorgeous 9-hole course and then prepared for our couples massage. The spa was just right and the massages perfect. That evening, after reading on our patio and balcony (we enjoyed both) we dined at Harvest. Food and service were flawless. We then listened to entertainment on
Manager Response: Hotelguru01,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and for taking the time to provide detailed feedback on your experience at the resort. It sounds like you made of the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Like you mentioned, the peaceful nature of the canyon allows our guests to relax and recharge. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Just got back from a stay at The Ranch and it was awesome! Right across from the beach, but nestled in a canyon surrounded by mountains. The staff is warm and welcoming and the food is incredible. Nice little touches like the clock next to the bed has your name on it. Big, spacious rooms with rocking chairs on the patio. Very quiet and peaceful. Close to civilization, but feels like a million miles away.
Manager Response: K9285YCjuliea,  We are stoked that you had an awesome experience at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. The weather has been fantastic this year, so Aliso Beach has been a popular spot for our guests to spend their time. Sitting on the patio chairs and enjoying the quiet and peaceful nature of the canyon sounds like an excellent way to relax in paradise. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful nature and perfect rooms! We loved it to stay there and we were verx sad, that we only stayed on night in this perfect hotel. Up on the mountain it is so silent and peacefull. We enjojed it a lot
Manager Response: Mirrga913059,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you loved your experience. Like you mentioned, the peaceful vibe of the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Rooms not cleaned until late afternoon.  Promised to pick up our group at the beach in golf cart....took them 25 minutes to show up after we called twice.  Closed out of services due to larger parties reserving and using same.  Restaurant noisy.  Wouldn't stay there again.
Manager Response: Stephaniegrogan,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the experience that you had at the resort and can understand your disappointment. Someone from our management team will be reaching out to you to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Coolest Home Away from Home in Laguna Beach
Summary: We stayed in a cottage suite and loved the "home away from home" feel.  We loved the proximity to the beach, safe walking distance with designated path under PCH.  Breakfast at The Harvest was delicious and majestic given the spectacular view. We even witnessed a stag resting at the volleyball court and a fawn/doe quietly passing through the pool & spa path...truly the Coolest Home Away from Home.  My sisters & I all plan to return next year for another memorable weekend!
Manager Response: Laura P,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled that you loved the "home away from home" feel at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Aliso Beach has been a popular spot for our guests to relax due to the incredible weather we have had this year. The local deer love to greet our guests and it is great that you got to experience that too. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again next year.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We so enjoyed our stay. It felt like a home away from home - gorgeous views of the mountains. We truly felt “nestled” in the mountains. Would love to come back soon for a longer stay! Harvest dinner was fantastic!
Manager Response: Protznicole,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed your experience in the canyon. Like you mentioned, our team works hard to treat out guests like family by making them feel at home away from home. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits for a longer stay.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Only a 45 minute drive from where we live, my husband and I discovered a little gem for a weekend getaway! To celebrate a birthday, it was so lovely. Walking the grounds, sipping on a martini overlooking the golf course and listening to some great music to the little activities surrounding the canyon was so much fun. It was just what we needed, a quiet, restful and very pleasant weekend. Nestled in the canyon made it feel like we were so far away. We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Passport665004,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate a birthday with a stay at the resort. It is great to hear that you cherished a quiet and restful weekend getaway in the canyon. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of walking the grounds, listening to the live music and also enjoying other activities. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is beautiful. The staff, rooms, golf and restaurant are outstanding. My only negative is the cost. If you had 6 people in the 2 bedroom it would be perfect. There’s plenty of room. There are a lot of activities for kids and adults.
Manager Response: TerryBreck,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a round of golf at Ben Brown's and also some delicious meals at Harvest. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Apart from the very uncomfortable sofa bed, everything was perfect: the room, the terrace, the pool , the gym, the restaurant. the service. The site is beautiful, and has easy access to the beach and the town. Overall a really lovely stay.
Manager Response: Chope996339,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed a lovely stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities during your visit. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return trips.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The golf was enjoyable and we played in an acceptable time. The hotel was able to give us our room, as requested, early upon our arrival prior to golfing. The dinner was very enjoyable and the wait staff was very attentive. Our breakfast the next day was very good and the wait staff also very attentive.
Manager Response: Mysewingroom,  Thank you for celebrating an anniversary and birthday at the resort. It is great to hear that we were able to accommodate your early check-in request and that you enjoyed golfing at Ben Brown's in addition to breakfast and dinner at Harvest. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through attentive and personalized service. We want our guests to take home lifelong memories with them. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing hidden gem. Great for families or couples
Summary: My wife and I visited (from LA) for our 5-year wedding anniversary. We had an amazing time. Unless you're looking for The Ranch you'd definitely miss it. The property was so thoughtfully done. Everything was biggest of quality. The pool was relaxing and had a great bar with did to order. We are at The Harvest restaurant and had a wonderful meal. Overall I highly recommend this resort. We will be coming back.
Manager Response: Andrew G,  Congrats on your 5 year wedding anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience. The weather has been fantastic this year, so the pool has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest too. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Could let people know the lodge is very loud; pool was very loud and the water was very cold for a summer day.Let people know about the amenities.Not sure what else can be said.  Seems we can not leave something that is just an average rating.
Manager Response: Sstric828164,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I will totally recommend this hotel to my family and friends amazing view from our room and the wildlife is amazing too.  I love everything about this resort  my son was so happy to see few dears from our room! dinner was excellent at the Harvest restaurant we really enjoyed our stay at this beautiful resort.
Manager Response: Teresadearing1,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and we are thrilled that you loved everything about the resort. The local mule deer love to greet our guests and it is great to hear that your son got to experience it too. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed at The Ranch at LB for two nights last week. It is an older  hotel that has been completely renovated. The property is beautiful and the rooms are fabulous. I only wish we could have stayed longer. The food in The Harvest Restaurant was wonderful and presented creatively! I would recommend in a heartbeat as a place to stay in LB!
Manager Response: Missy P,  Thank you for joining us for a two night stay and for the kind words regarding the re-imagination of the resort. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your accommodation and some delicious meals at Harvest. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great and  Convenient resort  to stay in Laguna Beach. Love the location. very tasteful decorated , clean rooms and  amenities. Complementary Ueber from the resort  5 miles and back, Golf cart ride to the beach a crossed the street with beach chairs, umbrella, towels and  boogie boards.
Manager Response: Rudy E,  We are thrilled that you had a great stay at the resort. The complimentary Uber service (within 5 miles) allows our guests to explore the local area and take advantage of the variety of experiences in Laguna Beach. The weather has been fantastic this year, so Aliso Beach has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A lovely hotel but disappointing service from housekeeping team...
Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a lovely hotel close (by car) to Laguna Beach in nice surroundings.  The accommodation was very clean and decorated to a very high standard.  The Harvest restaurant provided good food throughout the day with nice service.  The hotel pool was OK but not spectacular.  Generally the staff were helpful and friendly but housekeeping team forgot to turn down our room for the second night of our stay which was very disappointing especially since we were arriving late back to the room with our children having attended a concert in the town - which had been booked via the hotel!  As an expensive establishment The Ranch at Laguna Beach should not have made this mistake...
Manager Response: Carolinejlowry,  We appreciate that you stayed with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the service that our housekeeping team delivered. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for a Lovely Beach Getaway
Summary: Loved how this hotel incorporated class, elegance yet a down to earth beach vibe! Great location allowing both a beach and canyon/nature feel to the pristine property.  Highly recommend this property if you are staying in the Laguna Beach area.
Manager Response: Jmillet79,  Thank you for staying with us. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Like you mentioned, the 87-acre property is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal setting as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The cottages were very comfortable, clean, and spacious  for 2 kids and 3 adults.  Size of property was the right size for s short stay in Laguna Beach and easy to commute to Newport Beach, Dana Point and Laguna Beach with plenty of beach coves to explore.
Manager Response: Dtravis2018,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. It sounds like you took advantage of visiting the local area. Like you mentioned, Laguna Beach has 20+ beaches along the 7.1 miles of coastline to explore. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Severely torn on this review.  Overall 4-Star Beautiful Resort with 2-Star service.  We were a very large group (family reunion) occupying seven rooms for multiple nights and still encountered sub-par service on multiple encounters.  While The Ranch is gorgeous, the rooms spacious and the food excellent...the staff need some serious help!  The Ranch is a peaceful, beautiful setting, centrally located in the heart of Laguna with great activities on property and within short walking distance.  Were it not for the service, we would return, but the service was so disappointing (front desk, cleaning, servers, waiters, reception, etc) that our entire party felt it would not be worth returning.    Some details: - Rooms were nice with comfortable beds and very quiet. Little patio to sit
Manager Response: Gary W.,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We appreciate that you chose the resort for a family reunion. We apologize for the service that our team delivered. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A beautiful setting. Woodsy rather than beachee in a box canyon with a rather long walk by private trail to a beautiful mainstream community beach. The room was beautiful and functional. The on premises restaurant was very good. We enjoyed the free Uber service within a five mile radius.  The experience of being at the beach without a beach view was offset by a patio and evening entertainment overlooking a beautiful 9 hole golf course.
Manager Response: Duts R,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you utilized the complimentary Uber service as it allows our guests to explore the local area. The walk to the beach is very peaceful, especially on a sunny Southern California day. It sounds like you made the most of your time in Laguna Beach. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a couple of nights and days. The service is excellent onsite, and offering transportation to the beach and local restaurants hardly without any wait. There was an excellent musician playing during Happy Hour and the main restaurant serves quite good food. Very plearuble stay!
Manager Response: Gtm011,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. The weather has been fantastic this summer, so the beach has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. Like you mentioned, the live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon and golf course. Live music is now offered seven days a week. Thank you for sharing your feedback and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Lovely resort tucked in the Canyon
Summary: So my husband and I wanted to get away for a few days for my birthday.  We needed a respite - quiet, relaxing, Zen-like.  At first glance this place was it.  Nestled in the canyon off PCH, it's beautiful to the eyes.  Lovely Mountain views, lush golf course, manicured landscapes. Upon our arrival, the hotel front desk upgraded us to a suite and we were very pleased. The restaurant (the Harvest) was fantastic!  All our meals were delicious, including the Rib Eye!  Fresh, well seasoned, tasty.  It was all excellent!  Philip the waiter gave us a great tip on hiking spots so we were happy until...we sat by the pool to take in the Zen, and then a gang of loud children arrived.  Both them and their parents were screaming at the top of their lungs, with little consideration for the
Manager Response: Carmen W,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with a stay at the resort. It is great to hear that the accommodation upgrade enhanced your celebration. We are thrilled that you had a fantastic experience at Harvest and that you enjoyed some delicious meals. The property is very popular among families and we are sorry that the noise levels disturbed your relaxation at the pool. We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your visit as it is very important to our operations.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: nice but not what I expected for the price
Summary: The rooms are just ok. pretty basic for the rates. No free water offered. The breakfast and dinners were nice. Good service in general. The pool seems a little old. The restaurant offers plenty of choice. Lovely restaurant. It's a perfect place for golfers.
Manager Response: Cbenro727236,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Bravo to the Ranch at Laguna Beach!
Summary: Thank you for a wonderful vacation for our family reunion and birthday weekend!  Your facilities, staff, services and cuisine are top notched.  We highly recommend the Ranch for any visit to Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Bogart38,  We are grateful that you chose to host a family reunion and birthday celebration at the resort. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a top-notch experience. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: 1. The pool was dirty - it had a 3 inches of muck on the walls above the water line and there were leftover dirty cups and plates dotted around the loungers, and fruit on the ground.  2. We had a 2 story place for a family of 5. We brought in some snacks as there was a sort of make-shift kitchen area (sink needed!), but there were ants ants ants, despite regular complaints to staff. 3. We were there a week and the room was serviced during the day only four times.  We had room service on 3 occasions and twice the food service trays were still outside the front door in the morning, covered with ants. 4. 1 shower and 4 towels is not enough for 5 people, particularly with the beach so close. 5. I was unable to book a table for dinner (no one answered the phone, even when I tried to
Manager Response: TheaReade,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences that you had. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: excellent venue with outstanding service and amenities. Pretty little golf facility on site and easy access to the beach . Laguna Beach is a beautiful little town with lots to do a and see. The Ranch is in itself located in a beautiful setting surrounded by mountains
Manager Response: 501iras,  Thank you for staying at the resort for a family vacation. It is great to hear that you had an excellent visit. It sounds like you made the most of your time. Like you mentioned, Laguna Beach offers a variety of experiences along the 7.1 miles of coastline. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My Family and I decided to get away for the weekend. The Ranch was the perfect place for us to get out of the city and relax away from home. The staff was very polite and accommodating. The room was very clean and cozy; something that we greatly appreciate. We will definitely recommend staying at this property to all our friends and family.
Manager Response: MarkShimada,  Thank you for staying at the resort for a weekend getaway. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A nice hide away spot.  Awesome Spa
Summary: So many great restaurants in Laguna, I would stay at the Ranch and experience fun restaurants.  Our's fav was Driftwood!  I was not impressed with the property restaurant.  The grounds are super tranquil.
Manager Response: Rnaliboff,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon offers a super tranquil vibe. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Overall a lovely property.  Very close to the beach - able to walk from the resort - but the resort offered complimentary golf cart transport to the beach.  Also a big plus - complimentary Uber transportation within 5 miles - so going to restaurants in town very convenient.
Manager Response: Rosannets,  Thank you for staying with us while attending a wedding. The surrounding canyon offers a breathtaking backdrop for a wedding ceremony. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the complimentary Uber transportation as Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the coastline. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Don’t stay here, it’s not special
Summary: Wrong choice for a special occasion. Such a disappointment, bathroom had a dirty shower curtain, an industrial toilet seat (no lid public restroom vibe), bath fan didn’t work, refrigerator wasn’t cold & didn’t ever get cold. Do yourself a favor stay somewhere else for any type of special occasion. The balcony isn’t private, you get to stare at all your neighbors and lots of brown grass. Many other options to choose from, don’t choose this one.
Manager Response: Doyann,  We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay at the resort. National ADA laws require a certain percentage of rooms to be outfitted exactly as this room was with certain design features. The ADA law allows that when we are approaching full occupancy, we are able release these ADA rooms to guests who may or may not need accessibility accommodations but that we, on direct bookings, alert the guests that the remaining rooms are ADA accessible. We also try to communicate this directly to guests who book on OTA and third party websites, but it can be more difficult due to the limited contact information available. We are honored to welcome all guests and will always fully comply with all aspects of ADA laws. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is conveniently located near the beach and allows you to enjoy all it has to offer but stay in the quietness of the canyon.  The beds are VERY comfortable, the rooms have air conditioning and the restaurants are good.  The staff is warm and friendly.  That being said, the cell reception is non-existant so prepare to use wifi-calling and even then it's spotty.  Though they have complimentary wifi, it's still challenging.
Manager Response: Christine B,  We are thankful that you stayed with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family as we want them to take home lifelong memories. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were very much looking forward to our visit to The Ranch but actually it was overall a bit disappointing.  The room was nice but the small area outside the room was not at all private with lots of people walking past all the time.The front of house staff were very polite and friendly but we were annoyed to be charged an additional ~$500 on our bill by others who had charged their items to our room.  Though it was later refunded, we felt this was quite careless on the part of the hotel who should have noticed that the surname / room number didn't match before just charging it to the room bill.Overall probably good for families but we wouldn't recommend for other couples.  Remember to be very careful when you check your bill if you plan to stay here!
Manager Response: Flawri189690,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you had and can understand your disappointment. I will be reaching out to you directly to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: the Ranch at Laguna was a wonderful location, had beautiful grounds and the room was lovely.  I enjoyed the serene location, and patio overlooking the mountains.  We had a glass of wine while listening to live music in a very relaxed setting.
Manager Response: Laz001218,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon and golf course. Live music is now offered seven days a week. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fantastic one night stay.  Staff were very helpful, especially Laura on the front desk. Rooms even better than expected.  Complimentary shuttles/uber to the beach are very convenient. Great location, great service, great amenities, highly recommended.  Stick to the basics on the dinner menu at the main restaurant.  Breakfast was very good. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Stug0rd0n,  We are thrilled that you had a fantastic stay at the resort. It is great to hear that your expectations were exceeded. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It was perfectly located!  Golf, swim, food and beach!!  The wedding We attended was beautifully done....the ceremony under the trees, the dinner under the stars, and the party reception in the ballroom!!!
Manager Response: JedJaxon,  Thank you for staying with us while attending a wedding. Like you mentioned, the ceremony location under the trees and dinner under the stars is a very unique and exclusive experience. It sounds like you also got to enjoy a variety of leisure activities too. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We LOVED our stay at The Ranch in Laguna Beach!  The rooms are beautiful, service is great and atmosphere is fantastic!  The location is great - tucked away but only minutes from the beach.  We will definitely be back!!
Manager Response: Lauren K,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. We are thrilled that you loved your experience and look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Overall the hotel is lovely. They were at full occupancy when we were there and you could definitely tell. During arrival we couldn’t find a parking spot to unload with me 8+ months pregnant, and during several occasions we wanted to go up to listen to live music but the entire place was packed. Apparently there were public evenings (which I love getting the community involved) but we couldn’t find a server or seat either time. The food options are also pretty limited and the same throughout the property so if you’re staying for more than 2 nights you really need to go offsite. No real dessert options at all and very limited non alcoholic drink options. Also- I know they try to promote their local food program but they buy bulk lemonade and don’t make fresh juices ? Just a few
Manager Response: Kieran W,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort for a babymoon getaway. Congrats on this special time in your life. We are glad to hear that you had a great overall stay. We apologize for the lack of parking and seating. The property is very popular among both resort guests and the locals. Guest feedback is very valuable to our operations and we appreciate that you took the time to provide your feedback.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at the Ranch for 4 nights and it was perfect. The location was great, we could walk to the beach in 5 minutes and there was a free shuttle to the town centre. The service was brilliant, all staff were friendly and happy to help. The rooms were spotless and the decoration was lovely. On an evening there was live acoustic music by the outside seating area which was great. I highly recommend staying here for a relaxing and laid back holiday!
Manager Response: Abbey12346842,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing 4 night stay at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time in Laguna Beach. Like you mentioned, the live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I love this place, it's clean with excellent service, quiet, and relaxing. I was there a couple of years ago and now they remodeled this place and its even better now.They have a great pool service and If you want to enjoy the ocean you can cross the bridge and you will oversee a gorgeous beach. I will definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Ilemes355258,  We are thrilled that you loved your experience at the resort. It is great to hear that you came back after your prior visit and got to see the re-imagination of the property. Thank you for the kind words and the support. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We came to Laguna Beach to attend the infamous Pageant of the Masters.The Ranch was the hotel we chose due to a recommendation from a dear friend who had been there several times before.The location is beautiful and the accomodations surpassed our expectations.Everyone we encountered was extremely helpful and friendly.We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Larson7555,  Thank you for staying at our resort when coming to Laguna Beach to attend the Pageant of the Masters. It is great to hear that a friend recommended for you to stay with us. We are thrilled that your expectations were exceeded and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location friendly staff laid back environment. property is beautiful and if ya golf this place is a must do. Restaurant is terrific great ambience and friendly knowledgable staff fun environment.
Manager Response: Jonlazares,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, Ben Brown's Golf Course is very unique due to the canyon location in addition to having a creek running through the middle of the course. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team delivered enhanced your experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family and I tried out this resort last Oct 2017 as we usually stay at the Monarch Beach Resort for something new and different. My original review of this Property reflected a renovated motor lodge whose price value was off the mark. (For reference I paid $485/night).   The front desk manager Sean L reached out to extend a return visit which we stayed in a 2 bedroom cottage  #1001 this time around.   As per last visit, the room itself was well appointed and spacious. Harvest restaurant caters to locals and has some great dishes and wine selection supported by a solid restaurant staff.   However, I must repeat that for the price value the rest of the hotel staff is lacking. We did not have turndown service and while there were 4 leads working the pool area on Sunday
Manager Response: Calitravlerone,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your return visit to the resort. We apologize that the service levels were not delivered at a high level and can understand your disappointment. Guest feedback is very valuable as it helps our operations and we appreciate your feedback.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We loved everything about this place!  We don't golf, but it was nice to watch the golfers and the friendly deer (we named him "Forest" and wondered how many different names he's been given!) all enjoy the golf course.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you loved everything about the resort. Like you mentioned, the views of the golf course and canyon are breathtaking. The local mule deer enjoy greeting our guests and we are glad that you got to experience that too. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: High expectations but value for money not ok
Summary: Stayed for the first time at the Ranch at Laguna Beach. We came with quite some expectations based on reviews, the Ranch's website etc.  Arrival was to the point, and we had to drive up to our suite. Our creekside suite was well-appointed; with a nice terrace in concrete offering views on a creek with concrete walls, which makes it a little artificial. The pool is small, service is basic (make sure to ask enough towels early in the day), not enough sunbeds versus number of guests and they pretend the swimming pool is heated - compared with the 4 other hotels we stayed at in California I and especially my kids dare to challenge that. Food in Harvest is average at best; at dinner we had to send a burnt burger back. Service is equally average. My main complaints about the ranch are
Manager Response: ErwinFromBelgium,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort.
