It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest are not met and exceeded. Please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Lovely place.....shame about some of the staff
Summary: Great acccomidation. Food was good but service in restaurant was really poor on a few occasions. One night we waited  over an hour for our food. One day there was no space for us at breakfast because at the weekends there are a number of non residents using the facilities. The staff didn’t seem to care. The manager, Chris was abrupt and patronising. This was our 5th hotel on a long tour of California...we had got used to better service. Golf course was good. Pool was clean and warm. All in all a reasonable stay but the staff let it down.
Manager Response: James M,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the service that you received in Harvest as it does not reflect our standards. Our Director of Food & Beverage will be reaching out to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: At least once, you must stay here!!
Summary: An AMAZING property, the room, the restaurant, the staff!!!  All amazing!  ALL staff were kind, polite, and patient...which I appreciated. The room was a work of art.  Well designed, the color palette, décor and art...perfect!  A perfect place for a vacation or staycation!
Manager Response: Ogarcia658,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing stay at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We want our guests to have an authentic Laguna Beach experience. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch is Missing Their Mark
Summary: All the makings for a fantastic property without the proper staff in place.  The Ranch at Laguna Beach is missing their mark.  Upon arrival we were met by a gentlemen who seemed quite scatterbrained and emotionless.  It was our first time at the Ranch and we were very excited to be there and certainly didn't feel welcomed.  That said, it was dark when we arrived and we didn't quite no our way around yet.  Parking is a challenge at the Ranch.  We booked a two-bedroom and it was rare to find a spot near the building.  The unit itself was nicely decorated.  We did have a pest control problem with little ants in the unit.  There was one full bathroom and one powder room in the unit.  The two bedroom sleeps six people, the lack of a second shower proved to be an inconvenience
Manager Response: 395rhondap,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We are sorry that the service was not delivered at a high level by our team and can understand your disappointment. We also apologize for the other inconveniences that you encountered as they do not reflect our standards. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location. Beautiful grounds. Except for the front desk our experience was excellent.  It was a quick trip for my wife’s birthday. Despite mentioning it during reservation process and at check in it was never brought up again throughout the stay which for the property type I found lacking. Also issues at check in and check out made the entirety of the stay less than up to par with what would be expected.
Manager Response: Jpywell2018,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your wife's birthday with a stay at the resort. We apologize that is was not acknowledged throughout the stay and also for the issues that you experienced at the front desk. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Yes, the property is nice enough. And the staff tries really hard. But either they are understaffed, undertrained or both. Not one of our requests was met.   1.  Asked for more towels (there is one bath towel per guest) and they never arrived.  2.  Made a golf tee time in advance. On arrival they did not have it.  3.  Went to happy hour on the patio.  Way understaffed and had to track down waiter, ran out of diet tonic, never brought our check.  Just poor form.  4.  Went to dinner in the restaurant. Asked for olive oil. Never got it. Ordered a second drink. Never got it until we reminded the waiter. Ask for bread before meal. Never got it. Had to ask again.  5. Asked to be told when our room was ready. We were at the pool and no one let us know.   If you have to use your cell
Manager Response: LPF,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing feedback regarding your experience at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you have experienced. I know that our Director of Operations has reached out to you to discuss these further. Please accept our apologies for your experience so far as they do not reflect our standards.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location, great rooms, great service and great food!!!!!  Everything about this place is 5 star.  We needed to get away after a busy July.  It was the best place to unwind, in a beautiful setting.  I would go back next week if I could.
Manager Response: JeffdP8886SG,  We are thrilled to hear about your great experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the canyon is a wonderful spot for a getaway as it allows our guests to unwind from the normal hustle and bustle. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The little valley The Ranch at Laguna is in is too nice and too well-placed to not have a nice hotel and resort in. It was smart for the current owners to buy this place and update it. The rooms are updated, tasteful, and comfortable. The main building and restaurant are well done with nice outside views to the valley and 9 hole golf course. And the resort is just a short shuttle ride from the some of the nicest beaches in Laguna.
Manager Response: Scott S,  We appreciate the kind words regarding the re-imagination of the resort. The goal was to offer a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. Like you mentioned, Laguna Beach has 20+ beaches along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The best part of our trip to the west coast
Summary: Our family decided to vacation in California this summer. Traveling from North Carolina, our itinerary began in popular tourist destinations of Santa Monica with departure from San Diego. Initially the culmination of our trip was to stay in the historical and highly rated Hotel Del Coronado. As it turned out, The Ranch was the highlight of our vacation. The staff were overly welcoming and accommodating, always friendly with pleasant information and service. They knew exactly how much space and attention their guests need. Our two bedroom townhome was more than enough room for a family of four with split bedrooms and spacious living areas, all within a convenient walk of any facility at The Ranch. The canyon was a pleasant backdrop that provided privacy and seclusion, all within
Manager Response: Wadecoffey,  We are stoked that your stay at the resort was the best part of your trip to the west coast. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family by making them feel at home away from home. We want our guests to take lifelong memories home with them. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are popular due to the spacious layout and it is great to hear that your family enjoyed your accommodation. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a very relaxing, peaceful stay.  Great food too.  Enjoyed reading on the patio and outside our room.  Bed was very comfortable.  Grounds are well kept.  Comfortable seating scattered about.  Perfect climate.  Ocean air.  Thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.  This was our second time here and we will definitely be back.  It is our favorite long weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Jpluther,  We are thrilled that you thoroughly enjoyed a relaxing and peaceful stay in the canyon. The weather has been fantastic, so reading outside on the patio sounds like a great way to enjoy the climate. Thank you for staying with us and for the continued support of the resort. We greatly appreciate it and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Lovely stay but watch out for weekend events
Summary: We had 6 nights here at the end of July in a two bedroom cottage overlooking the golf course. Lots of space internally & very comfortable beds.  Decor very good throughout. Excellent view over the golf course too.  Really appreciated the Ubers into town which we used most evenings for dinners in Laguna Beach.  Harvest restaurant was very good and we used it for lunches most days.  Breakfasts excellent- the massive cinnamon roll has to be seen to be believed!!  Golf course is really scenic & great course - saw deer every day; luckily no signs of rattlesnakes despite the warning notices!  All the staff were extremely helpful & pleasant - a credit to the hotel.  Spa - one of the best massages I’ve ever had!  A few quibbles hence 4 stars rather than 5.  The night we arrived (a
Manager Response: Sarah I,  Thank you for staying at the resort for 6 nights. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the Uber service as Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Like you mentioned, the golf course offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not visible from other areas of the resort. We apologize that the wedding and the other special event disrupted your first night as we understand the importance of peace and quiet. We also apologize about the housekeeping service. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort is close to the beach, and great for kids. But try not to stay on a weekend when there’s a wedding if possible. The resort is newer and they can’t handle hotel guests and wedding guests successfully.
Manager Response: Andresenjulia,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize that the wedding interfered with your stay. A wedding should not affect the experience of our resort guests and we are sorry. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very service oriented resort.  We stayed as a couple. I really liked that it felt secluded and peaceful among the busyness of Laguna. We liked the pool and the convenience of being driven to the beach, provided with chairs, towels and water.   We were in building 6 and the one morning I was awoken by the noise of housekeeping rolling out to work. I'd probably request a different building the next time, but I would definitely return.  The rooms are beautifully decorated, spacious bathroom. We used our small patio to read and relax on.    Besides breakfast, we did not eat on the resort.
Manager Response: Rocksann,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The weather has been fantastic, so the pool and the beach have been popular spots for our guests to relax. We apologize that our housekeeping team disturbed you as we understand the importance of good rest. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a wonderful business meeting , the staff, food and surrounds were fabulous, workout and swim to start each day mixed in with a walk to the beach on the odd days  were a fabulous way  to commence each day . The vegetable garden is most impressive .
Manager Response: PatWSyd,  Thank you for staying with us while attending a meeting at the resort. We are glad that you got to take advantage of your leisure time before and after the meeting. Like you mentioned, the walk to Aliso Beach is a fantastic way to commence each day, especially due to the incredible sight of the sunset. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort is special.  The canyon views are peaceful, serene and gorgeous.  The pool is small but relaxing.  Tasty drinks poolside.  Yummy restaurant.  Great massages at the spa.  They do special things for the kiddos like little gifts and treats.  I loved it here and can’t wait to come back.
Manager Response: Jmuamy,  We are thrilled to hear that you loved your experience at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path location is very peaceful and allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were guests for 4 days at The Ranch. We were there for a wedding.  Everything was impecable, from the front desk service to the valet service.  The beds were very comfortable and the rooms were large and very inviting.  We would defintely stay here again.  The beach is just a 10 minute walk.
Manager Response: Diane G,  Thank you for staying with us while attending a wedding. It is great to hear that you had an impeccable experience at the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I wasn't sure what to expect....we wanted a lazy get-away weekend.  We got just that with awesome service all across the property.  Really impressive. Wonderful pool and great dining at Harvest. Rustic and beautiful property.  Easy walk to the beach.
Manager Response: Janebrust,  We are thrilled that you got to enjoy a relaxing weekend getaway at the resort. The off-the-beaten path canyon location allows our guests to unwind from the normal hustle and bustle. It is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. We want our guests to take lifelong memories home with them. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is in a magical spot and the management is top notch.  Away from the busy Laguna Strip but still walking distance from the beach.  Wonderful pool. Great for kids. Feels like old California.   We encountered a small issue on our first stay and, Laura, the front desk manager, went above and beyond to make it right. We will be back soon.
Manager Response: Mashaman,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. It is wonderful to hear that Laura went above and beyond to assist in making your experience better. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of the best hotels in Laguna Beach! Great service and room! The restaurant is awesome! The beach is right across the street and they have shuttle bus that can take you downtown Laguna Beach! Must try it!
Manager Response: Carl S,  We are thrilled that you had an excellent experience at the resort. The weather has been fantastic this year, so Aliso Beach has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. It is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a great place to stay. The rooms are not luxurious, but, they are updated. The bed in our room was not the best, but it was not the worst. The restaurant is solid, and Bens, on-site is convenient for snacks and morning coffee. The property is pretty. The staff at the front desk, and arrivals are awesome and upbeat. Kids club was great! Pool staff was on point especially when Branden was working (I believe that is his name) he had a great positive attitude and the staff was organized when he was around. The spa has awesome staff & treatments..they book up so make reservations before your stay!  My seven year enjoyed a golf lesson, and rides in the golf carts to the end of the property so we could just walk a few stairs and go through a tunnel to the beach..we stayed 5
Manager Response: Christine S,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your visit. It sounds like you made the most of your time by taking advantage of a variety of activities on property and in the local area. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service. We want our guests to take lifelong memories home with them. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Want some place beautiful and super relaxing, look no farther!!  We went for a quick stay catation/ baby moon and it was perfect.  Live music / happy hour from 4/8pm, very accommodating staff and a beautiful resort.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Kristendelpero,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you experienced a super relaxing staycation/babymoon in the canyon. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very charming, relaxing, lots of variety of activities. Good value. Good food! Friendly service! Enjoyed the 9 hole gold course. We will definitely be back for weekends and longer. Really good find!!!
Manager Response: Jlaski2018,  Thank you for staying with us. It is great to hear that you spent some time relaxing while also taking advantage of a variety of activities. The golf course offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not visible from other areas of the resort. Hopefully some of the local mule deer greeted you on the course. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a very beautiful secluded resort.  It feels like the country, but it is only a short walk to the beach.  They will shuttle you there if you like.  The live music on the patio is terrific along with watching deer graze on the fairways.  Just an outstanding place.
Manager Response: John L. B,  We are thrilled that you had an outstanding experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort offers a unique vibe with being secluded in a canyon and yet just walking distance from the beach. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: First time to Laguna, Anniversary Trip
Summary: This is a hidden gem in Laguna.  You cannot beat the resort style stay with the proximity to beaches and downtown Laguna shopping and dining. The rooms were so clean and so nice.  The bathroom was perfect for my wife and I taking our trip together.  The pool and hot tub were very nice with the poolside bar.  The best of all though would be the transportation to the beach.  We simply called and they picked us up in the golf cart with umbrellas, chairs, and towels. If you are looking for a quiet, romantic, beautiful setting this is it.  We would also return with our children.
Manager Response: Wise872,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your first trip to Laguna Beach. The weather has been fantastic this year, so Aliso Beach has been a popular sport for our guests to relax. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful staff.  Great amenities.  The shuttle service to the beach was awesome, it kept the sand out of our car.  They even provided beach chairs, umbrellas, and beach towels.  The complimentary Uber service made taking trips to downtown a breeze.  We didn't have to search and fight for parking.  The beds are super comfortable and the room is cozy.
Manager Response: Crudd2,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your time in Laguna Beach and it is great to hear that you took advantage of the beach shuttle and Uber service. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family by making them feel at home away from home. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A very nice place! Super comfy beds and the staff is amazingly friendly. The free Uber rides were awesome and the beach equipment provided was wonderful.  The setting is gorgeous. My review is only 4 out of 5 stars because there was a wedding last Saturday and the live band played until 10:00pm. Also we could not find a parking spot because all the wedding guests had taken them. My husband parked our car in the street in front of our room and had to go move it at 11 after the wedding guests left. This is incredibly wrong to do to your hotel guests. You need to leave spaces available for the guests who are paying good money to stay with you. It blows my mind that they don’t do this already. I would avoid this place on the weekends as the wedding put a damper on one of our nights.
Manager Response: Marcylw,  Thank you for staying with us. It is great to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. The weather has been fantastic this summer, so the beach has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. We apologize for the issues that you experienced during the wedding and can understand your disappointment. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch was an amazing setting for our family of 25.  We had dinners catered, special events set up and so much to do right on the site (golf, volleyball, pool, hiking.)  The Tree House provided an area for our family to gather without disturbing other hotel guests.  I would highly recommend The Ranch for any size party.
Manager Response: 900sswanson,  Thank you for hosting your family reunion at our resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time in the canyon by taking advantage of a variety of amenities and activities. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I don’t get a lot of vacation and needed some rest. We picked this place because the reviews described the peaceful experience. Sadly this is not the case where there is a wedding. We would never want any wedding to turn down their volume- but wish we would have had a heads up about the potential for the wedding soundtrack in our room. We likely would have picked something else.
Manager Response: Malexandras,  We apologize for the experience that you had at our resort as it is not acceptable. Like you mentioned, it is important to relax and enjoy your vacation. Please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel is located across the street from the ocean, and it is not too bad of walk to get there.  The remodel that they have done is quite nice.  We stayed in a two bedroom that we loved, and it worked out great for our kids.  The pool isn't anything special.  I think it would be worth it for them to upgrade their pool and lounge area into something nicer as I would be more tempted to return if it had a nicer lounge area to go to after hitting the beach for a bit.  The food is very good and service is exceptional.
Manager Response: Mariann758,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is located just a short walk from Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words regarding the re-imagination of the resort. It is great to hear that you loved the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite. They are very popular among families due to the spacious layout. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I went here for a staycation. It was pretty nice. Rooms were very clean and the grounds were well maintained. It was a long walk from our room to the restaurant. There were a lot of bugs. Food was overpriced. The location was good if you just want to stay at the hotel. If you want to go into Laguna Beach itself, it was pretty far from shopping. You’d have to drive. Not walkable.
Manager Response: L0ngB3ach,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. The city of Laguna Beach sponsors a free trolley that can take our guests to downtown daily during the summer and on weekends during the other months, so our guests don't necessarily have to make the drive. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We greatly appreciate it.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is our 3rd time staying at The Ranch at Laguna Beach and it never disappoints! We love this location because you really don't need to leave the property if you don't want to with great food, drinks, pool and spa there is really no need however, it is so easy to walk across to the beach or take the trolley into downtown Laguna.  Rooms are so spacious and comfortable and the best part is their beds which are the most comfortable beds ever!  Staff and service is always spot on with everyone being helpful, attentive and friendly.
Manager Response: 297tanyai,  We appreciate your continued support of the resort. It means a lot to us. Like you mentioned, the property offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, yet only walking distance from Aliso Beach and in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent stay overall. Very peaceful despite a wedding being on. The restaurant was excellent. The rooms are really cool and comfortable. Loads of space. The pool area is perfect and the service. Would visit again.
Manager Response: Muckrossman,  We are thrilled that you had an overall excellent stay. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort offers a naturally peaceful and quiet vibe. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A True Upgrade in Laguna Beach
Summary: Back to the 60's the property was known as Ben Brown's which featured a 9-hole golf course, restaurant and 64 hotel rooms which many locals did not know existed.  Fast forward to today - Mark Christy, General Partner, assembled a group of local investors to purchase the property and totally upgrade the entire property.  Great restaurant, upgraded hotel rooms, camps for kids, music on the patio including Vino & Vinyl the 1st Tuesday of each month.  Check it out.  You definitely will have a great time.
Manager Response: Bob B,  We really appreciate the kind words and the continued support. It means a lot to our team. The property re-imagination project turned out fantastic and the investment group is primarily comprised of local, like-minded individuals who share a deep love and respect for this iconic property. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location! We were enjoying view and nature! 3 min from the beach! Friendly and kind staff! Very quite place! Tasty food! We love live music and different games what resort provides!  Totally recommend it
Manager Response: Otali126106,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your trip. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort offers a naturally quiet and peaceful vibe. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Upon arrival the bell person politely walked me to the front desk person and said my last name correctly. The person at the front desk then called me “Mr. Calamari” even though my last name isn’t even close to sounding like that. I guess he was trying to be funny. I don’t pay that type of money to be greeted like that when I arrive. Never experienced that before in my life. What a joke.
Manager Response: Cheens2018,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the mispronunciation of your last name upon arrival at the front desk. It is unacceptable and does not reflect our standards. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a great place. The one complaint I have is that there was many bees onathe patio because of the flowers that were is bloom. This did not bother me but anyone with allergies would be in fear. Overall the place was excellent.
Manager Response: Pcotsirilos,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We do our best to have the highest pest control procedures throughout the resort. We appreciate that you let us know so we can look into this further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a great place for couples and families. We liked how quiet it is.  But it is a short walk to the beach. The service is good and the patio happy hour is great. they have games and music and comfortable rockers to sit on with fireplaces surrounding the patio.
Manager Response: Nknorris,  We are grateful that you stayed with us. Like you mentioned, the property offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch offers all kinds of neat opportunities for a fun and relaxing vacation. My wife and I recented visited here on our honeymoon. The beach was a short walk away, and the resort offered many attractions of its own. We spent a bunch of our time nearby in the beach town which is very well kept and interesting. The rooms were fancy, but not to the extreme. Also, the staff was all very polite and professional. I may not suggest this hotel as a honeymoon spot due to lack of magical romance, but it is a perfect vacation location for any families or couples who want a fun little get-away.
Manager Response: Mlf828,  Congrats on your special occasion and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. It is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. Like you mentioned, our resort offers the best of both worlds with being situated in a canyon, yet still having beach access and being in close proximity of downtown Laguna Beach. There is such a variety of activities offered along the 7.1 miles of coastline and it sounds like you made the most of your time. We appreciate the kind words and hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice staff, great restaurant, a little to secluded with limited views.
Summary: Nice friendly staff, great restaurant, average golf course. Small Friendly spa, comfortable. Rooms really nice, kept up well. The resort has limited views and not much to do but golf or spa. There is a pool but more cut out for children than adults, family friendly.
Manager Response: Kathryn K,  We appreciate that you stayed with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your meals at Harvest and your accommodation. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home away from home. We do provide a list of weekly activities at check-in to ensure all of our guests can take advantage of all that the resort and local area has to offer. The daily outdoor live music and happy hour event is very popular among our guests. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience as guest feedback is very important to our operations.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Very overpriced, poor service, not high end
Summary: I was travelling on business and then decided to treat myself to a couple of extra nights as I believed this to be considered high end.  The room is lovely, however the patio backs off onto either a volley court, swimming pool or someone else’s front door. Which means if you’re thinking of a peaceful evening, with your feet up, glass of wine and privacy you may be disappointed.  The resort is very much equipped for families and I would highly recommend it for families. But business travellers, couples on a romantic trip, or just trying to get some time out, this is not going to give you what you need, there are no little extras that make you feel special.  Room service can take over an hour, there are not enough staff so you could be sitting their for 20 mins waving at someone
Manager Response: Alaina N,  We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience at the resort. It is always disappointing when the expectations of a guest were not met and exceeded. We apologize for the inconveniences that occurred during your stay as they do not reflect our standards.  Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com? I would like to discuss this further with you. Our guest feedback is very valuable to our operations.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a one night family stay at this hotel and was overall pleased with everything. They allowed us to checkin a bit early since we arrived in town ahead of time. Everyone was courtesy up front as well as valet. The room was really nice. we were situated near the pool in a one bedroom king room. Decor was on point. The only thing that was hard for us was not having a tub to bathe our toddler, but we managed. The onsite gym is quite small but not many people were in there in the morning. The gym equipment let me get in a solid workout. We were able to grab a few drinks and cookies while listening to a three piece band in the evening. That was quite nice and relaxing and the view over the golf course and canyon was amazing.
Manager Response: Mark Z,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your overall experience at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and ensure that each guest stay feels like home way from home. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. Like you mentioned, the view of the golf course and canyon is breathtaking & definitely enhances the ambiance. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Worth the Investment for Luxury and Relaxation
Summary: We left the Blue Lantern Inn overlooking the ocean,   we had visited The Ranch previously.   A far better experience in comparison to Blue Lantern Inn in regards to customer service, amenities, and overall ambience!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort for a return visit. We appreciate the continued support. It is wonderful to hear that you cherish the service, amenities and overall ambiance at the resort. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Peaceful getaway close to town yet feels far away
Summary: Loved everything about this peaceful and beautiful place.  It feels like you are far away in a canyon yet you are right across the street from the beach and close to dining/shops,  The decor was perfect.  My husband loved the golf course and saw deer everywhere!
Manager Response: Llward5,  We are thrilled that you loved everything about your stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: When we arrived at The Ranch, we felt that this hotel was different from our expectations. The hotel is more like a golf resort, and it could offer limited interest for other guests. If you play golf, then you will enjoy a great survey of the whole property, stretching into the hidden valley. If you do not play golf, then you can enjoy the swimming pool and perhaps also play sand volleyball (this is nice for families). However, if you like to be close to nature, then it is important to know that the hotel area is pretty restricted, you really need to play golf to see the whole property. We were informed about future plans to create hiking tracks for other guests, to be able to walk into the valley. There is a nice outdoor restaurant, with open fire at the sitting places. Also
Manager Response: Cato B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not exceeded. Even though the resort does not have direct hiking trails that lead into the canyon, there are 20,000 acres of trails that are a short driving distance from the property. Most of our guests like to walk on the trail from our resort that leads towards Aliso Beach. Our team does provide a list of weekly activities at check-in to ensure all of our guests can take advantage of all that the resort and local area has to offer.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Local resort to relax and unwind
Summary: Beautiful location in the canyons of Laguna Beach.  The restaurant had delicious meals and varied selections.  The evening music on the patio was just the right beat to wind down after a day of relaxation.
Manager Response: Michaelksmith2018,  We are thankful that you stayed with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered seven days a week. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I am a California native and I never knew The Ranch at Laguna Beach even existed.  We held a two day meeting at The Ranch and were very happy with the meeting space, the food was outstanding and the hotel rooms (cottages) were beautiful.  Living in Huntington Beach, a twenty minute drive from the hotel, I might have a hard time convincing my husband we need to stay at the Ranch, but, I think it is well worth it.  Looking forward to using the Spa -- it looked beautiful.
Manager Response: Q3471BQloris,  Thank you for holding your two day meeting at our resort. It is wonderful to hear about your excellent experience. We agree that it is well worth it to make the trip from Huntington Beach to Laguna Beach for a leisure stay. There is so much to do in the canyon and along the 7.1 miles of coastline. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A nice tucked away place to stay with a large family or group-or a romantic get away. If staying more than a 2 nights, I would suggest Definitely have plans to leave the resort for meals as the one restaurant is very good, but gets repetitive for breakfast, lunch and dinner multiple days. The bed was WAY too soft for my back, but rest of my family enjoyed the down matters topper. The rooms are well appointed and the quiet setting is relaxing.
Manager Response: Lauren B,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the setting of the resort in the canyon is very peaceful and relaxing. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Up and down the Laguna coast all the action is on the water. The Montage, The Ritz, Surf and Sand etc.  but that view comes at a huge premium and unless you are an owl - that view is invisible while you are in your room asleep. Enter The Ranch. Tucked into a beautiful and lush canyon the Ranch blends into the scenery with a 9 hole golf course a fantastic restaurant and extremely comfy rooms. Quiet and Low key. But with great service and a super friendly staff. My opinion - stay at The Ranch and go eat breakfast at the Montahe if you want to overpay for the view. Or even better - breakfast at the Ranch and take their shuttle to the beach for the best of all worlds.
Manager Response: Hdemott3,  Thank you for staying with us and for the detailed feedback. We appreciate the kind words and your continued support of the resort.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Loved this place a very unique and a welcome addition to a place we love. Spectacular views and has something for everyone. Highly recommended to all looking to relax, explore, experience great food and amazing service.
Manager Response: JRCAL67,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the views of the canyon and surrounding nature are breathtaking. The resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Love the charm, seclusion and beautiful nature setting of this great get away! We took our whole family and enjoyed the golf course, bocce ball, seeing all the deer roam around and meeting friendly staff and guests.
Manager Response: Lzook353354,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. The off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort offers a naturally peaceful and relaxing vibe. The golf course presents exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are spectacular. Like you mentioned, the deer enjoy greeting our guests and we are thrilled that you got to experience it. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: From the moment I arrived I was greeted with excellent service.  A warm friendly atmosphere.  Shortly after checking into my room a delivery of macaroons, water, and nice note saying Happy Birthday was brought to my room.  The amenities were plush and beyond comfortable.  The pool was warm, jacuzzi nice, and enjoyed by myself and in town guest.  The food was great.  Pool side bar service was great for drinks and food.  Harvest restaurant delicious.  Ended the weekend fireside with live music, food/drinks in cozy wooden rocking chairs.  Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: JohnA3318EI,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with a stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that the welcome amenity enhanced your celebration. Our team works hard to ensure that each guest stay feels like home away from home. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of activities and amenities during your time in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great hotel, friendly service beautiful location and room. Food was wonderful. Will go back again! Took the whole family and there was something for everyone. Golf, beach, games for the family to play on the patio. Music was nice to listen to while drinking a glass of wine and watching the golfers come in on the ninth hole.
Manager Response: Kpdesign1,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our team works hard to ensure that each guest stay feels like home away from home. Summary: Our family stayed in one of the cottages and had a terrific time relaxing, enjoying the views, taking walks and especially the terrific service from the staff and the delightful meals at Harvest.  We are definitely going back soon!
Manager Response: 873deniseg2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a terrific experience at the resort. The canyon offers a naturally peaceful and quiet setting that allows our guests to relax in paradise. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular due to the spacious layout and we are thrilled that your family enjoyed the accommodation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lovely resort that was super close to home but felt like a million miles away.  Very laid back but great service.  The property has been completely redone and looks amazing.  You will be very pleased with the rooms and lay out of the resort.  We dined at Harvest and enjoyed a lovely dinner.
Manager Response: Patdl69,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, you could be super close to home, but feel like you are a million miles away by being secluded in the Aliso & Wood Canyons. Our team works hard to ensure a guest stay at the resort feels like home away from home by treating them like family. Thank you for the kind words regarding the re-imagination of the resort and we look forward to you return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had an enjoyable stay at The Ranch.  The hotel offers a relaxing atmosphere for golfing, relaxing poolside or going to the spa.  There is also good hiking a short drive away.  The food and wine selections are also very good from The Harvest restaurant.  The rooms are well appointed, with a large shower and bathroom area.  My only complaint would be the thin walls in building 8 where I stayed - can hear the TV and people in the room beside me!!
Manager Response: Sharon R,  We are thrilled that you had an enjoyable stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property provides a relaxing atmosphere for our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. In addition to the activities offered on property, Laguna Beach has such a variety of experiences to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent resort, very good food, walking distance from beautiful beach. Rooms are spacious with huge shower. Pool is very nice and there is a beach volleyball court. The service offered for our company training was very good.
Manager Response: Stefano O,  We are thrilled that the services for the company training hosted at our resort were very good. Like you mentioned, the property offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons and within walking distance of Aliso Beach. The weather has been fantastic this year so the pool has been a popular spot for our guests to relax. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I wanted to take my girlfriend for a romantic getaway. I have been to this property before when it was Ben Browns. The place has been renovated since I was last year. We both loved it. The minute we walked into the lobby we fell in love with a place. The front desk man Blake was very attentive and friendly and made us both feel right at home. The room was very comfortable and the grounds we're gorgeous. The restaurant and bar we're very nice. All I can say is, we can't wait to come back. I will recommend this place to all of my friends. We only live 30 minutes away, but it seemed like the minute we walked in we we're both a thousand miles from home!
Manager Response: James M,  We are thrilled that you loved your romantic getaway in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Relaxing and quiet retreat steps away from Laguna Beach
Summary: We celebrated our anniversary w/ a one night staycation here at the Ranch. The canyon setting, rooms, and restaurant/deck were all beautifully decorated and relaxing. The staff and service was top notch. The entire staff was very friendly, with lots of suggestions for restaurants and hikes. They sent us a lovely anniversary bottle of prosecco and macarons to our room! They offer comped Uber service to Laguna village which we utilized for a dinner off property. Had a nice brunch at Harvest on Sunday as well. Will definitely return in the future!
Manager Response: Mfs111,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Our team works hard to ensure that a guest stay is full of lifelong memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Highly recommend everything was perfect. Rooms are beautifully appointed, beds are comfortable and the grounds are meticulously maintained. From check in to check out our experience with every team member was excellent! Will definitely return!

Summary Heading: A MUST visit with room for improvement.  Not perfect yet but an EXCELLENT start!
Summary: Make your own judgement, I had a list of mostly positives.  Definitely go and experience!  Swim in the pool!  The food is excellent!  Close to Laguna Beach downtown, quick drive. High end resort that is casual.  Room for improvement but this is a new establishment and I trust they will get the kinks out soon enough.  I praise their originality and daring for this unique property that should fare well with most  looking for a relaxing and pleasant stay.  When I stayed there the resort was at full capacity but it did not feel that way except mostly...the restaurant was the exception and that will come with experience and handling situations smoother.  Definitely worth a try!!!
Manager Response: Rschie237085,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities at the resort. In addition to the variety of activities and amenities at the resort, Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe allows our guests to relax by unplugging from the normal hustle and bustle. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great for a weekend stay and an easy walk through the beautiful 9 hole canyon course. The people are super nice, and the rooms super clean. Harvest restaurant on site is a great spot to re-hydrate and fill your belly. Its a an easy 7 minute walk to the beach, and lots of other spots if you decide.
Manager Response: DJCJR_11,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your weekend stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of walking to Aliso Beach, especially since the weather has been fantastic so far this year. We agree that Harvest is a great spot to eat some delicious food while also soaking in breathtaking views. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: very calm and relaxing atmosphere. perfect to unwind. staff are very helpful and always around. the food is exceptional. did not golf or use the spa but plan to try next visit. I would recommend to my family and my friends. conference facilities are small.
Manager Response: Fuadr2017,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe allows our guests to unwind from the normal hustle and bustle. Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The grounds were very peaceful with the birds singing, flowers blooming and clear skies. There is very spotty cell reception, but I found this a blessing. The rooms were very clean & surprisingly. The food at the Harvest Restaurant was okay. It could be taken up a few notches especially for the price pain. The service was exceptional.  The Coffee Shop on the campus was mediocre. This is primarily because of the beans used. They have a minimum of coffee specialties, which is fine as long as they are done well. Espresso, Mocha, Cappuccino, drip coffee. Very enjoyable few days away.
Manager Response: OneCalifGal,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the peacefulness of the surrounding canyon. Like you mentioned, it is a naturally beautiful and tranquil setting. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. Guest feedback is very valuable to our operations and we appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback based upon your experience.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was our anniversary and we had stayed here 2 years ago also for our anniversary - it was perfect then. The hotel grounds are lovely and we love Laguna Beach. Unfortunately, there was a duplicate booking which I was later told happens some time. When I called to let them know the day prior, they were accommodating. However, upon arrival we did not have a room booked. They were able to get us one in Building 3 which overlooked the volleyball court - not what we hoped for. I had also emailed and shared it was our anniversary and received an emailed response back, but no one made a comment about that at all. There was an on again and off again engine noise late at night which was disturbing. We wanted to love The Ranch as much as we did 2 years ago, but some things can't be
Manager Response: Lisa H,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences and can understand your disappointment, especially since you had a different experience during your previous stays. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: From check in to check out, everything was perfect, from the front desk, Harvest Dining room, the suites-bedding and showers -the best! The views and the grounds were beautiful and breathtaking! The outside public areas are lovely-stay here!! It is worth every penny!!!
Manager Response: 5LindaH5,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear from check-in to check-in that everything was fantastic. Like you mentioned, the views of the surrounding canyon walls is breathtaking. We appreciate the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stupendous!! Great romantic getaway spot ....staff member service was impeccable! They go above and beyond to ensure customers needs are met beyond expectations. It was our first time and from first call to reservation  till upon departure at vallet....the experience was fantastic!
Manager Response: Samit T,  We are thrilled that you had a fantastic romantic getaway at the resort. Summary: We enjoyed our stay and we will be coming back in the near future. One improvement we would recommend is improving poolside food. The rooms were beautiful and the scenery gave us something different than what most laguna beach hotels could give.

The off-the-beaten path vibe allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We recently stayed at The Ranch at Laguna Beach whilst on vacation in California. The room was beautiful, romantic and nicely decorated. The bed was so comfortable and the pillows felt extremely luxurious.  The staff at The Ranch were all very welcoming and friendly. The live music in the evenings with the open fire was wonderful!  We loved that we could walk 10 minutes and then we'd be on the beach!  Our stay was so lovely that my boyfriend ended up proposing to me! So, this place will always have a place in our heart, we will have to return for anniversaries in the future!
Manager Response: Anna K,  Congrats on your engagement and thank you for staying with us. It is so wonderful to know that your stay at the resort was full of lifelong memories and that it will always have a special place in your hearts. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is nestled in the mountains, but walking distance from the beach.  You are surrounded by trees, mountains, and the most beautiful sky in the afternoon.  The Ranch offers cozy music in the afternoon and complimentary Yoga and other activities throughout the day.   The one thing that was a bother was the pillows.  They were big and kinked my neck.  If you are sensitive to pillow types I'd recommend to bring your own pillow just in case.   We'll visit the Ranch again!
Manager Response: Pleasekamir,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed a very relaxing getaway in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities and activities during your stay. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: best place in the world, we looking forward to go again, and was recommended to all the friends, service is excellent, the property keep very wall, in-room service is fest and amazing, worth every dollar

Our team understands how important service is to the quality of a guest experience and we are thrilled that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We have great beaches, warm weather and the joys of a coastal community in San Diego.   So why a getaway to LB?  After an easy drive and super lunch in Dana Point to kick off our getaway weekend we arrived to find we were upgraded for our 3 nights for the price of two weekend.  A wonderful condo/cottage in this picturesque canyon.  So quiet and the front desk folks were warm and helpful, as was the bartender who recommended a terrific Caribbean restaurant called Eva’s.  They even paid for Uber rides within a 5 Mile radius which made drinking some of her 400+ rums even easier.  We weren’t totally debauched.  We hiked right next to the property and were very close to the beach. Everything was perfect.  Having virtually no cell connection forced us to be quite serene.
Manager Response: GeorgiBG,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your trip at the resort while also exploring the local area. It is great to hear that our team provided personalized service that enhanced your visit. In addition to the 20+ beaches, Laguna Beach offers approximately 15,000 acres of outdoor trails. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location, excellent service, comfortable and clean rooms. The dinner at the harvest restaurants was great too. Cool outdoor bar. I would highly recommend to anyone who wishes to go for a relaxing beach holiday.
Manager Response: Hoong Chwan K,  We are thrilled that you had an excellent experience at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Thank you for staying with us and for the recommendation to others. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The setting for this hotel is absolutely spectacular.  It is a short walk to the beach and yet it is very private with beautiful canyon views.  The golf course (nine holes) is really fun to play and an easy walk (short course).  The outdoor patio has a great evening vibe with live music when we were there (was told that there is live music most day).  We had a very nice stay and would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Ned223,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a round of golf at Ben Brown's Golf Course. The course offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not available from other areas of the property. Hopefully some of the local mule deer greeted you during your round. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel-- the staff was the most customer focused and most professional I have ever encountered.  The setting, the views, the food, and the location are all superb! Hats off to the management; they have anticipated every detail.  Well done!
Manager Response: Chazhorton,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that the overall experience was superb. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service so that lifelong memories can be taken home. Like you mentioned, it is very important to anticipate the needs of our guests. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A peaceful property in the middle chaos, Food was very good and the service was excellent. Would stay again many times if possible. A longer stay would be needed to real enjoy all the benefits. Good location for a honeymoon.
Manager Response: cOcpa2018,  We are thrilled to hear that you had an excellent experience at the resort. We agree that a longer length of stay is the best way to take advantage of your time in paradise. In addition to the variety of activities and amenities at the resort, Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Tree House is a perfect getaway.  We had our end of taxes celebration dinner in the Harvest Restaurant and a small cocktail party in the Tree House before dinner.  It was PERFECT!!  The service and staff were wonderful.  We would do it again.
Manager Response: Pmtedeschi,  We are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful experience at the resort. It sounds like you enjoyed some delicious food at Harvest. Like you mentioned, The Treehouse is a great accommodation for a getaway due to the spacious layout and featured amenities. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Quaint and beautiful.  Beds were fabulous. Rooms lovely. Restaurant was delicious. Service attentive. Was there for work but would return with my husband for a getaway. Great location. Rooms were spacious and very well decorated.
Manager Response: Laurawalton67,  Thank you for staying with us during your business trip. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the beauty of the surrounding nature. We agree that you need to return and experience Laguna Beach from a leisure vacation aspect as the city has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at The Ranch for an anniversary celebration!  We were thrilled with the accommodations, the friendly staff, and the beautiful surroundings. We couldn't have asked for a better stay except perhaps to have stayed longer!  Thank you for making the experience so perfect!
Manager Response: FoodLover3,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that your experience exceeded your expectations and was filled with memories. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: After my first review, we were invited back by The Ranch and we're so glad that we did. The only complaint I had during my previous stay was that I didn't sleep well because of the noise from a wedding and construction in the morning. I appreciated the gesture of a complimentary night stay to make up for the last night.  The Ranch wowed us once again.  This time we stayed in the creekside suites and it was so beautiful and peaceful.  We dined at The Harvest restaurant and enjoyed our lunch on the patio. The Ranch is seriously a hidden gem.  Their property is nestled in a serene canyon but just minutes away from the beach.  We felt like their mission is truly to make sure the guests are well taken care of.  Their complimentary uber service is also awesome.  I don't think I'd ever
Manager Response: Jane K,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your return visit to the resort. It is important to us that our guests have an excellent experience and our team works hard to treat them like family. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful view, music on the open courtyard and delicious food!
Summary: Two couples enjoyed cocktails on the comfortable courtyard seating overlooking the canyon. We sat in front of one of the fire pits and the server brought over a heater and blankets to warm us on the cool evening. The guitar playing singer added to the serene atmosphere and was the perfect beginning to a great evening.   We then enjoyed dinner at the Ranch Restaurant. The atmosphere is like a comfortable lodge with a fireplace and upholstered seating. The view was lovely, the service was top notch and the food superb.
Manager Response: Paulette W,  Thank you for joining us on the patio for happy hour and live music, followed by dinner at Harvest. Like you mentioned, the views of the golf course and canyon are breathtaking. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed some delicious food and that the service was top notch. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The resort was beautiful. The staff was amazing. The room was nice and clean. The grounds were pretty great. Overall the place was fantastic! Pool was clean and warm and the restaurant had great food at good prices.
Manager Response: Gary T,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you had a fantastic experience. The pool has been a popular area for our guests to relax as the weather has been really nice so far this year. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay, and are planning to return next year. Different from the other accommodations in the area (i.e. hotels on the beach). This is not on the beach, but more in touch with nature, and less commercial. Food was very good, staff was friendly, and especially convenient if golfing is in the plans. Very clean and tidy accommodations, with live music during happy hour!
Manager Response: Totomtl2018,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, our resort is different from other accommodations in the area as it offers the best of both worlds with being situated in a canyon, yet still having beach access. The live music, happy hour and games on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: excellent stay in a unique setting
Summary: This was the final stop on our family Road Trip down the Californian Coast and a wonderful way to finish the holiday in style. The hotel itself is set in a stunning Canyon opposite the beach and the chalet style rooms are beautifully fitted out with lovely bathrooms, (and very good water pressure in the shower which made a welcome change from most places we visited). The restaurant setting, especially on the terrace is truly stunning and the evening live music entertainment, friendly and professional staff (special mention to Laura on the front desk) made our stay extra special. This is not a glitzy, flash brand-name hotel (If you want that, there are plenty of those in the region) but it doesn't need to be. It is all about the setting, the grounds, the surrounding nature and
Manager Response: Timajacksoin,  Thank you for staying with us during the final stop of your family road trip. Traveling down the California coast sounds like an amazing vacation. We agree that the setting of the property is truly stunning. Like you mentioned, the peacefulness of the canyon allows our guests to relax and unplug from the normal hustle & bustle. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A canyon oasis in Laguna Beach
Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a beautifully appointed property that looks surprises from the inside and outside equally.  On the outside it has a rustic feel and is beautifully set at the bottom of a beautiful canyon.  You feel enclosed by nature.  The buildings are simple and non-distinct.  Yet you step inside and you feel instant farmhouse luxury - from the carpeting and bedding to the lighting and artwork.  A very pleasant setting and a beautiful place to stay.  Not exactly a beachy vibe but special nevertheless.
Manager Response: Cookie2008_04,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The resort was designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Like you mentioned, our guests get to enjoy an off-the-beaten path adventure in the canyon. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had the best time staying at The Ranch!  The property is beautiful and the staff are wonderful!  We loved the outdoor fire pits during Happy Hour with the live music or some kind of entertainment each night we were there.  Amazing!
Manager Response: Juliecamberg220,  It is wonderful to hear that you had the best time staying at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service. The live music, happy hour and games on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: amazing! love the ranch, the best place to stay in orange county. the way that you can be so close to the ocean but still feel enclosed in the laguna canyons is what makes it so special and will always have us coming back
Manager Response: Masterstephcertified,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. It is great to hear that you are already planning on coming back to visit. Thank you for the staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: an enjoyable week in a seaside canyon resort
Summary: After spending a week at this property it is understood why this resort is considered a Unique Lodging experience by National Geographic.  From the natural beauty of the canyon surroundings to the beautifully appointed inside spaces it makes for a relaxing retreat from the busy beach town of Laguna Beach. My whole family, from ages 7 to 70,  enjoyed activities such as a welcoming and interesting 9 holes of golf to stargazing with an astronomer on a Friday night.   The afternoons and evenings on the patio were a treat with very good local musicians to entertain us. We enjoyed the dining experience at the resort.  It was nice to have such good food available without having to get into a car.
Manager Response: Pamelarae2013,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities/activities to make the most of your stay. We are thrilled to hear that your family had such an enjoyable experience. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Family friendly hotel in beautiful setting
Summary: relaxed and welcoming hotel with varied room options Great pool especially for kids. Dining relaxed if unexciting.Ideal for exploring Laguna Beach. Golfing in beautiful canyon setting  popular for guests.
Manager Response: Catherinefoley,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Our team understands the importance of welcoming our guests like family. Like you mentioned, the golf course offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not visible in other areas of the resort. It sounds like you took advantage of exploring Laguna Beach as there are a variety of experiences along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It’s difficult to add anything new to the many other glowing reviews on this property other than to say that I agree wholeheartedly with the positive reviews. My boyfriend and I came for a quick weekend away from LA. The Ranch not only didn’t disappoint, it exceeded expectations. It’s a perfectly beautiful mix of luxurious outdoorsy hotel and beachside beauty. It’s easy to forget you’re a short walk down the driveway to the beach when you look around and see green cliffs and hills and hear the stream running along the property.   The pool was lovely, as was the gym. Restaurant and room service food was good and the service was spectacular. We also enjoyed walking around in the evening, sitting by on of the fire pits, and hanging out in the comfortable, well-appointed room.   We
Manager Response: TrvlFam09,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that your expectations were exceeded. It sounds like you made the most of your trip and took advantage of the resort amenities.  Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch sits nestled in a canyon, across the PCH from the ocean/beach. A ranger will run you over if desired. They have a nice outside patio area with firepits overlooking their 9-hole golf course. You can order food and drinks there as well. The resort does have heated pool, a jacuzzi as well as sand volleyball court.   If traveling with kids during non-summer months; there is not much for the kids to do and no inside areas to hang out (only the restaurant Harvest). Would be great if the added other kid friendly activities like basketball hoop, cards, jenga in addition to cornhole sets.  If the sun isn’t out - it’s very chilly and hard to occupy them.   For the price, I’d hoped for more family fun.
Manager Response: VivaciousVal,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast.
