The live music, happy hour and games on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The setting is gorgeous, and the service is great.  Really enjoyed our stay. Just a heads up - the rooms are not very spacious for the price and don't have bathtubs.  The service was wonderful.  We attended a wedding there, and it was a magical setting.
Manager Response: 907ellenb,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us while attending a wedding at the resort. Like you mentioned, the view of the canyon and golf course is a breathtaking backdrop. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great views of the canyon, close enough to hear the waves crashing. Loved the resort. Food from the restaurant was slightly above average, nothing to write home about. Only complaint, lots of kid noise. Other than that it was great and relaxing. We had a splendid dinner in bed
Manager Response: Tperez122975,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. Listening to the waves crashing at Aliso Beach is definitely a pretty neat sound to hear. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I had the best birthday experience here...the grounds were beautiful and the property was tucked in the canyon so we felt completely removed from any of the tourists and traffic. Yet we were just a few minutes from the ocean. All of the employees were so sweet and accommodating and made us feel so taken care of. Can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you had the best birthday experience at the resort.  Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home. We can't wait for you to come back too.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We traveled with 2 kids for spring break and had high hopes based on the website marketing. While the happy hour and golf is great, the rest fell short for our group. The on-site dining options get old quick, the pool wasn't warm enough in March for our kids, and there were not near the kid activities that are mentioned on the website. We were so excited to stay here, but ultimately we were pretty disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We are bummed to hear that you were disappointed as we want our guests to enjoy their time at the resort. I will be reaching out to you so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: 87 acres of pure bliss tucked away in calif canyon - hard to believe this peaceful paradise sits in the middle of all the surrounding development.  food at the restaurant was fantastic, selection at the pro shop was unique/terrific.  this texan highly recommends
Manager Response: ROBERT S,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of our 87-acre resort. It sounds like you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest and the retail offerings at the golf shop. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We booked a two-night stay here to get away from LA and we had the best time! Gorgeous room and a super comfortable king bed (Kerurig, microwave and mini-fridge.) We loves the hot tub and pool bars The property is lovely and tucked right across the PCH from the ocean. It was easy drive to downtown Laguna Beach. Also, the customer service was exceptional!! We’ll definitely be back!
Manager Response: KellyM783,  We are thrilled to hear that you had the best time during your two-night stay at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time in Laguna Beach. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I love your hotel and it is my first choice when staying in the area but sometime the cost prevents me from being able to stay on business travel!  I love the 2 for 3 offering and took advantage of that on both of my previous stays.  Will be back in area late April but room rates at that time are above my allotted rate.
Manager Response: Implementedsolutions,  We are thrilled to hear you love our hotel and that it is your first choice when staying in the area. Your continued support means a lot to us and we greatly appreciate it.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our family of four tried this place last weekend and it wasn't bad.  We often stay at the Ojai Valley Inn and Spa and it is similar in a lot of ways, and not in others.  The property is nestled in a small canyon off the main highway in Laguna.  They pack a lot of buildings into a relatively small and contained property.    Check in was easy.  Our room was the two bedroom "Cottage" suite that is basically a two story condo with a small kitchen with no sink.  The shower had great pressure and housekeeping was adequate.   The best part of the property was the restaurant.  The prices are half on breakfast from Ojai.  And don't forget to try the cinnamon roll. Fantastic!  We also had friends over for dinner and it was as good.  Try the duck wings.  I also felt that the servers were
Manager Response: Treehouse_man,  We are grateful that your family stayed with us. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest and that it was the highlight of your time at the resort. Our property completes routine pest control service and we apologize that there was an issue in your suite. Can you please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This restaurant is a total do-over of the restaurant originally known as Ben Brown's adjacent the nine hole golf course. The decor/ambiance is excellent - very pleasant. The menu is good and varied. We all tried the Brussels sprouts starter - OK but I prefer my own Brussel sprout recipes. The entrees included the Short Ribs, Half Chicken, Crispy Salmon, and the Whole Branzino. All very good but the Branzino was exceptional. Would definitely have again. My only negative would be that the prices are a tad high, but then, it is Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Badger1_98,  We appreciate that you dined at Harvest. Like you mentioned, the view of the canyon and golf course from your table enhances the ambiance. The resort was designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were in Dana Point for a work function and wanted to extend our trip.  I wanted to play golf, do a message, and just relax.  The Racnh is Fantastic!  We were there on a Monday & Tuesday so it was very quite.  We had a message on Monday (best I've ever had) and played golf on Tuesday.  We also took in some hiking and spent some time on the paved paths by the ocean.  Rooms were perfect (view outside of our room was not but didn't matter).  Most comfortable bed I've ever slept in.  Breakfast and lunch at Harvest were fantastic.  Dinner was OK - not as much of a selection as I'd like but the service was good, great table, good bottle of wine.  Had to settle for a ribeye because it's all they had for meat.  It was just okay but part of that is because I'm a fillet guy.  Wonderful
Manager Response: Mike O,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort. Getting a massage at Sycamore Spa and playing a round of golf at Ben Brown's Golf Course both sound like great ways to relax in paradise. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Ranch on a roD trip around Southern California.  The Golf course was very fun, food was good, our servers were very friendly.  The room was really nice, and the bed was wonderful.
Manager Response: Melinda B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your road trip around Southern California. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a scenic round of golf on Ben Brown's Golf Course and also some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. Overall, it sounds like you made the most of your trip at the resort. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very special location and beautiful quiet get away spot for some TLC and connection with nature. The facility is attractive and service excellent. More indoor lounge seating would be a plus for days when it is cold and windy out
Manager Response: Jsteph571015,  We are thrilled that you got to enjoy a quiet getaway in the canyon and connect with nature. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We walked down memory lane by sitting out and listening to music, enjoying an amazing dinner, a scenic round of golf (deers included) and relaxing in the pure tranquility of The Ranch.  We shared a magnificent, dry aged, bone in, rib eye for 2 overlooking the majestic view of the first green.
Manager Response: Brenda S,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a tranquil experience. Like you mentioned, the view of the canyon and golf course from your table definitely enhances the ambiance at Harvest. Overall, it sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a fantastic resort!! I visited this hotel with my children over the summer. It was the first vacation that we have been able to go on as a family. We were all so excited. I had been in touch with the hotel prior to my arrival, and everyone I was in touch with before and during my visit were knowledgeable, courteous, and kind. There was a basket and fruit already in our room when we got there. We had help finding our room and getting unloaded. The rooms are gorgeous. We had a large suite overlooking the creek. Stunning views from all around this property. We enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi, and had breakfast each morning in the restaurant. The food is amazing!!! Large portions too. They had beach towels, chairs, and umbrellas to check out for free and take to the beach. (This
Manager Response: Khadijah1976,  We are thrilled that you had a fantastic stay at the resort, especially since it was the first vacation that you were able to go on as a family. It sounds like it was full of lifelong memories that you were able to take home with you. Hopefully you can stay with us again this upcoming summer as we would love to have you back.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Just returned last night from four nights at the Ranch.  I was a little concerned because we had a little issue when checking in.  The room was not ready at 4pm which was very frustrating but when we finally got into the room, there was a charcuterie tray and a bottle of wine with a nice note from Blake which was greatly appreciated.  The Ranch is absolutely gorgeous and reminds me so much of places I have visited in Colorado.  We stayed in a two bedroom cottage that was attractive, very spacious, and comfortable.  Also, the staff was very nice and helpful.  It was such a great bonus having free Uber service within a 5 mile radius.  The location is perfect and the beach is just a short walk across the street.  I would definitely recommend staying here!
Manager Response: Jmegg3,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort for four nights. We apologize for the inconvenience at check-in and appreciate your patience. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I booked a room at The Ranch at Laguna Beach without doing extensive research and came in without many expectations.  To say that I was pleasantly surprised would be an understatement…I was absolutely floored.   The location was seriously PERFECT! I was in town for a wedding and it was about a 15 minute drive to the venue. I’ve never had a hotel experience like this before! The room itself was very rustic-chic, comfortable, and much larger than expected. It was clean, modern, and very welcoming. It really did feel like a getaway…  All of the employees that I interacted with at The Ranch at Laguna Beach were accommodating, helpful, and seemed genuinely happy to be there. Parking was a breeze and the amenities were top-notch.  Although we only stayed at The Ranch at Laguna Beach
Manager Response: Samuel T,  We are thrilled that you had such an amazing and memorable experience at the resort. Thank you so much for sharing your feedback as we love it when our guests have the time of their lives in the canyon. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family as we want them to feel at home and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your first stay. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline, so we look forward to your return visit with a longer length of stay.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent hotel and service! First time staying at this hotel in Laguna! Will definitely stay again due to the excellent service! Everyone was eager to assist me! The rooms were convenient to everything as well as being beautiful! Love that there was Uber service!
Manager Response: Abravery3,  We are thrilled that you had an excellent first stay at the resort. Our team works hard to deliver personalized service and anticipate the needs of our guests. Our goal is to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB

Summary: Peaceful, safe, relaxing! Outstanding Staff! So friendly warm, they added personal touches you don't expect and it made this visit most memorable. I'll go back for the SPA, it's a real GEM! Bravo!! Listening to the music on the patio was nice. The food was Five Star! Lot of places, couple of food items stand out, but we stayed four days and ate all our meals on property and they were ALL VERYGOOD!!
Manager Response: Sprtnthsky,  We are thrilled that you experienced a peaceful and relaxing four night stay at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family with personalized service and make them feel at home. It is great to hear that the service our team provided created lifelong memories. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words regarding the food at Harvest Restaurant and that you ate all of your meals on property. Your continued support means a lot to us. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna was an excellent experience.  My Company was introducing a new product and lined up was training rooms with staff making sure everything was fine. The meals were very professional and delicious. The rooms were very spacious and comfortable.
Manager Response: Sandrikka H,  Thank you for choosing to host your company event at the resort. We are thrilled to hear that you had an excellent overall experience. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family as we understand the importance of quality service. We hope that you choose to return to the resort soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort is how others have mentioned it to be, quiet, serene and perfect for those not looking to do anything. It has a golf course, a restaurant, a cafe/bar, pool/spa and a few outdoor sports areas. Rooms were nice, clean and well maintained. We didn't love the food. Not because it wasn't good quality but because it was very limited. Staying 4 days, having that many breakfasts, lunches and dinners without many menu options really does drag. I would love to see the menu expanded to have more variety. If you don't golf (like us), there is limited things to do but we still enjoyed the time.
Manager Response: BC777,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort allows our guests to relax by unplugging from the normal hustle and bustle. The menu at Harvest Restaurant is a seasonal menu, so there are different selections available when the new seasonal menus are introduced. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna is a wonderful  peaceful place nestled a canyon In Laguna Beach. It feels like you are in the country but you are only minutes from the beach. The food and service is excellent. Our Hotel room on the outside felt like i was in a cabin but the inside was very modern.
Manager Response: Gscibilia,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the location of the property is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant and that the service was excellent. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a quick stay and left for Catalina Island from Dana point in the morning. Room was very nice and the bed was wonderful. Parking is a little difficult but staff was there to help if needed . . . .
Manager Response: 610toniw,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Thank you for your patience during the parking lot beautification project. We completed the project last week and the parking space on property is back to full capacity. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Love this place, everything was fabulous. We stayed in one of the less expensive rooms and it was very nice, linens were luxurious. I had no complains, if it had an ocean view I would have ginen it 5 stars!
Manager Response: DEBORAHJ805,  We are thrilled to hear that you love the resort and that everything was fabulous. Even though the property does not have an ocean view, it offers the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch at Laguna Beach Team

Summary Heading: Nice place for a weekend golf trip
Summary: We spent four days in late January 2018, over a weekend at this resort. We arrived in time to play nine holes in the afternoon, then again Friday morning. The course was challenging for me, relatively new and as well as for my husband who is experienced. On Saturday we played in Irvine at Strawberry Farms and then a dolphin tour on Sunday.  The hotel staff were all helpful. The bed was comfortable, always appreciate the double sink. We couldn't open terrace door at first, engineering responded right away. Only ended with one breakfast and happy hour on site since there were other good selections in town.
Manager Response: Moirajd,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort for four days. It sounds like you made the most of your trip and enjoyed a variety of outdoor activities. Hopefully a few rounds of golf led to some great shots and memories. Like you mentioned, the dual vanities are a popular feature in our guestrooms. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was my 4th time staying at The Ranch.  By far the most amazing hotel in the Laguna area.  Very peaceful and a great place to go relax with the family.  If you don't mind having an ocean view, this is your hotel.  The grounds are meticulous and the staff extremely helpful and friendly.  Overall- the best value for your buck in the Laguna area
Manager Response: Dancat2018,  Thank you for staying at the resort for the 4th time.  It sounds like you found your home away from home in Laguna Beach. The peaceful and tranquil vibe of the canyon is definitely something our guests cherish. We appreciate the continued support and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is fantastic. Just a few steps from the beach, restaurants, and shops but the canyon setting creates an illusion of isolation. It was so nice to walk out onto our patio to drink our coffee and be serenaded by singing birds while we looked at this beautiful canyon. Then, when we felt like it we ran into town to enjoy the great Laguna Beach community.   The restaurant was good, not great, the brussel sprouts and wedge salad were great, but the other items were just decent.
Manager Response: 711timothyg,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and being in close proximity to downtown. Laguna Beach has such a variety of experiences along the 7.1 miles of coastline and it is great to hear that you took advantage of exploring the local area. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: a wonderful get away to relax and relax food was great staff was very helpful location was a delight room was clean and comfortable two story two bedroom two bath unit on golf course will most definitely return
Manager Response: MichaelmH6032PW,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway at the resort along with some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout and breathtaking views. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent accommodations the rooms didn’t feel like you’re staying in a hotel which is what I absolutely loved. Nowadays I think people would rather stay in AIRBNB than hotel strictly due to the lack of space and and the amount they’re paying. But your resort is well worth the cost. The complimentrary Uber rides to town and back to the hotel is I think what really sold me and is why I will come back. That itself made our stay to stress free. With the all the amenities and credits this place is truly worth the stay per night. I’m so happy I found this place as I am already recommending and raving about it.
Manager Response: Maria R,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of a variety of amenities and made the most of your time at the resort. Thank you for the recommendations to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Seam and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Although I'm local in OC, I had yet to stay at/visit The Ranch. Given that I had a mid-week birthday this year, I chose to stay local and plan an overnight visit to The Ranch for a quick getaway. I would love to say it was a perfect choice, but unfortunately that wasn't the case. All in all, the property is quiet, tranquil and a hidden treasure simply based on location in South Laguna. I stayed in a well-appointed Canyon Room which is a short walk/drive from the main property. While the room was clean, comfortable and relaxing - with rocking chairs immediately outside of each room -  I was surprised how thin the walls were from room-to-room when In-Room Dining came knocking at the room next door at 6:30 AM (twice!) and spoke very loudly to the guest (who I couldn't hear at all).
Manager Response: RocioInOC,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for the unacceptable experience that you had at the resort as it does not reflect our standards. We will be reaching out to you directly to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Though didn't use any additional services as we were up early each day to go to Disneyland.  Would like to utilize the property to it's maximum next time, including the pool, spa and restaurant.  Nice room service.
Manager Response: Sunscreensue,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you spent some quality time at Disneyland during the trip. We look forward to your return visits that will allow you to utilize the property amenities and explore the city of Laguna Beach.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Tranquil and serene. Very romantic get away.
Summary: The staff was attentive and personalized the experience. The propert is gorgeous with access to a spa, the beach and a lovely hike with a panoramic view. We will definitely return for another visit!!!
Manager Response: JaneeV3760QT,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a romantic getaway at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home. It is great that you took advantage of visiting the beach and going for a hike as the nice weather has made exploring the outdoors really fun. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Treehouse is a wonderful suite for a private family getaway. Ok for 2 couples who want to enjoy the decks and beautiful views but second bedroom has queen bed and no real light or view. Wonderful large fireplace, maybe flame set a little high for such a warm day but great ambiance. Stay in for wine and appetizers
Manager Response: F9272WLsheilas,  Thank you for choosing the resort for a weekend birthday celebration. Like you mentioned, The Treehouse offers an expansive 1,600 sq. ft. floor plan and also breathtaking views of the canyon and golf course. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a serene, restful, lush and beautiful canyon oasis.  I was a little skeptical of going to Laguna Beach and staying someplace that wasn’t on the water, but those concerns disappeared very soon after our arrival.  The accommodations are first class, the bed was super comfortable, the staff is extraordinarily helpful and friendly, the grounds are lovely and the ambience is perfect for unwinding and re-charging.  The restaurant is excellent and the service impeccable.  My only complaint, and it is a small one, is that for such a first-class operation the towels are kind of scratchy.  Sort of like what you would expect to find in a Best Western and not in a luxury resort like The Ranch.  The Ranch is a place to which we will absolutely return and can recommend
Manager Response: Nancy N,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant and made the most of your time at the property. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Resort was very clean and the beds were amazing! I loved the décor of the room. The staff were all welcoming. One downside was that we stayed in a room that had an adjoining room. We could hear the occupants any time they were in the room. For the price of the room, I would have expected that something like this would not be an issue.
Manager Response: CMontgomery06,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate the kind words regarding the decor of the guestrooms. They were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We apologize that you had noisy neighbors as we understand the importance of a quiet and relaxing stay. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: All these years going to Laguna Beach and never knew this sweet place existed. Lovely staff and beautiful rooms. Hope to return soon. My spa appointment was fab! Has a facial and while.it's a small space, enjoyed sitting outside in the sun afterwards. Don't expect a sauna, hot tub or steam. Just nice bathroom and massage rooms.
Manager Response: Calleyne,  Thank you for staying with us. It is wonderful to hear that you discovered the resort after years of traveling to Laguna Beach. A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Everyone at the Ranch provided an incredibly hospitable experience. The location in the canyon and a short walk from the beach was absolutely perfect, and felt like a private ranch amidst the city of laguna. Can’t wait to return.
Manager Response: A7634DZstephenc,  We are thrilled to hear that you had a fantastic experience at the resort. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family and make them feel at home. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort in the canyon provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. Thank you for the kind words and we hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Harvest the restaurant was very very good! We had dinner and breakfast there and both were excellent. Everything from the wedge salad to the chocolate moose pie were excellent. The cheesy grits with shrimp were a highlife for breakfast. Service was very attentive and informative.
Manager Response: Gregg1012,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed an excellent breakfast and dinner at Harvest Restaurant. Your selections sound delicious. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very nice cottage style rooms.  Beautiful grounds.  Zero cellphone service, but good wifi availability.  Very relaxing and nice dining options.  Good access to the Montage across the street as well.  I would go back.
Manager Response: MannyMdallas,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway in the canyon. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: M husband and I had heard about The Ranch from our Laguna Beach friends and finally had an excuse to stay there for a weekend. We loved every minute of our time there. The TreeHouse was wonderful and beautifully situated overlooking the golf course. The rooms were impeccably clean, with a very cozy bed. The fireplaces took the chill off the cool winter evenings. Dinner at The Harvest was exceptional; the breakfasts were yummy as well. I had several spa treatments with a friend, and we were very impressed by the professionals at the spa. I will definitely go back for treatments, but must say the spa is on the smaller side and a little tight for a spa day. Our favorite part of the day was listening to the music in the evening.
Manager Response: Clz7,  It is wonderful to hear that you followed your friends' advice to stay with us and we are thrilled that you enjoyed every minute of your time at the resort. Like you mentioned, The Treehouse is an incredible experience as it offers an expansive layout and breathtaking views of the golf course and surrounding canyon. The live music on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink and is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful relaxing two night stay with my wife for her birthday.  Arrived on a Wednesday morning and played golf before we checked in to our room.  The room was delightfull and the bed was extremely comfortable.  We had a wonderful dinner at the Harvest.  The Baja sea bass was excellent and the wine selection is very good.  The next day we had a wonderful breakfast at the Harvest and then played golf.  In the afternoon we  took a leisurely walk to the beach and watched the skim boarders on a beautiful afternoon.  That evening we ate a light dinner on The Porch and enjoyed the live entertainment.  On our departure day we had a light breakfast on the porch and played one more nine holes of golf.  Overall an outstanding experience and we plan to return next year.
Manager Response: Robert B,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your wife's birthday with a two night stay the resort. It is great to hear that you enjoyed three rounds of golf on Ben Brown's Golf Course and some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. The World Championships of Skimboarding are held at Aliso Beach every year, so you got to witness one of the best skimboarding spots in the world. We are thrilled that you had an outstanding overall experience and we look forward to your return visit next year.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: When you want an alternative to the typical resort scene, this place is awesome.   Beautifully nestled in the base of the canyon, pretty scenic course, deer, music, great restaurant.   Loved our little get away experience.
Manager Response: Kenny S,  We are thrilled that you loved your getaway experience at the resort and we appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon provides a peaceful vibe and beautiful views. It sounds like you made the most of your time on property by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The setting, with the surrounding hills, is so peaceful.  The food at the Harvest restaurant was really good for breakfast and lunch (didn't eat dinner there), and the physical surroundings, especially with the windows open by the bar, are incredibly relaxing...love the high ceilings and ski-lodge type feel.  The deck for happy hour with music was packed, and rightfully so...the staff was great as well.  While there is no ocean view, you really feel like you are away from everything.  Having vaulted ceilings in the bedroom made the room feel incredibly spacious, even if the outside of the building makes the rooms look like you are staying at some barracks.  Overall, a great spot!
Manager Response: Dennis M,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. It is great to hear that you ate some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant for breakfast and lunch. We encourage you to come back and try the dinner menu soon. The live music, happy hour and games on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property, its a shame the service is absolutely terrible. For the price you pay for these accommodations id expect the service to match. Rooms are an arm and a leg but staff smiles are unfortunately not included. Restaurant Harvest on site is decent at best. If you want a great meal go to Nicks in Laguna! AMAZING food and AMAZING SERVICE! By far the best part of the trip was the one evening we spent there for dinner! Hardly anything is complimentary at the resort.. The staff is miserable and snobby, with zero customer service skills. If you have any questions id direct them through the valet guys as they were the only nice ones on staff! Super great guys! Also, beware, the incidental fee they hold at check in is $400. Absurd.
Manager Response: 78nellyk,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We apologize for the level of service that you received during your stay as it does not reflect our standards. Someone from our management team will be reaching out to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The hotel is a hidden gem, I almost hate to praise it for fear people will flock there. Historic to Laguna, the resort has been overhauled and redone. Stunning, charming, and cozy are just a few ways to describe this hotel. The rooms were tastefully decorated, the beds were comfort, robes hung in the closet, and amenities like water, coffee and tea were therfor your convenience.
Manager Response: Gardendeeva,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the history of the canyon dates back to the Thurston Homestead in 1871. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We appreciate the kind words regarding the re-imagination of the property and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Tranquil mountain setting in the heart of Laguna Beach.
Summary: Located on the east side of the highway, the Ranch is nestled into the hillside with a mountain vista.  A totally different experience from the many beach front resorts the Ranch is a classy well appointed hotel with a 9 hole golf course, deer, and easy access to the beach which is across the highway.
Manager Response: Limdeeee,   We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort provides a different experience than the typical coastal resort. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a round of golf and also access to the beach. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We decided to give The Ranch a try for our wedding anniversary getaway. We were very impressed with the special touches by the staff in making our night wonderful. In particular the bartender Paul treated us amazing. The property is gorgeous!!! We'll be back.
Manager Response: Nicole G,   Congrats on your wedding anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled to hear that you had an amazing first impression. Our team works hard to provide personalized service to enhance a guest experience and it is great to hear that the special touches created wonderful memories for you. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was completely surprised by this - I was supposed to stay at the Montage, and it was sold out, so ended up here w/out doing any research.  Wow!  Super special!!  I got lucky as I was there on a Thursday, and they had awesome live music in the shared area.  Perfect setting to hang out - Laguna Canyons in the background, fire pits, craft cocktails, and great live music!  The rooms are great, with nice spacious showers and comfortable beds.  It is nice to be able to park your car in front of your room.  Was a great unexpected get away!
Manager Response: Sondra W,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you got to relax and enjoy a low key, yet special experience in the canyon. The live music, happy hour and games on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is wonderful-such an amazing find-like a hidden gem. Checked in for a solo retreat as I wanted to visit Laguna Beach and tour several of California’s historic missions.  WOW!! Service from everyone was above anything I have experienced in US-everything was possible. My room was a lovely bed extremely comfortable and the HVAC-whispers!! Loved my stay!! Food and drinks were delightful.  The Ranch is situated in a canyon and as a result the location is extremely quiet. I will agree with one of the other reviews was that the walls are thin between the rooms and could hear the neighbouring children/tv. Everything else was perfection!! Will be going back to the tranquil retreat for sure!
Manager Response: Zak-Wade,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Touring several of the historic missions sounds like a great way to spend your time in California. It is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your experience at the resort. Our goal is to treat every guest like family and make them feel at home. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Hotel problem that they refuse to remedy
Summary: We booked 6 rooms for 3 nights Feb 1-4 and booked their ‘conference room’ for our annual company retreat .  Property looks cool and we were all excited to stay there. Then we get word that the hotel had double booked the conference room. Ok we are willing to change BUT the hotel manager refused to give us any consideration for their mistake (we switched to a suite at our expense but needed a bigger table in the room to accommodate us. He/they are charging us $750 to move out 4 top and put in an 8 top.  Well that doesn’t seem very fair since we were already spending >$5000 for the weekend and THEY screwed up. Not sure what we are going to do - suggestions?
Manager Response: Beitsch,  We apologize for the experience that you had as it does not reflect our standards. In speaking with our Sales team, a solution was offered to rectify the issue due to our mistake. If you would like to speak with us further, I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com. Again, we are sorry for the inconvenience and understand your frustration.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: If you hate to always valet your car, don't care to stare at the beach every minute of your stay and really want to experience living in Laguna Canyon, then this place is for you.  Posh digs but old CA feel and style is at the Ranch.  Cozy and unpretentious.  Indeed! Live like a local.  I know - I used to live there!
Manager Response: PurplePrayer,   We are thrilled that your experience at the resort felt like home away from home. Like you mentioned, our team wants our guests to enjoy Laguna Beach like a local does. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property. A great weekend getaway for the family. The setting is relaxing, yet there is plenty of fun to have at the pool, golf course, or playing bocce and cornhole. The rooms are updated, clean and very comfortable.
Manager Response: Jetsetbunny,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that your family experienced a great weekend getaway in the canyon. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities throughout the resort. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We loved everything about our stay here. Food was amazing, drinks were phenomenal, and the ambience was incredible! Brunch is a serious must along with a mimosa on the deck. The live music was also the perfect addition to our stay. Can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Rudya2018,   We are thrilled to hear that you loved everything about your stay at the resort. It sounds like you ate some delicious meals and cherished the ambiance in Harvest Restaurant. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We can't wait for you to come back either.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Been visiting Laguna/Newport Beach areas fior years and have now found our new spot! Loved the room, friendly service and overall feel to the location. The evening live music was a lovely addition.Can't wait to come back for a longer stay!
Manager Response: Julie Ann N,  We are thrilled that you loved your experience at the resort and have found your new spot in Laguna Beach. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great place to stay and what a great get away.  The Ranch is a hidden gem tucked away in laguna beach.  If you like to golf or just need a great comfortable place to get away, put The Ranch on your to do list!
Manager Response: JonathanmQ742PG,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a great getaway at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property is tucked away in the Aliso & Wood Canyons and allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. The golf course offers a unique experience as it winds through the canyon and also has a creek running through the middle of it. Thank you for the recommendation others and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay was wonderful. We would return here. We did receive an excellent discount price on the room online. I’m not sure if I would want to pay full price, but for what we paid, we had an amazing time.
Manager Response: Lauralee2018,  We are thrilled that you had a wonderful stay and great experience at the resort. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Best time ever! Very thankful for the opportunity to spend few days at this gorgeous resort. Beautiful decor, bed extremely comfortable, showers amazing!!!  Staff was very helpful and always nice. Never felt I was bothering. The kids enjoyed the pool and hot tub a lot and we as a family would love to come back again!  The nature at laguna beach resort is spectacular and you will feel totally in a retreat.  They will take you up to the beach in golf carts at anytime and pick you up.  Super close to beach and they have all the beach towels, sand toys and chairs you may need.  Great experience, will come back and would recommend to anyone trying to experience something unique and beautiful.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Cassianam2018,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and are thrilled that you had such a great time. It is wonderful to hear that the entire family took advantage of a variety of amenities, including the pool and beach. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort nestled in the canyon
Summary: Loved our stay here! Such a unique and beautiful atmosphere! Restaurant was amazing! Everything we ate was delicious! The exterior of the buildings could be a little nicer, but inside was nicely renovated. Would have enjoyed a tub or jacuzzi in room with the mild January temperatures but the shower was spacious and updated. Grounds were beautifully kept! Overall would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Nell W,  We are thrilled that you loved your stay at the resort and appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the property provides a beautiful and unique experience due to the surrounding nature being so close to the ocean. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We looked forward to this place to stay due to location and environment, and have no complaints on that.  We booked into the "cottage" accommodation (2 bedrooms).  They are not cottages - they are 2-level apartments with a "cottagy" feel.   The "accompaniments" were poor. There were only paper cups - no glasses, no cutlery, micro-fridge - quite unacceptable for the tariff we were paying.  They were available "on request" - which did.  Two lots arrived, one that night, one the following morning, and this is where it got interesting. I was awakened at just after 9.00 am the following morning (bear in mind our time difference), to noise downstairs, and rushed down to find someone putting a second lot into our cupboards!  Yes, he apparently knocked, but to just come in uninvited,
Manager Response: Kevin C,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We apologize for your experience as that does not reflect our standards. Someone from our management team will be reaching out to you to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We ended up staying here with my family for the holidays and what a gem we found. My mom great up in Orange County and we had never really made it this far down the Laguna coast. The Ranch is a lovely hidden spot in the canyons that pairs comfort with taste so well.  The spa, while small, was well appointed and comfortable. We really enjoyed our breakfasts at Harvest restaurant (chilaquiles!) and also ate there once for dinner - really friendly staff. We also golfed a couple of days during our stay and enjoyed the tidy 9-hole course. The technology built into the golf carts was a nice benefit.  Our favorite part of the hotel had to be the outdoor firepits near the golf pro shop with live music each night. The heating lamps plus the gas-powered fire pits made for some really
Manager Response: Carly H,  Thank you for choosing to stay at the resort during the holidays. It sounds like you made the most of your time on property by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. We would love for you to return as well.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I may just not be the right customer, but Ranch didn't quite do it
Summary: I think this place is best for families and golfers, maybe not for couples. We booked a Creekside King for a staycation and I can't say I was impressed. The staff was fantastic and the resort features a good restaurant and a lovely outdoor seating area near the fireplace with live music. The room was spacious and comfortable, but "creekside view" is a bit of a joke. The creek is mostly concrete and the bulk of the view was parking lot. I felt foolish for paying extra money to book it. Smaller quibbles: They Room service is only available until 9:30 pm which isn't ideal at such an isolated property. Also, the layout of the bathroom is peculiar with the shower located in a tiny room with the toilet. All in all, not a bad stay, but low on ambiance and I probably won't be returning.
Manager Response: Lowhedgerow,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed. Someone from our management team will be reaching out to discuss further with you.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Overall, excellent. Just wish you had reliable turn down service at night.  Other than that, we loved the property and the staff was very helpful and cordial.  Dinner at Harvest excellent.  Would come back.
Manager Response: Lorens956,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed an excellent overall experience at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you had with our housekeeping service and I will be sure to discuss this with our management team. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Perfect for our family, we loved our room. Walking to the beach was a nice family adventure. Food was great. Felt like a mini vacation get away. Spend the nights out on our patio and the days at the pool or beach
Manager Response: RobertrE1786VR,  We are thrilled that your family had an amazing experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, walking to the beach is a fun adventure for all. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious food at Harvest Restaurant throughout the visit. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Family Christmas Find Better than on the Beach
Summary: The Thomas Fire obliterated our Ojai Christmas plans. We discovered The Ranch at Laguna Beach when we searched for a golf resort in Orange County.  To our group of 5, the Ben Brown 9 hole course sounded perfect. The phone reservation staff (and all of the staff) were very helpful. After several calls and all questions answered (we did have to leave the puppy at home), we booked 2 rooms, the Creekside Studio and the Canyon Room, dinners, spa sessions and golf.  And we had a wonderful 5-day holiday stay.  Check-in was conveniently based on our arrival schedule.The Creekside Studios and one bedrooms are across the creek from the rest of the resort. We parked right next to the Studio's 2-story building. There's no elevator to reach our room on the second floor, which was fine with
Manager Response: RedLakeChip,  Thank you for choosing to spend a 5-day holiday stay at the resort. We are sorry to hear that the Thomas Fire changed your original plans, but appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your trip and took advantage of a variety of property amenities. Hopefully this was the first of many trips to our property.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location, beautiful view at breakfast, not exactly what I was expecting in some areas do to their website. They had an NYE party which I thought would be free for guest staying at an already highly expensive property, but NOPE, the tickets were $150 each and they said it's because there would be free food and drinks but they're not free if we're paying a flat rate to get in, lol. I'm not a drinker nor a heavy eater so the luster of that wasn't worth $150 to me, therefor we had to go else where to celebrate when I had hoped to stay on the property. The picture of the pool must have been when they were first building the property because it is actually surrounded by hotel rooms and not just a bare canyon like i was hoping and expecting. The rooms were mediocre for the price,
Manager Response: Jamie S,  It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. Like you mentioned, the view from your table in the restaurant is breathtaking and enhances the ambiance. We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not met in certain areas and if anything was not communicated accurately by our team. We are not sure what pool picture you are referring to, but the picture on our website shows the rooms on the outside of the pool area. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a wonderful gateway, close to the beach, but tucked away in the Laguna Beach canyons.  The staff were very accommodating, even on New Year's Eve when we could not find a restaurant reservation.  The rooms are well appointed and beautifully decorated.
Manager Response: Mrkimo1,  Thank you for staying with us in celebration of the New Year. It is great to hear that our team was able to assist with dining on NYE and we work hard to be accommodating to our guests. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Everything about The Ranch is excellent. From the smiling, friendly and helpful staff, to the beautifully remodeled and designed clubhouse and grounds. The food is amazing and the rooms are clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: I7477ITjosh,  We are thrilled to hear that you had an overall excellent experience at the resort. Thank you for the kind words regarding the re-imagined design of the facilities and property grounds. Our team works hard to provide friendly and helpful service to ensure that your stay is filled with lifelong memories to take home. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We left after one night's stay/ End unit, generators made a ton of noise and vibrated our room.  Honestly I felt like we were in a trumped up army barracks. dark, zero privacy, the picture of the pool is misleading, I get it for a wedding or corporate thing, but your pricing is crazy (I travel all over the world, high and low), I can't believe you get it....For the money we moved to Sand and Surf and had the experience we were looking for
Manager Response: 389kurth,  We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your experience at the resort. We understand how important a good night's sleep is and can understand your frustration due to the noise outside of your room. Please accept our apologizes for the inconveniences and we are bummed that you did not enjoy your time at the resort. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a very relaxing stay at the Ranch. The grounds were spectacular. The restaurant  service and food were high quality. The room was clean and the bedding comfortable. Took a walk down to the beach. Seem like the path next to the road could be improved for safety. We were a little confused by the heating system. Highly recommend and will probably return in the future.
Manager Response: Jpspoto,  We are thrilled that you enjoyed a very relaxing stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of the short walk to the beach. Our guest services team also offers a beach shuttle as an alternative option. It sounds like you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. The view of the canyon and golf course from your table definitely enhances the ambiance. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lovely property nestled in a canyon just across the street from an amazing beach. Really nice, modern rooms. Also there's a big patio area with views of the golf course and canyon where you can play games, have a drink, hang out. It's a nice, chill atmosphere. We loved it.
Manager Response: Lara R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. The live music, happy hour and games on the patio is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: we had a great time during our 2 night stay. during our stay we had a private dinner for 40 guest at the harvest rest. The service was excellent and so was the food. Awesome experience over all.  We also payed a round of gold and that was also top notch. We very much our day at the sycamore spa too!Over all it was an A+ experience. We will be back and we will be recommending the property.  Thank you. Tom Ruiz
Manager Response: D8320OCtomr,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for two nights. It sounds like you enjoyed a variety of activities at the resort in celebration of the 50th birthday and all of them sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The hotel and grounds are picturesque. A great place to get away from all the hassle of your every day life. The staff of the hotel make sure your stay is perfect. Even the little things they take care of.
Manager Response: Debbie D,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe of the resort allows our guests to unwind and unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Our team works hard on attention to detail as we want our guests to receive personalized service to enhance the quality of their stay. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Consider other properties for the price
Summary: Underwhelming.  Not good value.  Don't get a room in Building #8.  The property feels like a renovation of a layout that wasn't well designed . The renovation didn't justify the price.  Be patient in the dining room.  Don't expect the 9 hole course to be in good condition and expect less of the warm up practice area.
Manager Response: Trentmaclean,  We are bummed to hear that you had an underwhelming experience at the resort. Someone from our management team will be reaching out shortly to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great food, good location, and amazing food service personnel. Front desk and other reception staff were disappointing. Rooms and beds were very comfortable. Small resort, but it was nice to have the games (Bocci balls, bag toss) for the guests to play. S'mores kits were available for a fee. Unless you golf, not too many activities. We didn't use the pool or the volleyball court.
Manager Response: Lisa W,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your experience. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the games that are offered on the patio as that provides fun for all to enjoy. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the service that our front desk and guest services teams provided and we would love to discuss it with you further. If you can please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com, I would greatly appreciate it.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A Lovely Eco-Friendly Hideaway in Laguna Beach
Summary: This lovely, eco-friendly resort in South Laguna Beach made for an exceptional family vacation.  Though pricey, the rooms were excellent as was the overall ambience.  Staff were friendly and helpful and grounds were spacious and quite beautiful in addition to being nature friendly.  Will definitely return.
Manager Response: Docm564,  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed an exceptional family vacation at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort is eco-friendly and we have many sustainable practices in place such as recycling, using reclaimed water on the resort grounds/golf course, and maintaining an on-site organic garden. The overall ambiance is very unique as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. We appreciate the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay was from December 15th thru 17th. Arrival to this property is off the Coast Highway into a secluded canyon away from the city traffic and noise. Once on the property you will notice the quiet and peaceful surroundings. The rooms are well appointed and quiet. We enjoyed the beds and the big shower. The pool bar is perfect for having a cocktail while relaxing by the pool or in the spa. You will probably see deer on the golf course and is some cases they may be spotted in and around the hotel buildings. The Harvest restaurant and out door patio are great gathering spaces for appetizers or dinner and the food is wonderful. We will be back to enjoy this property ourselves and with family.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a weekend getaway at the resort. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities that the resort offers. Like you mentioned, the pool bar is a great way to enjoy food and drink while soaking in the sun. The deer love to greet our guests and we are glad that you got to experience that. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits with family.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Incredible experience and facility ... would definitely come back again to stay at The Ranch!  The rooms were great and the beds were very comfortable.  The food at the restaurant was wonderful.  The location was beautiful, set between the hills, with a short walk to the beach.  The beaches were absolutely amazing!
Manager Response: Chadh638,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious food at Harvest Restaurant and also took advantage of the short walk to the beach. We are looking forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Don't be fooled by the exterior of the buildings. Furnishings first class, food at Harvest excellent and people very accommodating. Outside terrace with fire pits so relaxing with music nightly and great way to unwind. Proximity to beach easy and town.
Manager Response: G961VKtomh,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to be very accommodating to our guest requests as we understand the importance that service is to the quality of a guest stay. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and being in close proximity to downtown. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort will give you the illusion that you've escaped away from the busy fast paced world but it is conveniently nested within reach of PCH. Great accommodations with sound absorbing walls. Fantastic service. The shower - I think this shower is phenomenal. You'll see what I mean! Resident deer on the course while you're overlooking at breakfast. Just a simple tranquility atmosphere that will have you feeling wonderful.
Manager Response: Terrasea,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a cozy and restful stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe allows our guests to escape and unwind from the normal fast paced routine. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I love the Ranch At Laguna Beach, it has a very friendly atmosphere, very relaxing. The rooms are very nice and cozy, very nice views and has great amenities. It’s the place to stay.....away from home....  Angie
Manager Response: Angie C,  Thank you for staying at the resort during the holidays. It is wonderful to hear that you loved your experience and found your home away home here. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the ranch, the place and the views are beautiful, the staffs are nice and friendly, the restaurant is so inviting, just a very nice place to stay and relax, we will come back and stay  longer next time. Love! Love! The Ranch At Laguna Beach. Rossana M.
Manager Response: Rossana M,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort and the breathtaking views of the surrounding nature. We are thrilled that you are already planning your return visit and we are looking forward to it.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Felt like we were somewhere further than we were being less than a mile from PCH.  Beautiful setting in a canyon with comfy modern rooms.  Golf course was nice with lots of deer to watch.  Outdoor deck with fire pits and heat lamps with happy hour was very relaxing....had the best brussel sprouts there!
Manager Response: Harumi03,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. The deer love to greet our guests and we are thrilled to hear that you experienced that. We agree that the outdoor patio is a wonderful place to relax in paradise and enjoy the fire pits/happy hour. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I rated only very good because the 2 bedroom suite smelled overly strong when we checked in and I found a smashed strawberry top on one of the chairs. The smell went away by the next day. The 2 one bedroom suites were perfect. Food and service excellent. Especially impressed with the young lady who worked Ben pantry on December 23 and 24😊😊
Manager Response: Kelleymiller2017,  Thank you for staying with us in celebration of Christmas. We apologize for the condition of your Cottage Two Bedroom Suite as that does not reflect our standards and is not acceptable. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your dining experience. We hope that you choose to join us again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family and I just had a great stay at this property.  From the moment we were greeted by the parking attendant to the moment we checked out, every person we encountered was friendly and accommodating.  The property itself is beautifully maintained, our two-bedroom townhouse couldn't have been more comfortable and spacious, and the food at the restaurant was consistently excellent.  While I would definitely recommend having a car if you want to go anywhere in town, the walk to the beach was easy and you could spend a few days just sitting around the pool or enjoying the quiet from a chair on the porch.  Many of the people at the restaurant and playing golf were clearly locals who have embraced this place but even we outsiders felt right at home.  While I can't comment on the
Manager Response: Kleic,  We are thrilled to hear about your great stay at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the property and took advantage of a variety of amenities. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Thank you for staying with us and we hope that you join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, clean and family friendly
Summary: The hotel was beautiful, comfortable and family friendly but the sofa bed was not set when we arrived. The brought us blankets to use but they were very thin so we felt cold at night. No glass cups where in the room as well
Manager Response: Zeina A,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is family friendly as we offer daily programming that provides fun options for all to enjoy. We apologize that the sofa bed was not made upon your arrival and can understand your frustration. I can be reached directly at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: My second time staying at this wonderful property. Really enjoy the area, canyon, room and amenities, great food and drinks, and near the beach. Looking forward to the next trip! Highly recommend if you’re looking for an alternative to being on the beach but want better quality rooms and amenities - and a short walk to Aliso Beach / Treasure Island.
Manager Response: Tim M,  Thank you for staying at the resort for the second time. It sounds like you really enjoy the amenities and all that the property/local area has to offer. We appreciate your continued support of the resort and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Super wonderful stay(would have loved one more night there!)
Summary: Our stay at Laguna was surprisingly wonderful. We upgraded to a larger suite at check-in, which I'm so glad we did, as the townhouse floorpan is so awesome, and allows for a lot of elbow room. We never even made it to the restaurant b/c we loved our room so much that we just stayed in and watched movies. Of course we were very tired from our redeye, but it was so luxuriously rustic. I would HIGHLY recommend it to anyone traveling and the fact that they took care of the uber ride to get downtown was a nice welcome touch!
Manager Response: Lesliekulik,  We thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful stay at the resort. It sounds like you enjoyed a very relaxing trip. The off-the-beaten path vibe allows our guests to unplug/unwind and we are glad that you experienced that. Like you mentioned, the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite offers a spacious floor plan that is very popular among our guests as it feels like home away from home. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is a slice of paradise in a very crowded and noisy beach community. Even though you’re just a short walk away from PCH and Aliso Beach, you’d never know it when you experience the peace and tranquillity at the Ranch. Our room was beautifully updated and so is the restaurant and other facilities. Although you can walk to the grocery store, we loved the healthy choices available at the restaurant and bar. We appreciated being close to downtown Laguna Beach and Dana Point Harbor. Getting to freeways and the airport was surprisingly easy. I only wish we would have made time to use the golf course.
Manager Response: Julielizabeth2017,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the re-imagined design of the guestrooms and other property facilities. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and being in close proximity to downtown and Dana Point Harbor. We agree that you need to play a round of golf at Ben Brown's Golf Course during your next visit to the resort. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We’ve stayed here twice now and there’s not much more we could ask for.  It is clean, quiet, close to the beach, close to downtown, and the staff is incredibly nice and accommodating.  Food is excellent and the views of the canyon are breath taking.
Manager Response: E8433VRgracec,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us for the second time. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and being in close proximity to downtown. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. We agree that the views of the canyon are breathtaking. We appreciate your continued support and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Good but not excellent service. Beautiful location. We had to cancel our Santa Barbara trip due to the fires, and stayed here last minute. The people that work there are nice but things like faster restaurant service would be nice.
Manager Response: Gina M,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, even though the circumstances for changing your travel plans were unfortunate due to the fires. We apologize for the service that you received at Harvest Restaurant as we understand the impact that service has on a guest experience. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Unique experience while in Laguana Beach right off Pacific Coast Highway but feels like a world away from busy Laguna downtown.  This was my sixth stay at The Ranch. When in Laguna Beach I will only stay at The Ranch
Manager Response: SandrasF4938AT,  We are thrilled to hear that your most recent visit was your sixth stay at the resort. Thank you for the continued support. Like you mentioned, the resort offers an unique experience with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access and located away from the busy downtown area. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team
