Summary: The venue excelled in everything we were expecting and then went far beyond to please our every wish. Thank you for providing a helpful, friendly and courteous staff. The fluffy towels were a special treat as well as the soft, warm and puffy duvet on the bed.
Manager Response: RaylG6556KA,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our team works hard to go above and beyond for our guests as we understand the impact that service has on the quality of a guest stay. It is wonderful to hear that your expectations were exceeded and that our team was helpful, friendly and courteous during your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful resort made truly special by a world class staff. Lack of cell service is mitigated by wifi calling, but really gives you an opportunity to disconnect and appreciate the experience. Would stay here again
Manager Response: S7691IHvictorm,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that our team provided excellent service during your stay. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten-path vibe of the canyon allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great stay. This made our 24th Annivaersary a very special occasion. We will be suggesting your Resort to our close friends. Please give your staff a well done as they are the people that make a great resort.
Manager Response: JohnpZ584NZ,  Congrats on your 24th anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Our team works hard to provide service that ensures an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the recommendation to your close friends and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Can't say enough about this place. Check in and never have to leave. Great room, great drinks and food, music on the patio with fires , heated pool and beautiful golf course complete with grazing deer. Go now.
Manager Response: Christina D,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your trip and found your home away from home here at the resort. Thank you for all of the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: We stayed for Thanksgiving and had a wonderful 4 day stay! Heated pool and clean rooms! On site restaurants!
Summary: My wife and I stayed at this wonderful hotel  and had a great Thanksgiving! I would like to thank The Ranch for knowing the need for Emotional Support Animals (dog) and there handlers! We got a great pool view room with our dog Midnight! The rooms are very clean and have a mini fridge with double vanities! There is 2 restaurants located on site with in room dining available. The setting of the Ranch is in the middle of a canyon on a very lush golf course! We spoke with Colleen and Israel at the pool cabana. They both have excellent customer service and definitely should be recognized! We enjoyed talking with them about the area, skateboarding, beaches, and mountain biking paths in the area. We are definitely going to move to Laguna Beach and explore! There isn’t much or a
Manager Response: Yehbut,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate Thanksgiving with a stay at the resort. Even though the resort is not pet friendly, we allow only those that qualify as service animals under the ADA requirements. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the pool view from your guestroom, especially with how nice the weather has been. Like you mentioned, Laguna Beach offers so many amazing experiences along the 7.1 miles of coastline that are definitely worth exploring. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Quite a nice facility tucked in the a canyon just off the beach.  Have driven by many times and didn't know it was there.  Seclusion and quite.  All the typical amenities.  Nice folks.  Great bartenders.  Rooms are nice but simple.  Need at lease a lounge chair, the desk chair and bed isn't enough.
Manager Response: Orlando G,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the property is a hidden gem. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the quiet and secluded vibe of the canyon resort location. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A True Gem in SO CAL!
Summary: We have stayed in numerous places in SoCal, and I would rate this as one of the best!   If you are looking for a beautiful beach and a  mountain retreat all in one,  this is your place.  When you are staying here you don't feel like you are in LA, but you still get the wonderful weather that SoCal provides.  We stayed in the one bedroom in the 1400 building.  Yes, the sun never hits that building but it didn't really matter because you could walk to the pool and get ample sun.  The people at the Ranch are good people.  They take care of your every need.  This place is a win, win.
Manager Response: Paula H,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. Our team works hard to exceed the expectations of our guests by providing personalized service that creates lifelong memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch has so many things for families to do: golf, spa, beach, s'mores and music on the patio.  Wonderful place that caters to all ages.  We were very impressed with both the accommodations and the staff.  Will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Amy F,  We appreciate that you provided feedback on your experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property is very family friendly and offers daily programming that caters to those of all ages. Thank you for staying with us and please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location that you would not believe is in OC.  Staff is great.  Food is awesome and the rooms are perfect. We had business meeting during the day which were held in a very nice boardroom with great food and a view.  Plenty of fun after the meetings at the bar and restaurant.
Manager Response: ChristopherrN3903KK,  Thank you for choosing to host your business meetings at the resort. It is great to hear that you enjoyed Harvest Restaurant in the evening after the meetings. The ambiance in the canyon is truly amazing to experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is wonderful. The atmosphere is great, the rooms are stunning, the grounds are peaceful, the drinks are yummy, and the staff is attentive and lovely. It is our absolute favorite weekend getaway spot. I had a massage at the spa the last time we stayed and it was the best spa experience I have ever had. Just perfect.
Manager Response: Dstny88,  We are ecstatic to hear that the resort is your favorite weekend getaway spot. Like you mentioned, the atmosphere in the canyon is a one-of-a-kind experience. It sounds like you have taken advantage of a variety of property amenities during your visits. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I had a fantastic weekend stay at The Ranch and everything was perfect. Also had the chance to try the spa area and relax at the pool for a bit - it was really amazing! Will definitely come back very soon and then also try to play a round at the golf course.
Manager Response: Mauing_858982,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a fantastic weekend stay at the resort. A treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a wonderful way to relax in paradise. The weather has been fantastic, so the pool has been a popular spot for our guests to soak up the sun. We agree, you definitely need to come back and play a round at Ben Brown's Golf Course. The course offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not portrayed in other areas of the property. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to the return golf trip.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel is a complete retreat. Your mind, tummy and whole body will be recharged and satisfied. The staff bends over backwards to attend to your every need.  The location makes you feel like you are in another world and you are secluded and able to get away from it all.
Manager Response: KathysT1827ZT,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the peaceful nature of the canyon allows our guests to relax and recharge. Our teams understands the importance that service is to the quality of a guest stay and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your time at the resort. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great rooms and VERY comfortable bed.  Very quiet and peaceful as well even when it looked busy. Used the Green Tree House for business meetings and it was the perfect setting for a small working group session.
Manager Response: 815nydiah,  Thank you for choosing to host your business meetings at the resort. We are thrilled that you loved the property. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the quiet and peaceful nature of the canyon. The vibe allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: High End Bungalows in the Hills
Summary: This place is great if you are looking to feel like you are away from the city and yet have all the accommodations of a 5 star hotel. The overall service of staff is amazing.  The rooms are very clean and look new. The bed and linens are very comfortable.  The pool and Jacuzzi are open 24 hours. The harvest restaurant has very delicious food and fairly priced.    Its a great place for couples get away, for friend and family gatherings.  Not much for children to do aside from the pool.  More of a adult luxury experience.
Manager Response: Jacob O,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort provides a different perspective of a luxury coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean and away from the city is such a rare experience along the California coast. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the property by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The staff is so friendly and welcoming.  The rooms were good size and the decor was warm and welcoming and they were very clean.  Our room didn't have a view of anything which was kind of a bummer, but overall the experience was good.
Manager Response: HeatherbY4740MM,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled that you had a good overall experience at the resort. Our team understands that a warm and sincere welcome creates the foundation for the guest experience. We are sorry to hear the about disappointment with the view from your room. I can be reached directly at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I am recommending a visit to the Ranch to all my friends as is was a truly magical experience.  The golf course we especially exciting being set in the canyon and with wild deer grazing in the fairways.
Manager Response: V2780DVjohns,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a truly magical experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, Ben Brown's Golf Course is situated in what’s arguably the most serene and natural setting in Orange County as the course is carved into the naturally dramatic and lush walls of the Aliso & Wood Canyons, creating an ultra-private playing experience with stunning views and elevation changes on every fairway. The deer love to greet our guests and it is wonderful that they greeted you. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful resort + genuinely wonderful service - The Ranch was truly a perfect experience. My mom and I spent 2 nights at The Ranch, hoping to secure a block of rooms for guests at my upcoming wedding in the area, so we were evaluating The Ranch with a very critical eye - wanting it to be special for our guests.  From the moment we arrived, it was clear the service was top notch. We were greeted with waters, and the entire front-end staff addressed us by name. Every person we encountered offered to help with anything we need... free valet parking, help with our bags, assistance making a dinner reservation. You name it, they were there to take care of us.  We booked a basic King room, the actual room was far from basic! Well appointed with beautiful linens, bathrobes, a spotless
Manager Response: Mkt206,  Congrats on your upcoming special day and thank you for choosing to stay at our resort with the purpose of hopefully securing a room block for your wedding. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Wonderful place to relax and enjoy
Summary: Visited on a business meeting/trip. Unique resort in the laguna Beach environment. The signage from the highway is difficult to see, so be careful as you approach the turn. Overall an excellent venue for a business meeting with the only downside being he lack of cell service as it is ringed by mountains.
Manager Response: Ben T,  Thank you for staying with us during your business meeting/trip. Like you mentioned, the resort is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is lovely, comfortable & perfectly designed rooms and beautiful grounds. Location is convenient to the beach. The restaurant food is ver good but the service isn't up to par. This place could be so much more, I think in time it will become more luxurious.
Manager Response: Derick G,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path vibe of the property. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort is also conveniently located 350 yards from Aliso Beach. We apologize for the service that you received at Harvest as it does not reflect our standards. Can you please reach out to me further at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Gorgeous wedding at the Ranch, the views are stunning, service excellent in every way, would love to visit again maybe play golf or a spa day next time. The rooms were perfect and the golf cart transport to and from our room was great,
Manager Response: Isabella M,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the view of the canyon and surrounding nature definitely provides a breathtaking backdrop for a wedding. We agree that a return visit with plans for a round of golf or spa treatment sounds like a fabulous idea.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It was a great getaway for my husband and I. The service at the Harvest restaurant kinda left a bad taste in our mouth but the food was actually pretty good. The property is super cool. Golf was pretty crowded but a pretty course.
Manager Response: Vanessa_sant3,  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We apologize for the service that you received at Harvest Restaurant as it does not reflect our standards. Our Director of Food & Beverage will be reaching out to you shortly to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch has lovely, comfortable rooms and grounds. Golf is a big focus and we don't play, but the location is convenient to the beach and it's a nice environment. I'd like to suggest adding a second jacuzzi for adults only. The pool and jacuzzi were loaded with kids, and I think a separate one for adults would be a worthwhile addition.
Manager Response: Shari A,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the property. We appreciate the suggestion as like you mentioned, the resort is popular for families. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful little getaway. Feels like you're away from it all, but golfcart ride from the beach and short jaunt to restaurants. The live music and s'mores on the patio were a nice touch. Beautiful location!
Manager Response: Wavehunterz,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a wonderful getaway at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and being in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. It sounds like you made the most of your trip and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Second time we have stayed at the Ranch. Rooms are excellent and restaurant was also. Will be staying there on ur frequent trips to LB. Price was also reasonable as compared to other locations. Although not on beach, close enough to hear the ocean at night.
Manager Response: MichaeleI5291ZQ,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you plan on staying at the resort during frequent trips to Laguna Beach. We appreciate the continued support. Like you mentioned, you can hear the waves crashing on the shore at night and in the early morning. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A great getaway! Love this place! Everyone was very nice. Sitting by the fireplaces overlooking the golf course and listening to live music. Doesn’t get any better then that. Wife fell in love with the room and how it was decorated.
Manager Response: BillbD7212GC,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My girlfriend and I had a lovely weekend at The Ranch.  The service was excellent, the room extremely comfortable, the staff very helpful.  Great location in the canyon, only a short distance to the beach and near lively Laguna Beach. NL
Manager Response: Nando L,  We are thrilled that you and your girlfriend enjoyed a great weekend getaway at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that our team provided excellent service throughout your stay as we understand how important service is towards the quality of a guest stay. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful stay, tucked away in beautiful hills. Amazing service, beautiful grounds. I would say the beds were a little soft (maybe they have pillow tops). Food was great too. I would definitely come back...looking forward to matching it up with their family events.
Manager Response: Franceskab2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path vibe of the resort being tucked into the canyon. Like you mentioned, we offer family programming so that our guests can enjoy their experience. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB

Summary: We stayed here for 6 days and will definitely go back!  The property is cozy and beautiful.  The staff is so accommodating.  We had our entire family with us and it worked perfectly.  Great restaurant too!
Manager Response: MaureenhQ492HJ,  We are grateful that you chose to stay at the resort for 6 days. It sounds like your entire family made the most of the time spent in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the surrounding environment offers a cozy vibe. We look forward to your return visits.   Best regards,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: As much as some may love The Ranch at Laguna, it was not our preference for lodging.  Our room faced the pool and we had to keep our drapes closed the majority of time because other guests could easily see in to our unit (Master also faced the pool).  The furnishings are odd and out of scale for the property, although the beds were super comfortable.  Our room also had an odd smell.  I definitely think this is a great property for families with children vs. a couple.  It lacked the ambience I prefer and for the price of the rooms, I expected more.  Our biggest aggravation was the parking.  We were never able to park near our room and sometimes failed to find an open space in the evening and ended up parking illegally on the curb.  We were told parking wouldn’t be an issue when
Manager Response: Katepatulski,  Thank you for staying with us and for providing feedback on your stay. We are sorry to hear that the resort was not your preference for lodging. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: RanchLB is a perfect getaway for couples, family, anybody! My family of four escaped from LA for the Thanksgiving weekend and it exceeded expectations in every way. 5-Star property, rooms, service, scenery, restaurant, and vibe; incredibly tranquil and relaxing; minutes away from shops and restaurants in Laguna Beach, but you feel as though you’re in California’s Central Coast once on property.
Manager Response: SpencerSocal,  We are thrilled to hear that your family of four had an amazing getaway at the resort over Thanksgiving weekend! Our team works hard to exceed the expectations of our guests by providing personalized service that creates lifelong memories. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline and it sounds like you took advantage of the variety of experiences. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Charming resort, cheerful service, relaxing stay
Summary: This is a charming property, nestled in a valley and the arrival of nightfall plunges the canyon into jet black darkness. It’s rare these days to see the night sky filled with so many stars because of so little light contamination from city streets and buildings.  This is why even a short stay feels like you’re really getting away. The resort is ideal for golfers housing a course for those enthusiasts but anyone else visiting should expect a low key, relaxing escape. This is not a resort offering an abundance of horseback riding, swimming or hotel activities and if you seek an array of them this is not the place for you. Come to lounge outside in terraces above and below. Wonderful walking trails are close by with the beach and ocean on the other side of PCH.   This feels like a
Manager Response: Guy G,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. We agree, the view of the stars at night is magical as the resort is nestled away from the city lights. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. The location of the property is very unique and provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort is far and away one of the nicest places we have ever stayed!  I took my 2 daughters, their husbands and kids for Thanksgiving and the trip was remarkable!  Everyone had a wonderful time and we definitely will return!
Manager Response: KatherinebQ3171KP,  We are thrilled to hear that your family had a wonderful Thanksgiving trip at the resort. Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of the holiday and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was our second Thanksgiving at the Ranch. We enjoy the serenity, scenery.  Couples should select building #8..quiet, away from larger/family units...close to the restaurant and golf. Husband enjoyed the executive golf course that is shared with the local deer. The Harvest Restaurant has a great menu.
Manager Response: K407YTglorial,  Thank you for choosing to spend your second Thanksgiving at the resort. We appreciate the continued support. It is wonderful to hear that you cherish the off-the-beaten path vibe of the canyon location. Ben Brown's Golf Course offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not visible from other locations of the property and it is great that your husband took advantage of playing a round of golf. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Really wonderful hotel beautifully located in Laguna Beach. The hotel has a 9-hole golf course located amid the hills close to a creek. The beach is walking distance or reachable by shuttle. The rooms are nice and recently upgraded. The young staff is extremely friendly and make you feel at home. We had a wonderful relaxing stay. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Luc M,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a wonderful relaxing stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, Ben Brown's Golf Course is situated in what’s arguably the most serene and natural setting in Orange County as the course is carved into the naturally dramatic and lush walls of the Aliso & Wood Canyons, creating an ultra-private playing experience with stunning views and elevation changes on every fairway. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Low-key, comfortable clean, friendly and relaxing
Summary: The two bedroom cottage we stayed in was very clean, nicely updated and comfortable for our family of four.   We really enjoyed the live music, games and fire pits on the patio.  The dining room at Harvest is spectacular in its "lodge-chic" style.  The food was quite good.   Accessing the beach was quite easy with the Hotel providing a ride to the pedestrian tunnel under PCH brings you right to the sand.  They also give you beach chairs and towels.   We also took advantage of the free Uber service to downtown laguna.   While I did not choose to golf at the resort I could see where the course would be fun for introducing newer golfers to the game.   On the whole, I found the property to be a very nice place to spend a few days.
Manager Response: Pg91011,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are very popular among families due to the expansive layout. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). It is great to hear that you took advantage of visiting Aliso Beach as the weather has been fantastic lately. Like you mentioned, Ben Brown's Golf Course is friendly to those of all ages and skill levels. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very fresh and new and well maintained.   The rooms are almost like cabins furnished in the most stylish way.    Comfy bed, patio.   Beautiful walk in shower.   Tasteful decor and colours in the room.   Free parking.   The  restaurant serves very good food in a great setting.    Firepit with cocktails and live music was delightful.    And minutes from the beach by car.     Very impressed.   Only downside is kids but it is a family resort.
Manager Response: Kdeeney,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the beach as the weather has been fantastic lately. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Love, love, love The Ranch! My husband and I were married at The Ranch last November 2016, the setting was beautiful and our photography turned out amazing! The servers at the reception were all very helpful. Unfortunately, all of the main courses were cold (minus the soup which was excellent and warm!). However, The Ranch completely redeemed itself by offering us a wonderful cottage and dinner at Harvest Restaurant for our 1st year anniversary (100% comped!). We had an AMAZING visit this time around and all of our food was warm (yay!), the cottage was terrific --right on the golf fairway with deer visiting often to graze and Harvest Restaurant was excellent. The servers were all incredibly attentive and friendly, some of the best service we've received anywhere in the O.C.
Manager Response: 245kellic,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We apologize for the issues during your wedding in November 2016 and I know that we connected to discuss those. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed your return trip to the resort in celebration of your anniversary. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had an amazing pre Thanksgiving weekend at The Ranch with our two 11 year olds and another family. We each stayed in one of the condos overlooking the golf course and it was amazing. The golf course was really fun and a little laid back-they have kids and adult clubs to rent. The Ranch has a super cool vibe with its large deck, live music, various games like corn hole and bocce ball. Lots of fun family time, we will definitely go back. They even carted our group of 8 down to the beach with chairs and towels.
Manager Response: Kim F,  We are thrilled that your family and friends had an amazing Pre-Thanksgiving weekend at the resort. The golf course is family friendly and offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not available from other areas of the property. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the complimentary shuttle to the beach as the weather has been fantastic lately. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Ranch at Laguna Beach. The happy hour cocktails and live music was so enjoyable sitting outside under the heat lamps.  We had breakfast included and the Harvest restaurant was lovely sitting outside on the deck and the food was fabulous.
Manager Response: Thomas H,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). The views from the deck at Harvest definitely enhance the ambiance. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a delightful stay here, booking for 3 nights but staying for 5. The service is excellent and the young staff invariably friendly. The pool is so warm that you can enter it even before breakfast on a cool November morning. The golf course is only 9 holes but with some tricky carries over the creek and very pretty as it winds up and back down the canyon.   There is a shuttle to Laguna Beach which we never quite got the hang of, but the drive is only a few minutes and there is no mandatory valet parking so self drive is cheap and easy. Neither is there any annoying resort fee so unlike some grander residences you escape the feeling of being ripped off.   The Harvest restaurant is OK, but there are many better eateries within a 10 minute drive. Uber was usually 8 dollars each
Manager Response: Acromion,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you extended your stay from 3 nights to 5 nights. Like you mentioned, the golf course presents some challenging shots over the creek, while offering picturesque views of the canyon. The pool is heated year-round, so it is enjoyable no matter the season. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had such a great time at The Ranch!  We drove from LA and stayed for 2 nights.  Loved dinner at Harvest and our 6-year-old son enjoyed the pool, and the astronomer (can't remember his name).  The bed was super comfy.  Felt like we were worlds away but so close to everything Laguna has to offer.  We'll absolutely be back!
Manager Response: V7818FHjordang,  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a two night weekend getaway at the resort. Our culinary team recently introduced a new dinner menu a few weeks ago and we are glad that you got to taste the new offerings. Stargazing on Friday nights is magical due to the breathtaking views away from the city lights. Like you mentioned, the location of the property provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We went there for a babymoon! We absolutely enjoyed it. The food was delicious and the view from the harvest was amazing. We did couples spa and they were very accommodating.  and finallylocation was perfect with close proximity to beach. Thank you for an amazing time.

We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The best part were the guys that welcomed us. They went out of there way to be helpful and obviously love their work. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is fabulous. Service and accommodations were a "10". I stayed 2 nights for a conference and I really enjoyed my stay. The server at the restaurant introduced my daughter to oysters on the half shell. He made it a very special experience for her.

Manager Response: Andrea P,  We are thrilled to hear that your family enjoyed a fun and relaxing staycation at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your trip at the resort by enjoying a variety of the resort amenities and activities. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Hidden canyon retreat in Laguna Beach
Summary: From the drive into the canyon and checking in, to the drive out to head home, this place is magical. Although there are golfers (we are not), it is a restful yet lively place to experience whatever you wish. We went for a quiet retreat in a sustainable setting with great food - and that is exactly what we got.
Manager Response: Sally R,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the canyon location of the resort. The off-the-beaten path setting naturally provides a peaceful environment. Our culinary team introduced a new dinner menu last week, so hopefully you got to taste in the new offerings. If not, you will need to come back and join us again soon to try them out. We look forward to the return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The hotel was excellent and it is nicely appointed and very comfortable. All the facilities and the golf course was fun.   Staff very very positive and a good energy at the place!  One of the best happy hours with great music and fantastic setting.   The Harvest restaurant is one of the best in Orange County.  Food great and service outstanding.   Can you tell, my wife and I thought the place was outstanding!
Manager Response: Tom951881,  We are thrilled to hear that you and your wife enjoyed an outstanding stay at the resort. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Like you mentioned, Ben Brown's Golf Course is situated in what’s arguably the most serene and natural setting in Orange County as the course is carved into the naturally dramatic and lush walls of the Aliso & Wood Canyons, creating an ultra-private playing experience with stunning views and elevation changes on every fairway. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice quiet location that feels more like central California. Recommend making reservations early if interested in the restaurant and/or spa. Great happy hour vibe with musicians. The property is family friendly.
Manager Response: Cubichi74,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the location of the property provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation as the topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch at Laguna is the Best!
Summary: Had a quite overnight stay to celebrate and early birthday and everything about The Ranch is just fantastic. I don't know what it is about the place but the relaxed, friendly vibe just puts everyone is a mood where you slow down a bit, enjoy some good company and relax. Really love this place more and more every time I get to visit. Highly Recommended!
Manager Response: 11andrewz,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of a birthday. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We appreciate your continued support and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed the weekend and loved the solitude of the canyon vs. downtown, easy walk to the beach, nice food options and great live music on the outdoor patio.  Seemed lacking some parking as people were circling at night looking for a spot close to their room, we got lucky with that
Manager Response: Ken S,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and being in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. Regarding the parking situation, the resort is a very popular destination for hotel, spa, golf, and dining guests. Our guest services team does offer complimentary valet parking to help manage when self-parking is full. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The property is absolutely stunning. The canyon provides incredible views just steps away from Aliso beach. Perfect for a family trip or a quiet romantic getaway. The service was top notch from everyone!
Manager Response: Jeremey S,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed an amazing stay at the resort and that the service was top notch as our team understands how important service is to the quality of a guest stay. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path location is great for a family trip or a quiet romantic getaway due to the naturally peaceful vibe. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful location- need work on there food service
Summary: Beautiful location, wonderful front desk, valet and room service staff. The food servers at Harvest restaurant as well as the pantry were horrible.  Unfortunately for the purpose of my stay; which was a mother daughter weekend, the unacceptable service  changed the entire dynamics of our weekend. When I booked this location, my intention was to enjoy all that the resort had to offer over the weekend. After our unacceptable service at the Harvest as well as the pantry , we went into town for the remainder of our meals. The service staff at Harvest was slow to take our order, brought the incorrect order and did not check in once we received our meals. Our experience on the patio for happy hour was very similar. The live music was amazing but it was difficult and frustrating trying
Manager Response: DebbiemX7281XO,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced at Harvest Restaurant and Ben's Pantry as they are not acceptable and do not reflect our standards. Our Director of Food & Beverage will be reaching out to you to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Amazing staff, food and accommodations ! We enjoyed the property so much and the access to beaches, shopping and dining is perfect ! The food for breakfast and dinner was amazing . Our rooms were so clean and well decorated ! We cant wait to go back again.
Manager Response: CristinacL4989DX,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of the beaches, shopping and dining as Laguna Beach has such a variety of experiences to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. The culinary team introduced a new dinner menu last week, so hopefully you got to taste in the new offerings. If not, you will need to come back and join us again soon to try them out. Thank you for the kind words and we can't wait for you to come back either!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Spent two nights here, nestled quietly in the canyon.  Accommodation was wonderful; clean and spacious, with parking near our room. Every one of the staff were very polite and helpful. We sat out on the terrace, with a fire pit and ate simple, tasty foods from Ben Browns. There is a 9 hole golf course, which didn’t interest us, but we did see deer on the fairway. The sandy beach was less than a 10 minute walk following the driveway and going along the underpass. Transport was available through reception if needed to other parts of Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Whatdaisy,  We appreciate that you chose to spend two nights at the resort. Sitting by the fire pits and enjoying some tasty food from Ben's Pantry while soaking in the views of the canyon sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. It is great to hear that you took advantage of walking over to Aliso Beach, especially since the weather has been fantastic. The deer like to greet our guests and we are thrilled that you got to experience that. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Location is not on the beach but who cares when your rooms and the service you get are five star. Truly felt like an authentic Californian destination. Didn’t have the opportunity to eat on site but suspect the experience would have been amazing. The only knock on my time there was the over attentive Valets at check in.
Manager Response: 503EC,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that our team provided five star service throughout your stay as we understand how important service is towards the quality of a guest stay. Our culinary team introduced a new dinner menu last week, so you will definitely need to eat at Harvest Restaurant during your next stay. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Celebrated our 47th wedding anniversary.  Tucked into a canyon off the beaten path (Coast Highway in Laguna Beach), but very quiet and peaceful!  Staff was excellent (all areas) and restaurant outstanding.  Highly recommend!  We’ll certainly be going back.
Manager Response: V6836QTpatrickl,  Congrats on your 47th wedding anniversary! It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a quiet and peaceful celebration in the canyon. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Only 30 minutes away from our home but we felt like we escaped to another world. So relaxing, gorgeous grounds, incredible meal at the restaurant, beautiful rooms. Stayed here for our 15th anniversary and loved every minute.
Manager Response: 495riank,  Congrats on your 15th anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the canyon location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. Hopefully you got to try our new dinner menu during your stay as we just introduced it last week. If not, we invite you to come back soon and taste the new offerings. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: best.  The Ranch staff are always courteou
Summary: Great setting.  The people are the face of The Ranch. Great facilities and  clean accommodations make the visit enjoyable. However the people make the experience top notch.  They are courteous,  friendly,  accommodating and real.
Manager Response: MichaelbU3695PL,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the canyon location of the resort. The off-the-beaten path setting naturally provides a peaceful environment. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service and our team believes in being authentic in all we do. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel had wonderful customer service and free local uber rides! Shrimp cocktail appetizer at hotel was laughable. $16 for 5 peices of shrimp laid flat on a plate with 1 oz of sauce. However, breakfast chilequiles with added chorizo made up for it. Absolutely delicious! No option to purchase a movie, just regular cable with Starz. My husband and I wanted to rent a movie one night and that wasn't possible. We were disappointed in that because nothing was good on cable tv. Would like to see that change. Overall, great customer service, food ok, nice little perks. Great location.
Manager Response: MelissapU9573VI,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that our team provided wonderful customer service that enhanced the quality of your stay. The breakfast chilaquiles are definitely a guest favorite. We appreciate your feedback regarding the guestroom entertainment options as our guest feedback is very important to our operations. We will share it with our management team. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The Ranch.  The staff was friendly and the surroundings were beautiful.  We especially enjoyed the comfortable rooms and the quiet swimming pool area.  The only drawback was we had to call housekeeping to clean our room or it didn't get touched.  The restaurant Harvest was a lovely surprise.
Manager Response: Anne Z,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The weather has been fantastic lately, so the pool has been a favorite spot for our guests to relax and soak up the sun. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced with our housekeeping service and thank you for letting us know so we can follow up with the department manager internally. Our culinary team just released a new dinner menu last night, so you will have to come back and taste the new offerings soon at Harvest. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great  get away to a hidden gem.
Summary: Nice property with everything you need.   Great pool, golfing, beach,spa and fitness center.  Have a cocktail while watching the golfers in front of a fire pit with live music.  Food is excellent.  Friendly staff that make you feel at home.
Manager Response: JohnmK1880WF,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of resort amenities to make the most of your trip. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Relaxing Environment with Laguna Beach with Quality Serivce
Summary: Greatly enjoyed our stay here.  Very relaxing atmosphere.  Beautiful property surrounded about 300 degrees by canyons.  Watched deer from back porch of room.  Enjoyed a glass wine in patio area while listening to music.  Harvest restaurant has great atmosphere with very good food.  Spa experience was also great - therapists, facilities, amenities, atmosphere.  Excellent customer service by all - front desk, valet, spa, housekeeping, restaurant.  Highly recommend, and we hope to return.
Manager Response: Lisa G,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The deer love to greet our guests and we are glad to hear that you experienced that. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I would rate the waitstaff service at the restaurant a 1. We arrived to the hotel and the valet guys were amazing. Equally amazing was the front desk. While we waited for the room, we decided to have brunch.   For a little bit of context, I worked in hospitality in NYC, Miami, Chicago, LA, and other parts of the world. I have one pet peeve when it comes to restaurants, and that is temperature of meat. We were starving and once our orders were taken in your lovely looking restaurant, we never saw the server again. A food runner brought the food out and I cut my burger in half as I always do because I can't digest well done meat. I ordered medium rare and noticed it was well to medium well. I was so hungry because our waiter was in the weeds I ate the first half of the meat and my
Manager Response: CYBILL L,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for celebrating it with a stay at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced at Harvest Restaurant and can understand your frustration. Our Director of Food & Beverage will be reaching out shortly to discuss your experience further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It was the perfect way to relax - great hotel, very nice people and very delicious food. We will come back. Laguna Beach is a very beautiful little city and The Ranch at LB is a hidden secret, nice golf court  everything was perfect.

Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a great place to spend a quiet relaxing weekend, with excellent service and a beautiful property to explore. The dining experience was wonderful and relaxing by the pool enjoyable. We highly recommend The Ranch to anyone looking to have a relaxing weekend with the best service you can imagine.

Summary: We stayed at The Ranch for our wedding anniversary and had a beautiful time. The rooms were nicely appointed and the beds and pillows were so comfortable. Dinner and drinks at the restaurant were great!
Manager Response: Cheryl J,  Congrats on your wedding anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Summary: Lovely setting. Family friendly. Not quiet, if that’s what you’re looking for. Kids having fun in the pool. Can’t blame them for enjoying themselves. When visited with family, our kids had a great time in the pool.
Manager Response: Kitt O,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is very family friendly and we offer family friendly daily programming. The pool is a popular spot for our guests to relax, especially due to the nice weather the past few months. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very relaxing stay away from main drag in Laguna Beach. Lovely cabin style rooms, excellent large bed and good mattress, nice shower and products. Good pool. Nice to have comp newspapers every day.  We were disappointed with the quality of the food in the restaurant. The staff we met were nice but the service extremely slow at times, it took over 20 minutes to get a pool towel. We were woken up twice by housekeeping before 8am on the weekend. A bath would have been nice.
Manager Response: Kat_ldn85,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay as we understand how important service is towards the quality of a guest stay. Can you please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: best couple's retreat.  my husband and i intend to revisit annually!  we even saw deer on the property.  easy access to the beach.  incredibly friendly staff.  avocado toast at then arrest was delicious.  loved it!
Manager Response: W9861AUtiffanyc,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing couples retreat at the resort. Summary: What other resort can you stay in that has a golf course, spa, a restaurant (so good), and is next to the beach? It almost sounded too good to be true when looking into this resort, but we had to give it a try. My friends and I decided to take a small getaway for the weekend. We had the best time at the spa and even better time at the restaurant. We cannot wait to go back!!
Manager Response: LuizaBor2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience at the resort. Enjoying a spa treatment at Sycamore Spa and a delicious meal at Harvest Restaurant both sound like great ways to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a beautiful location with fabulous bedrooms. I look forward to the next visit already.  The scenery is spectacular. We were sorry we didn't bring clubs so we could walk the course and see more. Just stunning. Great, friendly staff and a luxurious bed.

Summary: Everything was very nice.  Enjoyed breakfast with the nice view.  Grounds are very pretty.  Parking was a problem, having to walk far back to my room.   Cell phone coverage was also a problem.  Enjoyed the short walk to the beach.
Manager Response: X1200XXalank,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, enjoying breakfast at Harvest with views of the canyon and golf course is a great way to start your day. It is great to hear that you took advantage of walking to the beach, especially since the weather was fantastic in October. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed one night in a lovely ground-level unit. All aspects were above expectation for this price level. Would highly recommend it and would stay again. Only concern was lack of screen on patio door at ground level so must be careful not to leave door open unattended.
Manager Response: StephensZ1760TL,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that all of your expectations were exceeded. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

It is wonderful to hear how much you cherished the off-the-beaten path vibe of the canyon location of the resort. The baseball playoffs have been exciting thus far, so enjoying some food & drink at Harvest Restaurant while watching the game sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. Summary Heading: The Ranch Mountains and Beach paradise.
Summary: I truly had a wonderful time here at the Ranch,  a get away from all of the other things going on in life. Where can you play golf and have Deer walking by on the course and be nestled between a canyon and then walk to the beach and have dolphins going by you. The whole atmosphere there as soon as we check in, grabbed a bite at the beautiful restaurant looking onto the golf course and mountains. It is so peaceful, beds so comfortable we are buying one now(added expense!!). I've traveled quite a bit, it's a must get away. You can Uber to Dana Point Harbor or Main Beach Laguna within 5 minutes either direction. Had a great time here at the Ranch.  Mark Preston
Manager Response: MarkpW3385XF,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The deer like to greet our guests on the golf course and it is wonderful to hear that they greeted you. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers a naturally peaceful vibe that allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. A comfortable bed can definitely lead to a good night's sleep and recharge you for a fun time in paradise. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Really enjoyed our stay here! The location in a canyon was quiet and serene. Yet close to shops, restaurants and attractions via the Uber service provided by the resort. There's a nice patio with lounge furniture and fire pits overlooking the golf course, with Ben's Pantry adjacent for drinks, coffee and snacks. We enjoyed sitting here with a beer and taking in the scenery while waiting to get in to our room (we arrived earlier than check-in time). Front desk staff was friendly and helpful (Que and Tara were especially helpful as they were at the desk most often when we needed something), and guide you in getting your phone set up for wi-fi calling (no cell signal in the canyon). Our room was very nice – large walk-in shower, double vanity, very comfy bed, large TV, mini-fridge
Manager Response: TLW6407,  We are thrilled to hear that your stay at the resort was one of the best vacations that you have had. It sounds like you made the most of your trip and took advantage of a variety of experiences. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach and in close proximity to downtown. The patio is a great place to enjoy drinks while soaking in breathtaking views of the canyon. We understand that guests are looking for value when they travel, so that is why we do not charge a resort fee and offer complimentary parking and Wi-Fi. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch - beautiful decor, organization ehhhhhh
Summary: Beautiful rooms, great room service, front desk & housekeeping organization needs work.... Nice little get away spot, tucked away in hills of Laguna.  Room amenities very nice despite tired exterior appearance.  Staff very nice, but front desk command of property could be improved.

Summary: The Ranch is nestled in a canyon and makes you feels like you're miles away from the "city life" and yet, in just a short walk, you find yourself on a beautiful California beach.  I loved the contrast!  The staff is attentive, the greens well kept, the rocking chairs were a welcomed addition to both the main patio as well as the room's patio. Lovely location, terrific food, comfortable accommodations. Next time I'll be sure to add some time to enjoy all that Laguna Beach has to offer and maybe even find time for a round of golf.

The farm to table food is amazing! The service here is top notch, they even remember your name and go above and beyond! The front desk agent; Blake made sure every part of our stay was comfortable, he made suggestions, gave us directions, he was awesome... We can't wait to go back :)
