Manager Response: 19ledge,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the location of the property provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. Our guest services team does offer complimentary valet parking to assist when the self-parking in the rooms area is full. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a wonderful stay at the ranch Laguna beach.  Very inviting and well kept hotel.  Beautiful surroundings just wish was staying a little longer and was able to have time to golf.   Loved the location.  Very close to the beach, but in a secluded valley surrounded by mountains.
Manager Response: 818curtisr,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. We invite our guests to leave the pretension and rules of other luxury hotels behind, and step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. Hopefully your next stay with us can be longer so you can enjoy Ben Brown's Golf Course.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property and facilities.  Every member of the staff is anxious to make your experience great.  Don't miss the spa while you are there.  The live entertainment on Thursday and Friday night was an unexpected bonus.
Manager Response: Donald W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. The live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Live music is now offered six days a week (excluding Wednesday). We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I agree with other reviewers in that this property has so much potential. Views are beautiful, but were not utilized enough. The pool is motel style, surrounded by rooms, while they should have taken advantage of the mountains as a backdrop to their pool. We didn't even waste our time at the pool and drove to the beach. Their website advertises plenty to do on the property and as being family friendly, but unless you golf there is absolutely nothing to do (not even WALK to the beach, as its a long, semi-dangerous path). The property seems to be run by teenagers. We took our children to the advertised "Drum Night" only to see a woman with a guitar. This absolutely felt like walking into a locals playdate, of which you were not invited. I am certain that we were the only hotel
Manager Response: Jojochanti,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay at the resort. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your experience as our goal is for guests to leave the property with positive lifelong memories. Regarding the photos and website description, our team has worked hard to be very transparent, so we are curious to see what specifically would be misleading. We apologize for the late check-out incident as it was authorized by our team and can understand your frustration. Can you please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss your overall experience further?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: There were quite a few hiccups to my stay, unfortunately. But I might try again. This place has the potential for a great experience. There need to be more attention to detail in regards to cleaning the rooms. Also, not sure what was going on, but the restaurant area and outdoor area smelled really bad, which is why I did not dine on site. But the restaurant was beautiful and the menu looked great.
Manager Response: 523guest,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay at the resort. We are sorry for the inconveniences that you experienced as they do not reflect our standards. Like you mentioned, attention to detail is extremely important and we apologize that this was not delivered when housekeeping cleaned your room. I have contacted you directly so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property, great rooms, but several mistakes (check in issues, service issues at the restaurant and pool bar, and literal holes in my towels) and no reaction from staff and management other than insincere apologies.  I know mistakes happen but when management makes no gesture to make up for shortcomings, it is not the type of place that I want to spend my hard-earned money.  Stay at one of the other upscale resorts nearby.
Manager Response: Jt63030,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay at the resort. We are sorry for the inconveniences that you experienced as they do not reflect our standards. I know that you and I have set up some time to discuss this further as guest feedback is very valuable to our operations.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Renovated Motel-style provides alternative to beachfront resorts
Summary: The Ranch has a cute, but limited offering versus the larger, established resorts up along Laguna Beach. The staff was far overwhelmed by the amount of guests attending, where we had to call for housekeeping in in the evening, and after slow check-ins. However, the pricing was reasonable, though there's no cell service buried under the canyon walls. Definitely an isolated enclave though.
Manager Response: Clayton M,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your stay at the resort. We are sorry for the inconveniences that you experienced and can understand your frustration. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. I will be contacting you directly to discuss your experience further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The property is beautiful, peaceful, and relaxing.  The pool is fantastic and the lounge chairs very comfortable.  Our room was lovely, both rustic and elegant!  The food is excellent and the views of the golf course are stunning!  The main patio is lively for happy hour with live music and games to play.  We will definitely be back!  The service was great in some areas and not so great in others.
Manager Response: 816elizabethy,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing girls getaway at the resort. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. The live music and happy hour on the patio is a great way to enjoy food & drinks while soaking in views of the surrounding canyon. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A quiet haven near the beach
Summary: The Ranch is a recently renovated property on a short golf course.  It is next to San Diego Creek and surrounded by hills and lush vegetation.  yet you are only 5 minutes of Pacific Coast Highway and the sophisticated delights of Laguna Beach. We took a family weekend for my birthday.  The property is composed of condo-like accommodations.  There is a lovely pool, and the restaurant is really excellent.  Even our six year old had a good time. Never felt a need to leave, although there is a shuttle to the beach.  Finally did a bit of good shopping in LB on the way home, after a very satisfying trip.
Manager Response: CityLibrarian,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us in celebration of your birthday. Like you mentioned, the resort is surrounded by nature that includes a creek, canyon walls, and lush landscape. The property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access. The weather has been fantastic over the past few months, so the pool has a popular spot for our guests to relax. Downtown Laguna Beach is full of a variety of boutique shops and we are glad that you took advantage of shopping on the way home. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great value for luxury at Laguna Beach
Summary: My family spent 3 days here to celebrate our anniversary after a hectic week at Disneyland. We stayed in a two bedroom suite. The room faced the pool, but was not noisy at all. The suite was actually a two stories, with a dining table, microwave, living room, and powder bath on the ground floor, and two bedrooms and one bath upstairs. Although the hotel was not directly on the beach, a short walk (or golf cart ride to the main street) was all it took to get to the beach. The hotel provided towels and chairs upon request. The room was very comfortable, and although I cannot attest to the hotel restaurants (we chose to eat at nearby restaurants rather than at the hotel), the amenities at the hotel seemed quite nice. My only complaint would have to be the lack of parking on the
Manager Response: Sabrina B,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a three night stay at the resort. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout and we are glad that you and the family felt the same way. Like you mentioned, you get the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while also having beach access. Regarding the parking, we do offer complimentary valet parking in order to accommodate our guests when self-parking is full. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: It was ok.  They had multiple events lined up for a wedding on Friday and a corporate event Saturday which really restr
Summary: It was ok.  They had a wedding on Friday on the patio portion with a view as well as the area below then a corporate event on Saturday.  The fact you couldn't use any common area for their acclaimed happy hours made us have to uber to go elsewhere or be down by the pool with no view.  It may sound like a small thing but it really matters.  Our room had no view so to sit on our little porch and look at the fence didn't make it great.  Nice staff.
Manager Response: DanielfP2553XO,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. The property is a very popular location for weddings and events. However, like you mentioned, the guest experience needs to stay at a very high level at all times and we apologize for the inconveniences that occurred. I know that you and I have connected directly to discuss this further as guest feedback is very valuable to our operations.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort is peaceful, tranquil and incredibly lovely! The energy nature and service from the team was awesome! I truly appreciate each and everyone of you! I will be back with my family and Will have my first retreat here in the spring!
Manager Response: O6745TNcarla,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers a naturally peaceful and tranquil vibe. As the saying goes, energy is contagious. Our team works hard to present positive and welcoming energy to each of our guests as we want lifelong memories to be taken home. We look forward to your return trip with your family.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a great time at The Ranch, perfect staycation spot to get out of LA and to disconnect from work. The staff and their attention to their guests is impeccable and second to none. Would highly recommend to anyone and would absolutely stay there again.
Manager Response: Daniel A,  We are thrilled to hear that you had a great weekend retreat at the resort. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path vibe of the resort allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful and Relaxing .Great mountain views,close to beach.
Summary: Rooms decorated very well, great shower pressure and very comfortable bed.walking distance to beach , great for couples and kids.Has a country feel yet close to the beach and close to restaurants.Would come back for a longer stay
Manager Response: Pablo B,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access. We appreciate the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property beautiful rooms. They need help with service at the front desk valet and pool area is not on par with the highend hotels in the area.  Harvest restaurant is a nice restaurant great service but the food it was extremely salty not to I taste.  Breakfast  on the other hand was good.
Manager Response: L4025ASthomass,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay at the resort as guest feedback is very valuable to our operations. We are sorry that the service you received during the stay was not up to standards. I have contacted you directly to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Must see and dine in Laguna Beach 🏖
Summary: I’ve been to Laguna Beach in numerous occasions and only three days ago where my American family treat us all for a nice dinner. “The Ranch” @ Laguna Beach is superb! The environment, the atmosphere, the food and service was superb!  Highly recommended 👌❤️🇺🇸
Manager Response: TitoRich8,  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a wonderful experience at Harvest Restaurant. The atmosphere and ambiance is enhanced by the breathtaking views of the canyon that surround the property. Thank you for the recommendation to others and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: clean, well-kept and relaxing!  Great staff and fantastic food!  I went there for a business retreat and the staff was very attentive.  I did not have much time to enjoy the amenities but others seem to rave about them.
Manager Response: 423blaken,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a business retreat. Our team works hard to be very attentive to the needs of our guests and we are glad that the service that our team provided enhanced your stay. Hopefully you can come back on a leisure vacation soon and enjoy all that the resort and Laguna Beach have to offer.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One word, AMAZING...make time to check this place out.  Great access to the beach, all of the fun spots of Laguna, and most of all is the setting in the hills / valley.  This is a very unique diamond that you must consider for your next stay in OC.
Manager Response: F1739KVstephenh,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing stay at the resort. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Mixed Bag - Renovated Motor Lodge in LB
Summary: I was excited to test out this renovated motor lodge in Laguna Beach when a friend told me about her recent summer visit. We usually stay at the Monarch Beach in Dana Point for reference.   The basic difference is that the Ranch is not a standalone resort. We paid $485 a night in a creekside studio suite 1401 which all in, I felt was not worth the total spend due to lack of amenities. The room was directly under the mountain and very dark due to the shade, however, nicely appointed and clean.   The Ranch hosted 2 weddings and an art auction over the weekend so it was a very busy scene. The gym was small, but well equipped. Alos, the food is very rich at the Harvest restaurant. TIP - ask for the corner booth and you can get a great view of the golf course with open windows for
Manager Response: Calitravlerone,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your experience at the resort. Guest feedback is very valuable to our operations. We are sorry to hear that is was a mixed bag visit as our goal is to provide guests with a great impression. Can you please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice rooms and people, right off the Coastal Hwy, close to Laguna Beach. It is nestled into a canyon, so cell coverage is almost existent, which is great when you want to get away or have a focused meeting.
Manager Response: J7854WNbruceh,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon is a great place to escape and enjoy a fun, off-the-beaten path adventure. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great way to finish a trip
Summary: We stayed at The Ranch at Laguna Beach for our final evening of our 3 weeks trip and it was the perfect way to do so. The bed was huge and comfy and the staff made us feel really welcomed. We dined in the Harvest Restaurant and this was one of the best meal's we had. I went with our waiter's suggestions and he got it just right!
Manager Response: ClairebU3555OY,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on the final evening of your three week trip. We are thrilled that your stay at our resort ended the trip on such a high note. Our team understands that a warm and sincere welcome creates the foundation for the guest experience. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a delicious meal at Harvest that was recommended by your server. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Reception at valet and desk was good. Very poor privacy in rooms as we could hear our neighbours speaking loudly at midnight. Restaurant was very very noisy and we were always being bothered by waiter and manager asking us if the food was alright. My crab cakes were a disappointment. On a positive note, breakfast was not bad served in the veranda overlooking the golf course . Quite expensive for an overnight stay when we could hear our neighbours in the next room and our dinner was disappointing and overpriced.
Manager Response: Marta S,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay at the resort as guest feedback is very valuable to our operations. We are sorry to hear about the inconveniences that you experienced during the stay. I have passed along your feedback to our management team and have contacted you directly to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I really enjoyed our stay at the Ranch--excellent service, really good food, very comfortable. Parking was a little inconvenient a couple of times, but overall we really enjoyed it--we didn't want to leave.
Manager Response: JeffwL515OG,  It is wonderful to hear that you and your wife enjoyed a nice relaxing getaway in the canyon. Harvest Restaurant is working on introducing some new items to the menu as our culinary team offers seasonal menus, so we invite you to come back and try them soon. The resort is very popular for hotel, golf and restaurant guests and to assist with parking, we do offer complimentary valet parking. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location, we had a great time playing golf. Golf course is really pretty and wild life roams the course. Our meal at Harvest was not satisfactory, food was cold, although the waitress did offer to return the meals and gave us some sides. Pool area was fun, however service a little slow but it was a busy wedding weekend. We have stayed here before and were very pleased, just not as much this time.
Manager Response: Peggym485,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay at the resort. I know that you and I connected already on the inconveniences that you experienced during this stay as they are not reflective of our standards. We will definitely do something special for you during your next stay as we appreciate that you continue to stay at the resort.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderfully relaxing and hospitable experience. As I mentioned in my review of Guest Services, my fiance and I were very much take by surprise by some of the wonderful little hospitable treats that The Ranch was able to provide. I know that such wonderful little details in quality are not often deliverable or guaranteed even in such a wonderful resort, however these details in quality really enhanced our experience.
Manager Response: 541sophia930,  We are thrilled that you had a fabulous first stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing and hospitable experience in the canyon. Like you mentioned, going the extra step and executing on the little details is super important to the quality to a guest stay and we are glad that the service you received enhanced your experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Not great service and breakfast was awful.
Summary: Breakfast selections were cold and the food  it good. Also room requests were never completed. We also asked for sheets for couch never came  We liked the pool and jacuzzi.  Lots to do for service though which was awful
Manager Response: LauramB8176SP,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that happened during your stay as they are not acceptable and do not reflect our standards. I will reach out to you directly so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: 2 night stay at The Ranch (wish it was longer!)
Summary: As part of a mini road trip round CA we stayed with The Ranch for our time in Laguna Beach. This stay was fantastic from start to finish. They have a wonderfully polite, interactive and helpful valet, front desk, bar, golf shop and restaurant team staff. - We couldn't fault any staff we met! The quality of this resort and service is high, and naturally this is reflected in their pricing. This was the most expensive stay in our trip, but it was our first year wedding anniversary and we wanted something special. It was also validated by our experience and justified the cost. We even received a complimentary upgrade and welcome gift to mark the occasion which was a very lovely and much appreciated touch! We therefore have no trouble recommending The Ranch. Thanks guys! :)
Manager Response: Harrybevins,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us during your road trip around California. Congrats on your first wedding anniversary and we are thrilled to hear that the complimentary upgrade made the celebration even more special. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: As with other reviews there are a few things we'd like them to address to make this place perfect...parking (very frustrating not being able to park outside our cottage - allocated parking would sort it!), veggie food, no bath
Manager Response: 852hannaha,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We understand the desire to park near your guestroom and do our best to keep the self-parking open for our hotel guests. Please know that we also do offer complimentary valet parking and our guest services team can always assist with transportation to and from your guestroom. Regarding the menu, our culinary team is working on introducing some new items and we will pass along your feedback. I would like to discuss your experience further and will reach out to you directly.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We came here for a company retreat. It was a beautiful location in the woods and the customer service was good. However, it is not close to bars and restaurants and the food here was TERRIBLE. I would not recommend this hotel for that reason. They need to hire a new chef before I ever return.
Manager Response: 247lizl,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the off-the-beaten path location of the property. We are sorry to hear that you did not have a good experience with the food. I have spoken to our Director of Food & Beverage and he let me know that he contacted you directly to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great place to relax!   When we drove in town we avoided checking in first cause we both knew we wouldn't want to leave our room once we were there.  Can't say enough about The Ranch, all the staff are so welcoming and so accommodationing!  The Ranch will be the only place we stay from now on.
Manager Response: Meawj2017,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you took advantage of exploring around town before checking in as the city has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. Our team understands that a warm and sincere welcome creates the foundation for the guest experience. We are thrilled to hear that our resort will be the place of choice on future visits to Laguna Beach. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I found this place on Hotel Tonight, as it was an impromptu overnight stay. It was only a few minutes from my event of the day/evening. I was pleasantly surprised with the accommodations, and the good night's sleep. I awoke to find a cute little patio awaiting in the morning light. Unfortunately, I was unable to stay. I did grab a freshly baked blueberry muffin and a cup of coffee to go from the pastry shop, which had a larger patio area overlooking the golf course. One thing for sure.... I will be back!
Manager Response: Wanderkin,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the guestroom outdoor patio is a great place to relax and start the morning with the sun rising in the canyon. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of ordering a blueberry muffin and cup of coffee from Ben's Pantry since the ambiance is enhanced by views of the golf course and surrounding nature. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: From arrival to departure, from the room to the public areas, this is a first class resort peopled by staff who understand the real meaning of the term 'customer service'. Highly recommended for golfers and non golfers alike.
Manager Response: Bagsmags,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand the importance that service is towards the quality of a guest stay. We strive to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Breathtaking views in the canyon.  The patio overlooking the gofl course was fantastic during the day and at night when they have small firepits to sit around.  The rooms are gorgeous and clean.  I couldn't have asked for better.
Manager Response: Brad W,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the patio is a fantastic place to sit by the fire pits while soaking in the breathtaking views of the canyon. Relaxing in paradise does not get much better than that. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Unfortunately, we only spent a couple of nights at the Ranch, really wish it could have been more. Set back from the main highway, it's a luxurious and peaceful retreat. It's either a short walk or a quick ride in a complimentary golf trolley to the beach (from where we saw a seal and dolphins). The main part of Laguna Beach is a bit further away, but the hotel provides a complimentary Uber service for that. There's a relaxing pool area, a free fitness centre, a spa and it even has it's own 9 hole golf course. The spa and golf were a little expensive though.  Our room was large with a huge bed, double vanity unit and massive shower. It was clean and offered lots of amenities (safe, fridge, iron / ironing board, coffee maker, TV, microwave).  For meals there's a lovely restaurant
Manager Response: Steve W,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. That is so awesome that you saw a seal and dolphins at Aliso Beach. Hopefully you got some good photos of that sight. We are glad that you got to enjoy downtown Laguna Beach as it offers an excellent selection of shops and art galleries. Overall, it sounds like you made the most of your trip to Laguna Beach. Like you mentioned, our coastal city is home to over 20 beaches and coves. Heisler Park is a popular spot to view a lot of the coves. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Privacy and luxury away from the beach resort chaos
Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed the Canyon Room, pool, hot tub, and services. A very nice stay. Only issue was a domestic dispute between a drunken couple causing sleep interruption. Not the hotel’s fault. Security response was of little help.
Manager Response: Casl900,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the off-the-beaten path location of the resort allows for our guests to experience luxury and unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. The weather has been fantastic over the past few months, so the pool and hot tub have been the popular spots to relax in paradise. We apologize for the disturbance during your stay that caused sleep interruption and can understand your frustration with the situation. I will review this with our management team and can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We are local to the area and chose to stay here because of the LARGE hotel rooms. Our bungalow was two stories with two upstairs bedrooms that close! Perfect for families that put little ones to bed and still want to stay up and enjoy the room!

Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I had a very nice stay at this resort. Service was excellent. Food and drinks are very good and rooms are great. There is poor telephone receipt, but this is compensated with free wifi. If this resort is within your price range, certainly one I can recommend!

Summary: The hotel had very nice rooms and was close enough the beach and nice surrondings. The staff were professional but not very personal which I would expect when staying at a hotel with such high room rated. Would not go there again on a private trip

We understand how important service is towards the quality of a guest stay and would like to speak with you further so it can be addressed appropriately. I have sent you an email and look forward to connecting.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very comfortable beds. Restaurant good. Would have liked more vegetarian options. Slightly overpriced. Not close to any shops but just used Uber. Close to beach. Friendly staff. Overall very nice experience.
Manager Response: Reeva E,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and it is great to hear that you had a wonderful stay. Thank you for your feedback regarding the menu offerings. Our culinary team is working on introducing some new items as we offer seasonal menus. Downtown Laguna Beach has an excellent selection of shops and we are glad that you took advantage of visiting them. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A one night experience is short
Summary: The hotel is in a place where you experience the peace and quiet of the surroundings. You sit by the Harvest restaurant and the view seems like a live painting. Staff were always helpful and courteous.Though we only had the breakfast, it was a perfect  meal for us.  We could have had the dinner but due to the numerous plans intertwined with this trip, there was no time to come back for dinner. There is always a next time.
Manager Response: ClairedeLun,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. A live painting is a great way to describe the breathtaking view of the canyon. The culinary team at Harvest Restaurant just introduced some new offerings to the dinner menu, so you will definitely have to come back and try them out. Hopefully your next trip at the resort will be longer in length for you to experience all that Laguna Beach has to offer.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My daughter and I have an annual tradition to get away for a couple of days.  This was just a perfect spot.  Quiet, nice pool, plenty of places to walk.  The staff, from the front desk, to valet, to the  restaurant - all five stars.  This is a great place for pleasure, but also has two patios to accommodate a large gathering - or business retreat -.
Manager Response: Tanja F,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us during your annual trip with your daughter. It is wonderful to hear that you both enjoyed the peaceful and quiet nature of the canyon. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family as we understand how much that enhances the experience. Like you mentioned, the outdoor space is a great way to relax in paradise while soaking in views of the surrounding nature. We appreciate the kind words and hopefully this was the first of many annual trips to the resort.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The hotel and everything else at that propriety is really impressive and all the services and people are great. I true really recommend this place for tourism, family travel and business. The rooms are great and comfortable enough for some days.
Manager Response: 375thiagon,  We are thrilled to hear that you had an amazing experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the resort and Laguna Beach has so much to offer for a variety of travel purposes. That is what makes each trip to the coast of Southern California so exciting and unique. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had the best time.  was exactly what we needed.  super relaxing and quiet.  We will def be back.  the breakfast was excellent and the pool so comfortable.   we had the best 3 nights sleep and absolutely loved the room.  it was incredibly spacious.  best bed also!!
Manager Response: Tracyn196,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a super relaxing and quiet time at the resort. The canyon provides a naturally peaceful vibe that allows our guests to escape from the normal hustle and bustle. The weather has been fantastic to start the fall season, so the pool has been a popular spot for our guests to unwind in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of the best hotel experiences I've ever had!  I am/will telling everyone I know to stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach.  You are leagues beyond everyone else in town!  I can't think of a single thing I would change.  The updates made to the hotel since my last stay in Aug. 2016 only made it that much better.
Manager Response: 353codyc,  Thank you for your continued support. We are thrilled to hear how wonderful your first stay at the resort since the grand opening was. Our goal is to offer a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. Our guests truly experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We went to Tge Ranch for a relaxing staycation to celebrate our 20th anniversary. The property was amazing the staff was friendly and courteous and our services at the Spa were wonderful. In my experience many spa services at resorts are really expensive and poor quality. This was not the case!
Manager Response: KimkC1034LH,  Congrats on your 20th anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Our team works hard to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Local mountain retreat at the beach.
Summary: This hidden gem is right off Pacific Coast Highway, nestled in between the mountains.  We arrived in the late afternoon, they had a guitarist entertaining.  You could sit outside for casual drinks or go inside to a very nice restaurant lounge area, with large windows for the view.
Manager Response: Mamiefiere,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. Like you mentioned, the location of the property provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The live music is such a wonderful way to relax and enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the surrounding nature. Live music is offered six days a week (Wednesday is the exception). Harvest Restaurant has introduced some new selections on the dinner menu, so we invite you to come back and try them out.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: Overall I really enjoyed my stay. I was traveling on business. I will definitely consider staying here again for business or pleasure next time that I'm in the Laguna area. It's location is in a canyon a short walk/run to the Aliso Beach. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent business trip. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while walking over to Aliso Beach. We hope that you are able to travel back to Laguna Beach for a vacation as the city has such a variety of experiences to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My sisters and I stayed in four cottage suites and loved our weekend at The Ranch so much, we are looking forward to making this an annual tradition.  There were plenty of activities on property (golf, bocce ball, volleyball, bean bag toss, etc.) along with the beautiful beach across from The Ranch.  We loved the serene setting.
Manager Response: MarkandLaura P,  We are thrilled to hear that you and your sisters enjoyed a stay in four Cottage Two Bedroom Suites. It sounds like you made the most of your visit by participating in a variety of activities on property and in the local area. We look forward to welcoming you back for your annual tradition at the resort.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice low key way to do Laguna Beach.  The staff was terrific, and we will be back.  They were very accomidting to our large group, and really did eveything possible to make our stay as pleasant as possible.
Manager Response: D4460IQlisac,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service and it is wonderful to hear that the service you received enhanced the stay of your large group. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our two-night stay at the Ranch.  The room was spacious and very inviting with a large shower and a cute patio.  Harvest Restaurant was very good, particularly at breakfast, although the dinner menu was limited in its choices.  Service everywhere on the property was friendly and informed.  Don't miss the nightly happy hour with live music on the back patio overlooking the golf course.  It's a magical experience with a spectacular view of the canyon..
Manager Response: Richard H,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed an exceptional stay at the resort. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our culinary team recently introduced some new offerings to the dinner menu, so we invite you to join us again soon at Harvest Restaurant. The live music is such a wonderful way to relax and enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the surrounding nature. Live music is offered six days a week (Wednesday is the exception). Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We love the guest room, big and clean. Reception was really helpful. Checkout was fast and easy. We had breakfast in Harvest restaurant. The service was really great. Hotel location is good, just some minutes' walking to the amazing beach.
Manager Response: Xiaoyant2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We understand the importance of your first impression at the resort upon check-in and we are thrilled to hear that our guest services team provided excellent service. Harvest Restaurant offers seasonal menus, so we invite you to come back and try the new offerings once they are introduced by our culinary team later this fall. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed here for 2 days but could stay for 2 lifetimes.  They definitely want to make sure customer service is first and that's how it feels. This is an establishment that gives first class service without feeling too poncy.
Manager Response: E8433VRgracec,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. An important part of our values is offering authentic customer service that focuses on integrity in everything we do. Like you mentioned, we invite our guests to leave the pretension and rules of other luxury hotels behind, and step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We'd go back! Great place to relax for a weekend. Easy to get to, rooms were well done, bed very comfy!! We enjoyed the fitness center and the spa. Outside tables were a great place for happyhour drinks and snacks.
Manager Response: Doahl,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing weekend at the resort. A treatment at Sycamore Spa is definitely a wonderful way to relax in paradise. The outside tables on the patio are a great spot to enjoy live music and happy hour and we are glad that you took advantage of it. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Staff not enough polite, room not convenient at all : shower not pleasant you have to put the spurt on its maximum to get hot water, no glass in the room, no cutlery, not enough towel racks. bad experience in general. Nice and quiet Swimming pool
Manager Response: Cedricd37,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your experience. I will reach out to you directly so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We enjoyed our serene stay in a cottage suite so much last year we decided to return this year and reserved four cottage suites.  Truly you are the "coolest hotel in Laguna Beach!"  We'll be back next year.
Manager Response: Laura P,  Thank you for your continued support of the resort. We greatly appreciate it. Our team had a goal upon our opening to create "The Coolest Hotel in Laguna Beach" and it is awesome that you also thought of the resort the same way. We look forward to your return visits in the years to come.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a fantastic time.  The staff was one of the best we have ever dealt with. They were all so nice and helpful.  The front desk even set up our cell phones for wi-fi, that meant a lot to my husband.  The golf course is only a 9 hole course, but it is fun and we were able to play a couple of balls and practice without slowing anyone down.  I give this resort a 10 and the bed a 10, which is the first for me.
Manager Response: Suzi H,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service and it is wonderful to hear that the service you received enhanced your stay. The golf course is fun, yet challenging for those all of skills and ages, plus it offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not available from other areas of the resort. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the course. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was expecting luxurious accommodations in a tranquil setting, and was very disappointed. While the interior of our room was nicely appointed, the patio of our room had no privacy and the only view was of the rooms facing us, making it feel like a motel.  The Ranch was full of families with young children during our stay, and reminded me of an expensive camp for kids.
Manager Response: Cooky51258,  We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with your experience at the resort. Laguna Beach is a very popular destination for families with children, so that is not uncommon at area hotels. I will reach out to you directly to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had planned to go to Cabo, but our flights were cancelled. We ended up going to the Ranch instead, and it was great! The service was excellent, and the ranch was quiet, relaxing, and enjoyable! Highly recommend for younger couples or families!
Manager Response: MeganlP8194ZJ,  We are thrilled to hear that you experienced a wonderful local getaway at the resort. Even though your travel plans didn't work out as originally intended, we appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful and relaxing...low key place to stay.  We stayed in room 1410 creek side and thought it was probable the best place room to stay in.  The golf was family friendly.  The menu at Harvest was a little limited and unusual.
Manager Response: Roachma,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Laguna Beach. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your first stay at the resort. The Creekside Studio Suites are popular among our guests due to their spacious layout and views of the surrounding canyon. Like you mentioned, the golf course is family friendly as it is fun for those of all ages and skill levels. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It's not often that you arrive to a property and have your expectations exceeded.  Sure, we all WANT and HOPE for that to happen but it's rare when it does.  Enter into the conversation the Ranch and Laguna Beach.  Nestled against a stunning and lush backdrop, the property is literally across the road from the beach yet leaves you not wanting to ever leave.  With a challenging yet serene 9 hole golf course, an outstanding restaurant with a well known chef, and a spa/activities for everyone, there is really no reason to do so.  Throw in modern yet very carefully appointed guest rooms, impeccable service, and a bathroom where water pressure doesn't leave you taking a 20 minute shower, and you have a hidden secret along the California coast.  Lastly, I took my gf there for our one
Manager Response: LosAngelesFoodMan,  Congrats on your one year anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. We are thrilled to hear that your expectations were exceeded. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Seriously I must assume these good reviews are paid. Let me break it down for you as I wait for clean pillows to be delivered to a room I'm paying $745 a night for.  1. Before arriving I'm called by the spa bc due to the fact my reservation needed to be changed last minute from a facial to a massage bc this place apparently has one facialist. Spa is so important to me on a vacation so obviously I'm annoyed they cant honor my reservation. Luckily The Montage that has more than one person working for them was able to accommodate.   2. I go outside to the pool. Spider webs all over the chairs and bee's everywhere. Only positive was that the bartender was lovely.  3. Bathroom water pressure absurd. Water shoots out with high intensity.  4. Never got turn down service even though
Manager Response: Julie J,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay at the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay and understand your disappointment. I have made the management team aware of your experience so they can take proper action to discuss with the departments that you mentioned. We would like to discuss this with your further as your experience was not acceptable. Can you please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fantastic place to stay away from the crowds of Laguna Beach.  Private, beautiful, luxurious but not snooty.  The bed was cozy and  comfortable.  It was quiet, peaceful and relaxing.  Lovely and inviting pool and surrounding area.   Great attention to detail throughout the property.  Beautiful decor.  We visited for our anniversary an we wouldn't hesitate to return!
Manager Response: Henryf828,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. It allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Like you mentioned, we invite our guests to leave the pretension and rules of other luxury hotels behind, and step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Friendly staff, good food and accommodations. We truly enjoyed the stay and prices were very reasonable. The staff was excellent and we loved the setting.  Rooms were large and comfortable. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Steve W,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path canyon location of the resort. The spacious layout of our accommodations are popular among our guests and we are glad that you enjoyed the comfort of it. Our team works hard to treat out guests like family and it sounds like the service levels enhanced your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great place, but lock up your valuables
Summary: The only reason this got downgraded to 3 stars is the cleaning staff will steal you blind. The staff is nice, the location is incredible, and the pricing is fair. We stayed 3 nights. The thieves have an penchant for little purse like storage containers. Little pouches you would put make up or diamond earrings in. The management of course denies any wrong doing, but they ripped us off two days in a row, and the same type of thing was stolen. I asked them not to have their cleaning staff come in the room anymore, even to change the sheets because we didn't want to have anyone more of our stuff stolen. It's funny how when you report anything missing, they make you feel like you are crazy, and for a moment you start to believe them and think you are crazy. But the second day, we
Manager Response: Ron K,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay at the resort. Please know that our management team investigated your claim thoroughly by doing a room lock interrogation and speaking with the housekeeping room attendants that serviced your room. Based upon our investigation, we determined that our team members accessed the room only to provide standard cleaning service. Our Operations Manager has been in touch with you throughout the process and has been very transparent during your conversations. We hold our team accountable to the utmost integrity in everything we do. For all further questions, please communicate directly with our Operations Manager.     Sincerely,   The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach has shown itself to be an establishment that functions at the highest caliber.  I began planning for 3 company events and to date, one of our events has already taken place.  Joleen Tsai, sales manager, was phenomenal with all aspects of satisfying our needs from the get go.  She was the most supreme professional who assisted me with our employee room accommodations, business meeting room, meals, and the list goes on and on.  Any future property that we seek for events in the future will have big shoes to fill to meet the level of satisfaction as we had at the Ranch
Manager Response: Kathryn D,  Thank you for choosing to host three company events at our resort. We are so thrilled to hear that we have exceeded expectations and that Joleen has been of great assistance throughout the entire process. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your upcoming events.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Being at this resort was a great experience. Have not been in the Laguna Beach area but like the shuttle service and the friendliness of staff contacted early and was able to check in early. I also with aloud to check out late so I could enjoy the facilities
Manager Response: 943dwightt,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great getaway experience at the resort. Our team works hard to accommodate our guest requests and we are glad that we were able to accommodate yours so you could enjoy the resort facilities. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Perfect for special occasions I’ve been wanting to stay here for a while and I’m so glad we finally made it. It’s not going to be our last either. This place is so pretty, tucked away in between two canyons in the heart of Laguna Beach. You can almost pretend like you’re somewhere else. The grounds are gorgeous, the rooms are well-appointed, the service is awesome and we were equally impressed with the food at the Harvest restaurant and the massage at the spa. Thanks to traffic, we were late getting there for our spa appointment so they let us reschedule for the next day. Since we were celebrating our anniversary, we got extra special treatment from the hotel and restaurant. It’s not exactly inexpensive, but well worth it. It could be a really great place for special occasions
Manager Response: ChrisOrange_CA,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. Spa treatments at Sycamore Spa and delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort in the canyon provides a different perspective of Laguna Beach and a coastal vacation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Hands down a stunningly relaxing experience. Beautiful property, beautiful rooms and excellent food. My husband and I had so much fun just hanging out around the resort. We played bags countless times, swam in the pool and hot tub, walked down to the beach, and enjoyed sitting out on the deck. Absolutely excellent experience! Literally nothing to complain about!
Manager Response: Jilianjet,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you made the most of your time at the resort by taking advantage of a variety of amenities. The weather has been fantastic this summer, so soaking up the sun at the pool and at Aliso Beach are great ways to enjoy Laguna Beach during this season. We are thrilled that you had an excellent experience and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel in quiet location
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach.  The hotel is a little bit set back from the main road which makes it very quiet.  We liked the setting very much.  We stayed in a one-bedroom suite which was very large, immaculately clean and very nicely furnished.  Turndown is on demand.  We had breakfast at the hotel which can be taken on the terrace overlooking part of the golf course.  The pool area is nice and there is a pool bar that does nice cocktails (and some food, I believe).  The shuttle to the beach is by golf cart (on demand) and only takes a couple of minutes.  We loved our day on the beach! You need to 'cross' the coastal road via an underpass (no problem at all).  Where you get out is not ideal for swimming (waves and difficult to get out of the water,
Manager Response: Camilla W,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. The quiet and peaceful nature of the canyon is a great break from the normal hustle and bustle. The Creekside One Bedroom suites are very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of a variety of experiences while at the resort. Like you mentioned, the live music is a wonderful way to enjoy food & drinks from Ben's Pantry while relaxing in paradise. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I really like the property however I would not recommend staying there. They just don't go out of their way to make sure you have what you need when you're there. Special events take priority over the guest, parking and is taken up by visitors.  Oh and don't ask for anything extra as you will not see it.
Manager Response: LynndA1576FX,  We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. Please accept our apologizes for the level of service that you were provided during your stay. I would like to discuss this with you further. If you could please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com, I would greatly appreciate it.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were struggling to find a location for a minimoon following our wedding. I found the Ranch through TripAdvisor and immediately booked a room using the B&B rate ($50 included each day for breakfast). There are other package options available, and since the restaurant is reasonably priced (we only hit that limit once, and we love breakfast), I'd recommend the honeymooner package for couples, where you get 10% off of spa treatments. The room was comfortable, beautiful, and quiet. It's the perfect hotel for that "odd couple," where there's the mix of chic and stylish, and classic and rustic.
Manager Response: Charlie J,  Congrats and thank you for choosing to celebrate your special occasion at our resort. We are thrilled to hear that you had an amazing stay relaxing in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We wish you the best during this new journey in your life and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Everything was grea! Sat and Sunday morning live music was perfect! Food was excellent and location is perfect in Laguna.  Only wish we had more towels and cups in the room. The rooms were great and we loved the robes!!
Manager Response: 501cassandrah,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. The live music is such an amazing way to enjoy food & drinks on the Harvest Patio while relaxing in paradise. It is wonderful to hear how much you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed our stay at the ranch. Beautiful location, clean hotel, & friendly staff. They even surprised us with wine and cookies for our anniversary, very nice! Lunch at Harvest was very good as well!
Manager Response: Avaella1980,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at the resort. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing retreat in the canyon and a delicious lunch at Harvest. Our team works hard to provide the extra degree of service and we are thrilled that the amenity enhanced your anniversary celebration. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a perfect location for a staycation!  Loved the hospitality of the staff, the welcome fruit basket and stuffed animal.  Loved the privacy and location of my room.  Patio was perfect for coffee in the AM.  Trolley comes RIGHT to the property...no need to get in your car after your visit.  Plus, they'll golf cart you to the pedestrian access for the beach and give you umbrellas, chairs and towels!  I'll be back very soon.
Manager Response: Nancy S,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a staycation at the resort. Like you mentioned, the patio is a great way to enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning while soaking in views of the surrounding scenery. Our team works hard to treat our guests like family through personalized service as we want all of our guests to take home lifelong memories. It is wonderful that you took advantage of the complimentary summer trolley as it provides the opportunity to experience a variety of activities along the coast. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We couldn't find anything bad to say about this place.  It is not on the beach, but it is back in the canyon across the street from the beach and the property is really beautiful.  There is a tram that comes by every 20 minutes to take you anywhere you want to go for free!
Manager Response: Diane S,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access at Aliso Beach. The complimentary summer trolley is a wonderful way to enjoy a variety of experiences along the 7 miles of coastline and we are glad that you took advantage of it. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: really nice location, nice decor, over priced, wedding location ,. don;t go her eif you wan tjsut quiet and good service .. they don't have it!   food service was the worst ever and I have traveled all over the world..  they just do not care. untrained.
Manager Response: KimnR8821XB,  We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We apologize for the dining experience you had and thank you for letting us know. Our Director of Food & Beverage will be reaching out to you shortly as we take our guest feedback very seriously.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a stunning beauty nestled in the canyon- had a peace filled and lovely time there. Walked down easily to the beach, and the spa and spa staff is wonderful! They wished me a Happy Birthday and even gave me a little gift. The bed was very comfy and room was decorated well- I loved the chandelier! The staff was very friendly and I appreciated the bell hops on golf carts- very helpful and kind.
Manager Response: Jennifer K,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with a stay at the resort. Our team works hard to to treat our guests like family through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your birthday stay. A spa treatment at Sycamore Spa sounds like a great way to unwind and relax in paradise. The Elegant Coastal Ranch decor like the chandelier reflect an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Took the kids and wife for a staycation. It was amazing. The staff was great. The grounds were great. The food was good. The music was good. The games were fun. The spa was great. The pool was warm. Service outstanding. Close to everything.
Manager Response: Sbhavnani,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a staycation with your family. It sounds like you made the most of your trip by enjoying a variety of experiences at the resort. The live music along with the games on the Harvest Patio is a great way for all to have fun, especially since the live music is offered six days a week (Wednesday is the only exception). The weather has been fantastic this summer, so the pool has been a popular spot for our guests to relax and soak in the sun. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I never complain but this was really disappointing.
Summary: Certain parts of the hotel were run to satisfaction but the food/bev service was beyond deplorable.  Waiters took 30 mins to come over to get an order, food took as long as two hours to get delivered in one circumstance.  Food quality was poor when factoring in room cost per night.  I don't mind paying over $1000/nt for a room but expect it to be up to par.  If I paid $150 night for this hotel room, I would have felt value in their service but paying $1300+ per night for a two bedroom, you expect more.  Next time we are going to the Ritz Carlton down the street for half the cost and quadruple the value. I never write reviews but was so severely disappointed and felt so ripped off, I am voicing my opinion.  Many great options in the area.  Ritz, Montage, Surf and Sand (great
Manager Response: Blake J,  Thank you for the feedback. We apologize that our standards were not delivered during your stay and can understand your disappointment. Our Director of Food & Beverage will be connecting with you shortly to discuss your experience and your feedback has been passed along to our Executive Team as your experience was not acceptable.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB

Summary: Rooms were spotless, tastefully decorated and had loads of space. The staff were polite, friendly and attentive, even better than the high standards you would expect from top US hotels. 5 minutes walk from a beautiful beach and an easy stroll into town. Facilities were excellent and despite staying for busy I managed to chill out pretty quickly. Highly recommend it!
Manager Response: DfatRodge,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The canyon provides a naturally peaceful environment to relax and we are glad that you got to enjoy that experience. Like you mentioned, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. The resort does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access and in close proximity to downtown. Our team works hard to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The resort location and the scenery are very beautiful—stunning in places, however; the cost for a night stay is very expensive for what I got as far as cleanliness and amenities. I suspect that the cleanliness issue in my particular room was kind of a fluke, nonetheless; a bit disappointing. The service was very good, and everyone was friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: StellasW6967DB,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the scenery of the surrounding canyon and the service that our team provided. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the cleanliness of your room. I would like to discuss this with you further. Can you please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We really enjoyed staying here. We were a family of 6 and fit comfortably in 2 bedroom cottage. Only thing I would've liked to have seen was a larger refrigerator, coffee pot for a family, a small sink and plates and utensils.  I was told there was a small kitchenette and dining area so we imagined that there would  be some of this.
Manager Response: 261alfonsoa,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. The quiet and peaceful nature of the canyon is a great break from the normal hustle and bustle. The Cottage Two Bedroom suites are very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. Unfortunately, none of the accommodations besides The Treehouse have a kitchenette. We apologize if any miscommunication occurred.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Short stay at the Ranch at Laguna Beach
Summary: It is a very cozy place hidden in the canyons right off the shore of Laguna Beach.  Great romantic get away.  The golf course has 9 holes, small but looks very fun.  Don't expect the golf course to be a full 18, par 72.  Staffs are very friendly.
Manager Response: Mvs813,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a romantic getaway at the resort. Ben Brown's Golf Course is friendly to those of all ages and skill levels, plus it offers exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not available at other areas of the property. Our team works hard to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a company sponsored dinner. What a view!. Breathtaking. They have a golf course which must be treat to play on with all those views. It's hard to cook for 200 people, so I will not comment on the food. It was ok.
Manager Response: ScootersCrew,  Thank you for choosing to dine with us. The view of the surrounding scenery definitely enhances the ambiance. Like you mentioned, the golf course offers exclusive views of the creek and the canyon that are not available from other areas at the resort. The deer also like to greet our golfers. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: From check in to check out was a great experience. Lovely staff. Laid by the pool, had a spa treatment and take out breakfast overlooking the misty canyon. Beautiful time spent there. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: MichelledH310HU,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you had a great experience at the resort. You definitely made the most of your time at the property. Laying by the pool, enjoying a spa treatment at Sycamore Spa and eating breakfast overlooking the canyon at Harvest Restaurant all sound like great ways to relax in paradise. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a blast at this truly unique property. Tucked into a beautiful canyon just across the street from Aliso Beach. You can't find a better experience in Laguna. You can be off the grid (literally as cell service on existent) or have total access to everything in a matter of steps. Amazing staff, food and overall experience. The bed was super comfy and room decor was really well done. Overall great experience for the family. We will be back.
Manager Response: Kenyonrob,  We are thrilled to hear that you had a blast at the resort. Like you mentioned, the canyon provides a different perspective of Laguna Beach through unique experiences and is a matter of steps to total access. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We loved our stay at The Ranch! Everyone was very kind and accommodating-especially with our young daughter. The location offered a very unique experience while still being minutes from the beach and action. We hope to visit again one day!!
Manager Response: Heather L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our team works hard to make our guests feel at home and like family through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. We hope that you can visit again one day too!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We weren't sure what it would be like to go to the beach but not be on or able to see the ocean. At The Ranch, you don't need it. You are close enough, but not in the middle of the commotion. It is a destination hotel and one I would be happy to never leave.
Manager Response: Tracey S,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access. The off-the-beaten-path vibe of the canyon allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Most Enjoyable Stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach
Summary: This resort is off the beaten path and considering how crowded and noisy it is in Laguna Beach in the summer, The Ranch was a welcome respite! We were given an upgraded room upon checking in. The king size bed was very comfortable and once that comforter was pulled up around you it was easy to fall asleep. They have a rule about noise and its pretty quiet and peaceful in this canyon. We had a good size flat screen TV, a couch and table with chairs for 4. They provided a very comfortable robe. The bathroom amenities were nice. We were told that all rooms have showers. The double sink was separate from the shower/toilet area making getting ready more efficient. We ate at Harvest Restaurant three times during our visit for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Excellent meals and very good
Manager Response: MsMgmt,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us.
