Like you mentioned, our coastal canyon resort offers a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. The quiet and peaceful nature of the canyon allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation. The dual vanities are definitely very convenient when getting ready. The crab cakes at Harvest Restaurant sound like a delicious choice. Please accept our apologizes regarding the housekeeping service on your first day. We can understand how this was inconvenient for you. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Quiet in the Midst of Busy Laguna Beach
Summary: I was surprised at the look of the resort when I entered. Very low key, family friendly in a "camp" sort of way. The room was lovely but I found the buildings looking like a motel.The pool was nice but bartenders should have been on the lookout for debris to pick up and get rid of used towels instead of speaking to one another under the covered bar. The main building is lovely and food very good but service needed a bit tweaking even though everyone was polite and nice. If you want to go into town you must have a car or order an uber. We also used the free trolleys. The beach is a 10 minute walk or you can be driven down by golfcarts. This resort was expensive and I expected it to be  a bit more refined in its service.
Manager Response: Beth B,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. The complimentary summer trolley is a wonderful way to enjoy a variety of experiences along the 7 miles of coastline and we are glad that you took advantage of it. Guest feedback is valuable to the improvement of our operations and we thank you for providing it.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a GEM located in Laguna Beach!  I've been to Laguna at minimum a zillion times and this experience was so different, yet so AWESOME!  So many favorite things about this property, but the Happy Hour Live Music outside on the patio rates pretty darn high!  A nice change as the property is settled into a beautiful canyon and the rooms are just gorgeous!    Thank you for ensuring I made the right choice when determining my BDAY GETAWAY!!!  We will be back!
Manager Response: Bdaygirl2017,  Thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with a stay at the resort. The live music is such a wonderful way to relax and enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the surrounding nature. Live music is now offered six days a week (Wednesday is the exception). Our team works hard to anticipate the needs of our guests through personalized service to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories and it is wonderful to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Chose the raunch as they had a great kids club. This turned out to be completely true, my 9 year old that is bored almost instantly had the best time and was always happy. Food was great and the setting was lovely. Only Moments form the Beach if you do want the sea.
Manager Response: P5010KXdonc,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access. It is wonderful to hear that your 9 year old enjoyed the Junior Rangers program. The program is very educational as the kids to learn about the surrounding canyon environment. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were so pleased when we arrived at The Ranch in Laguna Beach. It was like stepping into a peaceful retreat.  The staff were friendly and helpful. Golf cart rides to and from your room are offered. When we were going to the Pageant of the Masters the first night, the trolley was not available so an Uber ride  was provided to and from. You will love this place; beautiful room; restaurant excellent; pool area relaxing and if you play golf- perfect setting against the hills.
Manager Response: ThomasdV7913MM,  Congrats on your 48th anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. It is great to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The room sizes in our accommodations are what brings us there as a family. It is spacious and nice location. Pool side is not great with hours and getting beverages, you can't get ice for your room in off hours, but yet you have an ice bucket??? Dinner chef was not on top of the quality that should be with the facility and opportunity.
Manager Response: Tessam874,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The spacious layouts of the accommodations are very popular among our guests. Our guest services team does offer 24 hour assistance and is always willing to help with requests such as getting ice for your room. I would like to discuss your stay with you further. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A lovely place to visit if you dont' mind being over run by event activities.
Summary: We enjoyed our stay for the most part. However we were disappointed that there was no screen door so we could enjoy the fresh air. Our room was lovely and clean however there was no comfortable seating at the desk or firm pillows to sit on the bed to watch television. Food was ok but lacking in side dishes. Service all around pleasant and helpful. The rating chart changed one of our ratings from poor to excellent so I did not use it.
Manager Response: M4623YLjackb,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. We are glad to hear that our team provided good service during your visit. I would like to discuss your stay with you further. Can you please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My GF and I wanted to get away for my birthday weekend, but I didn't feel like going far, but wanted something different from the beachy type places that we were already living so close to. Then, just browsing every place within decent driving distance, the Ranch at Laguna Beach popped up and looked really interesting. It sounded good, it looked good, and I found a decent deal on the rates considering it was the busy summer season.....so a booking I did go!  Wow! We were so awed and excited when we first drove up the driveway off the PCH as it felt like we had just left the coast and entered some inland sanctuary.....it reminded me so much of a ranch spa resort in Carmel CA that my family and I had visited a few years ago.....just a bit smaller in scale. What a beautiful little
Manager Response: TravellingBanana628,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of your birthday. We appreciate that you took the time to provide detailed feedback on your experience at the resort. It sounds like you definitely made the most out of your stay in the canyon. Like you mentioned, our team works hard to anticipate the needs of our guests to ensure an enjoyable stay filled with memories. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed for two nights with our 2 kids. Wonderful experience. The food, the kids camp, the location we loved it all. The hotel rooms are beautiful and comfortable. The kids had tons of fun at the pool and at the daily Ranger Camp. There is a free shuttle that takes you everywhere in Laguna Beach. This was so convenient. I truly recommend this resort... also deers show up in the evening on the golf course
Manager Response: Mona S,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for two nights. The Junior Rangers program is a wonderful way for the kids to learn about the surrounding canyon environment and we are thrilled to hear how much your kids enjoyed their experience. The deer love to greet our guests, so it is great to hear that they greeted you. The complimentary summer trolley is so convenient for our guests to enjoy all of the fun that Laguna Beach has to offer. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The ranch was exactly what we were looking for after a week of family wedding celebrations.  Very relaxing and easy going.  Our day consisted of breakfast in the Harvest restaurant followed by reading by the pool.  There is a trolley that goes into town that we used for lunches and happy hour.  Overall a great experience.
Manager Response: ChristophergP1672WA,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed some quiet relaxation in the canyon. The weather has been fantastic this summer, so reading by the pool sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. The complimentary summer trolley is a wonderful way to enjoy a variety of experiences along the 7 miles of coastline. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is an amazing experience for either business or pleasure.  The staff is friendly and helpful and the facilities and surroundings are once in a lifetime unique.  My family and I would live here if we could!  Robert Gerard
Manager Response: Surfb4work,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort in a canyon while being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience worldwide. The opportunity to live within a canyon environment would be difficult to pass up. We hope that this was the first of many visits to our resort. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We just spent two nights at this beautiful property.  We loved how easy it was to walk from the room to the pool to the main building.  The rooms were very large and clean as was the rest of the property.  Everything was decorated beautifully.  Because we have two young kids we arrived early (around 12:15pm) to swim and checked in at the front desk to have them give us a call whenever our room was ready. We arrived with the understanding that there was a 4pm check-in.  Unfortunately, our room (different from the one we were supposed to have on the bottom floor) wasn't ready until 4:45pm.  This ended up being quite stressful and inconvenient as we had to all (2 kids included) get showered after swimming and dressed up to be ready for an event right after our 5:30pm dinner
Manager Response: Marisa C,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. We apologize for the inconveniences that you had during the check-in and dining experiences as they clearly do not meet our standards. I would like to discuss these with you further. If you could please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com, I would greatly appreciate it.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Quiet, serene mix of ocean and canyon living. Loved the salt water pool, the way the hotel is situated off PCH but within ocean access. I'd stay here again. I hear the restaurant and the wine list is very good.
Manager Response: Darren D,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is secluded within a peaceful blend of canyon and sea. The saline pool and hot tub are a popular spot to soak in the sun among our guests and we are glad to hear that you took advantage of that experience. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great quick getaway. Felt we were really "out of town" and not just an hour away. A hidden gem! Secretly luxurious. Low key but close enough to town/beach so best of both worlds. Will absolutely go back!
Manager Response: Andrea S,  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a Mother/Daughter trip at the resort. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access and being in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. The location of the resort truly provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of the best places that I've stayed in Laguna so far I look forward to returning to this establishment I felt comfortable and relaxed It was all so quiet and not too busy over  crowded like some places thank you so much for the hospitality
Manager Response: Jesser785,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, we invite our guests to step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. The blend of rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe is a great way to enjoy rest and relaxation. We love to hear that you found your home for future Laguna Beach trips and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fabulous resort and steps from all the Laguna Beach action! The service, food and overall atmosphere was beautiful. Sitting out by the fire pit with a glass of wine was very relaxing. Our dinners were delicious and the service was great. I loved relaxing by the pool and the the spa facial I had was just perfect. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Roseann M,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a Laguna Beach retreat at our resort. Sitting out by the fire pits, lounging at the pool and getting a spa facial all are great ways to relax in paradise. Like you mentioned, the resort provides an off-the-beaten path adventure that is steps from all of the action. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch at Laguna Beach - yes!
Summary: I stayed here for a two night stay for business.  Room was clean - grounds are lovely - I wish I could have stayed longer to enjoy more amenities.  I've spoken to my husband about taking a weekend getaway here - after seeing my photos of the room/grounds, he agreed!
Manager Response: Kelley T,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for two nights during your business trip. It is wonderful to hear that you have already decided to come back for a leisure vacation. Laguna Beach and the local area has so much to offer. We look forward to your weekend getaway with your husband.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice place to stay but it can misleading as most rooms are single story so you would expect it to be almost noise free, but the walls are paper thin to the extreme.  A very loud family stayed next door and would arrive to their room at midnight and scream and run around for hours.  Also, the serving staff seems to really hate their jobs and an older lady commented when we didn't order more food off the menu.  You can cut the tension with a knife when they come up to you, especially after waiting a long time for them to even come up to you.
Manager Response: JulieKiggins,  We are sorry about the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay. Regarding the noise issue, we are not sure if you reached out to the Front Desk, but our security and guest services teams would definitely assist in handling this situation if made aware. Our management team would like to discuss your stay further with you, especially with your feedback on the service you received in the restaurant. Can you please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com?  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautilful spot to hide away with the one you love. Very comfotable room,smelled good and very clean.Very roomy shower with great water pressure. Delicious dinner and breakast with fast service. Great 9 hole course beautiful senery, loved the wild deer roaming around.
Manager Response: JimmP2355CS,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a romantic getaway in the canyon. The deer love to greet our guests, so we are glad that you got to see them. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Pleasant time at Laguna Beach Resort
Summary: Wonderful visit at this resort. The only complaint is that I had various small insects in my room. I'm assuming it was because of the location of my room in relation to the bushes. I believe I killed over 5 small insects during my stay. Also, with the resort being located in the canyon, cell phone coverage was a problem. Beyond this, I loved my stay.
Manager Response: Desdadoc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The resort does perform routine pest control maintenance throughout the year and we apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced. We will ensure that the room that you stayed in is thoroughly inspected. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, but noise policy needs improvement.
Summary: Everything about the hotel was beautiful. The only issue I had was that there was a crew taking down a wedding way past 1:30 am. I could hear crew members talking, loading the truck, using the lift in the truck... It was so loud. After I finally fell asleep, I was woken up around 7:30 am by a cement truck that was fillings little walkway behind the lobby/valet area.  I felt like that was unacceptable of the hotel to not manage and maintain a suitable noise level for the guests resting in nearby rooms. Hopefully they will look into this matter since most guests go to hotels for some r and r.
Manager Response: Jane K,  We appreciate that you took the time to provide feedback as this helps us improve our operations. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced. I will pass this along to our Executive Management team as guests should enjoy rest and relaxation during their stay. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com as I would like to discuss this with you further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing experience at The Ranch at LB.
Summary: Beautiful location that feels secluded even though you are in the heart of Laguna Beach.  The staff was was fantastic and always had a smile.   The grounds were really well maintained and always had fun activities and live music on the weekend.   The property is quarter mile off the beach in a secluded valley but it was a pleasant surprise when they offered to drive us to the beach and lend us beach chairs. My wife and I went for a couples weekend but we think our kids would love it too.  We will definitely be going back.
Manager Response: Trevor B,  We are thrilled that you had an amazing experience at the resort. Our team works hard to ensure each guest takes home lifelong memories through personalized service. It is great to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. The live music is such a wonderful way to relax and enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the surrounding nature. Live music is now offered six days a week (Wednesday is the exception). We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Overall excellent except for one major glitch. Great location and perfect weather. Family fun in the pool and spa. Food was excellent in the Harvest and service was good except for one glitch. Great not to valet the car, also.
Manager Response: 773wardt,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. The weather has been fantastic this summer, making the pool and beach two popular spots for our guests to soak in the sun. The complimentary self-parking in the guestrooms area makes it easy for our guests to have access to their vehicles to go explore all that Laguna Beach has to offer. Please accept our apologizes regarding the glitch. We would like to get your feedback on what occurred. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We love this get away from the hustle and bustle of Laguna Beach that is just steps away in beautiful Ben Brown's Canyon at the "Ranch at Laguna Beach". This location is nostalgic to us. The rooms are very comfortable and are tastefully decorated. We love the family feel we get from the staff. This is a home away from home for us. Thank you!
Manager Response: 869kgirl,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers such a relaxing vibe that allows our guests to cherish the off-the-beaten path experience and unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Our team works hard to make our guests feel at home and like family. We are glad that you sensed that during your stay. Regarding the design of the guestrooms, our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance with decor that reflects the culture of the local area. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I loved this hotel and location. Kinda off the beaten path which I appreciate. Service Excellent. Rooms excellent. They provided chairs umbrellas and towels for beach which was great. Also provided a ride to underpass which was nice.
Manager Response: W2420VFthomasc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, our resort invites guests to get caught up in the world of a Laguna local that’s off the beaten path in every sense. The weather has been fantastic this summer, so the beach is a great place to relax. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was a trip for my husbands birthday. It was very nice. The staff were very friendly and the resort was wonderful. They had EV chargers for guests and we charged our car at night. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Loriefuntrave,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of your husband's birthday. It is wonderful to hear that the celebration was nice and relaxing. We are glad that you were able to utilize the electric car chargers to assist with your travel during the stay. The resort has both a Tesla charger and universal charger that can accommodate a range of electric vehicles that our guests drive. We hope that you choose to stay with us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of the better hotels !!! Excellent service and very helpfull staff Nice short golfcourse with shop and  fine pool and fitness  Good food and bar Clean rooms and linnen Uber and trolley services Worth a longer visit!
Manager Response: Hans S,  We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your summer vacation in Laguna Beach. It sounds like you enjoyed a lot of activities on property and in the city. The trolley is such a great way to take advantage of the variety of experiences along with 7 miles of coastline. The golf course provides exclusive views of both the canyon and creek that are not available from other areas of the resort. We would love to have you back for a longer visit too!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location - canyon views abound.  The rooms were high-end and spacious.  Restaurant food was delicious.  Great 9-hole course and in very close proximity to the hotel.  Feels more like a hotel for adults than family.
Manager Response: EricsO1663DT,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. The Harvest Restaurant menu changes with each season, so we invite you to come back and try the new offerings once they are introduced. Our daily programming  provides a great experience for all guests to enjoy as we have a mix of travelers that stay at the resort. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Reasonable stay,  could be improved in many ways. Having only one pool makes for quiet time at the pool quite challenging, would be great to have a separate adult pool perhaps by the spa. Also the lack of parking spaces by the rooms made for the need to valet the car each time which was not optimal
Manager Response: Meng L,  Thank you for providing feedback on your experience at the resort. We understand that our guests cherish the quiet nature of the canyon. However, especially during the summer, the resort is very popular among families. We realize that valet parking is not always optimal when self-parking is no longer available, but valet service is complimentary to all guests. I can be reached directly at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is like a little piece of heaven in the hustle and bustle of Laguna Beach. The restaurant is gorgeous inside and has beautiful views of the canyon from the patio and large windows. Our hotel room was perfect in every way...highly recommend!
Manager Response: Smilnirish3,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. The canyon offers such a relaxing vibe that allows guests to cherish the off-the-beaten path experience and unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Like you mentioned, the view of canyon from your table enhances the ambiance in Harvest Restaurant. The natural light that comes in through the windows also adds a special element to the experience. Thank you for the recommendation to others and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Property is beautiful needs a few details worked out - hooks to hang towels, screen doors to provide ventilation from patios, housekeeping forgot to provide service to one of our rooms until we called the front desk at 5:00 p.m. (we had been out of the room all day).  Very nice to have a trolley stop at the resort and to have very friendly valets to drive you to your room, down to the Coast Highway, etc.  Restaurant was a step above your normal hotel dining experience - the menu is somewhat limited so if you are eating there over several days you might wish for a few more options.  Overall definitely a winner in the Laguna area - and would highly recommend the property for either a couples adventure or taking a family.
Manager Response: CarolinebU527ZE,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. We appreciate the feedback as it helps us improve our operations. Please accept our apologizes regarding the housekeeping service. The trolley is a great way to enjoy a variety of experiences up and down the coast and we are glad that you took advantage of it. Harvest Restaurant is very popular among the local community and resort guests and it is wonderful to hear that it exceeded your expectations. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location away from the crowds. Very quiet. Comfy beds and very clean. You won't be disappointed. I'm typing more words now because for some reason Trip Advisor has a 200 character minimum for reviews.
Manager Response: S1749VRwhome,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a nice couples getaway in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the resort has an off-the-beaten path vibe that is away from the crowds of downtown Laguna Beach. It is a great place to relax and enjoy nature. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I needed a getaway for our 5-year anniversary and found the Ranch at Laguna Beach to be the perfect spot.  The rooms are super nice and clean.  The beds are amazing and the bathrooms are spacious and well appointed.  The staff was incredibly friendly and informative -   Make sure you golf here and enjoy the live music on the deck at sunset!!  We HIGHLY recommend this place -
Manager Response: JamiemN621FI,  Congrats on your 5 year anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. The live music is such a wonderful way to relax and enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the surrounding nature. Live music is now offered six days a week (Wednesday is the exception). Regarding the guestrooms, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Our team wants our guests to experience an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by designing the rooms with decor that portrays the culture of the local area. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel is in a beautiful canyon setting.  The rooms have bland exterior but are lovely inside, very modern and plush.  2 bed cottages are perfect for families.  Breakfast at the hotel is good (extra cost).  I would recommend the 5 minute drive (or UBER) into Laguna centre where there is a wide choice of restaurants.  Good beach close by 15 min walk or golf buggy lift and 5 min walk.
Manager Response: Family10000,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are popular among families due to the spacious two-story layout. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access and being in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of a variety of experiences along the coast. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay so much. The property is beautiful, the staff is friendly and professional, the room was nice, clean & comfy. We enjoyed the restaurant and Ben's pantry. My husband played golf twice and I enjoyed a strawberry smoothie by the pool.
Manager Response: 900shailendras,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you loved it. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of a variety of amenities at the resort. Hopefully the familiarity of the golf course after two rounds led to some low scores and birdies on his scorecard. Enjoying a smoothie by the pool sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I just celebrated our 18th anniversary at The Ranch and had a spectacular time.  This resort is special and we strongly sing its praises.  We have stayed at the Montage and found The Ranch more suited to our tastes,  Very relaxed and environmentally sensitive. Great place to relax and unwind.  We both used the spa and that too was a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Michael G,  Congrats on your 18th anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. Like you mentioned, our guests like that the resort offers a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Our guests are able to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. A treatment at Sycamore Spa is a wonderful way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch - Great resort in Laguna
Summary: This is an excellent resort hidden in Laguna Beach. Very secluded and peaceful. We enjoyed the resort, golf, spa, and dinner. I would highly recommend the Ranch Resort and plan to return in the near future.
Manager Response: Vantrain,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you took advantage of Harvest Restaurant, Ben Brown's Golf Course and Sycamore Spa. Each of them offers their own special touch of enjoying your time in the canyon. Hopefully the deer greeted you on the golf course. Harvest Restaurant offers seasonal menus, so we encourage you to come back and try the new offerings once they are introduced. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: So, so. Ho Hum. Nice, not great. The people working at The Ranch were very good.  The service in the restaurant was painfully slow. The food was good.  The common area outside was crowded in the evenings with families. A small and uncomfortable space at night it is quiet and enjoyable in the morning. You'll like it, just not likely love it. The value for the price is not there.
Manager Response: MichaelbS4597SU,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback on your experience at the resort. During the summer, Laguna Beach is a very popular destination for families. We do provide added value as all guests enjoy complimentary valet parking and Wi-Fi, plus we do not charge a resort fee. The resort also offers daily programming that is family friendly. We would love to speak with you further regarding your stay. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: My favorite on our California road trip
Summary: I wish I had stayed more than 3 nights on this fabulous property on our 23-days road trip from San Francisco to San Diego. Our family of 5 stayed at the Two bedroom suite: 2 bedrooms with queen beds on the first floor and a mini-kitchen and a sofa sleeper on the ground floor. I especially liked the walk-in closets, great to have enough space to unpack all our clothes from the suitcases. Only a short walk to the beach, (or if you are lazy someone will drive you). The pool area was very relaxed and nice. Loved the free Wi-Fi, free parking and the small fitness center, and a short drive away you will find Laguna's HIP-district with lots of cute shops and restaurants. The free shuttle-bus stopped by the hotel every 20 minutes and was a fun option to get to the main streets of Laguna
Manager Response: Lenkre,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for three nights during your 23 day road trip. We can only imagine all of the wonderful sights and sounds you experienced from San Francisco to San Diego. We are thrilled to hear that our resort was your favorite stay during your trip. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access and being in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7 miles of coastline and it sounds like you took advantage of enjoying a variety of experiences. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We went with our active one year old son and had a great time! There was a lot of space for everyone and the service was excellent. We were able to arrange a spa visit and childcare with the help of the front desk and they were very helpful any time we needed to get around town. I would definitely go back!
Manager Response: X9173MNkatiac,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works hard to treat every guest like family through personalized service and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. A treatment at Sycamore Spa is a wonderful way to relax in paradise and we are glad that you took advantage of it. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed the night of my son's wedding.  The grounds were beautiful and our room overlooked the wedding venue on the golf course. We stayed in a 2-bedroom and there was plenty of room for all of us.  There is no cell connection there, which posed a bit of a problem for communication, but did not interfere with our enjoyment of the room.  We did not have a chance to use any of the other services, as we were there only to attend the wedding.
Manager Response: 135carolynd,  Congrats for the wedding of your son and thank you for choosing to stay with us. The canyon wall and surrounding scenery provides a magnificent backdrop for a special occasion. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. You will have to come back and stay with us again so you can experience all that the resort and Laguna Beach has to offer.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Recently renovated it is an oasis.  My family enjoyed the two bedroom apartment facing the pool.  Patio and balcony and lovely fabrics and furnishings.  Golf was great and our son loved his lesson with a pro.  Only word of advice is that the pool is not adult only...lots of kids.  Dinner at Harvest was a terrific surprise.  Easy beach access too.
Manager Response: Burnsva,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing visit. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. Regarding the furnishings, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. When designing the guestrooms, our team wanted the decor to portray an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by reflecting the culture of the local area. It is wonderful to hear how much your son enjoyed his golf lesson with one of our instructors. The course is fun for those of all ages and skill levels. Over the summer we do have a lot of families staying with us, so there are definitely kids in the pool and other areas. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: great place except for the food at the Harvest Restaurant
Summary: food at the Harvest was average at best.  avoid eating there and instead take the shuttle and have a great dinner in downtown Laguna Beach (so many good restaurants there).  room was a 5,  beautiful and clean
Manager Response: 317byronk,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation in the canyon. The decor reflects the culture of Laguna Beach as we want our guests to experience an authentic ambiance of the local area. We are sorry to hear about your experience at Harvest Restaurant. The restaurant is very popular among our guests and locals, so we would love to receive further feedback from you. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Booked this room for my family visiting from New Zealand... we all loved it.  Wonderful secluded feeling... great food... beautiful views... When you drive into the hotel, you almost have a feeling of finding a secret 'lost world'.... Cannot wait to stay again !
Manager Response: Erichr662,  Thank you for choosing our resort for your family visiting from New Zealand. It is wonderful to hear that you loved being secluded within a peaceful blend of canyon and sea. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a wonderful time. The staff and food were terrific!! Try the Harvest Burger the best I've ever had!! Great area to have coffee outside in the morning. Terrific spa. Great location to everything. A must visit!
Manager Response: S9744VBmelissad,  We are thrilled to hear that you had a wonderful time at the resort. We agree, the Harvest Burger is delicious. Enjoying a morning coffee on the patio while soaking in views of the canyon sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We absolutely enjoyed this property. It's in middle of everything and feels like you are miles away. Can't wait to go back. The rooms are very comfortable and the shower was very powerful and nice. We loved the grounds and enjoyed taking our wine out there late at night and enjoy the scenery.
Manager Response: Afi K,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path location of the resort. Like you mentioned, the location of the resort provides a different perspective of a coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon being so close to the ocean is such a rare experience along the California coast. Enjoying a drink while soaking in views of the surrounding canyon scenery sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The bed was so comfortable , the food was absolutely outstanding ,pool was clean and having a real deep end is a bonus . The daily cleaning of the rooms and the thoughtful evening bedside chocolates were both outstanding  Thanks for a great stay,friendly people and perfect location.
Manager Response: Patrick W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled that you had a great stay in the canyon. The weather has been fantastic this summer so far, so the pool has definitely been a popular place to cool off and relax. It sounds like you were here on business, so hopefully you can return soon for a leisure vacation and enjoy all that Laguna Beach has to offer.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful place to stay.  The staff and setting are very inviting for a nice relaxing vacation. The rooms are larger giving you the feeling that you are home.  The grounds are beautiful and close to many fun activities.
Manager Response: John Z,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and thrilled that you enjoyed a nice relaxing vacation in the canyon. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family with personalized service and it is wonderful to hear that an inviting experience was provided. It sounds like you took advantage of the variety of fun activities at the resort and along the 7 miles of Laguna Beach coastline. The weather has been fantastic this summer so far and has allowed for some great outdoor adventures in town for our guests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is truly a destination resort tucked away in its own canyon with beach access and a little 9 hole golf course and spa. We loved the room decor and the huge salt water pool. Harvest restaurant is solid and has a beautiful setting. Ranch staff are very friendly. The only issue we had was they do not have enough beach umbrellas and chairs to accommodate all of the guests. Plan ahead to get your hands on them early when you arrive. Cell coverage is really bad and wifi is spotty, but on vacation that is kind of nice.
Manager Response: Roger H,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. When designing the guestrooms, our team wanted to portray an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance with decor that reflects the culture of the local area. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while also taking advantage of the beach access at Aliso Beach. Harvest Restaurant will be offering seasonal menus, so we invite you to come back and try the new offerings once they are introduced.  We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the inventory of umbrellas and beach chairs. Thank you for letting us know as it helps us improve our operations. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well.   Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place looks a lot better on the website than it is in actuality. For the cost of the room, it should have been a lot bigger and a lot nicer. The grounds are not as vast or nice... everything feels close to a parking lot. The food at the restaurant was over-spiced, poorly seasoned, too large of portions and felt like it was trying too hard. Not at all classy and WAY overpriced. I was really really disappointed overall and felt like I was ripped-off.
Manager Response: Mimi C,  We are sorry to that you did not enjoy your experience. The entire resort property is 87 acres, so we are not sure how it looks bigger online than in reality as we are very transparent about the size and other details regarding the resort on our website. We would like to speak with you further regarding your experience so we can understand your thoughts and feelings about the property in more detail. Please reach out to me directly at sean@ranchlb.com.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: WOW!  We felt like we were on our own private island in a canyon of gorgeous greenery.  We were actually only .25 miles from the beach and LOVED that we could escape the crowded parts of Laguna and slip away to a super peaceful retreat each night!  Amazing property, employees, resort and experience!  We'll be back soon and THANK YOU to everyone at the Ranch for such a wonderful vacation!!!!
Manager Response: Babsgolden,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort is located on an iconic piece of land where the canyon and sea meet. The off-the-beaten path vibe provides such a different perspective of a coastal vacation where you can enjoy the beach and other offerings, but relax in peaceful nature away from the crowds. Our team works hard to treat each guest like family and it is wonderful to hear that the service you received enhanced your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Love this hotel but the service was super slow. Rooms were super cute and love the location. Housekeeping and restaurant are super slow in service. Room service was ok and so was the restaurant. My husband had a great steak but everything else was bland.
Manager Response: Melanie R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the location of the resort. Our guests enjoy a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. Like you mentioned, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We apologize for the level of service you received during your stay as that does not live up to our high standards. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: One of the best places we stayed!!!
Summary: This hotel is fully renovated, rooms are very clean, bed is very comfy. They have happy hour every day with live music outside with fire pits. Housekeeping comes twice a day ,amazing!! Pool open 24 hours , we went to hot tub during night under the stars:)) . Highly reccomend it and we definitely will come back here !!!!!
Manager Response: Artur K,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. When designing the guestrooms, our team wanted to portray an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance with decor that reflects the culture of the local area. Like you mentioned, we offer Happy Hour daily and live music six days a week (Wednesday is the exception). Happy Hour is a great way for guests to enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the canyon. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Excellent service and dinning, great for events
Summary: My wife and I held our wedding ceremony and reception dinner at The Ranch at Laguna Beach.  We could not be happier.  The staff were wonderful.  The catering and event planning was excellent (thank you Jayme Vainer).  Most of our family stayed at The Ranch and found the accommodations to be excellent.
Manager Response: Michael R,  Congrats on your special day and thank you for choosing to host your wedding ceremony and reception at our resort. We wish you the best during this new chapter in your life. Our team understands how important this special occasion is and works hard to provide a memorable experience. It is wonderful to hear that your family and guests enjoyed their overnight accommodations in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Best hotel to avoid the crowds and madness of touristy Laguna Beach
Summary: Being a former Laguna resident, I was conscious of the rather extensive transformation of the Ranch  (it was definitely tired and in need of remodeling and upgrading) into its current incarnation. I hadn't stayed there as a guest or spent any time there until recently, and i have to say I am extremely impressed.  The Ranch is situated in a unique and special coastal canyon setting, just a few hundred yards inland from the Aliso Beach county park. It feels pleasantly removed from the often crowded and chaotic tourist hubbub of Laguna, yet all the attractions of the town are easily accessible, especially with the free city shuttle that stops right in front of the hotel (at least during summer). I'm sure some visitors would prefer to be right on the sand (and would be willing to
Manager Response: Murray9000,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the support during the transformation of the resort. When designing the re-imagined resort, our team wanted to blend the past with today through the decor and other aspects of the property. Aliso Canyon has some great history before the development of the resort. In 1871, the Thurston family established a 152-acre homestead on the area that is now the golf course. Our guests enjoy a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. The topography of the surrounding canyon environment is so rare along the California coast. Like you mentioned, all guests receive added value with Complimentary Valet/Self-Parking & Wi-Fi, plus No Resort Fee. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Family trip to Laguna Beach, didn't know anything about the area or where to stay... Googled hotels & found The Ranch.  Pleasantly surprised!  Beautiful surroundings, friendly staff and right across from gorgeous Laguna - perfect!
Manager Response: Dino D,  We are stoked that you had such a lovely time in the canyon at our resort. Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your first trip to Laguna Beach. It sounds like you had a wonderful first impression of our coastal city. Our team works very hard to ensure all of our guests have a personalized experience so that way they can take home lifelong memories. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: beautiful location  peaceful. .I would ask for extra towels in the bathroom!  bed was a little soft but comfortable. I would definitely go there again.  close to the beach but very quiet and secluded feeling.
Manager Response: GigiLaub,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the off-the-beaten path vibe of the canyon. The canyon provides such a peaceful feeling that allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A thoroughly enjoyable stay at the ranch. The relaxed yet professional environment provided the perfect contracts to a busy day in the office. The golf course was a welcome feature for an evening round.
Manager Response: StuartsU2297MM,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business trip. Like you mentioned, the golf course is a great way to relax and enjoy the peaceful nature of the canyon after a day of work. Hopefully you can join us again soon for a vacation as Laguna Beach has so much to offer.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We got married here! The staff was amazing and so kind. They always went above and beyond for us. They helped make our wedding so magical!!!  I highly recommend this place as a wonderful getaway or just to even have a coffee. We cannot wait to come back!
Manager Response: 147leahj,  Congrats on your special day and thank you for choosing to host your wedding at our resort! We wish you the best during this new chapter in your life. Our team understands how important this special occasion is and works hard to provide a memorable experience. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We came up for the weekend and had a wonderful stay! The staff are so friendly and helpful!  The hotel is beautiful and is located in this gorgeous canyon across from the beach.  We stayed near the volleyball court and the room was super cute.  Comfy bed! The pool is nice - lots of families.  Not really a "party pool" if you're looking for that kinda of vibe.  The restaurant is excellent.  Really good food! We'll be back!!!
Manager Response: Courtneyo249,  We are stoked to hear about your wonderful stay at our resort and we thank you for choosing to spend it with us. When designing the guestrooms, our team wanted the decor to portray an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance by reflecting the local culture. The pool is a popular place for our guests to relax during the summer heat, especially since food and drink is available at the pool bar. It sounds like you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. The restaurant will be offering seasonal menus, so we encourage you to come back and try the new offerings once they are introduced. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location and professional and courteous staff.  Very serene vibe in the canyon - hard to believe you are so close to the traffic on PCH.  Creek Side Suite was roomy and comfortable.  Very much enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Marco R,  It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed a serene getaway in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the resort offers a fun, off-the-beaten path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. The Creekside Studio Suites are very popular among our guests due to the quiet location above the Aliso Creek that runs through the property. We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is spectacular.  The scenery stunning and the amenities were excellent.  Staff were extremely accommodating and worked hard to make our stay special. The only miss was the lack of adequate glasses, coffee and coffee cups for the size of the cottage and the number of people it was designed to sleep. It was frustrating to continually have to call the front desk to get these basic items sent over.
Manager Response: 994wesleyj,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works very hard to ensure that each guest receives a personalized experience in order to take home lifelong memories. Thank you for the feedback regarding the item inventory in your Cottage Two Bedroom Suite as it helps us improve our operations. We can understand your frustrations and please accept our apologizes.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: So pleased to have pick The Ranch for our first weekend staycation experience. It was the perfect adult playground. We utilized almost all that was offered at this quaint gem nestled in the canyon and had the pleasure of introducing The Ranch to our family and friends. Looking forward to another staycation excuse at The Ranch!
Manager Response: Julee N,  We are thrilled that you chose our resort for your first weekend staycation experience. It is great to hear how much you took advantage of the daily activities and programming. Your way of describing the resort as an adult playground is spot on as there is such a variety of experiences available each day. Thank you for introducing the property to your family and friends and be sure to bring them with you during your future visits. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna is a lovely property!  It welcomes you casually and easily and is the best of both worlds: quiet, poolside, golf and easy dining AND the bustle of Laguna and the beach.  It is a short walk to Aliso State beach OR the staff will take you and all you need in a golf cart to the pedestrian tunnel.  The free shuttle also comes right in to the property to pick you up if you just feel like leaving your car.  The parking is free and the layout of the rooms is lovely.  SO very quiet and peaceful.   We never heard any night noise so slept very soundly.  The bed was a dream and the provided robes wonderful to wear on our patio.   There is a fully equipped workout space-- it is small but no one was there so had it all to my self. The Harvest Restaurant has very good
Manager Response: Nancy N,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access and being in close proximity to downtown Laguna Beach. The off-the-beaten path vibe allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. The complimentary trolley is a great way to experience a variety of activities along the coast and we are thrilled that you took advantage of that. Live music is now offered six days a week (the exception is Wednesday) and is a great way to enjoy food & drink while soaking in views of the canyon. The topography of the surrounding canyon environment is so rare along the California Coast and it provides a natural quiet setting that attracts our guests. We are grateful that you tried a stay with us out too and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay by the beach in OC
Summary: It was my first time at this hotel and I can assure you the experience was phenomenal. I'm looking forward to my next visit to this hotel. The room was excellent. The service as outstanding. Valet was very helpful... No complaints.
Manager Response: 609clementeg,  We are stoked that you had a phenomenal experience during your first stay at our resort. The main experience that sets our resort apart from the others is that it offers a fun, off-the-beaten-path adventure that blends rustic wilderness with a cool coastal vibe. When designing the guestrooms and other facilities, our team wanted the decor to reflect an authentic Laguna Beach ambiance. It sounds like it was the first of many visits in the canyon and we are looking forward to your next visit too!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Staff here are really personable and helpful! Loved being tucked away in the canyon, away from bustle of highway 1. Beach was beautiful. Beware of strong surf. Things get a little lively when events are happening, but it seems that noise from events is shut down by 10PM
Manager Response: J8786AAemily,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team works really hard to ensure that each guest has a personalized experience and is treated like family. It is wonderful to hear that you cherished the off-the-beaten path experience which allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Aliso Beach is very popular due to it being family friendly with fire pits and a playground and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your time there. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Service rules at this secluded enclave off the Oscific Coast Highway in Laguna Beach. This property is especially appropriate if you don't plan to leave the ranch. The free Laguna town shuttle is hampered by dense area traffic and it's a long walk to town. So just stay put!
Manager Response: Todd C,  We are stoked to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your coastal vacation. The topography of the canyon is so rare along the California coast. It sounds like you made the most of your trip relaxing at the resort. The summer traffic in Laguna Beach can get very busy on weekends.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great getaway in South Laguna. Recently refurbished old country resort is now the best beach-close hotel in Southern California. Walk or get a golf-car ride to the beach; nine holes of fun executive-course golf in a gorgeous canyon; poolside bar. But: Nothing Vegas about it.
Manager Response: Lawrence W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the kind words regarding the reimagined design of the resort. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the golf course. The great thing about golfing at the resort is that it provides exclusive views of the canyon and creek that are not seen anywhere else on property. The walk to the beach is always a refreshing way to get some fresh air. Enjoying some food and drink from The Pond Pool Bar sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I really love this hotel it is a hidden gem.  I wish the room had a tub though as I have young kids.   It was a little pricey, but well worth the expenditure.  I also would recommend that the rooms are a but on the pricey side, but it is a beautiful place regardless.
Manager Response: 85kavitah,  It is wonderful to hear that you experienced an awesome staycation in the canyon. Our guests cherish the hidden gem vibe of the resort as the topography of the surrounding environment is so rare in a coastal setting. All of our guests receive added value with each stay including Complimentary Valet Parking & Wi-Fi, plus No Resort Fee. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great property--unless there is a wedding
Summary: This is a really fun getaway, the facilities are great, the rooms are spacious, the food good.  But be warned: if you happen to go when there is a wedding, you will have limited access to some of the things that make this place so wonderful (golf course closed early, social spaces unavailable during our stay on account of 3 weddings).  I'd recommend a mid-week visit.
Manager Response: VanessarU8521CT,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and love hearing about your fun getaway. It is understandable regarding your feedback about the weddings. The resort is a very popular destination for weddings during summer and we try our best to provide an excellent experience to all of our guests. Please accept our apologizes if the modified offerings were not communicated in advance. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful but not what we expected
Summary: First I have to start off by saying that it truly is beautiful and a wonderful location. The staff is also great. However, overall we were disappointed with our visit. We are locals and it was our first night away from our twin toddlers, so a nice and quiet atmosphere is what we were hoping for in the beautiful secluded location. While we were surprised to find out that there was a wedding that night which we have nothing against because it is a wonderful spot for a wedding BUT it was loud and we felt cornered to a small area of the hotel area. When I had searched online, I saw great sitting areas that we could enjoy our cocktails at while overlooking the landscapes but this was taken up by the wedding. The hotel is in a valley type location, so the wedding echoed and we could
Manager Response: SBee821,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is completely understandable that you travel to the resort wanting a peaceful and relaxing stay in the canyon. The resort is a popular destination for weddings, especially in the summer, but it should not take away from the high standards we set for a guest experience. We apologize for the lack of communication in advance regarding the weekend events prior to your arrival and for the inconveniences you experienced on property. I would like to speak with you further regarding your trip, so please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com. Please accept our sincere apologizes.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: There is no place like the Ranch! Seriously...where else can you stay in your own little beautifully decorated unit outfitted with a comfy bed, flat screen TV, small frig, microwave and Keurig coffee maker, lovely bath and a patio tucked away in a beautiful canyon. The grounds are amzing with beautiful drought-friendly plants and there is a sweet pool that is great for swimming and lounging. You can even order food and drinks at the pool. There's a spa and workout room, both of which take advantage of the natural setting and have open air views. We don't golf, but there's a lovely course for those who do. There's also a great restaurant that also offers great views. My husband is in a wheelchair and we got an accessible room which was great. My one issue is that the bed is
Manager Response: Bethk439,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. When designing the rooms, our team wanted the decor to reflect the culture of Laguna Beach. The landscaping on property is very drought friendly and we also use reclaimed water to maintain the outdoor areas of the resort. The Pond Pool Bar offers a relaxing way to enjoy food & drink poolside and we are glad that you took advantage of it. Having windows that slide open in the fitness center is a great way to feel the ocean breeze as it comes through the canyon. Some of the windows in the restaurant do the same thing as it also invites natural light into the dining area. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful canyon setting with everything at your fingertips: food, salt water pool, hot tub, 9 hole golf course, shuttle to Laguna Beach; large patio with comfortable seating, gorgeous canyon views, gas fire pits, and live music but you can still carry on a conversation. Lots of photo ops. Families of multiple generations, couples on anniversary trips, everyone around us seemed happy and relaxed. Met quite a few locals on the patio, at the bars, and on the golf course. Service was excellent everywhere from front desk to housekeeping.
Manager Response: Mary W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The patio is very popular among our guests and locals with offerings such as happy hour, fire pits, live music and games. We now offer live music six days a week on the patio with the exception being Wednesday evening. The photos of the surrounding canyon wall definitely provide lifelong memories as this type of topography is so rare along the California coast. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property, great location, clean to the max, unbelievable service. Dining was such a pleasure the dishes were amazingly good.  The staff are most helpful and prompt. Can't wait to go back. Thank you
Manager Response: Sharonar2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. It sounds like you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest. The view of the canyon from your table definitely boosts the ambiance. The menus are seasonal, so we would love for you to come back and try the new offerings once they are introduced. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We consider this a fantastic Summer Retreat.  To have the privacy of being in an amazing Canyon and to cross the street for beach fun is a perfect balance for us! Laguna Beach has so many great things to do, it was invigorating. Love the Ranch at LB!
Manager Response: T9719WKjohnh,  We are stoked that you enjoyed a refreshing getaway in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the resort offers a perfect balance of canyon and sea. We agree, Laguna Beach has so many great things to do along the 7 miles of coastline. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My fiance and I went to The Ranch for a weekend getaway and were blown away with the quality of this place. It was perfect for what we were looking for - close enough to restaurants and just up the street from the beach but far enough away that you felt like you were away from it all (including cell phone reception)! We really felt the personalized approach of the staff members and will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: 990whitneyd,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Congrats on the upcoming special occasion and it is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed a pre-wedding getaway in the canyon. Like you mentioned, the vibe of the canyon allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Our team works hard to ensure every guest has a personalized experience and is treated like family from the moment they arrive. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I felt that this resort was like 3.5 stars.  I was hoping for more. There is nothing to do unless you golf.  Pool bar closed early, beach is a public beach.  The 2 bedroom townhouse we staying in didn't smell clean at all, had a bad odor even though it looked clean.  Only one restaurant and a togo snack bar that were out of sandwiches at 1 pm and there were not much snacks.  The store only had golf related items.
Manager Response: Mcaindeals,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are sorry that you felt that way, but please do know that we list our daily activities on the back of each welcome letter that is provided at check-in. For example, we offer live music every day except for Wednesday and also offer a variety of other activities that are family friendly throughout the week that go beyond golf. Please accept our apologizes for the condition of the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite and thank you for letting us know so I can communicate this to our housekeeping team. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss your stay further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were looking for a local hotel to stay at to celebrate our anniversary. After learning about The Ranch from eating dinner at Harvest last month, we were excited to try the hotel.  We arrived early the day of check-in and were told that we could enjoy the pool area until our room was ready. I understand that it was 4th of July weekend, so there were probably more families than usual, but there were definitely a lot of children. The main issue with the pool area is that it doesn't fit the vibe of the resort at all. The hotel is 4 stars, but they don't really offer 4 star service. You have to go to the bar itself and order from the team of young adults that work it. I asked for a glass of rosé, and was just simply told they didn't have any. There is a full bar and restaurant
Manager Response: Jessica949,  Thank you for taking the time to provide this feedback on your stay at our resort as we greatly value guest feedback. Please accept our apologizes for the inconveniences that you experienced during your visit. We understand that an anniversary is a wonderful celebration and we clearly did not do a good job of acknowledging it and making it special. I have passed everything you mentioned along to the proper department heads and someone from our management team should be reaching out. I can be reached out sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The resort is fabulous... so cozy, yet elegant.  Service was excellent, room was awesome and beautifully decorated, and loved the outdoor area entertainment (great keyboard/guitar/singer guy)!  We will be back again for business and for pleasure!!
Manager Response: P9242SBkarenw,  Thank you for choosing that host your business team meeting at our resort. It sounds like you really cherished the off-the-beaten path vibe that the canyon offers. Like you mentioned, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. We now offer live music every day except for Wednesday and it is very popular among our guests. The summer is still young, so we would love to have you come back in the near future to experience all that the resort has to offer.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed a beautiful anniversary retreat at the Ranch at Laguna Beach. Mountains, beach, fine dining, nature, great service -- what more could you want. I will certainly recommend the Ranch to others for a week-end stay, extended vacation, or business meeting.
Manager Response: Vera W,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it at the resort. The canyon offers such a relaxing and romantic vibe that allows guests to cherish the off-the-beaten path experience. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: We were more excited to check out than we were to check in...
Summary: Check-in was unorganized.  We had to change rooms within 5 mins due to the screaming children next door & as a result, sacrificed our view.  When we got to the pool area it was overrun with kids cannonballing into the pool.  The bar at the pool did not have Rosê which seems odd for a "luxury" getaway in Southern California. As a substitution, we opted for a Kettle One & Soda which was also unavailable.  We had a dinner reservation at Harvest, the on-site restaurant at 7:30pm and went a little early for to have a drink at the bar beforehand. The view was great, service was poor.   We sat for dinner around 7:45pm and didn't receive the main course until after 9pm.  My husband's Pork was so overcooked that he had to send it back...we have been together for 9 years, this is the
Manager Response: Heather H,  Please accept our sincere apologizes on the inconveniences that you experienced at the resort. An anniversary is an important occasion and we certainly wished it would have been a much better stay. Laguna Beach is a very popular destination over the July 4th holiday, so there is naturally going to be a lot of families visiting. I have spoken to our management team and someone will be reaching out. I can be reached at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A warm welcome upon our arrival at the front desk and beautiful views from dinner Harvest restaurant are just two of the highlights.  We are local and this was a lovely place to celebrate our anniversary!
Manager Response: Brittan62,  Congrats on the anniversary and we are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed the celebration in the canyon. Our team values the importance of a warm welcome as we want all of our guests to feel like family. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great Family Getaway, Close to Beach, Cottage Rooms and Studios are spacious
Summary: Definitely would return. Great Family Venue. View was great of the canyons. Close to the beach with the shuttle services. No RESORT or PARKING FEES!! A gem in Laguna! On weekends there's live music from various locals artists. In Room Dining was delicious and Harvest was good if too lazy to venture out to local spots. Cottages were a great way to spend time with family. Studios were great for family of 4 etc.
Manager Response: Jo Ann H,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is so wonderful to hear how much you cherished the family getaway in the canyon. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are definitely very popular among our guests due to the spacious layout. Like you mentioned, our guests receive added value with every stay due to complimentary valet parking & Wi-Fi, plus no resort fee. We also just added live music to Monday and Tuesday nights, so we now have live music at the resort six days a week with the exception of Wednesday. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: While the facilities are beautiful and well furnished,it is worth a trip to Laguna just for the Harvest Restaurant. Congratulations to the chef and staff, especially Enrique, the restaurant manager. Excellently prepared, fresh and interesting menu, lovely views of the canyon.  Rooms are spacious and very quiet.
Manager Response: Donna M,  We are stoked that you enjoyed a wonderful getaway at the resort. Harvest Restaurant will be offering seasonal menus, so we invite you back to try the new offerings once they are introduced later this year. In the meantime, invite your family and friends to join you at the restaurant. Like you mentioned, the views of the canyon from your table definitely enhances the ambiance.
