I have passed along your compliments to the culinary team. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a wonderful time at and my husband loved the golf course.  He played the course 5 times and were there 6 days.  The location is great you feel away from it all but you are actually so close to the beach and the town. Would definitely go back.
Manager Response: 4dianaeh,  We are thankful that you and your husband chose to stay with us for six days. It is so wonderful to hear how much your husband loved the golf course by playing five rounds during the trip. Hopefully the familiarity of the course led to some low scores and birdies on his scorecard. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers a different perspective of Laguna Beach as you get the best of both worlds with also having beach access and being in close proximity to downtown. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had the most amazing time at The Ranch for our honeymoon! We were surprised with a beautiful charcuterie plate and bottle of wine to celebrate our special trip! The views were amazing and the property was impeccable! We can't wait to visit again!
Manager Response: Mlk594,  Congrats on this happy occasion and thank you for choosing to celebrate your honeymoon with us. We are thrilled to hear that your special trip was filled with so many great memories in the canyon, including the welcome amenity and the views. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Go for the quiet, stay for the dinner
Summary: Great property, but I'm not a golfer. I'm sure I'd have rated it even higher if I were. One of the best meals I've had in a long time at their restaurant HARVEST. Only bobble was our request for early check-in-- which had been approved by the hotel in advance --was suddenly not-so-much-approved-anymore when we got there. Would not have been a big deal except we planned our travel to the hotel based on our toddler's nap schedule and when we got there we couldn't put him down. Thwarted nap schedule led to sleep trouble led to not quite the relaxed weekend we had hoped for.
Manager Response: 417yl,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and appreciate your feedback. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your meal at Harvest. Harvest offers seasonal menus, so you will have to come back and try the new seasonal offerings when they are introduced later this year. Please accept our apologizes regarding the inconveniences of the early check-in request and for any miscommunication that occurred. We always try our absolute best to accommodate all of our guest requests, but we cannot guarantee them. I have reviewed the communication our team had with you regarding this request and will contact you to discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent resort with great accommodation, dining, and golf.  A place you will want to come back to as often as you can!  A relaxing experience with a receptive and hospitable staff!  Make sure you golf and make sure you have a few meals at the Harvest restaurant.
Manager Response: Vatcheh2017,  We are stoked to hear that you had a relaxing experience in the canyon. It sounds like you enjoyed the off-the-beaten path vibe. The golf course can definitely be addicting as it offers a layout that is friendly to all ages & skill levels plus it also provides stunning views of the canyon & creek that are not available from other areas on the resort. Hopefully you got some birdies on your scorecard. There is nothing like enjoying a meal at Harvest after a round of golf, especially when the sun is setting. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent overall-a great place to stay, very relaxing, beautiful-but could be a better value as cost is comparable to other top hotels nearby that have more elaborate facilities (especially spa) and immediate beach access. Highly recommended,  regardless-will definitely go back.
Manager Response: K578GAjw,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and appreciate your feedback. Even though the resort is not beachfront, our property does offer the best of both worlds with being carved into the Aliso & Wood Canyons while still having beach access. This is an experience that is very rare along the California coast. Regarding cost, we do provide significant value by offering Complimentary Valet Parking & Wi-Fi, plus No Resort Fee. Thank you for the recommendation to others and please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I was lucky enough to have a recent visit to the Ranch at Laguna Beach and it was lovely, the staff were very upbeat and friendly from the front desk to housekeeping.  I absolutely loved my room it was very large and the bed was amazing in fact I meant to ask someone before I left about purchasing one! The showers were huge and the bathroom amenities were a nice size not tiny little bottles. I attended a business meeting with lunch served on an outdoor patio the main entree was chicken which normally you think of as tough and rubbery but this was great and the presentation was beautiful.  I had the pleasure of working with Patty Bell who couldn't have been nicer and made sure I was happy and comfortable and I would certainly recommend her and the Ranch for any group program.  I
Manager Response: Christine W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us while attending a business meeting. Our team works really hard to provide guests with an experience that makes them feel like family and we are thrilled to hear how much the service enhanced your stay. This summer sounds like a great opportunity to join us for a vacation so you can enjoy all that Laguna Beach has to offer. Patty Bell should have sent you the information the other day regarding purchasing beds from Serta. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed here for two days and while I almost don't want to share The Ranch, I must. What a treat! Tucked away in the canyon, it's like you are in Jurassic Park! While you can't see the ocean, you are literally a 5 minute ride away. The pool and cabana bar are beautiful . The staff amazing. The restaurant is beautiful with its open windows and Hailey at the bar is a doll!! Guillermo at the outside snack bar is so friendly with a smile and amazing service. Great extras for families this summer. Check out their website for details! If you are planning a romantic getaway, you may want to wait until school starts because it is CRAWLING with (mostly behaved) children. I can't wait to go back! (Once school starts ;) Definitely recommend!!
Manager Response: Tennis1031,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. We know, it is very hard to keep the resort a secret after experiencing the relaxing nature of the canyon. It makes you want to share it with others. The canyon has often been referred to as The Yosemite of Orange County. We offer daily family programming, so those who stay with us this summer will have a variety of activities to choose from on property. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was a real get-a-way from LA, and so secluded yet right off the main highway.  Loved it !  Also was close to the beach, had great walking around the property and a wonderful dinning room.  The great views up the valley really set it off as well.
Manager Response: David H,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a weekend getaway. It sounds like you made the most of your trip by exploring the surrounding area. Hopefully you captured some good photos of the canyon wall and the ocean as it is an experience that is so rare along the California coast. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My wife and I spent two nights with you celebrating our wedding anniversary. We are so happy that we found you. We would normally travel to Carmel and Big Sur to find an  experience like yours. Everything about your hotel was wonderful, my wife had a spa treatment and loved it, our room was excellent, your staff was amazing. We will return!
Manager Response: Melvinm719,  Congrats on your wedding anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. We are happy that you found us too and we are thrilled to hear that your stay at the resort was so wonderful. Sycamore Spa offers therapies that rejuvenate inside and out and it sounds like your wife loved her treatment. Like you mentioned, our resort offers a peaceful blend of canyon and sea that is very rare along with California coast. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Gorgeous location nice hillside views and the beach!
Summary: The Ranch has amazing views, excellent food, adorable cottages, 9-hole golf course, and across from the gorgeous California beaches. You get a full tour in a golf course, access to rentals, complimentary valet, and a private open air bus ride to the beach (across the street).
Manager Response: KellyMD30,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are very popular due to their spacious layout and we are glad that you enjoyed it. Harvest Restaurant will be offering seasonal menus, so we invite you to come back and try the new offerings once the next seasonal menu is released. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: beautiful resort - picturesque setting but close to the beach and town.   The restaurant was very good, with big windows opening onto the canyon and golf course. Nice pool area, bocce and volleyball courts.
Manager Response: Sian640,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the resort offers the best of both worlds with a canyon experience and also access to the beach. When designing the restaurant, we wanted a lot of natural light to come in through the windows and also enhance the ambiance with views of the canyon. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of activities on property. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great place for couples. Great drinks at the bar in the restaurant and beautiful grounds. All the staff was very helpful and friendly. Only downfall was housekeeping woke us up on Sunday morning when we had a do not disturb sign on!
Manager Response: Valmv78,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Enjoying a drink while soaking in views of the canyon sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Please accept our apologizes for the disturbance on Sunday morning. I have spoken with our housekeeping team regarding this to ensure this does not happen again. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great accommodations- nice facilities......all around beautiful grounds Didn't like: Golf course in mediocre shape and overpriced. Some dangerous areas to get hit by another golfer. The employees had a bit of an attitude - not customer friendly. Tried to have a roller bed moved to my room-got three different answers why they could not. (Didn't fit- then fire hazArd- then "we don't have any"...then they tried to get me to buy a larger room.   Be prepared to overspend for meals, way overpriced.
Manager Response: Rick G,  We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations. I would like to speak with you further so I can understand the experiences that you mentioned. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort was very relaxing and the service was outstanding. A few hours after I book the reservation the hotel called me to confirm and ask if they could help make golf, dinner, and/or transportation reservations. They really went above and beyond during our stay. We will definitely return.
Manager Response: KCNR_8519,  We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your weekend getaway at the resort. Our team provides pre-arrival phone calls and emails to each guest to ensure that each experience is personalized. We want all of our guests to take lifelong memories home with them and it is great to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Went for a birthday celebration.Wonderful location in the canyons.  Rooms are a great combination of rustic charm with modernfurnishings . Restaurant is not only gorgeous but has  excellent food.  And the staff is unusually friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: BillMaryIrvine,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of a birthday. Like you mentioned, the guestrooms were designed with Elegant Coastal Ranch decor as the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. The view of the canyon from your table in Harvest definitely enhances the ambiance and it sounds like you enjoyed some delicious meals. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Location is convenient clean rooms parking spots tight and limited fitness room small nice property in Laguna Beach lots of amenities property not on beach side remodeled rooms nice did not use all the amenities
Manager Response: Nelson C,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Even though our property is not located beachfront, the resort offers the best of both worlds by being carved on 87 acres in the Aliso & Wood Canyons, while still having beach access. This experience provides a different perspective than the typical coastal experience. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach was one of the best experiences ever; mind you I have stayed at Wynn, Encore, Bellagio, etc; The Ranch is one of the top.  The atmosphere is warm and welcoming.  You will not regret your decision!
Manager Response: Matty801,  We are stoked to hear that you had one of the best experiences ever at our resort. Like you mentioned, we invite our guests step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful Resort just off the main road! It is tucked away enough to feel secluded and private, yet super close to everything Laguna has to offer! It's so peaceful there! Every single detail of this Resort is beautiful! The rooms, the restaurants, the decor! The staff is super friendly and go out of their way to make your stay everything you hoped it to be and more! And the dining is delicious!
Manager Response: Kristyng87,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, the canyon offers a different perspective of Laguna Beach as you get the best of both worlds with also having beach access. It sounds like you really enjoyed the off-the-beaten path vibe. Our team works hard to go above and beyond as we want each guest to be treated like family and have a personalized experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Not a great experience for the price
Summary: We stayed at a two level cabin and the air conditioning units did not work properly. The upper level rooms did not have day curtains, only night curtains. The main restaurant was too pricey for the food served and the quality was not at par with the price. Very small gym for the size of the hotel (only fits 9 people very tight). Unheated pool. Golf was nice, location is great and staff service is good.
Manager Response: Galz3597,  We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and our apologizes for the inconveniences that occurred. I would like to speak with you further regarding the experiences that you mentioned. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Highly recommend if you want a short getaway. You wouldn't think this place it right off PCH. It's beautiful and green. The room we stayed in was comfortable and beautiful. Housekeeping even came by with chocolate. We woke up to the LA Times hanging on our door.  The Patio outside by Ben's Pantry is beautiful. Live music on Friday and Saturday, with lawn games. Family and kids friendly.
Manager Response: JasonaX2537YV,  Thank you for choosing to spend a birthday staycation at our resort. It sounds like you took advantage of many of the amenities on property. Our team works hard to offer daily programming that is family friendly as we want everyone to enjoy their experience. Like you mentioned, the live music and games on the patio are very popular among our guests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The staff is friendly and helpful.  The rooms comfortable, clean and inspiring in décor.   The setting peaceful and beautiful.     When you're there you must go to the outdoor deck and have a bite while listening to live music.  It's a happy place and the service excellent.
Manager Response: 572renep,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The canyon offers an off-the-beaten path vibe to allows our guests to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. Like you mentioned regarding the decor, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Enjoying a drink on the patio while listening to live music sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: different location yet close to beach
Summary: This is a clean fresh very cool and hip new time of higher class but down to earth resort.  Had everything that you would want including beach chairs, umbrellas, towels and a golf cart ride to the aliso beach area about 350 yards away. Firepits and golf on premise...just cool.
Manager Response: Carl C,  We are stoked that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, we invite our guests to leave the pretension and rules of other luxury hotels behind, and step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. The canyon offers a different perspective of Laguna Beach as you get the best of both worlds with also having beach access. The resort offers a coastal experience that you can't find anywhere else in Southern California. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We decided to get away for a local couples getaway. What a great resort! The rooms were very comfortable with rockers on the porch to read and enjoy the view. Ben Browns golf course is a great hidden gem. I'm not that great of a golfer so it was nice to have friendly patient people who are not snooty!  My husband and I had a very relaxing and fun time to get away and refresh as a couple away from the everyday chaos. We  especially enjoyed the live music and happy hour on the deck with the fire pits!
Manager Response: 744trishar,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us for a local couples getaway. The outdoor space that is featured with each accommodation is a wonderful way for our guests to enjoy some fresh air while soaking in views of the canyon. Like you mentioned, the golf course layout is well suited for those of all ages & skill levels. The live music is very popular among our guests as a relaxing way to spend the late afternoon and early evening at the resort. It sounds like you really cherished the off-the-beaten path vibe that allows you to unplug from the normal hustle and bustle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed two nights at this fantastic Golf Resort in Laguna Beach.  You will not want to leave.  Although it is only a 9 hole course, playing it twice is and adventure.  The Grounds are amazing and I wish you could see the pictures of the Flora and Fauna that we took.  Just sitting on the Patio after golfing with a glass of wine and looking at the view is worth the price of admission.
Manager Response: N1507GTsusanb,  We are stoked that you enjoyed a wonderful getaway in the canyon and thank you for choosing to stay with us. The golf course is a great way to get stunning views of the canyon and creek that are not visible from other areas of the resort. Hopefully your familiarity with the course after two rounds led to some birdies. It would be amazing to see the pictures that you took as there are so many picturesque locations throughout the resort. We agree that enjoying a drink on the patio is a great way to relax in paradise. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property located in secluded canyon yet less than a mile from the Montage and the gorgeous beaches. Thoroughly enjoyed the different vibe (I mean that as a positive) than your traditional, oh so typical beach resort. The Ranch is a unique property with all the top notch amenities you'd expect from a high end beach resort.
Manager Response: Megan P,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the off-the-beaten path vibe. Like you said, the canyon gives a whole different perspective on the typical coastal vacation, plus you get to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to the beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A luxury stay in Laguna at an great price! Being from the area for 30 years, this is a true gem! We sold our house but still travel to OC several times a year.  The Ranch is so nice and homey, it felt  our own space!  We will definitely put The Ranch on the top of our list as places to stay in OC!
Manager Response: William W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. A big part of our vision is to offer a truly authentic Laguna Beach experience at a great value. Our team works hard to ensure that each guest feels at home and we are glad that you had that feeling during your stay. We are thrilled that our resort is on your top list of places to stay in Orange County and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family and I stay at The Ranch for two nights while visiting California. Great views, great food and a very nice golf course.  The staff was very professional . We will most definitely return to The Ranch.
Manager Response: Molly M,  We are stoked to hear that you and your family had an amazing stay at the resort. It sounds like you made the most of your two nights. Aliso Canyon has often been referred to as The Yosemite of Orange County and it is great to hear about how much you enjoyed the views from different areas of the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: For golfers this is probably a great resort.  I found it quiet and relaxing but would've rather been at the Surf and Sand Hotel.  Rooms were very comfortable and the bed was amazing but there were too many kids in the hot tub and our room had a view of the parking lot even though they call it a creek view.  The creek is way beyond a wall across the parking lot.
Manager Response: Sheldone365,  We are sorry to hear that the resort did not meet your expectations and also apologize for any miscommunication regarding room type views. The only rooms that have a view of the creek are the Creekside Studio Suites and Creekside One Bedroom Suites. The Canyon Rooms and Cottage Two Bedroom Suites do not have a view of the creek, but rather the canyon. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I'm confused by this section but as I shared earlier, I would not have booked with you had I known the location of our one room suite. I upgraded thinking a better room would have a better view.  I was wrong,  disappointing.
Manager Response: 475marcim,  We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not met. The Creekside One Bedroom Suites are very popular because they spacious, located in a quiet section of the resort and provide stunning views of the canyon. I will reach out to you directly so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fantastic trip at The Ranch. We arrived from the UK and loved every minute of our time there. Great atmosphere and facilities... The accomodation was ample and clean and perfect for what we wanted. Twin beds in the second room would have made it perfect.
Manager Response: MattbZ4692UH,  We are stoked to hear about your fantastic trip to Laguna Beach and thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate that you made the long trip to experience everything that this amazing coastal city offers. It sounds like you took full advantage of your time at the resort and exploring the local area. Please join us again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great hotel and facilities but was lacking something for such a high price per night. Great for families and lots to do but food wasn't great and rooms could be better. Food is very American and could do with a bit more flare.
Manager Response: Lucymarner1989,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are sorry to hear that your expectations were not fully met. Regarding value, the resort offers additional inclusions with each stay including Complimentary Valet Parking & Wi-Fi, plus No Resort Fee. Please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful Location and all the Staff were helpful and gracious. We will definitely be back look forward to our stay at the Ranch Again. The next visit I plan to play golf and my wife will visit the Spa. The only problem was our stay was too short.
Manager Response: JohnnK3110VR,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. The canyon is a wonderful location to enjoy a Laguna escape as it provides such a different perspective to a typical coastal getaway. Playing a round of golf while your wife visits the spa sounds like a great plan. The golf course showcases stunning views that are not available in any other spot at the resort, plus some of the deer like to greet the golfers. This summer sounds like a great time to join us for a longer vacation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A little piece of heaven in Laguna
Summary: This little gem is tucked away in a canyon in Laguna Beach.  As you head up the drive, you are pleasantly surprised once you are greeted by the Ranch staff.  We enjoyed everything the resort had to offer.  We were pleasantly surprised by the affordability of the restaurants on property. The staff couldn't have been nicer or more accommodating.  The rooms were large and very clean.
Manager Response: Sunvalleyjodi,  We are stoked that you got to enjoy a canyon stay in paradise. Our team works hard to ensure all of our guests leave the resort with lifelong memories and we are glad to hear that the service that our team provided enhanced your stay. When designing the guestrooms, our team really wanted the culture of Laguna Beach to be reflected in the decor. Like you mentioned, when you enter the canyon from the highway towards our resort, you get a different perspective of the city. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This property is beautiful!  The rooms are all updated, comfortable and big.  The food in the Harvest Restaurant is great.  The restaurant service is a little sketchy.   Waitress was friendly and nice, but we got some incorrect items and some items missing from our two orders.     If you don't like to valet-park your car, be careful.  There was an event going on and while we we're trying to check in the valets INSISTED on getting our car keys.  After some discussion, a supervisor finally agreed (at my suggestsion) to let my husband park in the fairly empty parking lot for 10 minutes while I went to get our room keys.  The valet staff needs to learn how to treat customers who simply do not want to be valet parked and have some flexibility.
Manager Response: Barbara M,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are stoked by how much you enjoyed the location of the resort in the canyon. Harvest Restaurant does offer seasonal menus, so you will have to come back and try the new seasonal menu later this year. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the parking situation as we want all of our guests to have a fantastic arrival experience. Our valet team does their best to manage parking based upon business demands and we appreciate your feedback. Please join us again soon.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent property. Comfortable, clean and beds so comfy I didn't want to leave. You need to Uber around out of season, but a minor point for such a lovely peaceful setting and wonderful service. Lots of wildlife and fresh air...don't think twice about booking anywhere else.
Manager Response: MarisaMason,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. There is nothing like fresh air in the canyon. Downtown Laguna Beach is only a few miles from the resort and offers a variety of experiences that our guests love to take advantage of. The city of Laguna Beach does sponsor a complimentary weekend shuttle in the off-season and a daily shuttle during the summer season. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: How often do you spend time mid day in your hotel room staring out the window? That's the key question when evaluating a place like The Ranch and comparing it to the Montage or one of the other waterfront hotels in Laguna. I for one am up and out - spending early mornings and evenings in my hotel and little else. And for that The Ranch is a steal. Comfortable rooms with great amenities and a friendly staff welcome you to a special canyon filled with wildlife. Sure the view is across the road - but at 9PM - do you really need it. The Ranch has an awesome restaurant, a great snack bar - 9 holes of golf - and other facilities to keep you busy - coupled with a small low key vibe. On a recent trip I paid under $300 for a great room compared with a quote of over $800 at the Montage
Manager Response: Hdemott,   We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. We agree, there is nothing like waking up in the morning and looking at the view of the sunrise above the canyon wall. An interesting thing is that many associate Laguna Beach with just the beach vibe, but don't realize the wilderness aspect it to with over 15,000 acres of trails and the canyon layout in some areas. It sounds like you made the most of the hotel amenities and enjoyed the off-the-beaten path experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: In a quiet setting, beautiful surroundings. Nice seating outside near the golfshop for pre dinner drinks. Restaurant is well decorated and food is excellent. The staff is phantastic, specially Sal (the Italian) with great sense of humor and knows how to treat his guests. The room we had was super, well decorated, good airconditioning (very quiet), only the buildings look like army baracks... The golfcourse is an easy short 9 holes course, but set in a spectaculair surrounding. Played it twice during our stay. Would recommend this hotel and will stay again when visiting Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Patrick P,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Sitting on the patio and enjoying drinks while soaking in views of the canyon sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Our team works really hard to help create memories for each of our guests and we are glad that Sal was one of the team members that assisted in that. The golf course is a great way to experience stunning views of the surrounding wilderness that you can't see from other areas of the resort. Hopefully your familiarity with the course after two rounds led to some birdies. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I travel regularly for work and stay at both large chains and independent/boutique properties. Given this I can be picky and don't always find the right "fit." The Ranch at Laguna Beach definitely surprised and delighted me with it's laid back luxury, natural beauty and friendly environment. The rooms are well appointed and speak to a southern California casual design with a touch of rustic/country. Every staff member I met was incredibly friendly and helpful. I loved the design of the main lodge where their restaurant and bar reside - lots of light and views of the canyon paired with a modern equestrian feel and small tokens of Laguna Beach history. The spa is boutque but the services were just right and use of space is perfect for relaxation. Overall i was won over by the
Manager Response: 7Valentine7,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us and that you were able to enjoy a relaxed & laid back weekend getaway at the resort. What surprises most people is the fact that Laguna Beach has a large wilderness aspect it to with over 15,000 acres of trails and the canyon layout in some areas as most people just associate the city with the beach element. We are glad that you enjoyed the off-the-beaten path vibe that allows guests to unwind from the daily hustle and bustle. Like you mentioned, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle as our team really wanted the culture of Laguna Beach to be reflected in the design. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch at Laguna Beach...A Fabulous Find!
Summary: Fabulous  find in the Laguna Beach area for golf and non-golfers alike. Beautifully appointed rooms. We will absolutely stay there again when we come to the area! A great option and wonderful service! Loved it!
Manager Response: Karenmay2017,  We are so stoked and thankful that you had a fabulous experience at the resort. Regarding the decor of the resort, we want our guests to get the vibe of a Laguna local. It is great to hear that the service that our team provided enhanced your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family and I stayed at the facility over memorial day weekend we could not have had a better time anywhere else, we've done Hawaii  Mammoth and other destination spots for different holidays but the ease and location of this getaway destination has by far been the best!! It was like we were in another region all together. And for the service of the staff and facilities, you could not get better, they treated the kids as if they were family!!  They provided evening activities for them so there wasn't the "suns down have nothing to do worries" from the kids!! And when it came time for the dads to hit the links, a quick call to our private concierge Madison, and she had us tee'd up in no time. The course is fun but challenging, and kept up beautifully, just have to watch out for
Manager Response: Jeremy O,  We are stoked that you and your family chose to stay with us and that the coastal destination has by far been the best. Like you mentioned, our guests are like family to our team. Our goal is to offer a variety of family programming so that way those of all ages have something to enjoy on a daily basis. The golf course is a great way to get authentic close up views of the canyon walls and creek. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the course. Regarding the decor, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle as our team really wanted the culture of Laguna Beach to be reflected in the design. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Who would not just love the scenery here. Eating on the patio is a must.  The golf course just makes you never want to leave.  Our family wants to return next year. The history of the Ranch was very interesting !
Manager Response: 910sabinah,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, eating on the patio while soaking in the views of the canyon is a great way to relax in paradise. The history of the canyon is fascinating, especially going back to 1871 when the 152-acre Thurston homestead was located on what is now the resort golf course and other parts of the property. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Delightful setting.  Best attribute is cocktails on deck after golf or before dinner.  Restaurant is comfortable and relaxing.  Menu did not "wow" us, but food was well prepared and tasted.  Rooms are very comfortable, but views are of the hotel grounds.   Great for local one night getaway.
Manager Response: Vince M,  We are stoked that you got to enjoy a one night local getaway at the resort. Like you said, the view of the canyon is a great way to enjoy a cocktail in paradise. When designing the rooms, we wanted the decor to reflect the culture of Laguna Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to the return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We couldn't believe the value and experience received for the cost. We were sure it would be twice as much as it was and if it had been we wouldn't have been able to stay. We are so grateful such an amazing hotel is available at such an amazing cost. We will be staying here all the time.
Manager Response: Melibex1982,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The experience is definitely what makes a stay truly special. We also know that value is very important to travelers and we enjoy providing added value to each stay that includes Complimentary Wi-Fi and Valet Parking, plus no Resort Fee. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Quiet and relaxing place to stay in busy LA area
Summary: I've stayed at the Ranch five times in the past two years and watched its progress to completion.  The finished product is top notch.  The resort with its canyon location and full amenities provides a quiet retreat in an otherwise crowded and fast paced Southern California area.    The staff is enthusiastic and very attentive to guest  needs
Manager Response: DavidrK6581NA,  We are thankful that you have chosen to stay at the resort five times within the past two years. Thank you for your loyalty and the kind words regarding the reimagined property. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Would give 10 stars if I could
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the ranch for 7 days. From the moment we got we where treated like VIP guests. The Room was amazing, The grounds are jaw dropping. Staff on the property made us feel like family. We ate on site almost every day and is was fantastic. We Golfed 3 days and the staff at golf course was top notch. After staying at the ranch the bar has been set high as we travel to other places every year. We have been home for 1 week and still talk about how we cant wait you go back. We will be staying at the ranch again next year for our annual trip to cali.
Manager Response: Carpetpaul,  We are stoked that you chose to stay at the resort for 7 days and it sounds like you made the most out of your weeklong stay. It is so wonderful to read about your excitement regarding the trip. Our guests are like family to our team and it is great to hear that the service provided enhanced your stay. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the course and your familiarity with the holes led to some birdies. Harvest Restaurant offers seasonal menus, so during your next trip, you might have a new variety of items to choose from. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your annual visits to the resort.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Completely overwhelmed by the friendly and accommodating staff. They made us feel valued. The resort is beautiful and very clean. The food and atmosphere are amazing. Can't beat the view of the canyon.
Manager Response: Ginelll2017,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. We value our guests like family and want them to feel at home from the moment they reserve their stay at the resort. Our team also works hard to ensure that resort guests take home with them lifelong memories, so it is wonderful to hear that you had an experience of a lifetime. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I will write a yelp and a letter to the owners ....absolutely amazing stay! I cant wait wait wait to come back!!!!! Madison you are so wonderful. I am just taken back by the property. It is not pretentious and such wonderfully understated beauty.
Manager Response: ColbyElizabeth,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are so stoked that you had an absolutely amazing stay at our resort! You are exactly right, we want our guests to leave the pretension and rules of other luxury hotels behind, and step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits!  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed there exactly 1 year ago and was an almost completed work in progress. As to be expected they had some issues, but they have resolved them. The brand new lobby/restaurant building is very nicely done, food was killer (and the exec chef is so young!), and everybody was exceedingly pleasant. A much needed addition was the free Coast Hwy shuttle trolley stop to-from downtown Laguna. And love the drought tolerant landscaping!
Manager Response: 5ft17,  We are so grateful that you chose to stay with us again after the completion of the resort. It is so wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed the reimagination done to the property. The complimentary trolley to Laguna Beach is so wonderful as guests get to experience all that the city has to offer. In addition to the drought tolerant landscaping, we completed a water reclamation project that saves millions of gallons annually. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: See comments under headers More loungers at pool Ice and Water in the coolers for golf and clean 60 th bday should have had dessert at dinner Cushions in rockers more comfy Awesome room ready to check in and rooms very lovely
Manager Response: LisawA4044US,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. We appreciate the feedback and are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation and the resort grounds. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Meh, not sure it's worth it.
Summary: Front desk and pool staff not in tune with quality expected. Towels in room were dirty. I should have been given new towels right then and there. This is simply not acceptable from such a pricey place!
Manager Response: 791kirstenr,  We value our guest feedback and appreciate that you took the time to provide it. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during your stay. You are right, it is not acceptable and not up to our standards. I have requested that our management team will connect with you to discuss this further. Again, please accept our apologizes.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: They helped me set up my room and provided the perfect setting to ask my girlfriend to marry me. The feeling of being in the mountains yet at the beach is amazing. The staff is very kind and accomadating, and the food was wonderful.
Manager Response: 941nabils,  Congrats on the engagement and we are honored that you chose our resort as the location for your special occasion! The great thing is that you now have lifelong memories of your time in the canyon. We are so thrilled and happy for you and hope that you stay with us again in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We lucked out getting a corner room overlooking pool with canyon view with only one week notice but probably due to mid-week visit. (We like going off season to Laguna to beat crowds). We enjoyed hiking the Valido trail nearby which provides an interesting view of the coastline and canyon/ranch. We didn't do room service but enjoyed dinner at the Harvest restaurant. Chocolate pudding dessert was amazing!
Manager Response: Tammy L,  We are stoked that you chose to stay with us and that you got to enjoy the stunning views of the pool & canyon from your accommodation. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the local hiking trails as Laguna Beach boasts 15,000 acres of wilderness trails in addition to the 20+ beaches. Like you said, it is amazing to see the different perspective of a canyon and a beach being so close together as that is so rare. The chocolate pudding sounds like a delicious way to end an incredible day at the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What an interesting place - at first i was a bit put off by the motel type construction of the 12-some buildings that make up for 8 to 10 rooms each. Inside, the room was tastefully decorated and very comfortable. The pool area was a bit basic...but then it was clean, with a warm pool with perfectly comfortable long chairs. Not fancy but very quaint. The premises are all based on that same idea: relaxed, unpretentious, with guests' comfort at mind, clearly. The food was great (though a bit too rich) and the golf seem quite enjoyable with a pretty relaxed atmosphere - unlike your usual private golf club. Overall this place seems like a wonderful place to relax in and i much regretted being there... on a business trip!!!
Manager Response: Nick of Paris,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Regarding the design of the rooms, the property pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Like you mentioned, the resort invites guests to get caught up in the world of a Laguna local that’s off the beaten path in every sense and also invites guests to step into the warm embrace of a place where everyone becomes family. The view of the canyon from your table in Harvest Restaurant definitely enhances the ambiance. We appreciate all of the kind words and hopefully you can join us for a vacation in the near future so you can explore all that Laguna Beach has to offer!   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: During our 20 hour stay at The Ranch in Laguna Beach, my wife and I had an amazing experience. The views were stunning and the property was breath taking. The service was fast, courteous, and professional.
Manager Response: Marcosf115,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The views of the canyon are definitely breathtaking and a unique experience for a coastal location. Our team works hard to ensure all of our guests are provided professional service throughout each stay and we are glad that it enhanced your stay at the resort. Hopefully you can join us for a longer stay this summer or in the near future.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The hotel rooms are nice, the service is great, the food is excellent, and the facility is clean. My only "complaint" is the lack of privacy within the room. There is a nice patio outside the room that is open to the hotel, however because it is on the ground floor, you can't leave the curtains drawn without feeling like everyone walking by can see into your room. In addition, I was able to hear all the noise coming from the surrounding rooms (baby crying, people talking, doors opening and closing).
Manager Response: Crystal M,  We are grateful that you chose to stay at our resort. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the resort features and amenities. We apologize for the inconveniences with the noises coming from the surrounding rooms as we want all of our guests to experience a quiet and peaceful trip. We understand the importance of privacy and the purpose for the outdoor patio is for our guests to enjoy views of the canyon and resort and experience a different perspective of Laguna Beach.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I cannot say enough about The Ranch and what the venue has to offer.  Our family and friends had such a great time celebrating with us.  Those that stayed overnight at the property really enjoyed their stay, too.  The Ranch is tucked away in the canyon and offers such a peaceful environment.  I will definitely be recommending this venue to anyone who wishes to take a miniature vacation at somewhere other than a beach resort.
Manager Response: OCturnedDCgal,  We are thankful that you chose to host your wedding reception at our resort. It is so wonderful to hear that your family and friends enjoyed celebrating your special day with you in the canyon. The peaceful nature of the canyon is such a great way to enjoy the off-the-beaten path vibe and experience a different perspective of Laguna Beach. Thank you for the recommendation to others and please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The newly renovated Ranch Hotel is incredible! The Tuvalu furnishings are the epitome of California luxury and the property itself is beautiful! I only wish I had a friend getting married so that I could plan their wedding at this location ASAP! They have easy beach access, in fact they share the same beach area as Montage Laguna Beach, which is amazing if you've ever seen the photos! great proximity to Downtown Laguna as well as South Laguna, which has some really great restaurants as well! I highly recommend a stay at this place or at least a meal overlooking the Golf Course!
Manager Response: CharlieeMariee,  We are thankful that you chose to stay at our resort. When designing the resort, our team wanted the decor to reflect the culture of Laguna Beach and pay homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. Tuvalu did an amazing job and we are grateful to partner with them. We agree, the canyon wall presents a beautiful backdrop for a wedding. We are glad that you got to take advantage of visiting Downtown Laguna Beach as it has such a variety of experiences to offer. The view of the golf course and canyon from your table definitely enhances the ambiance at Harvest Restaurant and thank you for the recommendation to others. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a wonderful secluded property in the canyons of Laguna Beach. Many amenities and the golf was a lovely distraction. No cell phone service at that property due to the terrain and that is just fine by me. Allows me to truly get away from distractions. All in all I would recommend this property to anyone needing a relaxing and beautiful vacation
Manager Response: Patrick M,  We are stoked that you got to enjoy a relaxing vacation in the canyon at our resort. You are absolutely right that the property is a great way to get away from distractions and experience the off-the-beaten path vibe. Hopefully some deer greeted you during the round of golf. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is the perfect place for a weekend getaway. The property is beautifully landscaped and has an intimate but luxuriously rustic feel. The staff is friendly, helpful and professional; the food and drink are top quality and the beach is a short golf cart ride away.
Manager Response: Karaw531,  We are grateful that you chose to spend a weekend getaway at our resort. Southern California got more rain in the spring this year than in past years, so that has helped keep the canyon walls nice and lush. With the property having so much history, dating back to the Thurston homestead in 1871, the resort pays homage to the rich heritage of early California, blending history with elegant and rustic coastal beach lifestyle. The beach allows our guests to enjoy the best of both worlds (canyon and beach) and it is great that you took advantage of it. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I have stayed at many "high end" places, especially in the Orange County area. At check in, the girl was unenthusiastic and not very professional. More like an under trained teenager. After check in, it took the valet 30 minutes to even ask us for help. They even "radioed" it in and We were just standing there being avoided (maybe because I was wearing a sleeveless Slayer shirt and they didn't think I belonged there). After watching them take several guest to their room that arrived after us, I literally had to walk up to the Valet closet and they seemed surprised when I said I was a guest.  It's very loud in the mornings. Grounds crew talk loud out side your villa. I had a do not disturb sign up and walked into our Villa while a worker was "turning down" our room which I had
Manager Response: We value your feedback and apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced. Your experience at our resort is not acceptable and I have passed this feedback along to the correct division managers to ensure that something like this does not occur again. Can you please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss this further? Again, please accept our sincere apologizes.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: For a relatively new resort, this is an absolute gem. We were keen to spend time exploring the local area, but the resort amenities kept us close to the resort for a lot more time than we had originally intended. We would highly recommend a meal (or many) in Harvest restaurant and the evening cocktails & live music on the patio were a big draw, especially before the sun disappeared. We shall return!
Manager Response: 66sbr,  We are thankful that you chose to stay at our resort. Even though Laguna Beach has so much to offer, the resort provides a different perspective of the local area. It is great to hear that you took advantage of a variety of amenities. Listening to the live music on the patio while soaking in views of the sunset in the canyon sounds like a great way to relax in paradise. Having such a stellar view from your table definitely enhances the ambiance in Harvest Restaurant. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The pictures of the resort were very nice and I expected a very nice ranch. The ranch was ok but I have to say that I was a little underwhelmed. It felt like we were the only guests staying and the whole resort appeared a bit deserted. We'll prob stay at the Ritz next time.
Manager Response: Lukas I,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to provide feedback. We are bummed to hear that you were underwhelmed with your experience at our resort. The property provides an off-the-beaten path vibe that provides peace and quiet to our guests. I can assure you that the resort is popular for both locals and those traveling to Laguna Beach. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A quiet country setting while only a short distance from the beach. Staffed with very nice people. We had great service from all the staff. Excellent food in the dinning room. A hidden gem I didn't know was there.
Manager Response: GHlavaty,  We are stoked that you chose to stay with us and that you got to enjoy a quiet trip in the canyon. The walk to the beach is a great way to experience the off-the-beaten path vibe. Our team works really hard to make all of our guests feel at home and it is great to hear that the service we provided enhanced your visit to the resort. Harvest Restaurant has become very popular among our guests and locals as there is nothing like enjoying a nice meal while soaking in a wonderful view. Hopefully this was the first of many visits to our property and we look forward to your return.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location. Even though it rained it was beautiful. Close to beach for nice walks. Great restaurant, ambiance, service and food were wonderful. Would love to come back and enjoy it in the sunshine. Overall very good experience. Will recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Leslier329,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Southern California has received more rain in the spring this year than in years past and it is helping keep the surrounding canyon walls beautiful and lush. The summer sounds like a great opportunity to come back and enjoy the sunshine and the beach. The view of the canyon from your table in Harvest Restaurant definitely enhances the ambiance. Hopefully you got to try the new breakfast and lunch menus that our culinary team introduced a few weeks ago. If not, you definitely need to come back and try the new offerings. We appreciate the recommendations and look forward to return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: See the Harvest Restaurant review above.  Really really bad service.  What an embarrassment to your property.  Aside from that we liked everything very much- the bocce ball and the corn hole games are fun and we golfed and had a nice time. We liked the room and thought the property was so beautiful
Manager Response: 599nanciy,  We value your feedback and we appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of activities at the resort. The golf course conditions are lush and hopefully some deer greeted you during your round. When designing the rooms, our team wanted to reflect the culture of Laguna Beach to make our guests feel like a local. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced at Harvest Restaurant and thank you for letting us know as it helps us improve our operations. I spoke to our Restaurant Manager and she let me know that she did reach out to you. Again, please accept our apologizes and please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com if you need further assistance.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Rather than spend a fortune at Montage, Ritz-Carlton or Monarch Beach Resort, we decided to try this new resort in Laguna Beach and we are glad we did! Right off of PCH between two canyons, we found the resort to be beautiful, quiet and peaceful and we had a great weekend. Definitely recommend checking out The Ranch.
Manager Response: StevewX4982GL,  We are thankful that you chose to stay at our resort as we know that there are a lot of choices of hotels to stay at in the Laguna Beach and surrounding area. It is great to hear that you got to enjoy a peaceful and quiet trip in the canyon. The canyon is a wonderful place to unplug and get away from the hustle and bustle. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A hidden gem at Laguna Beach
Summary: This was our first trip to the California coast, and we were pleasantly surprised with the beautiful surroundings of Laguna Beach.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at The Ranch.  The setting is private and beautiful, and the service was top notch.
Manager Response: 31leannec,  We are stoked that you chose to stay with us during your first trip to the California coast. Laguna Beach has so much to offer along the 7.1 miles of coastline with over 20 beaches, 70 art galleries, boutique shopping & restaurants, and so much more. One of the many great things about Laguna Beach is that it combines the wilderness element (15,000 acres of trails) with coastal fun. We hope that this was the first of many trips to Laguna Beach and to our resort.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I literally can not say enough about The Ranch. From the time we drove in to the time we checked out we were greeted by genuinely warm staff and the entire vibe of the resort is so cool. I think I actually might prefer the surroundings back in the canyon to the coast. Just a really serene atmosphere. We were only there for one night and got some rain so we didn't get to experience everything, but they really do provide a great balance between relaxing and having a lot of fun. Couldn't recommend the place more
Manager Response: 11andrewz,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Like you mentioned, you get the best of both worlds with staying in the canyon and still having access to the beach. It really gives a different off-the-beaten path perspective of Laguna Beach. Our team works hard to ensure that all of our guests have an incredible experience from the moment they reserve the accommodation to the moment they depart as we want our guests to take home lifelong memories. Southern California did get some more rain this year during the spring than in years past and it really has made everything nice and lush. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is an excellent value for the area. The Ranch provides a very tranquil place for rest and relaxation. After my stay, I felt like I had just come back from a vacation despite the purpose of my stay was a two-day business meeting. I can only imagine how it would feel to come here on vacation. I highly recommend this place, especially if you value a calm and peaceful experience! Further, the beds are so relaxing, I had the best sleep of my life here!!! Go check out the Ranch, you will not be disappointed!!!!
Manager Response: Jaimea771,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us during your business trip and stoked to hear that you had an epic time. The canyon truly provides the off-the-beaten path feeling where you get away from the hustle and bustle and just relax. This summer sounds like a great time for you to come back and enjoy a vacation. Laguna Beach has a lot of great experiences up and down the 7.1 miles of coastline.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Spent 3 days with colleagues in an offsite meeting to get away from the daily distractions.  The meeting facilities were excellent.  The Ranch staff provided great service, dining, and an excellent location.
Manager Response: GaryMX,  Thank you for choosing to host your offsite meeting at our resort. The view of the canyon definitely enhances the ambiance of any meeting or special event. We would love to have you come back for a vacation trip so that you can experience all that Laguna Beach has to offer.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We recently stayed at the Ranch for a couple of days. The weather could not have been more perfect. Due to all the recent rain, the hillsides were green and lush, making for a beautiful setting. The staff was terrific, offering great service and suggestions. The room was spacious and beautiful. We will definitely be back for more.
Manager Response: Chris C,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us. Great observation as the rain that we received in late winter and early spring really made the canyon walls, golf course, and surrounding landscape green and lush. The weather now is starting to feel like summer. It is great to hear that our team enhanced your stay by providing great service and suggestions so that you could make the most of your trip to Laguna Beach. It is important that our guests take home lifelong memories. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Total enjoyment. But one thing was the shower.  If you had a great day  at the beach.  Enjoy the shower back in your room then have dinner  without driving, then take a walk around the property then take swim.
Manager Response: EricsX2097UN,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are stoked that you enjoyed the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while having access to the beach. Walking around the resort is a great way to soak in the views of the surrounding nature, especially during sunset. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel, as it ticked all the boxes for our personal preferences during our 6 day stay at the end of a westcoast roundtrip. The rooms are very well designed, quiet with really good beds, meticulously decorated and spacious, the location beautiful and convenient for visits to LB, the beach and the various restaurants - alll within a couple of minutes.The staff  is exceptionally nice and helpful. Specifically Blake at the front desk helped to make my wife's birthday a memorable experience. We utilized most of the hotels services.  The golf course is very well maintained and trainers and service around the course are without fault. The Spa was reported by my wife to be very nice although a bit overpriced in comparison. THe pool area is nice and clean,
Manager Response: Tristan K,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us in celebration of your wife's birthday. It is so wonderful to hear that you extended your stay while staying at the resort. Our team wants our guests to leave the resort with lifelong memories and it sounds like the service enhanced your stay. The rooms were designed to reflect the lifestyle of a Laguna local. It is great to see that you took advantage of visiting downtown Laguna Beach, which is only a short drive or trolley ride away. Hopefully you got to visit Heisler Park, Main Beach, the boutique shops and art galleries. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Was a great getaway for the weekend without the kids.  Was very quiet there in the canyon.  We had dinner and breakfast at Harvest and the food was excellent as was the ambience.  Also got out to the Village for dinner one night.  Easy Uber rides up and down the coast.  Would love to come back.
Manager Response: Kevin D,  We are stoked that you got to enjoy a quiet getaway at our resort without the kids. The view of the surrounding canyon from your table at Harvest definitely enhances the ambiance. Downtown Laguna Beach is a great place to enjoy some boutique shops and other unique experiences and we are glad that you got to take advantage of that. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We went for a couple getaway and found everyone at the Ranch very professional, knowledgeable and inviting. Absolutely beautiful surroundings, decor, and casual atmosphere. We ate at the Harvest and really enjoyed the atmosphere and Brussel sprouts were amazing!
Manager Response: Michelle S,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and that you got to enjoy a relaxing stay in the canyon. Our core values include having a knowledgeable team that is connected to the local area and can help guests feel like a Laguna Beach local by providing the inside scoop. When designing the resort, our team wanted the decor to reflect the Laguna Beach culture. Hopefully you got to try the new breakfast and lunch menus that our culinary team recently introduced. The Brussels sprouts are definitely a favorite on the menu. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Chill, quiet, tasty, beautiful. We definitely be back! Like room style and decor, vaulted ceiling makes it more spacious. Amazing nature around. Really friendly stuff and food are really delicious. Outstanding mountain view is the best
Manager Response: 98tommyw,  Congrats on your 4 year anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with a stay at our resort. The canyon is such a quiet and beautiful place to just chill and it is awesome to hear that you took advantage of that. We agree that the vaulted ceilings are a great additional feature that some of our rooms offer to provide that spacious feel like you mentioned. Our team chose to have the decor reflect the culture of Laguna Beach as we want our guests to feel like a local. Hopefully you got to try the new breakfast and lunch menus that our culinary team recently introduced. If not, you will have to join us again soon and try the new offerings. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great Place for a relaxing evening
Summary: This was a great way to have non Formal meeting. Really enjoyed it.  Views were Great with the mountains. The front desk staff was great at Check in made you feel right at home. They were also very nice to help with the cell phone coverage as well.
Manager Response: ChrismN4605YN,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. This is a great spot to have a meeting as the canyon backdrop enhances the ambiance. Our team works hard to ensure our guests feel at home as we want them to experience lifelong memories. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place is absolutely gorgeous. Just a golf cart ride to the beach, a short trolley ride to hikes along cliffs overlooking the ocean, shops and restaurants near but no need to leave the property! Spa service and room service available. Great stay for couples but they even have fun things for the kids.
Manager Response: Sheilaw102,  We are stoked that you chose to stay with us. The weather is starting to feel like summer, so Aliso Beach is a great spot to spend your time. The trolley is a great resource to explore all that Laguna Beach has to offer and we are glad that you took advantage of that opportunity. We will be offering more activities for both couples and families this summer so that our guests can experience the resort in many different ways. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Truly beautiful physical place. Fresh air, lots of great landscaping; cactus and flowers.   wonderful staff, low key atmosphere with under current of "we go the extra mile for guests" Fabulous food  I was in a two bedroom cottage. Well appointed and home like. Great for hiking, watching the sunset. Lots of families good for kids
Manager Response: Pondee,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The natural habitat of the canyon is abundant with great landscaping, fresh air and true beauty like you mentioned. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular for the spacious layout and we are glad that you felt at home in your accommodation as that is one of our main goals. There is nothing like seeing the sunset reflect off the canyon walls here as it is truly stunning. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Peaceful, relaxing and anything you need on the property to keep kids and adults satisfied. Love the outdoor patio with fire-pit great place to enjoy a drink. And the bed is great for a restful sleep.
Manager Response: SandrasF4938AT,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and that you enjoyed a peaceful and relaxing stay at the resort. The canyon definitely allows our guests to unwind from busyness. Like you mentioned, the patio is a great spot on property to enjoy a drink, get comfortable by the fire pits and soak in views of the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The service at The Ranch at Laguna Beach was fantastic. We were headed to the beach and within 5 minutes of asking two chairs and beach towels were delivered to our door. The Ranch is in a great location for exploring the coast and the room was lovely. We would definitely stay there again if we are in the area.
Manager Response: Pospatty,  We are so stoked that you chose to stay with us and got to experience the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while also having access to the beach. Our guest services team works hard to accommodate all guest requests as quickly and efficiently as possible and it is great to hear that you were able to able to enjoy Aliso Beach. Laguna Beach is such a great location to explore the 7+ miles of coastline with over 20 beaches. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A beautiful location tucked away in Laguna.  Dinner was excellent and we really enjoyed sitting on the patio listening to live music overlooking the golf course by the fire pit.  I have stayed all around the area and there is not a better value.
Manager Response: Coltonw558,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Relaxing on the patio while listening to the live music is a great way to soak in the breathtaking views of the surrounding canyon walls. It truly gives our guests the off the beaten path feel. Thank you for the kind words regarding the value of staying with us as the resort offers added value to a guest stay in many ways, including Complimentary Valet Parking & Wi-Fi, plus No Resort Fee. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed for our 20th anniversary, and we were very impressed with the facility and location.  The grounds were so beautiful. And the staff was extremely helpful.  Especially Madison who was very helpful and even called us to ask if they can do anything more. We highly recommend staying there!
Manager Response: BradleyAna,  Congrats on your 20th anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us! Our pre-arrival phone calls and emails to our guests are very important as we want to ensure that we personalize every stay and that our guests can have full enjoyment of their visit to Laguna Beach. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: No Cell Service (Verizon), Nice Decor, Shop Your Rate
Summary: Spent my wedding night at The Ranch and wasn't that impressed. Beautiful canyon location and scenery, property has a cool vibe but...  Rate: I booked directly with hotel online at one rate and my Best Man booked through PL and received a much much lower rate for the same room. I never book through discounters as I hate to see the hotel take a 20%-30% haircut. I hope the hotel will price match.  Sunday Evening Check-In: Hotel was very quiet - maybe 20% occupancy. I asked for a nice room, perhaps a complimentary upgrade for our wedding night? After all, we were in wedding tux and gown attire. Nope. Instead we were put in building 1 - the furthest away from the main building where are the amenities are located. Why do hotels do this? Perhaps a choice of locations could be offered -
Manager Response: 50isthenew40,  Congrats and thank you for choosing to celebrate your wedding night with us. We are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and we value your feedback. After reviewing your reservation, I see that we did match the rate. Regarding your room, I see that you did request an end unit and our team did place you in an end unit. End Units are very popular requests, so we did do our best when assigning your room as we always try to accommodate the requests of our guests. I also see that our Reservations Manager connected with you after your departure and addressed your concerns that you mentioned. Please accept our apologizes for the inconveniences that you experienced.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed at The Ranch for a family wedding. We had such a wonderful stay! The folks that work here were awesome! Everyone was extremely friendly and exceptional in customer service (valet, front desk, wait staff, managers, etc). The grounds are beautiful and rustic. Our room was perfect! Nautical decor with the most comfortable bed and pillows! Very spacious too. We definitely recommend you try the Harvest restaurant - great cocktails and food too.
Manager Response: Pita650,  We are stoked that you were able to attend a wedding at the resort as the canyon wall makes for an ideal backdrop. When our team was designing the guest rooms, we wanted the decor to reflect the culture of Laguna Beach and be natural to the local area. One of our important goals is to make our guests always feel at home and we are glad that our team provided that excellent service during your stay. Hopefully you got to try the new breakfast and lunch menus that our culinary team introduced last week. If not, we invite you to come back to Harvest Restaurant and try the new offerings. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The grandeur of the view, as soon as you enter in the property and see the valley and mountains, is very impressive. They seem to have a very nice golf camp, but I didn't use it, so I can't give my impressions on that. The room, on the other hand, was very nice;  decorativelly and comfortably well furnished. The shower and the bed were outstanding; the bed was very comfortable and clean and the shower had a strong pressure and precise control of the water temperature.I always comment on bed and shower because these two items, to me, are essentials and should be the basic priority in all hotels (but we know that is not always the case).
