I was disappointed with the service, though. They were always very polite, don't get me wrong; the problem was they were very unexperienced and
Manager Response: Boaviagem34,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation. The oversized walk-in showers are popular among our guests due to the reasons you mentioned. Thank you for your feedback as it helps us improve our operations. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced and do not want that be your impression of the resort. Can you please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further?   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I spent last weekend at The Ranch celebrating our anniversary.  It was a last minute trip and I'm so glad we decided to spend our anniversary there.  The grounds are beautiful and so peaceful.  Our room was absolutely beautiful.  I knew as soon as we got there that there was no reason for us to go off site during the weekend.  When we checked into our room there was a bottle of wine and some cookies along with a very nice note wishing us a happy anniversary from Erin.  I had spoke to Erin the day before we arrived with some questions that I had. That was such a pleasant surprise and very much appreciated!! We did the yoga and circuit training classes with Dara both Saturday and Sunday mornings.  Her classes were fantastic!  I'm so glad that I found the classes
Manager Response: Cathy S,  Congrats on your anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. The welcome amenity is our gift to you for this special occasion. The resort is in an ideal location for a romantic occasion as like you mentioned, the surrounding canyon provides a relaxing and peaceful environment, so you can relax on the patio and soak in the views. Fitness classes are a great way to start the day as the sun rises over the canyon walls. We appreciate all of the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Blown away by our stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach!!!!  While we're locals being from Newport Beach, we LOVED out weekend escape/getaway to The Ranch as the property is quiet, tranquil and a little slice of heaven.  Everything from the golf to spa treatments to pool to Harvest restaurant to the rooms were perfect and we'll definitely be back for another weekend getaway!  True highlight though is the staff as it's 5* type treatment, BUT in a relaxed, casual environment matching the charm of Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: NBMatthew,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are so stoked that you were blown away by your stay at the resort. It sounds like you took full advantage of the amenities on property. The weather has been superb, so a round of golf must have been filled with some great fun. Hopefully you got to try the new breakfast and lunch menus that our culinary team introduced last week. The great thing is that you live close by, so there will be some more opportunities for staycations in the near future. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Everything is fantastic !  the check in process was very friendly .All personal were very welcoming ! the rooms are great ! We had the chance to play golf (reservations recommended) ;the golf course is challenging and we had dinner at the restaurant which was excellent!!
Manager Response: CarlosrI7868DI,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. Our team wants our guests to feel at home from the moment they arrive, so it is great to hear that you felt that way. The golf course is so lush right now, so the conditions make it a must play. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the course. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Unable to book taxi to airport causing me to nearly miss my plane.  I tried to correct the person at reception but she still booked the taxi for the wrong day.  Otherwise hotel was fine but certainly not worth the price with this poor level of service.
Manager Response: Kathleen B,  I want to apologize for what appears to be a miscommunication between our front desk agent and yourself and understand that this created undue stress on what should otherwise be a restful stay with us. We have reviewed our process for making reservations for outside guest services and can assure you that it will not happen again. Please accept our apologies and thanks again for visiting The Ranch at Laguna Beach.  Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We visited the ranch for a wedding. The service was excellent from the beginning. Rooms were comfortable and has everything we needed. Very relaxing. The creek side rooms have a walk in closet. We never left the grounds. Easy to walk to the market for all of our meals. Food was excellent. I would definitely come back
Manager Response: CynthiabU659IJ,  We are stoked that you got to attend a wedding at the resort as the surrounding canyon wall is definitely a beautiful backdrop for a ceremony. It sounds like you made the most out of your stay by experiencing a variety of amenities. Hopefully you got to enjoy the new breakfast and lunch menus that our culinary team introduced last week. If not, I would invite you back to try the new offerings. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Staff and service on point. Drinks poured stiff at the bar, the rooms were incredibly cozy, and the pool was open 24hrs. Great location tucked away in the hills-quiet and relaxing. It was a great experience, we will be returning for a longer stay in the future.
Manager Response: AmandadT2684LZ,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a birthday getaway. We are thrilled to hear that our team was on point and paid close attention to detail, which is very important especially since you were celebrating a special occasion. We want our guests to always feel at home while they are staying with us and we want for many lifelong memories to be taken home. With warmer weather on the horizon, hopefully that will provide an opportunity for a longer stay later this spring or summer. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, in Laguna but not at the beach
Summary: Our stay was nice.  Walking distance to the beach, and staff will golf cart you down to the main road.  Free Long Beach shuttle drives through the property to pick up/drop off every 20 minutes or so.  Beds were very comfortable, rocking chairs on personal patios are a very nice touch.  Prompt room service, 24-hr pool.
Manager Response: Salinarae,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Even though we are not oceanfront, our resort offers something special with the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon and also having access to the beach. The trolley is a great way to experience a variety of areas in town, so we are glad that you took advantage of that. The outdoor space with each accommodation were designed for our guests to relax and soak in the views of the canyon as it offers such a different perspective of Laguna Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a beautiful hotel n a stunning location. It is the right spot if you come to relax and you are still close to many other restaurants outside. We however stayed in the hotel as we did not want to leave such a beautiful place.
Manager Response: Yasmine M,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us for three nights. You are spot on in saying the resort is a wonderful place to relax as it is off the beaten path and away from the hustle and bustle. The surrounding canyon is so peaceful and quiet. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Hotel was very pretty, food was great, stay was family friendly.  There is definitely a need for more lounge chairs in the pool area.  Guests paying 500$/night were forced to spread out towels on hot cement to enjoy the pool which is unacceptable for a high end resort and a major dissatisfier.  Since we went for the sun and pool, this definitely affected my perspective of the resort.
Manager Response: TaikoM,  We appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you found the resort to be family friendly and it sounds like you enjoyed some delicious meals. Our culinary team introduced a new breakfast and lunch menu this week, so you will have to come back and try the new offerings. We apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced at the pool and thank you for letting us know. Please know that we are addressing this by purchasing some more lounge chairs. We value your feedback and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Its in a great location surro ded by mountains. The rooms are beautifully decorated, beds are super comfy. The pool, amenities, service... all the staff was very nice and helpful. I would definitely come back
Manager Response: Mariabrasero,  We are stoked that you chose to stay with us and thrilled to hear that you felt like a stay at our resort was hidden paradise. When our team designed the rooms and other facilities, they wanted the decor to reflect the culture of the local area. Our team wants all of our guests to take lifelong memories back home with them when they leave the canyon. Thank you for the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: there for just a night and a morning.  wished i could have had a week. The staff was great. Food excellent and room perfect. both my meals were fun, well prepared and tasty.  will look for a chance to return
Manager Response: CharlessJ5948GX,  We are grateful that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation and also dining at Harvest Restaurant. Our culinary team will be introducing some new offerings to the menu over the next few weeks, so you will have to come back again soon to taste them yourself. Hopefully this will help lead to the chance you mentioned to return.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This lovely resort is located in a canyon a short walk to the ocean. The setting is breathtaking and cozy. The ocean is also breathtaking and feels very natural as it is out of the fray of the Laguna Beach action. The setting for the dining room encourages lingering over food and conversation as it affords a panoramic view of the golf course and canyon.
Manager Response: Marymeyer,  We are thankful that you chose to stay with us and that you found the canyon setting to be both breathtaking and cozy. You are right in that South Laguna Beach and Aliso Beach are so relaxing as you are away from the hustle and bustle of downtown. Like you mentioned, the views of the golf course and canyon definitely enhance the ambiance at Harvest Restaurant. We look forward to your return visits soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a fun 2 days/nights at the hotel.  The property is fantastic, overlooking the well-maintained golf course and the beautiful canyon.  The room itself exceeded my expectations. We had plenty of space for our family of 5. I don't like that they charged us an additional $40 for a rollaway bed when we were paying for one of the top room categories. The pool was basic, but perfect for a low-key weekend.  The pool bar is only open Fri-Sun.  I was there on a Thursday and was offered a drink by a waiter.  I happily accepted. They charged a $5 delivery charge, plus a 22% service charge, so it was pricey, but I was glad that the service was available.  The 4 stars is because the level of service is not as high as I would have liked to see for a resort of this caliber.  We waited an
Manager Response: Carrie H,  We are stoked to hear how much you loved the canyon setting of the resort. It is wonderful to hear that your accommodation exceeded your expectations. When designing the resort accommodations, our team really wanted the decor to reflect the culture of Laguna Beach so our guests will feel like a local. We always try our absolute best to accommodate all of our guest requests, including early check-in, but unfortunately, we cannot always guarantee them. Your feedback is of great value to us and thank you for sharing. We look forward to your return visits soon.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My little boy and I stayed here for a fun get away over Spring Break and had an amazing time.  Fun games for the kids, walking distance to the beach, and the restaurant is incredible.  There is even a volley ball court outside some of the rooms.
Manager Response: 29melindak,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us over spring break. We are glad that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds with relaxing in the canyon, while also having access to Aliso Beach. Our team is really focusing on having a variety of games on the patio for all to enjoy, so it is wonderful to hear that you liked that offering. The sand volleyball court is a great way to have some fun in the Laguna Beach sun. We appreciate all of the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice for families, but we definitely had issues
Summary: The valet guys were super sweet with our three year old! We tried to check in but our room was not ready for hours and even when we got our room, the carpets were soaked from being cleaned. We notified reception and they brought some fans, which did not help. We had to deal with wet floors for two days. The pool was nice but we had to call for towels. Bens was ok- overpriced s'mores kits and they wouldn't light the fires because the people sitting there didn't want them lit. The room and harvest were great for families!
Manager Response: Cdkelly13,  We greatly appreciate that you chose to stay with us. It is great to hear that the resort and restaurant was great for your family. We apologize for the carpet issue that occurred with your accommodation as this is just not acceptable and definitely not up at our standards. I have followed up with our management team and someone will be reaching out to you shortly.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Overall our stay at The Ranch was dreamy.  You could be anywhere in the world when you are back in that little canyon surrounded by green trees and breeze.  While in the dining room I often had the feeling that I was in another country.  So nice to look out the windows and just see nature. We can hardly wait to repeat our experience there.
Manager Response: Paulained2017,  We greatly appreciate that you chose to stay with us. Your description of feeling like you can be anywhere in the world is spot on as the canyon provides a different perspective of Laguna Beach. When designing the restaurant, we wanted our guests to enjoy the view of the natural beauty of the canyon right from their table. We look forward to your repeat experience at our resort in the near future.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We wanted to getaway but only had a a short amount of time. Granted The Ranch is an hour away from home we felt a world away. It was so nice. So relaxing. Fantastic for the kiddos. We will definably be back.
Manager Response: Danielle S,  We are stoked that you were able to experience a relaxing staycation in the canyon with your family. It sounds like you took advantage of some of the family programming that the resort offers. We want to make sure we offer a variety of activities for our guests to enjoy. Hopefully this can become a regular occurrence for the family.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Met friends for dinner and drinks. Just love the new environment. Food and drinks are great. 3rd visit this month and really enjoy it.  Great young chef from NY. Windows open completely to create nice open air spot with amazing surrounding of the canyons.
Manager Response: DebwithaY,  Thank you for choosing to dine with us at Harvest Restaurant for the third time this month. It is great to hear how much you enjoy the reimagined design that allows for great views of the surrounding canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This place was everything I imagined. The restaurant is not to be missed. The absolute highlight of our stay. They have a wonderful shuttle service to the beach. The rooms were comfy and classy. Being away  from all the crowds was just what we were looking for.
Manager Response: 258dustinw,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed Harvest Restaurant and that it was the highlight of your stay. You picked the right spot to avoid the crowds as we invite our guests to get caught up in the world of a Laguna local that’s off the beaten path in every sense. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We spend 5 nights at The Ranch at Laguna with our 3 kids for their spring break. Wish we could have stayed longer. It's such a beautiful setting, rooms were so comfortable and beautifully decorated. The golf course & dining were both top notch. It's just a couple of minutes to drive into Laguna or any of the nearby beaches. Disneyland is also totally doable in a day with an easy 1hr drive. We absolutely loved the peacefulness of The Ranch- hope to return soon!
Manager Response: Susan O,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that your family enjoyed a five night spring break vacation at our resort. The peacefulness of the canyon is a strong attraction for our guests. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the golf course. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a little piece of Heaven hidden in the valley.  The view is spectacular.  We had a wonderful weekend of relaxation.  We enjoyed breakfast, lunch, golf and drinks in the Harvest Restaurant--all of which were tasty and greatly presented.  All of the staff we encountered were gracious, helpful and very friendly.  Our room was beautifully decorated, comfortable and met all of our needs.  The bedside chocolates were a special treat at the end of the day.  Thank you to all for a wonderful weekend.
Manager Response: S6788CPdavidt,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a wonderful weekend of relaxation at the resort that included golf and some delicious meals at Harvest. It sounds like you took some great memories home with you. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Mostly great with a couple wrinkles
Summary: The Ranch Laguna Beach has very strong positives and a couple of drawbacks which will be no big deal if you know about them in advance.  Customer service is impeccable - staff are helpful, friendly, and anticipate your needs.  Location is excellent - in a gorgeous canyon away from the crowds and noise, but with everything you need onsite (there is a public beach a short walk away.)  Rooms are spacious, well-supplied, and comfortable/luxurious; pool and hot tub are nice; restaurant is very solid with a welcoming bar; fitness area is small but has the basics.  Not so good: know in advance that the resort hosts A LOT of events (there was a wedding a day during my April stay) and this will make some amenities off limits (deck and parts of main restaurant taken up for event) and will
Manager Response: Nc1701d,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you during the stay and that you enjoyed the resort facilities. It sounds like you got to experience a variety of amenities. Our resort does host weddings and events, but we do not want it to affect the experience of our guests. We apologize regarding the parking situation and for any items that were not properly communicated to you. We appreciate your feedback as it helps us improve our operations. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Well worth the price of admission.  Our other options were generic beach hotels, whereas this was set in the canyon with gorgeous views surrounding us.  The lodge was awesome with firepits and the golf course looked cool too
Manager Response: M7077ZWandrewc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The fire pits on the patio are a great way to relax and enjoy the peaceful nature of the canyon. Hopefully you saw some of the mule deer as they like to greet our guests. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A wonderful secluded hotel in the center of laguna beach
Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is secluded yet within walking distance to the town and to the beach. The property is large and is in a canyon.  You can even see deers on the golf course. The rooms are nice and large .  Service is great
Manager Response: Timetotravel324,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The mule deer are very friendly and we are glad that they greeted you. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the spacious design of the guest rooms and that our team took excellent care of you. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a fantastic stay here, excellent location and very nice facilities. Would return here in the future. Rooms were very spacious and well presented. Golf course looked very well looked after. Bed was also very comfortable
Manager Response: Mreeves85,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the canyon location of the resort and also the facilities/accommodations. We wanted to incorporate the Laguna culture into the design of the guest rooms and facilities. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were there last year when they were in the midst of the refurbishment.  I have to say they did an excellent job on the rooms, decorations, fabulous bed, caring and attentive staff.  The restaurant serves excellent food for all meals. There is a challenging 9 hole golf course in Aliso Canyon so you are surrounding by majestic hills.  We played 9 holes one day and 18 holes(9 twice)...and enjoyed each shot.   There is a pool and a spa and 24 hour fitness center...as well as activities such as Falconry...and mountain biking and a shuttle into town (a few miles)if you don't want to drive...also across from the ocean.
Manager Response: CAYCE000,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we appreciate the kind words regarding the reimagined resort. It sounds like you took advantage of a variety of amenities on property and know the golf course quite well after three rounds. We are now finished with the renovation, so we invite you back to see the completion.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The views from the pool and the restaurant were beautiful and the beach is just a quick golf cart ride away. My only complaint was that the balcony to our room was never in the sun so too cold to use during our stay. Rooms were pretty expensive, but we would return again. Staff from pro shop, bens pantry, harvest restaurant housekeeping and bell service were always smiling and helpful. Our first trip to laguna beach and we will definitely return!
Manager Response: Evelyn C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your first trip to Laguna Beach. It sounds like you had a great first impression of the resort and Laguna Beach while getting to experience a variety of activities. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Feels like a million miles away
Summary: Beautiful resort! Our cottage overlooked the creek, and was beautifully decorated. The bed was unbelievably comfortable. We loved hanging out on the outdoor patio between the restaurant and the golf shop - lots of chairs, couches, fire pits, and all overlooking the golf course. We ate breakfast at the outdoor deck in Harvest Restaurant - good food, great presentation, and again, overlooking the golf course. We will go back for another getaway weekend.
Manager Response: Waterdog07,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the features of the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite and also a delicious breakfast at Harvest. The patio is a popular spots for our guests to relax and enjoy the views of the canyon/golf course and we are glad that you took advantage of that. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Pool bar is awesome. Spa is tiny but relaxing. Harvest restaurant has great service and good food. Close to beach so got a beach run in. Definite all-in-one experience. Golf is a good option. Snack bar was a nice option.
Manager Response: Allison H,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had an all-in-one experience by enjoying a variety of amenities at the resort. The beach is a great spot to enjoy the views of the coastline. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The resort is beautifully located in a canyon within walking distance to the beach. The room (Creekside suite) was lovely and peaceful. The service was exceptional. Our daughter left behind her favourite soft toy which the staff found and are sending to us. In the meantime we have received email updates with some hilarious photos of the toy's adventures! Golf is $20 for 9 holes for hotel guests. Laguna beach trolley comes onto the property to pick up/drop off guests at the weekend.
Manager Response: BritinPerth,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are glad to hear that it was a fabulous stay. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you and that your daughter's toy was located. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Simply an amazing resort! This trip was for a Mother/ Daughter relaxing getaway during spring break.. We stayed in a Creekside Studio Suite, it was large and very spacious and truly enjoyed relaxing on our private furnished patio that overlooked the creek while listening to birds sing.  We had an amazing time being pampered at Sycamore Spa with the best facials we have ever had, Dawn and Diane are extremely talented and provided a very personalized treatment.  I highly recommend trying their Bacon Bourbon Cinnamon Rolls, they are Amazing!!! The Ranch at Laguna Beach is the perfect location to create those special family memories you will always remember! Can't wait to go back again in August!!
Manager Response: 281erinw,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a Mother/Daughter getaway. It is great to hear that you experienced memories that you will always remember at our resort and it sounds like you took advantage of a lot of the property amenities. The Bacon Bourbon Cinnamon Rolls are definitely a favorite choice among our guests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Exceeded my expectations in terms of room, service, food and incredible view. Beautiful property. Cell coverage is OK by the creek road, but not in buildings. Patio food and happy hour were great, including music.
Manager Response: S2645XYneilw,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that the resort exceeded your expectations in a variety of areas. Enjoying the views of the canyon on the patio while listening to the live music sounds like a great way to spend the afternoon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: This is not a luxury hotel
Summary: Pretty location but understaffed. Services were poor. We did not feel like it was a luxury resort. Had to call numerous times for simple things that other hotels would provide. Towels, coffee, sugar, ice. No true master bedroom. No running water in a weak kitchenette so you have to get water from the bathroom for your coffee. Spa was ridiculously overpriced.
Manager Response: 18traceyn,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We value your feedback as it helps us improve our operations and we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Highly recommend The Ranch at Laguna, but probably not for families with young children, but definitely for couples, friends, and large group events.  Location is tucked in one of the beautiful canyons of Laguna, with the beach just a half a mile away.  A quiet retreat with a spa and exercise facility.  Love it!
Manager Response: N4013BPbobh,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you loved the quiet nature of the surrounding canyon. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful Ranch with excellent accommodations and customer service!
Summary: This was our first stay and we will definitely be back!  The Ranch is in a beautiful more secluded location but very close to the main road and downtown Laguna Beach.  The incredible customer service started the minute we drove up.  Every employee we came in contact with was so genuinely friendly and helpful.  The food at the Harvest restaurant was delicious!
Manager Response: Sharlynn C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your first experience at our resort. It is so great to hear that our team took excellent care of you from the moment you arrived on property and that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest. Our goal is to make every guest feel like family. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice resort on north end of Laguna Beach
Summary: Nice resort across the street from beach that's at north end of Laguna Beach. A little too far to walk into town. Good rooms Fitness Center ok. Restaurant good for breakfast. A little limited for dinner but what's there is good. Great selection of beers at the bar.
Manager Response: RS L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation and also having access to the beach. Our culinary team is working on adding new items to the menu as it will change seasonally and continue to evolve. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our quick but spectacular stay began with a round of  golf for 10 followed by cocktails and appetizers while enjoying the beautiful view. We ended the evening with a delicious and fun dinner in the Harvest restaurant.  We live less than a mile away but felt like we were in a different state. The Ranch is truly a unique and special place, we can't wait to return and hope to stay longer than 24 hours!!
Manager Response: Hollyw876  Thank you for choosing to stay, dine and golf with us. It sounds like you made the most of your 24 hours of fun at our resort and it is great to hear that you live so close. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Good Bones, but not there yet.
Summary: The Ranch is in a beautiful  canyon location in Laguna. We booked a girls' birthday weekend with the hopes of being pampered there. While we had a pleasant weekend, there were a series of disappointments at what we thought was a top notch resort:  no recognition of my friend's special occasion until we pressed, the indoor yoga space barely fit 6 of us, there is no steam room in the spa (and treatments are pricey), no complimentary coffee (aside from in room Keurig, which we were told we had to pay for after using what was there) and our "suite", while nicely decorated, was just a room with the addition of a pull-out couch and a view of the parking lot. With more attention to detail, this resort could reach it's full potential, but I'm not rushing back.
Manager Response: 920carynr,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the canyon location of the resort. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations and value your feedback. Please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I have lived in Southern California since 1984, frequented Laguna Beach forever, but have never been to The Ranch?? Friends from St. Louis, yet turned us onto it. This day it was a dear girl friend's birthday, so five gals went for lunch. Such a treat! Service incredible, scenery/ambiance wonderful, plus the menu fabulous! We spent the entire afternoon laughing, enjoying the great views. Mikala was our server & she was a delight. Very special place. If you are a golfer, even more so! Can't wait to take my husband here.
Manager Response: Bebe44,  Thank you for choosing to dine with us at Harvest Restaurant in celebration of a birthday. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your first experience at our resort and now we hope that you become a regular. We look forward to when you return with your husband.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We live locally but wanted two nights of relaxed Laguna Beach experience for our anniversary. We got it! Loved this place and will enjoy going back again. The staff are great. The facilities are great. The food and drinks are great. What else do you need to say.
Manager Response: Michael G,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear how much you loved the resort and that our team took excellent care of you. Two nights of relaxing in the canyon sounds like a great way to celebrate. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The one br suite was wonderful and the salmon and flat iron steak dinners were some of the best we have ever eaten, although the chicken was overly salty. The patio is a great place for a drink and relaxation
Manager Response: Ron L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the Creekside One Bedroom Suite and the flat iron steak at Harvest Restaurant. Relaxing on the patio and soaking in the views of the canyon sounds like a great time. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Potential to be a nice property.
Summary: Construction of main road from units to restaurant was a issue during my stay but not something that would take away from a positive experience.  People at the hotel are pleasant, warn and helpful.  I would return for vacation but not for business.
Manager Response: 768rickj,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our apologizes regarding any inconveniences the work being done on the main road might have caused. The result of the work being done will be beneficial to our guests and the resort. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you doing the stay. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Delightful experience! . Wedding was perfect , service very good , enjoyed the stay immensely .  Only concern I have is I have not received an email receipt of the final bill.  I will recommend to friends most definitely!
Manager Response: Lynn V,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you enjoyed experiencing the wedding in the canyon and that our team took excellent care of you. Our apologizes regarding your folio. I have just sent it to the email address on file for the reservation. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The rooms have been upgraded and remodeled nicely. All services were great and the food at Harvest was fantastic.  The menu is limited, but everything we ordered was delicious with high quality ingredients.
Manager Response: Maile G,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the reimagined accommodations and also some delicious meals at Harvest. Our culinary team will be adding new items to the menu as it will change seasonally and continue to evolve. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Loved everything from my room to the restaurant to the view from my room.  Everyone was so nice and helpful.  My room was ready early as I had requested and I love how the check out time is Noon.  We had room service breakfast and the wait was under 30 mins.  Awseome.
Manager Response: LisagS5090KC,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the views of the Aliso & Wood Canyons and also some delicious meals at Harvest. Our team does our best to accommodate all requests and it is great to hear that we were able to have your accommodation ready early. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great hidden spot in Aliso Canyon - rooms lack character in decor - Harvest was excellent and staff very attentive.  Lack of parking was an issue but there was a main water line that was being replaced -
Manager Response: Patrickj283,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals in Harvest Restaurant and that our team took excellent care of you. We apologize for the parking issue and appreciate your patience. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Don't look anywhere else, just stay here.
Summary: After my wife and I decided we weren't going to stay at the hotel we originally made a reservation at (due to it's questionable nature and the general uncomfortable vibe it was giving us) we last minute made a reservation at the Ranch at Laguna Beach. The staff was incredibly helpful and kind, the rooms were clean and cool, the property was beautiful and relaxing. Unless you're looking to stay on the beach there is no better option in Laguna Beach, and quite frankly, the Ranch is so close to the beach you should just stay here anyway! I really hope to be back and to stay longer next time.
Manager Response: 987mitchellc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for thinking of us when your travel plans changed. We are thrilled to hear that you and your wife had such a wonderful time at the resort and that our team took such great care of you. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Gorgeous venue and outstanding customer service!
Summary: The Ranch is perfect place for a romantic weekend getaway.  The grounds are beautiful, Harvest restaurant is excellent, Ben Brown's course is a lot fun and overall outstanding customer service.  Will be back soon!
Manager Response: ClaudiapE821VV,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a romantic weekend getaway. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the canyon location of the resort and that our team took excellent care of you. It sounds like you also got to enjoy a nice round on golf at Brown's Golf Course and some delicious meals in Harvest Restaurant. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Incredible place very magical and retreat like
Summary: The Ranch is a fantastic resort with all the amenities you need. The food whether the restaurant, cafe or in room dining is amazing which impressed us. The 9-hole is a fun course and though the spa is small it does have a lovely serene feel and incredible massage therapists. The scenery is breathtaking and you have a view from every room of the property. It is so close to the beach but feels like you are in a mountain retreat. Very calming and serene with plenty of life at the golf course and restaurant if you want it. Close to downtown Laguna. Golf shop also offers great apparel and golf accessories. There are also fun games just outside the shop over looking the course like cornhole and a putting skee-ball. Overall we just love this place and will continue to come back every
Manager Response: Sashamclines,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you have experienced the resort for different occasions, whether it was the girls weekend or the couples trip. It sounds like you have taken advantage of a lot of the fun activities on property. We plan to add more activities as we gear up for summer, so stay tuned. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Overpriced resort best enjoyed by golf lovers
Summary: Beautiful canyon with delightful trails... for golfers. We imagined walking the length of the canyon but were quickly brought into line by a teenager on a golf cart who cited 'safety precautions' as the reason we were not allowed to walk on the trail (which by the way was marked with a warning about mountain lions and poisonous insects but neglected to mention golf balls). Somehow golfers' little caps must protect them from head injuries because golfers were allowed to walk the course. Strange.   Well, the beach then. We walked the resort road and then under the highway through a pedestrian tunnel. We needed the exercise, but I would hate to do it with kids and equipment in tow.   Massage? I don't know about you, but I find $185 exorbitant for a massage, especially if you leave
Manager Response: LoulaGod,  We value your feedback and thank you for sharing your experience at our resort. We are sorry that your expectations were not met. We do not let anyone access the golf course besides golfers due to safety like our team member explained. We also do provide a complimentary shuttle to PCH that allows for a short walk to the beach so that way guests do not have to walk all of the way to the beach from the resort property. The resort does add value to each stay by offering complimentary parking and Wi-Fi and no resort fee. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss your experience further.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I need to preface my rating (4 stars instead of 5).  I came here to do a site visit for my company's meeting. I was intending to compare this property to others that we have held the meeting at or were planning on holding the meeting at (ie: Fairmont Grand, Bacara, Ojai Valley Inn and Spa, Rancho Valencia,  and Terranea).  This resort is different but if I were to compare it, I would give it a 4 stars.  With that said, it is a very fine establishment that needs to be in its own category.  I think the resort that it most resembles is Rancho Valencia.  IT is more of a boutique resort.  Although its dining and service is 5 stars, its amenity is lacking compared to the previously mentioned resort.  First off, it is small.  Only 90 some rooms.  IT is not a spa focused resort.  And
Manager Response: Saysum,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a site visit for your company's meeting. We value your feedback and appreciate that you took the time to share your experience. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you during the stay and that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest. Like you said, our guests enjoy staying in the canyon to relax by removing themselves from the hustle and bustle of Southern California. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Heavenly resort-like ambience in our own back yard!
Summary: This completely renovated property is absolutely gorgeous! It features a resort-quality lodge which houses a very nice restaurant, patio areas, and a special events level. The lodge is surrounded by a compliment of elegantly furnished hotel/patio rooms, a spectacular golf course, walking areas, and a casual area for drinks and snacks, all nestled up against the rocky hillsides that make Laguna Laguna.. It would be a dream-come-true wedding venue. I met a group of friends for breakfast in the restaurant one weekday morning. The staff was exceptionally helpful and polite. The only detail that kept it from being a perfect experience was food (eggs Benedict) that was served cold, with undercooked eggs.
Manager Response: 47Juicyfruitgirl,  Thank you for dining with us at Harvest Restaurant and for sharing your experience. The resort is definitely a popular destination for weddings as the canyon wall makes for a wonderful backdrop. We apologize for the food quality issue you experience and thank you for letting us know as that helps us improve our operations. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It was great ! It met all our expectations. Would stay in Creekside again when traveling to the area. Everyone was very hospitable and friendly. Fire pits were fun. Reasonable access to some great beaches.
Manager Response: Ronald K,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that your expectations were met and that you enjoyed your stay in one of our Creekside Suites. The fire pits are definitely a great way to relax and enjoy the view of the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch has been recently updated. Definitely a ranch feel but not far from the beach. Great location and great service. Unique experience vs other hotels and resorts. More of a boutique feel. More of a low pro experience which is very nice. Service was excellent. Restaurant was good and lots of locals come which is a great sign.
Manager Response: 887stephenz,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the canyon location of the resort and that our team took excellent care of you. It sounds like you also got to enjoy some delicious meals in Harvest Restaurant. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I agree with what the last few reviewers said! It really was a fantastic stay! Truly a perfect family vacation with 3 teenagers and my husband. The property is absolutely gorgeous and the rooms are a generous size. I would highly recommend staying there.
Manager Response: Chris O,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a fantastic family vacation in the canyon and that the accommodation fit the needs of the family. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: While our Creekside room was nice and spacious, it was overlooking a dried-out creek/culvert and far from everything.  Building looked like service accommodations rather than guest accommodations.  No bottled water in room other than $5 small bottle for purchase and "happy hour" including "20% off food and drinks" with no courtesy food or drink whatsoever.  This is very different from our experience at other hotels.  The property is not accessible to the beach (other than by shuttle) and all other activities must be arranged and paid for through third-party providers. Pool and fitness room were nice and entire resort has been updated but still not good value for the money.
Manager Response: M8981GWgeorgeb,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are sorry that your expectations were not met. While we took the buildings down to the studs and did a complete renovation, we liked the scattered campus layout and most of our guests seem to appreciate the intimacy of the vignette groupings it creates as opposed to the standard big box hotels. We are working on developing more activities and family programming for our guests and will be implementing them soon. Please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Best regards,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a great time at The Ranch at Laguna Beach. The resort has a great location and it is surrounded by the most beautiful canyon landscape. It is only a short drive to downtown but removed from the bustle. We could easily walk to exquisite beaches. Throughout the resort there are numerous touches and details that are evidence of excellent, personal management that can be found only at singular facilities, not luxury chains. All of the staff was friendly and accommodating to our family, and they made an effort to welcome our children. But there is also plenty of privacy and room for adults to be apart from kids. It is a great place for a peaceful and relaxing trip.
Manager Response: Chris60745,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took great care of you during the stay and that you enjoyed a peaceful and relaxing trip in the canyon. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach and also a short drive to downtown. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: On the website The Ranch advertises lots of actives (golf, the beach, walking trails and biking) and a property were canyon meets sea.  They neglect to tell you you there is a 4 lane highway separating the two.  Upon checking in the only active on site was the golf course.  Every other activity, including the beach, needed a car to get to and you have to pay a third party for any equipment needed.  Unless you like golf there's nothing to do except pool. The resort is set in the middle of canyon which felt like being in the bottom of a bowl with only a small road to access which would not be safe for children to walk.  The rooms look like servants' live-in quarters and cel phone service doesn't work, you have to use wifi.  Staff provided minimal assistance unless they felt they
Manager Response: Wendybabits,   We apologize that we did not meet your expectations and value your feedback. Our team does provide beach chairs and towels for guests who want to enjoy the beach and we do provide a complimentary shuttle that allows only a short walk to the beach. It appears that some miscommunication with activities onsite vs. offsite might have occurred as well. We do offer mountain bike rentals, but the trails are offsite for both biking and hiking and are not accessible directly from the resort. We apologize for the inconveniences. Please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,   Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: After a long, dusty day of softball, my daughter and I pulled into the Ranch and were immediately greeted by a friendly "ranch hand" who directed us to the front desk for check-in.  When we got out of the car we were blown away by the lush, green surroundings and the beautiful lobby nestled in the middle of the mountains. Blake, at the front desk, checked us in and gave us a quick run down of the history of the Ranch and everything it had to offer.  We followed our "ranch hand" to our room which was across an old, rustic bridge and bordered by a babbling creek and waterfall.  Our ranch hand was over the top helpful, even offering to carry my daughter's dirty cleats!  Upon entering the room we noticed the incredible cheese plate that was left for us, a welcomed snack after a day
Manager Response: Jennifer B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your experience. We value our guest feedback and it is great to receive such wonderful compliments. The recent rain has really created a lush environment on the canyon walls. It is great to hear that our team provided excellent service and helped create memories. The cheese plate amenity sounds like a great way to refresh after a day at the fields. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Everything from the room, to the service, to the Harvest restaurant was excellent. We arrived after all the rain so the canyon was picturesque. It was exactly what I wanted, a peaceful romantic, yet cozy place for me and the hubby to enjoy some R&R. I would definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: N3272WRvanessas,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you got to enjoy a peaceful and romantic celebration. The rain has definitely made the surrounding canyon environment very lush. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our family enjoyed every minute of our stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach. Every staff member was friendly and went above and beyond what is expected to ensure we enjoyed our stay. The room was clean and nicely decorated, the food wonderful and the atmosphere is like an oasis. Great for couples and families.
Manager Response: Maryleep2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that your family enjoyed every minute of your stay at our resort and that our team provided excellent service. It sounds like the family got to enjoy some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant and also the location of the resort in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: the facility, food and service were absolutely excellent. The only negative was no or poor cell  due to being  located in a canyon. It's a beautiful setting. i would definitely return, would just need to have family members have the phone number of the resort.
Manager Response: Ian A,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the food, service, and the resort location plus facilities. Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The value was above expectations.  Food served well and very good.  There was excellent customer service all employees asking if there was anything needed or desired.  Beds very comfortable.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: BlumeskinCentre,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that the value in staying at our resort was above expectations and that our team took excellent care of you. It sounds like you also enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest Restaurant. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: with the exception of the parking snd the very poor service of the wait staff with the exception of Sunday Morning we enjoyed our stay at the hotel. i am not going to write any more. I have told you all that you need to know
Manager Response: Q4643TNdavidi,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed your stay in the canyon. We value your feedback as it helps us improve our operations and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I would highly suggest a stay over at Ranch at Laguna Beach. The rooms are nice with modern décor & the staff is all super friendly. The views from the bar/restaurant are just gorgeous. Golf and Spa ideal. Great for business ,couples families or single getaway.  Thumbs up!!
Manager Response: SandygP800QR,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the view of the canyon from Harvest Restaurant and the décor in the guest rooms. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Golf was awesome. The outside sitting area above 18th hole was relaxing. The restaurant was beautifully done and the room was perfect quiet and fully stocked!  In addition the bed was clean and super comfortable. I loved how big the shower was as you could actually move around. The decor was friendly and the bathrobes were. Pay!!
Manager Response: Hottea2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your accommodation and Harvest Restaurant, plus you got to play a round of golf on Ben Brown's. Hopefully some deer greeted you. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location. loved the atmosphere. the dining menu seemed a bit limited. THe new rooms were great. liked all the lighting in the rooms. need more parking. the rooms seemed a bit pricey. i don't know what else to say.
Manager Response: 330done,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear about how much you loved the atmosphere of the canyon. The culinary team will be offering different selections on the menu seasonally, so look out for new selections in the future. Our team adds value to a guest stay by offering Complimentary Wi-Fi and Valet Parking, plus No Resort Fee. We appreciate the feedback and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: attended a birthday dinner at The Ranch restaurant.  the property is somewhat hidden away and the quiet, the views, the food, the service- all pretty perfect.  those who used the hotel loved it- recommended it highly.
Manager Response: GeeLongIsland_NY,  Thank you for choosing to dine at Harvest Restaurant. It is great to hear about your experience and that our team did an excellent job taking care of the birthday party group. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits. Hopefully you can stay at the hotel during your next visit.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Calm / casual stay with young kids
Summary: Great alternative to the more busy downtown PCH hotels. They are extra friendly and accommodating. Beach is closer than you think but the canyon provides amazing still and calm. Great space for kids to explore.  Food is terrific - must try breakfast enchiladas!  Ask about the two story / two bedroom units if you have kids.  It's a life saver from having to whisper after they go down or be stuck out on a patio.  Rooms are well done with nicer than expected style, fixtures, furniture.  I'd defintely stay here again.  Only negative is the beds were a bit too soft for my liking.
Manager Response: C_Grade,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is a good fit for families and we are glad that your family enjoyed it. The breakfast enchiladas are definitely a favorite in Harvest Restaurant and we appreciate the recommendation. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: First let me start by saying that the trip to complete this place is way beyond the space here.  The finished product is to say the least, over the top!  You have to see it to understand.  That's the sugar.  Now the molasses . The food , while okay, is far below any standard.  Sitting at the bar, I had full view of the restaurant, and the amount of food going back to the kitchen on plates,half eaten  was staggering.  There is not a comfort food  item on the menu for a 60+ couple.  Just my opinion.
Manager Response: Mike M,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the feedback as it helps us improve our operations. The culinary team will be offering different selections on the menu seasonally, so look out for new selections in the future as the menu evolves. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com if you would like to discuss your experience in further detail.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I were very pleased with the Ranch and our stay there. The location was very convenient and our room was bright, clean and quiet. The Ranch was the perfect place to rest and renew ourselves!
Manager Response: C3027PTbarbarar,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you and your husband got to rest and renew yourselves in the canyon. The canyon definitely offers a quiet environment and we are glad that you took advantage of that. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Absolutely loved our stay here. I am a solo traveler with a service dog, and I was thankful for the kind treatment and approach to him. The room was beautiful, stunning decor, comfy and cozy. Wonderful afternoon live music with smores, lush golf greens, (I can appreciate though I don't play). It was so nice to take a late night soak in the jacuzzi and the beach was just a short walk away. Loved the spa and and early morning yoga class. The restaurant was warm and inviting with yummy food. It was a fantastic stay and I would definitely recommend it. A few names hat need to be mentioned: Madison for providing 5 star service and being very detailed, including a cute little surprise for my birthday. Zoriama, the massage therapist for being a great listener and addressing my needs,
Manager Response: 208annelia,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to read about all of your experiences in the canyon and how much you loved the stay. It sounds like you took advantage of a lot of the amenities and made the most of your trip. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Quiet seclusion just off the beaten path
Summary: A great hideaway just minutes to all that is Laguna Beach. The property is beautiful with lovely views. Service was excellent from the moment I pulled in right through departure. My room was tastefully decorated, bright and light. Happy Hour on the patio, sitting next to a firepit, watching the sun sink below the canyon walls was wonderful. The heated salt water pool and spa were just the thing at the end of the day  I would not hesitate to recommend this resort to anyone
Manager Response: Scwhite99,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that our team provided excellent service from the moment you arrived. Enjoying happy hour on the patio while watching the sunset in the canyon and relaxing in the saline pool/hot tub sounds like a great way to experience the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice rooms. Good food. Staff very attentive. The grounds and view are beautiful. We don't golf, but for golfers it would be an excellent choice. We read negative reviews about The Harvest restaurant service, but we had great service.
Manager Response: F8799UGnancyl,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the resort grounds and that our team took excellent care of you. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great spot super pretty and relaxing! Close to beach but tucked away in canyon and on great golf course. Yummy restaurant and great happy hour on the patio with live music and little fire pits. Great for a couples get a way or families too. I would just suggest if you want some romantic time to request a more private room location and make sure there are no families next door the walls are pretty thin. Room decor is cute though but no bathtubs at least we didn't have one. We would stay again!
Manager Response: Jenigwen76,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Enjoying happy hour on the patio while listening to the live music sounds like a great time. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I can't wait to return.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.  The rooms are adorable and VERY clean.  Firepits, small but amazing spa.  Don't miss!  The laguna trolly even picks up guests to bring them into town.
Manager Response: Jennifer C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took great care of you during the stay. The Laguna Beach trolley is a great way for out guests to experience of variety of areas in town and we are glad that you took advantage of that. We appreciate the kind words regarding the rooms plus the spa and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Excellent long weekend at the Ranch!
Summary: We had wonderful time! The Ranch is very peaceful and beautiful and the rooms are wonderfully appointed. The resort is a ten minute very easy walk to the beach and a few minutes into town either with your own car or with Uber. The staff is very helpful and friendly and the on-site restaurant is wonderful. Stay here instead of pricey on the water hotels! You will be rewarded with a spacious resort, lovely sunset patio with fire pits and cocktail service and a lovely restaurant.
Manager Response: JenniMil,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took great care of you during the stay and that you enjoyed Harvest Restaurant plus the views from the patio. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach and also a short drive to downtown. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I love this beautiful canyon. I discovered Alisso Creek in 1996....now The Ranch, it's gone from 3 stars to 5 stars in my opinion.  Two minute walk to the beach, beautiful golf course and the food is organic and fresh. Live music at night while having a drink sitting around fire pit.  The Ranch has everything.  Will never stay anywhere else on my trips to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Linda R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the continued support over the past 20+ years. It sounds like you enjoyed the re-imagined amenities and resort features. We look forward to your return visits and thanks for the wonderful feedback as it means a lot to us.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a quick weekend away. We loved the location with the greenery and proximity to the beach.  The hotel staff and service was impressive. We had fun playing bocce ball in the rain and exploring downtown Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: 348kirka,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you and helped create memories. Even though the weather did not cooperate, it sounds like you made the most of your trip. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I were looking for a nearby getaway and found The Ranch.  It was perfect - we had an amazing dinner, golfed, listened to music while having cocktails outside and relaxed in our beautiful room.  It makes you feel like you are at an isolated resort in the mountains which is exactly what we were looking for.
Manager Response: E684KBlaurenb,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It sounds like you got to enjoy a lot of amenities on property. Hopefully some deer greeted you during the round of golf. Enjoying cocktails on the patio while listening to the live music with views of the canyon as the backdrop sounds like a great time. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: No cell service and slow wifi. All other area's a 10 out of 10
Summary: We had friends meet us for golf and followed with a terrific lunch.  Or bags were sent to our room and all things were terrific. We appreciated the local shuttle to bars too. Too bad the wifi is bad, it made collecting friends a real challenge.
Manager Response: 654janetp,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. A round of golf followed by lunch at Harvest is a great way to enjoy the canyon environment. It is so great to hear that you took advantage of the complimentary trolley service. The trolley service allows our guests experience a variety of areas in Laguna Beach. Our apologizes on the Wi-Fi service and thank you for letting us know so we can look into this further. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed here for a work event, will definitely be back with the missus!  Staff was friendly, rooms were clean and well appointed.  Facilities were top tier.  You cannot beat the location, just a short walk from the beach and short drive to town.
Manager Response: 863laneb,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team took great care of you during the stay and that you enjoyed your accommodation. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach and also a short drive to downtown. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: From the decor of the rooms to the canyon views, the resort blew us away upon first arriving.  Equally exceptional was the helpfulness and friendliness of the staff.  We felt so pampered and relaxed the entire time.  We will be back!
Manager Response: J7873SSkates,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us to celebrate your babymoon. The view of the canyon upon arrival is a great first impression for our guests. It is great to hear that our team took great care of you during the stay and helped create wonderful memories. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent get away.  We loved it.  Highly recommended.  Clean and nice employees, very friendly.   Off main road, which is nice, but short distance to all restaurants and beach.  Nice patio overlooking the golf course, with food and beverage service.
Manager Response: Donaldp418,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you loved your stay in the canyon and that our team took great care of you during the stay and helped create wonderful memories. Enjoying food and beverage service on the patio with the canyon wall as the backdrop sounds like a relaxing time. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel is a gem.  It's so much more relaxing and peaceful than the hustle/bustle snobby Montage, which I stayed at last time in Laguna.  People are dressed casually, and since it's a small property, the noise levels in the restaurant and property are much lower, so its wonderful that you can chat at lunch or dinner and be heard, even when all the tables are filled on a sold out weekend.  The food was outstanding and so was the service.  In particular, Lauren, the reservations agent was wonderful, suggesting things to do in Laguna and places to go for night time music and making golf reservations.  We stayed in a two bedroom cottage by the creek which had a huge living room and kitchen area with two great bedrooms upstairs.  It had a huge tv and nice deck downstairs with
Manager Response: Kileywe,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing and peaceful stay in the canyon. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular amongst our guests due to the spacious layout and we are glad that you enjoyed the features. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: You would never know this place is around unless you heard about it first. It is off Coast Highway but up a small country like road to the basin of a valley nestled in the hills. There is a 9 hole golf course. But even if you don't golf, they have spectacular rooms at the hotel and a nice outdoor patio with fireplaces to relax and have a drink sitting over the golf course with the backdrop of the hills surrounding you. It's close to all the action of Laguna Beach but you feel 1000 miles from anywhere when you are there.
Manager Response: StationToStation,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. Enjoying a drink on the patio while relaxing around the fireplaces sounds like a great time. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Really cool hotel tucked away in the canyon.  It's a hidden gem with very nice rooms and grounds.  The Harvest restaurant was wonderful. Great service from all of the staff. Pool and Spa are conveniently located.  Decor in the rooms is excellent.
Manager Response: D2767LJjohng,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest restaurant and the decor in the rooms. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The resort and location was excellent.  From the time we arrived until wearly left the staff was excellent,rooms were clean and scenic resorts.  This place makes you feel like you are not in California.  Will be back!!
Manager Response: Chefcurry203,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our team provided excellent service from the moment you arrived and that you enjoyed the canyon location of the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A quiet find close to the beach
Summary: The hotel is set in a beautiful canyon only a stone's throw from the beach.  We stayed in a two-bedroom cottage which was great for our family of two adults and three kids. The decor is new and fresh and the housekeeping was excellent. My only complaint is with the quality of the fold-out bed--it was ok for kids but it is not commensurate with the cost of the stay. You cannot beat the setting if you enjoy nature, and the patio with fire pits and stringed lights is gorgeous!
Manager Response: Alexis R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular for families and we are glad that your family enjoyed it. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our room was very spacious and clean.  Extremely comfortable bed, huge shower and separate sink area with nice sized closet.  You definitely feel like you are away from it all as you can't see or hear the road.  My husband golfed and very much enjoyed the 9 hole course.  Very helpful staff from start to finish.  Loved the outdoor patio overlooking the first hole.  Comfortable seats around firepits.  Ate at the Harvest restaurant for breakfast and dinner and enjoyed both meals.
Manager Response: Ks1117,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. Enjoying a drink on the patio while relaxing around the fireplaces sounds like a great time. Hopefully some deer greeted your husband on the golf course. It is great to hear that our team was helpful from the moment you arrived. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: They read my mind, this is my new getaway
Summary: I live in San Diego and always look for new places for my wife and i to have a nice relaxing weekend. I am so happy to have stumbled across The Ranch. From the rooms, to the staff, to every aspect of my experience, they nailed it! I will be sure to frequent at least once a year as it is such a better experience than any other hotel in Laguna.  Be sure to eat at Harvest, the look and taste is second to none.  btw, I never even post on trip advisor but felt the need with the kind of stay I had with them  Happy travels
Manager Response: SDMichael1234,  Thank you for making the drive up from San Diego and choosing to stay with us for a relaxing weekend. It is so great to hear that your expectations were exceeded in every aspect of your experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Still needs to work out the kinks
