Summary: The pros are the comfy beds, outdoor seating oasis, live music during happy hour and pretty good food when it finally comes out.   The cons are there is zero cell service, the dining room was very backed up and was disorganized during dinner time, the spa is much smaller than they make it out to be with not much of a quiet room and the hotel rooms are set up like camp bunks throughout the property.  Other than the happy hour location and dining room there is something lacking about the overall vibe and location of the hotel.   I think eventually they will work this stuff out, but you can certainly tell it is newer and not at the status that it should be at this price point.
Manager Response: Sean L, Manager at The Ranch at Laguna Beach, responded to this review Snathan13,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the kind words and also the feedback as it is very important to our operation.   Regarding the cell service, due to the immediacy of our magnificent stone canyon walls, there are pockets on the property that have limited cell service. However, we do offer Complimentary Wi-Fi that allows compatible devices to use Wi-Fi calling and our team can help provide other solutions as well.   As for the “camp bunks,” we took the buildings down to the studs and did a complete renovation. We liked the scattered campus layout and most of our guests seem to appreciate the intimacy of the vignette groupings it creates as opposed to the standard big box hotels.   We apologize for Harvest restaurant being busy. Most restaurants in Laguna in general have a rush period and our Harvest restaurant has proven extremely popular with the locals and has become the “go to” spot for fine dining in an atmosphere where tables are generously spaced and acoustics allow for conversation.   Please feel free to contact me at sean@ranchlb.com to discuss anything further regarding your stay.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We wanted a laid back "staycation" and found it!  Hidden in the canyon, but close enough to the beach!  Elegant without being "stuffy".  Looks were very deceiving!  The staff was terrific, our room was wonderfully decorated, the bed comfy, loved the bathroom and kitchenette... enjoyed the golf course and spa too!  Definitely felt like we were away from the hustle and bustle of regular life!
Manager Response: Maryplum2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a laid back staycation in the canyon and got to take advantage of a variety of amenities. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Best kept secret in laguna. Almost hate to rate so high as I'm nervous everyone will want to stay there. It really felt like we got away even though we were 30 minutes from home. Definitely recharged the batteries.
Manager Response: Tom L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you got to recharge the batteries with a relaxing stay in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I LOVED my stay here and I WILL go back again! The staff and property was amazing ! The room was beautiful ! To have a 24 hour heated pool was amazing to i have never been to a place with a 24 hour pool!
Manager Response: Caitlins171,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the property amenities, specifically the pool and that our team helped enhance your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Romantic canyon room, fun amenities with onsite golf course and amazing sunsets. I never would have guessed a place like this existed across the street from the beach! Drinks at the bar were expensive, although tasty.
Manager Response: I3827MXdavidh,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The sunsets in the canyon are definitely breathtaking and hopefully some deer greeted you on the golf course. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Very friendly, warm and welcoming hotel
Summary: The staff made us feel like to come back soon. It is in a secluded valley with a great gold course and view. The room was spacious and clean. The had accomodated our every special request. What a great service.
Manager Response: Hungchuny,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that our team enhanced the quality of your of trip. The view of the canyon offers something special that you don't see anywhere else in Laguna. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice place to stay, but if you forget the 50 dollar credit a day, they will not tell you this. So I stayed two nights and forgot the 100 credit I could have used on my food and beverage. I call to see if I could get credit on my stay and spoke to Naomi, who was rude and kept sighing in between her sentences.   Well I would have hoped that she would have tried to make a new guest happy.    She needs to work on her service.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback.  We never intended for our promotions to cause more stress for your stay, as they are specifically designed to try and enhance our guest experience!  I have personally adjusted your bill accordingly and will be following up with all departments to make sure that we do not have this happen again.  Please feel free to reach out to me with any additional questions or comments. Kelly

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: We stayed at the ranch in Laguna Beach in February. We found the ranch to be Clean, spacious and quiet. I like how it is set in between the canyon.  Also very close to all that LB has to offer. We will definitely be staying there in the near future.
Manager Response: Bcffpm,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the quiet canyon setting of the resort and that you also got to enjoy a lot of what the city of Laguna Beach has to offer. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Perfect  little getaway to celebrate an anniversary.  Beautiful property, courteous and welcoming staff, excellent bar and restaurant.  Enjoyed the live music on the weekends.  Toured the Tree House with knowledgeable staff, can't wait to come back with the kids.  Overall amazing experience.
Manager Response: Nb20172017,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to celebrate it with us. It is great to hear how wonderful of an experience you had and that our team provided excellent service during the stay. The live music is a good way to relax on the patio and enjoy the breathtaking views of the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beah is a place to go to get away from it all, but yet with all of the essential elements of a wonderful hotel. The Ranch is in a great location nestled in the valley, but so close to the happenings at the beach. Highly recommend them to anyone who wants to get away.
Manager Response: R7857MUsusant,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the kind words. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach and allows you to enjoy the best of both worlds with also having access to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Don't hesitate for a second!  Great location, great rooms, great staff and just all up excellent! Laguna Beach is a special place and the Ranch at Laguna Beach evoke that feeling of special from the moment you arrive to well after your departure.  Would stay there again anytime!
Manager Response: Christopher A,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how wonderful of an experience you had from the moment that you arrived. We love hearing when our guests take lasting memories with them when they leave the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location, serene and spiritual. Even the interior design was calming. We started at the bar, fantastic Bloody Marys. Checked into our room. Fantastic massages for my wife and I. The Harvest restaurant has a great vibe, dinner was a concert of flavors. The breakfast was delicious. I will be returning to the restaurant with the entire family. Great service all around!
Manager Response: BrucemT5353CP,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It sounds like you got to enjoy a variety of property amenities and we are glad that you loved the canyon location of the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits with the family.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful, tranquil setting in a rugged canyon.  The central focus is the outdoor deck around the 1st tee, with table and comfortable seating area and multiple small fire pits.  A very good snack bar there sells smore's kits and they give you tongs to make them over the fire pits.  Even if not a golfer it's relaxing and enjoyable to watch them tee off.  Amazing staff, just an ideal getaway.
Manager Response: Vixiela,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had an ideal getaway and loved the beautiful and tranquil setting of the canyon. The patio area is a great place to relax and we are glad that you took advantage of getting comfortable around the fire pits. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a hidden gem! Friendly staff and gorgeous property! The setting is so serene and peaceful, just what you need if you are looking to relax!  The food at the Harvest restaurant was very good and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: MarkieMark730,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the kind words. It is great to hear that you got to relax in the serene and peaceful setting of the canyon. Summary: A fantastic venue that offers everything. Golf is fun and all the services are excellent. Short walk to the beach with beautiful scenery. Restaurant is still coming up to speed otherwise, OUTSTANDING!
Manager Response: 129arthurf,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the kind words. It is great to hear that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while also walking to Aliso Beach. We hope that some deer greeted you on the golf course and we look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We enjoyed our stay in Laguna Beach very much. The resort is located next to a creek in a lovely country side. It is very close to the amenities of Laguna Beach . We stayed in a two bed room apartments who were very comfortable and spacious. The beds were excellent  the breakfast very good . Excellent place for golfers and Beach next by

Summary: Had a wonderful time with my friend.  Looking forward to coming back.  Everything was so clean and decorated so well.  The restaurent has the best food.  Try the Brussel Sprouts they are mouth watering.  The view of the mountains are georgous and super green.
Manager Response: Kareenmatt,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in the canyon. It is great to hear that you enjoyed some delicious meals at Harvest. Summary Heading: Absolutely lovely place highly recommended for romantic getaway or couples
Summary: My wife and I went here for her birthday. Wonderful staff Beautiful rooms, and a lovely restaurant. Has a very romantic feeling about. We went swimming in the heated pool and haved fun in their large hot tub.
Manager Response: Moses H,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of your wife's birthday. We are glad that you enjoyed a romantic stay in the canyon as it offers such a quiet and peaceful environment. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family (4 kids 6 and under) spent the night here last week to celebrate my husbands birthday and we stayed in the 2 bedroom cottage. It was perfect for our family and there was plenty to occupy the kids.... From corn hole near the reception area, the pool, bocce ball area and the sand volleyball court outside our room. The setting is so serene and peaceful which was just what we were looking for. Unfortunately we didn't visit the beach because of the rain, but the location of The Ranch is so convenient. We had a great experience with room service and The Harvest restaurant and have no complaints. We will be back!!

Summary: Loved the place.  Room, food and service were all great.  Because of rain, we couldn't use the golf course.  Only downside is that it is not on the beach.  In off season, this isn't an issue but in summer, I might make a difference for some.
Manager Response: 631joelt,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you loved the stay and that our team provided excellent service to enhance your experience. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Love the location Property is beautiful Loved the 2 bedroom guest house, although a bigger refrigerator and more kitchen amenities would have been a nicer touch Unfortunately the weather was awful so we good not enjoy most of the outdoor activities, will definitely go back

Summary: I stayed here on a business trip when I had a conference at the Montage, nearby.  These are great rooms for the price., the food was excellent and the people were very friendly and quick to offer service in all areas of the hotel.
Manager Response: DianapW6830US,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us while attending the conference. Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed for Valentine's weekend. I loved it. Very low key but rooms are lovely and extremely comfortable. Everything is fresh and new and canyon location helps you feel you are away from it all. I actually loved parking (free) in from of our room too - so much easier to come and go. Also couldn't complain about the complementary champagne and macarons. Would definitely go back.
Manager Response: CPullen,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us over Valentine's Weekend. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at The Ranch for a weekend getaway to relax after the busy holiday season. The hotel had very recently been renovated, and the new facilities were very nice. Check in was smooth, and the bellhop/valet service staff were so friendly and accommodating. They led us to our room, and let us follow them in our car because we had a baby and lots of baby gear and didn't want to take her out of the car and ride the golf cart. They then drove our car back up to valet and brought our ticket back down to our room.   The room was very spacious, with a small patio and comfy chairs that looked out onto the pool. The shower was huge, but I wished there was a door separating the bathroom from the bedroom. Instead, the sink area was a nook off to the side of the room.   We didn't make
Manager Response: Celina C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a relaxing weekend getaway. It sounds like you got to enjoy a variety of amenities on property and also had some delicious meals at Harvest. It is also great to hear that our team provided wonderful service to help you have some wonderful memories in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your annual return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay even though it rained and we couldn't make the most of Ben Brown's. The rooms are clean and the staff are very friendly. Some rooms have better views than others. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Musicsj,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are sorry to hear that the weather did not cooperate during your stay. Laguna Beach has had a true winter with rain for the first time in a while. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Clean friendly and GREAt customer service  We were greeted immediately upon arrival and taken to our room The housekeeping staff immediately came to door to deliver our chocolates for our pillows and turn down our bed 😊 restaurant onsite is amazing too and INDY our waitress was the BEST!!!! We will definitely return !!!!
Manager Response: Np2be,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The chocolate on the pillows sure is a nice treat for our guests. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The property is beautiful. Staff was amazing. I lost my iPad in the room at check out and it was found. The gym was clean and staff was extremely friendly. The bocce court was a lot of fun and pool bar was ver nice to hang out.
Manager Response: RobinsN4449OF,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad to hear that your iPad was found. Summary: We stayed at The Ranch at Laguna Beach for a quick girl's getaway and stayed in one of the cottages. The accommodations couldn't have been any more fitting for us. The cottage is like a small townhouse (without a kitchen) where the two bedrooms are upstairs and the living room and dining table is all downstairs. Perfect separation for those who prefer to sleep in and can do so peacefully upstairs while the early risers can hang out downstairs.   Beds were comfortable (although softer than my preference), and there is a full bathroom upstairs and a powder room downstairs.  The property itself is nestled in the canyon just footsteps away from PCH. Like other reviewers mentioned, while you're only steps away from PCH, you feel like you're in nature (with the exception of several
Manager Response: Christina L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for a girl's getaway. It is wonderful to hear that you and the girls in your group got to enjoy a variety of amenities on property. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is a popular accommodation for larger groups and we are glad it fit your needs. Like you said, staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach as you get the best of both worlds by having Aliso Beach across the street from the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: First time, but not the last
Summary: What a great place tucked away just of the coast highway .. The 'ranch hands' are very nice and helpful .. We stayed in building 14 on the other side of the creek that leads to the ocean .. A good size room with a super comfortable bed .. we'll definitely be staying again soon

Summary: This little hidden village is AMAZING. The location is perfect, the service is perfect, and the accommodations are perfect. We did not expect live music to greet us, or the onsite coffee shop for snacks and hot chocolate. I can not wait to stay again. Loved it.
Manager Response: 92clarkb,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so thrilled to hear how much you loved your stay and that it exceeded your expectations. Summary: This was our second time staying at The Ranch and although it was a quick trip to spend Christmas Eve with our family nearby we were excited that the rest of the renovations were complete. Harvest is stunning! We did not dine but we did have a glass of wine by the fire place. We will stay longer for sure next time and can't wait!

Summary: We stumbled upon this hidden gem on Booking.com. The service was stellar and the coffee in the room was amazing.Our room was comfy and clean. We had a great view from our patio and only wish we had more time there. We did not use the spa this trip. We were treated like royalty by EVERYONE there. We will be back!!!
Manager Response: Neeciem06,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The views of the canyon from the patio are breathtaking and we are glad that you took advantage of it. It is great to hear that our team took excellent care of you during the stay and helped create lifelong memories. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This resort is relaxing, comfortable and beautiful. The rooms are newly remodeled and charming. I can't wait to come back when it's a little warmer to try the pool and spa! In the morning you can enjoy your breakfast over an open fire and take in the views.
Manager Response: Heather D,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed relaxing in the canyon. The views from the patio fire pits is a great way to start the day while enjoying a delicious breakfast. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was a much needed staycation for my husband and I. We have 3 children and it was so great to get away just for one evening and enjoy all the beauty of The Ranch. The rooms are lovely, the service is impeccable, and the ambiance is perfect. It is a gem and we feel so fortunate to live 5 minutes away and enjoy all the lovely activities from Golf Camps, Ranger Camps, Golf, Pancakes with Santa, and now staying over night. Laguna Beach is lucky to have The Ranch!!
Manager Response: Aegea_Lee,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Thanks for continuing to join us for many resort activities and events. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is located in a beautiful canyon with a creek that runs through it.  It feels like you are miles from the beach but it is only a short walk to get there.  On many occasions there are deer foraging on the property.  The rooms are super clean and have a beach-vibe decor with super comfy beds!
Manager Response: Ann l,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Staying in the canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach as you get the best of both worlds by having Aliso Beach across the street from the resort. It is great to hear that the deer greeted you throughout your stay. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A great resort - Scenic and Relaxing
Summary: Great getaway. Perfect if you are looking for a relaxing week-end away from the crowds . I enjoyed the luxury feel without dealing with the attitudes of other nearby resorts. Cozy, quiet and outstanding service. The food can be improved but otherwise highly recommend.
Manager Response: Flavie D,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had a great relaxing getaway in the canyon and that our team provided outstanding service. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful property. Fabulous service. Great room layout. We stayed in the two bedroom cottage. Perfect for a family of four. The beds were very comfortable. The views of the golf course and canyon were relaxing. Perfect Cozy winter getaway.
Manager Response: Brandid63,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suites are great for families due to the spacious layout and we are glad to hear how much your family enjoyed it. The views of the golf course and canyon from the patio is a great way to start the day. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

They were reversed after a day however for two days I had expected to pay $520 and upon checking in had been charged around $900. Again the charges were reversed however no one mentioned that this would be the case.
Manager Response: R1392BMtimm,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you and your girlfriend had a great stay in the canyon. We apologize for the lack of communication that occurred at check-in and are glad that it got resolved. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I've listed title in the titles I've listed as my review.
Summary: 1. A Breath of Fresh Air. 2. Quiet and Intimate Place, set in Serene Beauty. 3. Home Away from Home. 4. Refresh and Restore. 5. Celebration Destination Place. 6. Embraced by Down Home Elegance. All of this to say that we cannot wait to come back to stay at the Ranch.
Manager Response: Robin & Darrell C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate all of the kind words. The canyon definitely offers a breath of fresh air that allows our guests to refresh and restore. We want our guests to always feel at home and we are glad that you felt that way. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I came here with my fiancé for a one day staycation, and it was awesome. The rooms are beautiful, the food excellent, and the property a hidden gem! Unfortunately, I did not get to try out any of the services at the spa, but it looks great. I will definitely check it out next time. would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Jocelyn L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so thrilled that you and your fiancé enjoyed the one day staycation in the canyon. Sycamore Spa does offer a variety of treatments and it will be great to have you experience it. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful resort, great service, cool retro vibe. We were in town for a wedding, but would have liked to spend more time on the grounds. We did get to use the pool and hot tub and really enjoyed that experience.
Manager Response: Jennifer E,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The canyon definitely offers a wonderful backdrop for a wedding, so we hope that all of the guests enjoyed the view. We look forward to your return visits so you can enjoy all of the resort amenities.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: they need to step up their game.  since the remodel is recent, maybe they'll improve their customer service.  i would give them another chance.  the restaurant menu had a lot of choices and the food was very good.
Manager Response: Tortillamama,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We apologize that we did not meet your expectations. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay was quite enjoyable. The room, facilities, and property are beautiful. Room service was almost non-existent, and the service was courteous, but not very good at problem solving. Harvest was fantastic and the wait staff was attentive and excellent.
Manager Response: KevinmA6373JU,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you found the room, facilities, and property to be beautiful. We appreciate our guest feedback as it is important to our operation. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I would definitely come back!!!! My favorite part was utilizing the patio, with the view of the mountain and the golf course backdrop with fire pits and rocking chairs it was perfect!! Get a cappacino and play some beanbag!  Very relaxing setting with cool cottage style rooms, very homey- not hotel like. I loved it!
Manager Response: Chris R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you utilized the amenities on the patio. The fire pits are a great way to relax and take in the views of the canyon. We look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I have not stayed in Laguna before, although I have had many trips to LA over the years. Typically we stay at the Terranea. We decided to journey a little further south.  I found this resort online. I was very satisfied with the facility. The rooms were spacious, very nicely decorated and well equipped. The location is beach adjacent, not on the beach but getting there was no problem at all with our rented car. It is right off the PCH. Easy to find and easy to get out and about. They have shuttles. Our stay was too short to get to use all the facilities, so I guess we will just have to go back! Soon! I wouldn't hesitate to re-book and visit again at all, and take more time to enjoy the entire resort and amenities. The surroundings are beautiful!
Manager Response: Wanderlust4ever71,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for venturing a little further south than your typical trip to Southern California. It is great to hear how much you loved the canyon and your accommodation. We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your first trip to Laguna Beach and we hope that this is the first of many to our resort.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful property with a few kinks needed to work out
Summary: Beautiful grounds and room. Service was good. In-room dining was not very good (I had two dinners and one lunch), even though its menu was similar to the restaurant - the restaurant quality was much better. Creekside Studio felt a little too far and isolated from the rest of hotel, I liked the extra space for business, but if I had my family i would have wanted to be closer to center of hotel grounds. Would have also wished I could take advantage of beach shuttle and pool (too cold, but I did sit next to pool while doing work.) I would likely bring my family back if the rates were reasonable, to try it as more of a trip for pleasure.
Manager Response: Anne Y,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate your feedback as it is very important to our operations. We forward to your return visits when you can bring the family and enjoy the resort amenities.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fun place.  A unique experience.  It's not the Ritz Carlson or Montage - which is OK.  Service was good, food as well.  Restaurant service not so good.  Golf course was fun and not too serious.  Spa was expensive for what you get - no steam or Jacuzzi...
Manager Response: T6331ZZgregorys,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you had both a fun and unique stay in the canyon. The canyon gives a different perspective of Laguna Beach. We hope some deer greeted you on the golf course and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our meeting at The Ranch was hugely successful and we'd like to attribute that to the excellent service and top notch amenities here. Every aspect of the meeting (space, catering, staff) was perfect!!
Manager Response: Theresa_tylla,  Thank you for choosing to host your meetings with us. It is great to meet everyone at AbbVie and our team really enjoyed working with your group. We appreciate all of the kind words and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful new property with a few kinks to work out. Golf course was not open, and that was not communicated to guests ahead of time. Housekeeping was subpar. Harvest restaurant was delicious although the dinner menu was fairly limited.
Manager Response: Nyc100162017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We apologize that the golf course closure was not properly communicated to you prior to the stay and that housekeeping did not meet your expectations. Please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great weekend getaway to Laguna Beach
Summary: We drove up from San Diego looking for a place to stay while we explored the Laguna Beach area.  This resort was a pleasant surprise, as it felt secluded and private, yet was just a short distance from the Pacific Coast Highway.  The staff was friendly and the atmosphere was informal.  We look forward to our next visit
Manager Response: 560carterp,  Thank you for making the drive up from San Diego to stay with us. The resort does offer the best of both worlds by being carved into the canyon, yet across the street from Aliso Beach and it is great to hear that you got to take advantage of it! We appreciate the kind words about our team and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Getting away from home close to home In a beautiful canyon
Summary: We have lived in So California for many years but just discovered the Ranch. It is only 13 miles from our home but it seemed like we were completely out of town. A relaxing, comfortable place to enjoy  the quiet canyon setting and tranquil grounds. We lucked out and stayed over on a Saturday, which was one of the few days in January that it didn't rain. And we were rewarded with an absolutely beautiful sunset! Can't wait to come back! Thanks to all the great staff for their excellent service.
Manager Response: Sheilaa566,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The canyon does make it feel like you are completely out of town with it's peaceful and relaxing nature! The sunsets are breathtaking and we are glad that you got to witness one. We appreciate the kind words about our team and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent place with wonderful service.  If you are looking to get away to a quite place, this is the one.  The bathroom upgrade were beautiful and the room was very comfortable.  I remember this place from when I was a child but it has grown up as well.
Manager Response: Walter F,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The canyon definitely offers a quiet and relaxing environment. It is great that you got to add memories of your time at the property to those when you were growing up. We appreciate the kind words about our team and the renovations. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Renovation was done very well, location is incredible. Love the quiet canyon feel, makes sleep amazing. F & B was top quality, golf course was closed due  to rain (understandably) but still disappointing nonetheless.
Manager Response: 326magtraveler,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the kind words about the renovation to the resort. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the quiet nature of the canyon. We did get quite a bit of rain recently and the golf course is scheduled to reopen this Friday, February 10. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Laguna Beach is must if you're visiting the greater LA/orange county area. We came here for a weekend getaway from North California. The weather was perfect, in the 80's.   It felt like HOME here. Each room is like your own private cottage. Updated fixtures and furniture, contemporary/beach house decor, and very comfortable! The bed was like sleeping on Cloud 9. The Shower/bathroom area was the best! Softest robes for each guest await you, in the closet!  The staff goes out of their way to make your stay comfortable. They were very friendly and helpful! A standing ovation for the valet/bell staff. They will even give you a private tour of the property on the way to your room.   Walking distance, with underpass, to beach across the street! They also have a shuttle service
Manager Response: 606dn2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We want all of our guests to feel at home, so we are glad that you felt that way. We appreciate the kind words regarding the decor and our team. It is great to hear that you got to advantage of the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon and also enjoying Aliso Beach across the street from the resort. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The location of The Ranch is amazing -- tucked into a picturesque canyon and a short walk to the beach. The décor and setting are fabulous. Staff is wonderful. The overall ambiance is very special and makes for a memorable experience.
Manager Response: Lydiak294,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how memorable of an experience that you had staying at our resort. The view of the canyon is definitely picturesque and breathtaking. We appreciate the kind words regarding the decor and our team. It is great to hear that you got to advantage of the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon and also walking to Aliso Beach across the street from the resort. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The rooms are comfortable, it's quiet and the hotel staff was great, but the spa is overpriced for offering little and our dining experience wasn't great. We may have just had a bad server. The bartenders were cool through. Made an experimental drink and gave it to us, which threw our server off. We sat by the bar.
Manager Response: L2630HYmichaels,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during Christmas vacation. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your accommodation and the quiet nature of the canyon. We apologize that your dining experience was not great and appreciate that you let us know as our guest feedback helps us improve our operations. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: i truly enjoyed my time and will always return. the gold was great, the food was amazing, the service was perfect and everyone was truly friendly. I felt right at home and love the rooms more than any five star hotel i have even stayed at. the beds are super comfy.
Manager Response: K1790MLthomasc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed playing golf and hopefully some deer greeted you during the round. We want all of our guests to feel at home and we are glad that you felt that way. Thanks for the kind words regarding the accommodation and the service our team provided. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: AMAZING STAY. We checked in at about 11pm no issue and everyone at the front desk was so nice. They even gave us a ride in a golf card to our room and gave us a tour of our beautiful 2 story room (thank you Charlie!). The beds were extremely comfortable and the room was spotless. We really felt at home here. 5 stars.
Manager Response: Layceeb2017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you had such an amazing stay in the canyon. We want all of our guests to feel at home and we are glad that you felt that way. Thanks for the kind words regarding your Cottage Two Bedroom Suite accommodation and the service our team provided. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We live 20 minutes away and this is our new favorite "stay-cation" Such a beautiful place with great rooms, fun restaurants and unbelievable service. We cannot wait for an excuse to come back and stay again.
Manager Response: RobertwL3915NR,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our resort is your new favorite staycation. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Domnitz visit to The Ranch at Laguna Beach
Summary: We had a very nice and relaxing stay at The Ranch. Very comfortable room with a great bed and shower. Our room was always clean and well kept. We had 3 very good Breakfasts and one great Dinner at The Harvest restaurant. The Food and Service were both excellent. We enjoyed the exercise room in the mornings and the hot tub at night. Both were kept impeccably clean and in perfect order. The Ranch is a really quiet, restful retreat while still being very close to the Coast Hwy and the beaches in and around Laguna.
Manager Response: C3044DPlarryd,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you found the resort relaxing and also that you enjoyed the food at Harvest frequently during the stay. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a treat.  Everything was wonderful from the time we arrived until the time we left.  We were there for a New Years eve party and stayed the night.  The rooms were great. The setting was beautiful.  The room service was punctual and friendly.  We had breakfast at the Harvest Restaurant.  It was excellent.    Everything from check in to check out was first class.  And they thought of the little things.  For example, there was a "recovery kits" in the room since it was New Year's eve.  It included a bottle of champagne, a package of Tums and some Tylenol.  Very cute.
Manager Response: Elliott P,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for celebrating New Year's Eve in the canyon. It is great how wonderful everything was from the time you arrived until you departed. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This was a sister getaway. My sister and I felt so pampered (and we didn't even take advantage of the spa amenities). We had such an amazing time. We ordered room service for breakfast and the food was delicious. We had pancakes. I will DEFINITELY be heading back agian soon.
Manager Response: Jocelynj470,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for a sister getaway. It is so great to hear that our team took really good care of you during the stay. Ordering breakfast from In-Room Dining is a great way to relax and enjoy the quiet surroundings of the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This property is just Fabulous - Lodge like setting, beautifully decorated, wonderful staff and amenities. The Harvest Restaurant and Ben's Pantry were delicious - even if you don't stay at The Ranch - try their restaurant! The Sycamore Spa is small and Lovely.                                                                                  We have already booked 2 return visits!                                                                                                          We can't wait to relax at the pool and grab cocktails at the pool bar this summer.
Manager Response: Pamc428,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for already rebooking two return visits. It sounds like you experienced a variety of amenities around property. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits. We will have some delicious drinks ready for you at The Pond Pool Bar this summer.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed here for our anniversary.  A free bottle of wine provided for the occasion.  Wonderful setting and lovely recently remodeled rooms.  Having a good restaurant on site meant that we did not have to leave the property.
Manager Response: Jakrogers,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of the special occasion. It is great to hear that you good enjoy some delicious meals at Harvest. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful property, feels like you're in the mountains but only a quarter-mile or so from the beach. My only hint is that our room was on the ground floor of a two-story building, and you can hear the people above you rather easily; therefore, either get a one-story unit or be on the second floor if you want peace and quiet.
Manager Response: John S,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great that you got to experience the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon and also enjoying Aliso Beach across the street from the resort. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Fantastic getaway!! We had a wonderful time, a great mix of relaxation and fun. Perfect hideaway for a relaxing couples weekend. Can't wait to come back when the beach is warm and we can enjoy it with the kids.
Manager Response: JasonbM5416DH,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It sounds like you got to enjoy a relaxing couples getaway in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits with the kids.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stunning grounds that feel like home.  Atmosphere was fantastic and staff and food were amazing.  We were there for two nights and never left the grounds.  Was a nice getaway that wasn't too far from home.  If you want to get away, Laguna Beach isn't far away at all.
Manager Response: S02017,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We want all of our guests to feel at home, so we are glad that you felt that way. It sounds like you got to experience a variety of the resort amenities during your two night stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great stay not so hot Restaurant
Summary: This is an excellent get away spot for a stay-cation.  It is far enough away from home to feel like I've gotten away but close enough to home to head back if I needed to. My husband and I enjoyed the cozy feeling and beautiful scenery. You may want to try an outside restaurant.
Manager Response: LTRil2006,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled that you both enjoyed the cozy feeling and beautiful scenery that the canyon provides. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent staycation the beautiful resort in the canyon made it feel like a true get away.  Fire pit excellent place to enjoy a bottle of wine! Beautiful beach ranch decor  with patio chairs to relax and enjoy
Manager Response: KathybP4869XW,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Enjoying a drink on the patio at the fire pits with the view of the canyon in the background sounds like a relaxing experience. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a surprise to wake up in this little paradise.  Large well appointed rooms.  Very attentive staff.  Relaxing in the main restaurant and admiring the natural scenery is the best.  Came for business.  Will definitely return for R&R.
Manager Response: 429edward,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The canyon is definitely a wonderful sight to wake up to. We are glad to hear that our team was very attentive during your stay. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: WE had an event in the big room which is the finest large space in Laguna Beach for an even.  Huge patio attached and the views are stunning.  Two bedroom cottages are an excellent value,  although you do need to share a bath.
Manager Response: X6520SXlaurag,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite. It is a very spacious suite that many of our guests enjoy. We appreciate the kind words and look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A great property tucked away; The rooms are adequate and the grounds are beautiful.  The restaurant is great for breakfast and the food is very good for dinner as well.  The golf course is really enjoyable and easy to walk.  Overall a great romantic getaway about a mile from the heart of Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Seisner,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a romantic getaway in the canyon. The surrounding canyon definitely enhances the ambiance of the resort. We look forward to your return visits.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Took my wife for a quick 1 night stay.  Rooms were amazing, service was amazing.  Recommend dinner at The Harvest.  Great food, great service.  Best Brussel Sprouts I've ever had.  Pool is heated 24/7.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: K1739BKmichaele,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your accommodation, the service our team provided and dinner at Harvest. I will let our Chef know that those were the best Brussels Sprouts that you have ever had. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Fantastic birthday weekend stay at Ranch at Laguna Beach
Summary: We had a wonderful stay at The Ranch at Laguna Beach. The property is newly renovated, and the rooms are finely appointed with nice furnishings and very comfortable beds and linens. The restaurant is very nice, and service was great. The setting at the foot of several mountains with the view of the golf course is very nice. We were also able to take a short walk to the beach. We will be back!
Manager Response: Bryan R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of a birthday. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon and also enjoying Aliso Beach across the street from the resort. We look forward to your return visits.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We rented the cottage right by a running stream and it was amazing! So much room and the décor was beautiful. It was 2 stories so I was able to get up early and not wake my husband and go downstairs. Our son stayed in a regular room across a bridge from us that was gorgeous too.  It was so nice to go into Laguna Beach and shop, etc. and then when you make the turn, the quiet begins. You can sit by the fire pits at night and unwind with a glass of wine. The views are amazing from every place you are whether your room or dining. They have golf carts to take you around if you need it (I like walking) and help with the luggage. Great and friendly staff. That being said, just a few minor things I would change: The sign from the road. It is lit up at night but during the day you can't
Manager Response: Begonia4,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The views of the Aliso & Wood Canyons are definitely breathtaking from everywhere on property! It sounds like you got to explore a lot around property and also in Laguna Beach. We appreciate all of the kind words and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Selected the Ranch at Laguna Beach to celebrate my birthday. The reviews on TripAdvisor were very good and there were many many hotels to choose from and I couldn't be happier that I decided on this one. It is secluded and wooded in a canyon adjacent to the ocean and away from all the traffic on Coast highway. For the golfers there is a very nice 9 hole golf course right on the property. Check-in was seamless and we were made to feel very welcome the moment we stepped through the doors. The property is terraced so we were guided down to our room by one of their employees who helped unload our luggage. We were assigned room 1102 which was across from a creek that washed into the ocean. The location was very quiet. Upon entering the room I was surprised with macaron cookies and a
Manager Response: River1colorado,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of your birthday. It is so great to hear that you enjoyed your celebration in the canyon and that our team helped make it very special. It sounds like you got to take advantage of a lot of the property amenities and we appreciate the kind words. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Discovering the jewel of Laguna Beach!
Summary: The expression "it's the little things that count" does not apply to The Ranch at Laguna Beach because “everything" counts. Having recently sojourned there to convalesce from surgery I was greeted every morning to peaceful landscaped views of the canyon, a world away from the hustle and horns of Coast Highway. Owner Mark Christy described the decor as "casual elegance meets cottage chic", but you can add soothing and cozy as well. Small details like signature push pens and note cards penned with quotes from Jacques Cousteau, chocolate truffles on the ultimate pillows perfectly propped for HBO and Showtime enjoyment and of course the priceless views of the moon rising over the canyon are but a few magical details they provide. The next staycation will definitely require pool &
Manager Response: Lisa F,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the views of the canyon during different times of the day and that you got to spend some time relaxing. We appreciate all of the compliments and look forward to your next staycation.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Perfect place for a 2 day getaway . The hotel is small but in a perfect location.  The staff is extremely nice and helpful .The rooms are new and very well furnished. The overall atmosphere is very relaxed which is surprising since most properties with a attached golf course can be very stuffy .
Manager Response: Krystian T,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on a two day getaway. We appreciate the kind words and are glad that you found the atmosphere in the canyon to be relaxing. We look forward to your return visit.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice place...but hit and miss service
Summary: Overall nice places. Lots of little things were great. But lots of little things were lacking. For example upon check in staff was very friendly and accommodating. The front desk clerk even asked which papers we'd like in the morning which I thought was a nice touch. We asked for all 3 that were available since we were on vacation and had the time. The first morning all 3 came in a cute little sack labeled news. We left the sack out that night in case they wanted to reuse it. The next morning there was only 1 paper on the floor on top of the sack. Where were the other papers?  The delivery person couldn't be bothered to put the paper in the sack and hang it back on the door?  When we went to the main building for breakfast one of the other papers was available but no WSJ. No
Manager Response: Jill H,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We apologize for the multiple inconveniences that you experienced during stay and that we did not meet your expectations. We appreciate the honest feedback as that helps us improve our operations. I will share this with our team. Please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.    Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here this late autumn, the scenery from the restaurant was absolutely fantastic.   The room was very cozy, new, and inclusive of all we needed.  We did have a problem with the TV and the safe box, notified the reception right as we were about to leave for a sight visit, and both issues which were immediately solved.  Good service.  Only downside is, the rooms where we stayed seemed sort of unlit and empty at night; but perhaps it had to do with the re-modeling going on.  The Spa was closed due to the same reason, but I recently received en email stating it's open again.  Overall, the place is a bit on the expensive side, totally worth it is you are big on golfing.  There is no denying the beauty and of the property and the surrounding.  That having been said, if you
Manager Response: Bayimc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you enjoyed your accommodation and the views of the canyon. Like you stated, the Sycamore Spa is now open on a daily basis as we have completed all renovation to the property. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Went from Napa to So. Calif. for the Holidays- Originally Booked the Marriott Residence in Capo Beach for 7 nights to visit our Daughter. Her husband told us about the Ranch- Went on-line and Booked a Creek side  Room for 7 nights- Relatively newly opened and remodeled- The weeks was $68.00 More for the entire week than Marriott- LUXURY accommodations- great room service- exceptional attention to detail -VERY well appointed rooms - Ate at the Restaurant for dinner first night- Young newly appointed Exec Chef doing a GREAT job of making a name for himself- Good portions- well executed plating and reasonable pricing- Everything well seasoned and TASTY- The resort is difficult to find but secluded off of the Cost Highway far enough to give you a  quiet,peaceful stay- You had better
Manager Response: BrianNapaCa_,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you were recommended to our resort and we appreciate all of the kind words and compliments. Chef Imbelli and the team at Harvest are doing a wonderful job. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Gorgeous property with some kinks to work out
Summary: This hotel/property is just absolutely gorgeous. Tucked off pacific coast highway, in a canyon, the scenery is incredible. The rooms are gorgeous (we had two villas for our family). The lobby/main house/restaurant are beautiful, too. All of the staff are incredibly gracious. This property has the potential to be five star - but it is not there yet. Housekeeping is subpar for the price and property (at turndown, they didn't remove our towels (on the floor) one night, skipped our room for main housekeeping one day, etc.).  The service in the restaurant is painfully slow and just bad (ten minutes to get drink refills or any attention from servers, etc.). We got to the pool one day at 230 and there were no employees, no towels, and trash/food on the ground.  I consider this
Manager Response: Philly7677,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you enjoyed the surrounding canyon scenery of the resort. We apologize that we did not deliver excellent service in all areas. The feedback that we receive from our guests is extremely important to us improving our operations, so thank you for sharing.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A unique getaway that has it all
Summary: We had our wedding on this incredible property and we were glad we did! When people think of Laguna Beach they think Beach. The Ranch has much more and of course the beach.Our guests were happy we were thrilled everything went so well. This place is luxurious without giving up the bohemian atmosphere of the Laguna Beach life.
Manager Response: John  Thank you for your review and thank you for choosing us for your wedding.  We are thrilled you and your guests enjoyed themselves on your special day.  Please let us know when we can welcome you back for a visit!  Best,  The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Gorgeous remodel! The interior details are amazing. We celebrated 15 years here this week, spending two nights. The food, the decor, the quiet beautiful grounds has us anxious to go back.   I almost cancelled because I was worried from a few reviews and pictures that the old, retro vibe remained. It is neither retro or old. The interiors are absolutely beautiful, modern, and coastal and so well done. The front desk said it was done by Tuvalu Home. Gorgeous.   Staff are so nice and helpful. Quick ride to the beach on their golf carts but if you have a car it's just as easy to hop in and drive down to the beach parking lot.   Restaurant and pool service was great. Great decks, fire pits, and views of the canyon and golf course are not to be missed. Enjoyed every second of our
Manager Response: Jjd15,  Congrats on the 15 year anniversary and thank you for choosing to spend it with us. We appreciate all of the kind words and compliments. We are very thankful to have Tuvalu as our designer as they did a wonderful job. It sounds like you got to take advantage of many of the resort amenities and the view of the canyon is definitely breathtaking. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Just off the buzz of PCH is a beautiful canyon and a creek. A true oasis of peace. Feels like going back in time with the plus of modern amenities. The property is lovely. Deer roam onto the golf course in the early a.m. The views are of nature not suburbia. I stayed in a canyon room. The ceilings are high and makes the room seem larger. There is a pool and hot tub as well as a small spa and a beach volleyball court. Some of the rooms face the creek. Just sitting out on my porch chair was wonderful. Plenty of shade and trees. Enjoyed watching the bird life. Great for a get-a-way or visiting family. Ate at Harvest restaurant. Food is good. Only negatives are poor/no cell reception and the slow service at Harvest. We were there for Christmas. Many large groups with families. There
Manager Response: Dziran,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you enjoyed your peaceful trip at our canyon oasis. Watching and listening to the sounds of nature from your patio must have been amazing. The deer like to come say hello to our guests, so we are thrilled that you were able to experience that. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful property, staff, rooms and amenities. Would recommend highly to anyone looking for a quiet and relaxing weekend romantic getaway. Looking forward not only to staying at the hotel again but recommending it to friends and family when they come to town.
Manager Response: Matthew M,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing getaway in the canyon. We appreciate the compliments and for the recommendation and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location, adorable rooms, friendly staff - definitely a great place to stay! The only downside I saw was the location made cell service very difficult. They had great wifi - but my phone wasn't a fan of wifi calling or texting for some reason. Everything else worked just fine!
Manager Response: 402beccaj,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the compliments regarding the location, rooms and our team. We try our best to offer solutions for the cell phone reception and we are sorry to hear that you were unable to connect to Wi-Fi calling.  We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Spent an evening strolling the beautiful peaceful grounds.  Enjoying the warm fires. Dinner at the Harvest Restaurant was  special. The food was prepared and presented with thought and so delicious. You must try the Salmon.   Our server was friendly and charming yet so professional. Wonderful memories.
Manager Response: RoniTose,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The fire pits on the patio are definitely a great way to stay cozy during the winter time in Laguna. Salmon is one of my favorite dishes and we are glad that you had such a wonderful dining experience at Harvest. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had an incredible time The Ranch for our Anniversary! Amazing property, staff, and amenities. We would highly recommend to anyone looking for a romantic getaway. The close proximity to the beach is an added bonus if you enjoy surfing or any other ocean activities.
Manager Response: Swiz7,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to spend it with us! The canyon definitely offers a romantic backdrop. It is great to hear that you also got to experience the beach across the street from our resort. Our guests get to enjoy the best of both worlds. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nestled in the beauty of Laguna Beach, this hidden gem offers the perfect combination of relaxation, comfort & outdoor activities. We enjoined the newly remodeled restaurant & took part in some of the activities the hotel offers. Will come back!
Manager Response: BrianlV949ME,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The canyon definitely delivers relaxation and comfort. It is so great to hear that you took advantage of the different activities offered by the resort. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Awesome Place to get Away and for Events
Summary: We had an amazing stay there at the Ranch. Super friendly service, beautiful clean grounds, and the room was very nice and clean. We really enjoyed our stay. We would recommend this place to friends and family.
Manager Response: Alxeia,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your commnets!  We are so glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best,  The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Even if you are not an aspiring golfer, this is a great place to stay.  There were 10 of us girls and although we did not play golf or use the spa or other amenities, the hotel was accommodating, and perfect for our three day stay.  The restaurant is very good, the setting is beautiful, and the rooms were spacious and comfortable.  All of the staff were gracious and helpful.  The location is near downtown Laguna, with great shopping, but (fyi) you will need a car or uber.  Overall, we had a fabulous time and would recommend this site for a wedding venue, girls outing, couples outing, or simply a solo get away as the area is very quiet (no street noise) and the rooms are nicely decorated.  One minor suggestion is to improve the bed quality (i.e., add a topper to the mattress for
Manager Response: Deborah T,  Thank you for the great review, you really covered all the bases here, that is what we strive towards is providing an amazing experience for every guest visiting us for any reason. We look forward to welcoming you back for your next adventure and we will have the bed topper in place.  We can't wait to see you again!  Best,  Caitlin

Summary: Let me start by saying that you completely feel like you are at a ranch and at some point forget you are so close to the beach. Pay attention to hotel's sign or you can easily miss it. The road to get to i, definitely not the most appealing and when you finally arrive the first thing you see are cars parked. However, once you entered the front desk area and then see the Patio area it is worth it. Front Desk experience was not the best, I understand the hotel is pretty new but the staff we dealt with during check in and check out were lacking experience, being such a crucial part of a hotel additional training or supervision is needed. Cole (hope name is spelled right) showed us our room and was very pleasant, helpful, polite. Our room was very nice, still smelled like new, we
Manager Response: Dianita,  Thank you for taking the time to provide such a great review.  We are glad that overall that you had a great stay.  Please note that we agree the Front Desk experience is key.  We will be addressing your comments right away in the areas you mention above.  We hope to have you back soon and make sure we earn that last star!  Best, Caitlin C.

Summary: Property was very nice and spacious. I liked the set up of the rooms, it didn't feel like a stuffy old hotel. I would like to come back in the summer when the weather is better and utilize the golf course and pools. We had drinks i the bar which was nice and loved the free wi-fi.
Manager Response: Debbie P.,  Thank you for the kind words! Let us know when your are ready to plan your summer vacation. We would love to help you design the perfect Laguna Beach escape! We are looking forward to seeing you at the property soon!  Best regards,  Caitlin.

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel twice now, and have equally enjoyed each time. The rooms are beautifully decorated in a clean, calming manner. The grounds are very well kept, and the setting is peacefully secluded, yet close to all the local ammenities and attractions. Great, accommodating service. A very relaxing stay in a beautiful place!
Manager Response: Josh B,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us again for the second time. The resort and canyon definitely offer a calming and peaceful environment and it is great to hear that you were able to take advantage of that. We appreciate the compliments and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Loved that there was no cell service! You can unplug and focus or just relax and recharge. Dining was excellent and the staff very attentive. The rooms are large and well appointed. The Ranch delivers on a great resort experience.
Manager Response: Trey H,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you were able to relax and recharge in the canyon. We are so thrilled that our team delivered a great resort experience and we look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I highly recommend this gorgeous property that is conveniently located just minutes from Laguna Beach restaurants, shopping and beach. It was a wonderful experience in a fantastic location. The management and staff were wonderful, the dining experience was exceptional. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: S4444KPamyl,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that our team provided fantastic service and that you enjoyed the dining experience. The view of the canyon certainly enhances the ambiance. We appreciate the recommendation to others and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a fresh spin on the classic California resort lifestyle. The canyon location is beautiful and peaceful. The hotel is newly renovated, crisp and modern. The food is terrific! All of the usual resort recreational facilities are present, but in a modest scale: 9 holes of golf, not 18 . . . Nice pool but nothing extravagant . . . Fitness center with all of the essentials. Most important . . . the staff is terrific from valet to check in to restaurant to golf. Special mention to golf pro Ryan Sheffer who provided the most helpful instruction I have had.
Manager Response: Larry A,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are thrilled to hear that our resort is a fresh spin on the classic California resort lifestyle. We appreciate the compliments regarding the service you received during your stay and will pass them along to our team. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a great property that offers the ambiance of a mountain lodge in close proximity to beautiful coastal scenery. Rooms offer relaxing golf course views. Beautiful large fireplace in lobby/restaurant area and terrace provide great gathering spots. Onsite restaurant and bar make it easy and delicious.
Manager Response: Marydeer,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. The view of the canyon definitely enhances the ambiance. It sounds like you got to enjoy the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon and also going to the beach. We appreciate the compliments regarding Harvest Restaurant/Bar and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stunning setting, calm,serene,beautiful. Minutes from downtown Laguna Beach bustle, to the calm and peace of Southern California canyon. In an unexpected location, walking distance to spectacular Aliso Creek Beach . Small golf course, resort amenities, and beautifully appointed rooms. The decor is simple breath taking style...yes, I promise breathtaking. Comfy cozy inviting indoors and out. You'll be so happy you've come to the Ranch
Manager Response: Graceandflavour,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you got to enjoy a variety of amenities on property and also take a trip to Aliso Beach. We appreciate the compliments regarding the resort decor and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch provided us with the ultimate staycation! From the moment we arrived to the moment we left we felt at ease and completely relaxed. The room's are very warm and comfortable, the property was scenic and the food was delicious.
Manager Response: R4585ZHscottc,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing staycation in the canyon and that your accommodation was warm and comfortable. We want our guests to feel at home. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed here recently on a business trip. Checked in on a quiet Tuesday and the front desk staff were very helpful and professional. Quick process to get my key and they sent a young man in a golf cart to drive me down to my room. Very nice touch as i did not have a vehicle and walking that distance after travelling would not have been too fun. Room was beautiful and the decorations brought the feel of grandpa's cabin in the woods but with all the modern amenities. Cell reception was virtually non-existent which was a problem. They provide free wifi but i use a mobile hotspot to connect to my company's secure network and i could not get my computer to link up using their wifi - and I'm fairly tech savvy. Casually vented about it to the security guy who gave me a ride from dinner
Manager Response: Dealsbroker77,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business trip. We appreciate that you shared the story about our security team assisting in getting your laptop connected to the network. The canyon is definitely a great spot to get work done. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had the best time ever. Everything was just perfect and the service is just impeccable. They take care of every little thing that you can think of and more. I can't wait to come back her. Everyone on the property is so kind with smiles all around. Everything is so well kept, from the rooms, to the pool, to the restaurant to the kids club. They really do take care of everything...we had the best time ever!
Manager Response: Daisy_bhasin,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is so great to hear that you had the best time ever and that our team provided impeccable service. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is a fantastic place for a getaway and relaxation with a world class touch. Every detail is done to the finest  standards one could be looking for. The staff could not be better trained and the food was terrific. We will definetly make a return visit before too long.
Manager Response: MikesA8070ZW,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so glad that you got to enjoy a relaxing getaway in the canyon. It is so great to hear that our team gave so much attention to detail and exceeded standards. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Still working out some kinks I think but overall it was very nice. The rooms are beautiful. The front desk staff needs a little more training. The spa does not have any extra amenities. Very expensive massage for just the massage, no sauna or steam room.
Manager Response: Sabrinah820,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate the compliment regarding the guest rooms. Please know that the feedback of our guests is very important as that helps us improve in our daily operations. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful time. The rooms are fresh and newly decorated and amenities are new and nicely located. The restaurant is newly constructed and the food is good although a limited menu. Surprised The Ranch has such gourmet food on the menu. A fantastic place for weddings with the newly built and decorated rooms!
Manager Response: 773wardt,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for all of the compliments. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation. We plan on expanding the menu at Harvest in the near future and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Always had my eye on this resort but recently found out it had been renovated by the 'Hobie' sports investor group so decided to check it out.  Tucked into the canyon really gives a special getaway feel that still is super close to the Laguna beaches and downtown.  We found some new surf favorites close by in Dana Point & the Ben Brown 9 hole course is beautiful and challenging.  The creek played a main role in our stay as we checked in on the tail end of a rain storm so the gushing water not only was great to watch but listening to it in the evening was an extra special treat.  Make sure to hop into a golf cart to enjoy Aliso Beach & if you bring firewood you can have a beach bonfire right on the sand.  We chose the larger studio that was ideal for hosting our family of three
Manager Response: Kendall,  These are the notes we love to see.  Thank you for choosing us for your Holiday escape. We hope you will make this a tradition with us.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Best,  Caitlin

Summary: Wow.  What a wonderful place!  The setting is serene, the beach a short walk (or ride) away, and the staff is AMAZING.  Sitting in the hot tub, in the rain, is a memory we will not forget.  Along with playing backgammon by the fire.  We can't wait to book again!
Manager Response: F7341KVmartam,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for all of the compliments. It does not rain too much here in Laguna Beach, so that experience is definitely a lifetime memory. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A wonderful place for a weekend getaway. Our room was very comfortable, spacious, and beautifully decorated. We took advantage of the jacuzzi and pool, but not the new spa and fitness room. The food was excellent and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The location is lovely - nestled in a canyon, a short walk to a beautiful beach, and a short drive to shops, galleries, and other restaurants. This is a very family friendly place - the only drawback being that we had an early morning awakening from a baby crying next door. This would not stop us from returning!
Manager Response: Q5102WKnancyb,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you loved the location of the resort and the amenities offered. We are glad that you got to visit the downtown Laguna Beach area as well. There are some great shops, galleries and other fun things to do. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Although we usually stay beachside, we really enjoyed our "canyon" experience. The staff could not have been friendlier and our dinner was excellent. Location was great for an early morning hike and then afternoon leisurely walking through the town of Laguna.
Manager Response: Lyn L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we appreciate that you stayed in the canyon even though you typically stay beachside.
