It sounds like you got to experience a different side of Laguna. We appreciate the compliments and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A great place for a family celebration
Summary: With a family of kids from 5 though 17 and 8 adults nothing could have served us better, golf the beach and the restaurant, service etc was all we could hope for . The family rooms of various sizes had all the amenities and were clean and comfortable. Thanks for a wonderful time.
Manager Response: Ivan R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so glad to hear that the guest rooms accommodated your family during the stay. It sounds like you got to enjoy the best of both worlds in the canyon and at the beach. We hope some deer greeted you on the golf course and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The best of both...beach and hillside!
Summary: Our 1-night stay at the Ranch at Laguna Beach was wonderful!  I fell in love with the bed; I slept in a cloud of cushion and down feathers...it felt so good!  The location and landscape are perfect.  You get the best of both worlds...the beach across the street and the hillside with stream and golf course onsite.  The staff couldn't have been more friendly and welcoming...kudos to the management and staff.  The room décor and landscaping are so picturesque, you can tell it is a lot of thought and attention to detail went into the design...BRAVO!     The only drawback really is the thin walls in the canyon-view rooms, but they have a 10pm quite time rule so everyone can get a restful night's sleep.
Manager Response: Michellehello29,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while still having access to the beach. Thanks for the compliments regarding our team, the room decor and the location of the resort. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing location, accommodations and service.  A 5 star experience!
Summary: Loved the setting, top quality everything, great service and a definite return destination! Friendly staff, gorgeous decor, great food and convenient location.  The remodel is impeccable and the facilities in pristine condition.
Manager Response: Z9992DWlaurad,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you enjoyed the setting of the resort and got to experience our property shortly after our renovation was finished. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for one night of relaxation and fun. We thoroughly enjoyed our time at the Ranch! The staff was extremely friendly and helpful!! If you need to get away - go here! The rooms were the vision of comfort and class, the food was delicious, and we can't wait to return.
Manager Response: TheKellieO,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you and your husband got to spend some time relaxing in the peacefulness of the canyon. We appreciate the compliments and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nestled at the bottom of an unexploited canyon in a forest, yet only a few minutes from a stunning beach. Lovely restaurant (just had breakfast but it was very nice and I'm picky about the quality), quiet and easy access for families with small children. There's a 9 hole golf course but for all the non golfers there's plenty to do such as play volleyball, swim in the pool, a hike or a visit to the spa. Lovely staff too. The only possible average thing about this hotel would have been the bed which was on the softer side in our room.
Manager Response: Anna S,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, while still having access to the beach. We are glad that you got to take advantage of a lot of the amenities offered on property and we look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great Getaway, still working on things, but getting a lot right
Summary: We booked The Ranch for a little local getaway over Thanksgiving weekend. Everyone we met on the staff was smiling, helpful, friendly, ready to assist.  This was from the valet, to the "ranch hands", the reception, restaurant, and housekeeping.   The property is very pretty.  We booked a Canyon Room, with a king bed, and our patio area overlooked the volleyball court and the parking (Building 3).  The room is beautifully appointed with unique light fixtures and art.  The bed was wonderfully comfortable with a feather bed, a duvet, and big pillows.  VERY comfortable! We loved the double sinks, large closet and very large walk in shower. The water pressure on the shower head was better than what we have at home.  We were there on a very rainy weekend, so were only able to use our
Manager Response: CAKatie,    Thank you for choosing to stay with us over the Thanksgiving holiday weekend. It is great to hear that our team was ready to assist in making your stay memorable and that you enjoyed your accommodation. We apologize about the inconveniences experienced with our housekeeping team. I will make sure to pass this along to them. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Spent 2 days at the Ranch at Laguna Beach for a business meeting and wish we could have stayed longer.  The location was absolutely beautiful and serene.  The facilities and rooms were well-appointed and attractive and the food was wonderful.  Best of all, the owners and staff were kind and attentive and the service was impeccable.  I can't wait to return - next time for a vacation!!
Manager Response: Deborah D,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business meeting. Wow, we are honored to hear you say that you wanted to stay forever. It is our goal to make our guests feel at home and it is great to hear that our team provided service that exceeded this goal. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay was relaxing, perfect for a two-day Thanksgiving escape. The service was thoughtful from golf carts to valet to the turn down service.   Free wi-fi throughout the property meant I could work outside with the view as my husband played a round of golf.
Manager Response: Darling-Traveller,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us during the Thanksgiving holiday. It is great to hear that the service provided by our team was thoughtful and thanks for the compliments. We try to add value for our guests by offering Complimentary Valet/Self-Parking and WiFi plus No Resort Fee. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great getaway for family or couples. Very relaxing. Nice pool. Food was good. Didn't try the spa but did use exercise room. It was small but ok. I would go back again and hope that they have fixed some of the problems with getting food outside of "normal" BLD hours.
Manager Response: Danajustdana,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed relaxing in the canyon. We appreciate the feedback about the food service outside of normal meal hours and I will pass it along to our Executive Team. We will be adding dinner to our exisiting In-Room Dining service in the near future. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had such a wonderful family vacation at the ranch just before thanksgiving. The entire staff was so friendly and helpful, thoroughly enjoyed the spa, and loved every meal we had at the hotel. Jr ranger program was fabulous!
Manager Response: ClairewY2853VC,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your family vacation. The Jr. Ranger program is great fun for our young guests and we are glad that the experience was fabulous. We appreciate the compliments and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Stayed at the Ranch while in the process of relocating... Best internet find! The staff, location and services made our relaxation escape during our open house perfect! Our diner at the Harvest restaurant was excellent and enjoying a light breakfast from the Pantry overlooking the golf a good way to start the day before our massage. Will try going back to the Ranch!
Manager Response: 539nadinec,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are glad that you enjoyed relaxing in the canyon during your relocation. It sounds like a massage in Sycamore Spa also contributed to the relaxing stay. Overlooking the golf course while dining definitely enhances the ambiance. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Staycationed here. Played golf twice, which was amazing. Had lunch and dinner at The Harvest. Both were great, but we enjoyed the food at lunch a little better.  Great location, friendly and helpful staff, clean and comfortable rooms, beautiful and cozy property.
Manager Response: Brian W,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is always a great time on Ben Brown's Golf Course and hopefully some deer greeted you during your two rounds. The view of the canyon from Harvest Restaurant definitely enhances the ambience. We appreciate all of the compliments and will share them with our team. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here for a wedding with another couple in one of the cottages and it was just perfect! Beautiful property and the service was impeccable. Very comfortable and enjoyable stay. Wish we could have stayed longer to enjoy more of the amenities.
Manager Response: Macadventures,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope that you enjoyed the canyon backdrop during the wedding. Please join us again soon so you can take advantage of all of the amenities.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice hotel surrounded by mountains and closes to Aliso beach. just read other guest comment and found out they provide shuttle bus to the beachfront with chairs and towels, but the front desk agent did not mention that to us when check in.   We booked Harvest for dinner. They also held a wedding party that day, so we waited 45 minutes for our dinner on the table.  Overall we enjoyed our stay at the Ranch.
Manager Response: Selena L,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that you took advantage of the complimentary shuttle to Aliso Beach. We apologize for the delayed food service at Harvest and appreciate that you let us know. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Friendly and attentive staff.  Room was clean.  Bed was very comfortable.  Shower water pressure was superb.  Enjoyed the local beauty of the Canyon and the accesibility of the beach.  Fitness Center looked awesome, but didn't get an opportunity to use it.
Manager Response: U3722CRjoed,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are glad that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, yet still having access to the beach. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the features of your accommodation. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach was like stepping back in time to the Laguna of my youth. The hotel offers top notch service, food and amenities. When you want to get out of the craziness of new Laguna, step back to a slower pace at The Ranch at Laguna Beach. You will not be disapointed.
Manager Response: Thomas S,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. It is great to hear that our resort brought back fond memories of Laguna. The canyon location of the resort helps establish a slower pace due to the quiet and peaceful environment. We appreciate the kind words about the food, amenities and the service our team provided. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My trip here was excellent. I would recommend it to anyone. The grounds were impecable, staff was friendly & helpful, restaurant was delicious and the rooms were clean and I felt very comrtable......and the beach was a 5 minute walk!
Manager Response: Jcj697,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the recommendation. It is great to hear how comfortable you were during your stay. We want our guests to feel like they are at home. The walk to the beach is very nice and peaceful, so we are glad that you got to take advantage of that.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful location...and short walk to gorgeous beachfront
Summary: The property was beautiful and serene, exactly what I was looking for to enhance my personal getaway.  Easy walk to beach or they provided transportation to the beachfront along with chairs, umbrellas and towels. Spa was not open during my visit so I look forward to coming back to experience that.  The only recommendation I have is to provide more availability for room service...only available for breakfast and lunch, and the restaurant was closed for several hours during the day -- between lunch and dinner.....I am used to much more availability of times to dine so that it works with my schedule, not my having to work my dining time around the resort's. Location to the heart of Laguna Beach was a huge advantage. So, I was able to enjoy a variety of dining and entertainment
Manager Response: ArizonaSpaaddict,  Thank you for staying with us and for recommending us to others. It is great to hear that you were able to enhance your personal getaway at our canyon oasis. We are happy to announce that Sycamore Spa opened last week.  We appreciate the feedback and plan to offer in-room dining at dinner time in the near future. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had the pleasure to stay at The Ranch this past weekend and all I can say is WOW!!! I have been fortunate to golf here since I was a little guy and the transformation to the property is amazing. I live out of state now but always gravitate back to this property to eat and hang out. You don't need to be a golfer to stay. My GF doesn't golf and always insists we come here for breaky or lunch. The remodel of the hotel has been done so carefully that it didn't lose any of its original charm. My mother lives 10 minutes away and this is her go to "staycation". The newly refigure restaurant is so great. Post up at the bar with the windows drawn back or at a table and you are set. Overall my favorite place in Laguna and one of the most unique places to stay. I highly recommend The
Manager Response: Billy C,  We appreciate that you have been a loyal and avid golfer on our course over the years. It is great to hear that you continue to visit us even though you live out of state. Thank you for your support through the transformation and we look forward to your return visits.  Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Was there mainly for buisness and didn't get to enjoy much of the extra stuff that it has to offer. Hot tub seemed a little cool.  Shower inside the room was great.  Food was really good and quickly served.
Manager Response: Coryb738,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your business trip. It is great to hear that you enjoyed dining in Harvest Restaurant We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We will be back! Accommodations and restaurant were excellent! The new remodel turned out very nice. The staff was friendly and professional. Golf course was in great shape as well. We look forward to our next trip back!
Manager Response: Jrncivil,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your accommodation and Harvest Restaurant. Ben Brown's Golf Course is fun for all, so we are glad that you enjoyed a round of golf in the canyon. We look forward to your return visit too!  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This recently renovated property in the canyon is very peaceful. The property has been totally upgraded from the last time we stayed (20 years ago!) and the attention to detail shows. We had a Canyon Room near the volleyball court. The bed was comfy, the linens were lovely and the robes delightful.
Manager Response: Laurie M,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we are glad that the attention to detail showed during your stay. It sounds like you had a very peaceful trip in the canyon and we look forward to your return visit.    Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here and it was the perfect getaway while still being in OC. It has its own micro climate and is surrounded by the hills since it sits in the canyon. It definitely has a ranch feel and the rooms were nicely furnished with wonderful food at Harvest. We received many complimentary meals which was such a treat and enjoyed the 24 hour jacuzzi. Being right across from the beach was great for watching the sunset and the breakfast at Harvest is unbelievably awesome. Get the breakfast enchiladas!
Manager Response: RyanrD8763OU,  Congrats on the anniversary and thank you for choosing to stay with us. Watching the sunset in Laguna sure is a pretty sight. We've heard the enchiladas are delicious, so we are glad you enjoyed the breakfast at Harvest. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: PLeasant eco-lodge adjacent to a golf course
Summary: The property is laid out as a series of one story buildings, most of them surrounding a spacious pool and hot tub.  Deer roam through the property pretty freely it seems; I saw a doe and two older fauns when I left my room and walked to the meeting space.  Saw them again on the golf course and also when I was returning to my room at night.  It's very quite and very peaceful, has good wi fi which is helpful since you are unlikely to get a cell phone signature here.  The rooms are quite spacious and luxurious although simple in design.  Certainly not elaborate but comfortable.  The lodge itself is tastefully decorated, they also have a meeting room in a lofted space that gives a sort of tree house feel.  Friendly people and good service.  Can't comment on the spa and I don't golf
Manager Response: Retinol13,  Thank you for staying with us. The deer like to roam the property, so we are glad that they greeted you on mutiple occasions! That is definitely an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The grounds were so beautiful and we enjoyed it just the two of us but there was so much to do for families we decided to come back with the gang.  Volleyball court, pool, golf, hiking, beach across the way, bocce ball, bean bag throw, fire pit for night time visiting, wine, coffee bar.  So new and clean and all staff were very friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: GregmO6864HZ,  Thank you for bringing the family along for the return visit. It sounds like you took advantage of a lot of the activities offered at our resort! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Old Ben Brown would be proud
Summary: I first started playing the Ben Brown golf course in 1987.  Stayed on site when there were old but very comfortable two-room cottages.  So to see the transformation into a world-class resort -- without effecting the character of the property, is truly a delight.  Ocean views are always great, but there's a lot to be said for the seclusion and peace and quiet of the Canyon.    Hats off to the new owners and to their vision.  Here's hoping you can figure out how to cater to hotel guests rather than "locals."  I never would have come back to a "Montage" with a championship golf course and all the traffic it would have created.
Manager Response: Richard S,  Thank you for being a loyal and avid golfer on our property over the years. We really appreciate it! We are so thrilled that you have been able to witness the transformation of the property and get to experience the vision of The Ranch at Laguna Beach.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great start for this unique laguna hotel
Summary: The service sets this hotel apart. We stayed 2 nights as part of a little romantic getaway and it was perfect. The rooms are comfort and the resort is very well equipped. I imagine the rest will be used frequently for retreats, events and gatherings as the space and setting are perfect for larger groups. The one draw back to the location is no ocean access. However, easy to drive to the beach and laguna.
Manager Response: DelightinTravel,  Thank you for staying with us. We are so glad to hear that the service our team provided enhanced your romantic getaway. Even though we are not oceanfront, we do have a complimentary beach shuttle so our guests can enjoy Aliso Beach.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Loved the Ranch at Laguna Beach...perfection!
Summary: I scoured every description of every hotel in Laguna Beach and checked reviews and finally found the ranch...it was perfection...location ,room, bedding, furnishings, service, toiletries, everything.  Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: Marcia D.  We are so glad you scoured and chose us!  We are so pleased you had a great stay, we look forward to your return!  Best,  Caitlin C.

Summary: The resort was still under some construction during our recent visit but I would still recommend it. The staff is wonderful, friendly and helpful. The restaurant had just opened and we had a delicious lunch and great service. It is tucked into hills just off Pacific Coast Highway next to Ben Brown's executive 9 hole course. Very peaceful, rustic decor, spacious rooms and added touches such as rocking chairs on your (small) but private patio, beach volleyball court, fire pit and corn hole game on patio off the lobby. A family of deer graze on the golf course. They are still working out a few minor kinks and cell service on the property is a problem. Overall, very satisfied and would stay again!
Manager Response: Anne D,  Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you got to enjoy a peaceful stay in the canyon. Our resort just completed our renovation as Sycamore Spa just opened this week. You will need to come back and experience the resort again soon.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Perfect for Families, skip the restaurant
Summary: We had A two-story unit. It's like having your own townhome. Beautifully decorated and the bedding was very comfortable with feather beds. Even the pull out sofa was comfortable. The grounds, pool, everything was very beautiful. The staff goes beyond good customer service! Amazing. Heated pool!!  I still gave it five stars due to staff and accommodations but did have one complaint. The restaurant could use some work. There isn't really any room service. We called to order room service and then were told we needed to pick up the food. It was dark and I didn't feel very safe walking on the dark road. Plus it was quite a hike uphill. We also ordered off the kids menu macaroni and cheese for my daughter and it had red chili flakes on it so she couldn't eat it. It was too spicy. I
Manager Response: Dinoalita,  Thank you for staying with us. It sounds like your family had a wonderful stay in our Cottage Two Bedroom Suite. We appreciate the kind words about our team and the beauty of the property. We do apologize that in-room dining was not available for dinner service. We are looking at having that service available in the near future. Please join us again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Like other guests at the Ranch, we found the property to be beautiful, the rooms elegantly rustic, the staff super friendly and helpful, and the Harvest restaurant, while pricey, to be excellent. Still and all, we checked out after one night instead of three because the noisy guests prevented us from having a peaceful respite. There's only one pool, and this "family friendly" resort was filled with screaming, running children. Also, several members of a convention decided to party loudly in the hot tub all afternoon. We called management, which was helpful, but there should be an employee at the pool who can handle this. Additionally, a wedding was scheduled for that weekend -- we left before the guests arrived. Our suggestion, if you're looking for a peaceful experience, is to
Manager Response: Lisa D,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate the kind words about the property location and our team. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced during the stay and our goal is that every stay is truly special for our guests. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel was quaint and the service was world class.  Had a great time with friends and will certainly come again.  The bed was super comfortable and the shower was similar to home and not a normal Hotel Shower  ( Showers are always a disappointment in hotels for me ).   I had a great time and loved every moment.
Manager Response: S7306CHmatthewc,  Thank you for staying with us and we are thrilled that you loved every moment. It is great to hear that our team provided excellent service and we look forward to your return trip.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My family surprised me with a trip to this resort.  They know I have very high standards for hotels, and this hotel certainly went way above these standards.  The grounds were so calming, filled with natural wonders.  It's not on the beach, but it is set back in the beautiful Aliso Canyon.  It is on PCH, but it set far enough back to where it is completely silent at night.  The decor is well thought out and goes perfectly with the setting.  The only flaw was the slow service at dinner, but the staff was very kind and the food was delicious. I cannot wait to take another relaxing trip to the Ranch!
Manager Response: JoeyTommy,  What a wonderful surprise and that was very kind of your family to do that for you! We are thrilled that our resort exceeded expectations. The setting of the resort in the canyon does have a calming and peaceful effect. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach was an extraordinary experience. We were greeted extremely friendly, led to our Canyon Room (which is more a little cottage) and found everytjing very clean and comfortable. We especially liked the private patio with the rocking chairs... We also enjoyed dinner and breakfast at the Harvest restaurant a lot. The canyon setting is very special and all the gardens and the golf course a very well maintained. Thank you for a great stay at your hotel!
Manager Response: Imkeo970,  Thank you for staying with us and it is great to hear that you had an extraordinary experience from the moment that you were greeted upon arrival! It sounds like you got to also enjoy the breathtaking view of the canyon from your guest room patio. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch setting in the Aliso Canyon is a quiet escape that feels as if one is in a remote getaway, yet upon emerging onto the PCH you are greeted with a gorgeous view of the Pacific. Best of both worlds.
Manager Response: R8469IHtracyb,  Thank you for staying with us and we are glad that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice escape close to beach and attractions
Summary: The check-in was fast and convenient. The staff were all very curtious. The staff will show you where to park by leading you in their golf cart and walk you to the room.  The room was clean and nicely decorated. The room and bathroom area were spacious as well. They even provided a pack and play for our baby.  The staff will provide transport around the property and to the edge of the property where you can walk to the beach.   Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we are glad that our team provided excellent service during your stay. We want all of our guests to be treated like family.  We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: One of the best in Laguna
Summary: The staff here can't do enough for you. The newly refurbished restaurant has high beamed ceilings and commanding views over the canyon and golf course. All the windows open up giving a great sense of space and the food is superb. The rooms are scattered over the property and are large and well appointed. The salt pool area has a bar and hot tub. It's located in a mountainous basin making it feel like you're more in the hills than by the beach, but not in a bad way. The beach is a q0 minute walk, where you can meander up to the 5 star Montage hotel. No sea views and town is a drive away - but great golf - and otherwise it maintains very high standards. I would happily book again.
Manager Response: InkTraveller,  Thank you for staying with us and we are glad that our team provided excellent service during your stay.  We are glad that you got to experience our new restaurant, Harvest. The resort offers the best of both worlds and it is great to see that you got to enjoy both.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice hotel, quiet I just think if you are in Laguna you should be on the beach. Didn't like how everything was so far away. Overall it was a nice hotel and the rooms were def clean and nice. Don't think I would go back but still nice
Manager Response: 369bryanv,  Thank you for staying with us in celebration of a birthday. Even though we are not oceanfront, our resort offers the best of both worlds and is still close to downtown Laguna Beach. We hope that you change your mind and choose to stay with us again.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Ranch at Laguna Beach Harvest Restaurant is Phenomenal!
Summary: Harvest Restaurant at the Ranch at Laguna Beach is our new favorite restaurant in the Laguna Beach area.  We stayed two days and we ate there for breakfast twice and dinner once.  It was absolutely outstanding.  The rest of the trip we wished we had eaten there all week long, and every meal we had paled in comparison to our meals at Harvest.  I highly recommend anything on the menu really, but the smoked bourbon cinnamon roll that is topped with bacon is out of this world.  The service was phenomenal as well.  You would never know they had just opened.  The chef there is an artist.
Manager Response: Jbautz,  Wow! It is an honor to hear that Harvest is your new favorite restaurant in Laguna Beach. Thank you for the compliments. The smoked bourbon cinnamon roll that is topped with bacon is very delicious. We look forward to your return visit. Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The grounds are beautiful, but it is mostly for golf, so there's not a lot to explore with the family. The pool area is average. Super soft mattresses. We prefer firm, so that was a major bummer. They do their best to make it easy to get to the beach by driving you on a golf cart, but the golf cart can only go so far and then you're walking on busy PCH until you get to the under ground tunnel.
Manager Response: I843FEjenniferl,  Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate the kind words about the property grounds. We will be releasing more family programs in the upcoming months, so please stay tuned.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: It was a wonderful get away for my husband and I celebrating out 10th wedding anniversary! It was so relaxing. We enjoyed just sitting on our patio with coffee in the mornings. It is so quiet, you feel like you are miles away, but also so close to everything in Laguna. At night you can faintly hear the waves crashing in the back ground. We enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: StuartsC5271NC,  Congrats on your 10th wedding anniversary and thank you for choosing to spend it with us! The sound of the waves crashing in the background is one of the many wonderful sounds of nature heard in the canyon. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Perfect little getaway for families!  This was a fantastic little slice of paradise, close to the beach and feels like you are in the mountains with a five star room.. My 4 year old son loved the pool, the mule deer both 4 live and 1 stuffed gift.  Such a  great place!
Manager Response: SarasJ4912GI,  Thank you for staying with us and we are so glad that it was a wonderful family getaway. We are glad that you got to experience the best of both worlds. The deer certainly enhance the ambiance of the stay in the canyon. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Quiet, relaxing and still close to the beach
Summary: Great service, comfort and the best shower you will ever take! Great value for the accommodations and less than a mile from the beach. No cell coverage on property and wifi was hit and miss. Not necessarily a bad thing for some much needed relaxation.
Manager Response: Ashley S,  Thank you for staying with us and we are so glad that our team provided excellent service during your stay. We are glad that you got to experience the best of both worlds. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had a lovely time celebrating a birthday at this location.  The staff was extremely friendly, attentive and helpful in meeting all of our requests.  If you appreciate peacefulness and nature's beauty, this place is perfect.  We would definitely come back again and recommend this spot for other travelers.
Manager Response: Mike P,  Thank you for staying with us in celebration of a birthday. We agree, the canyon helps one appreciate peacefulness and nature's beauty, Thanks for your recommendation to other travelers and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely,  Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The rating scales you provide are not high enough to actually give an accurate account of how much we love this place.  We loved the food, the food service (thanks Lauren!!), the bar service (looking at you Ted and Carlos), the pool, the golf, the deer, the room.... ALL OF IT!
Manager Response: James H,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. We are so thrilled to hear how much your love our resort. We will pass along your compliments to our team and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We have been waiting for The Ranch to open its doors for a while. Our expectations were high but this very "young" property exceeded them with the friendliness of the staff, the superb dining experience at The Harvest, and gorgeous rooms. The Ranch is surely on the radar of the older, famous hotel across the street and, if it isn't, it should be.
Manager Response: Sjuric_352429,  Thank you for staying with us and for the patience and support during the renovation. We are so thrilled to hear that your expectations were exceeded. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the service provided by our team, your dining experiences at Harvest Restaurant and your accommodation. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Harvest Restuarant god beyound belief, rooms and location beyound expectations. Staff was great and friendly. I felt a. Enter value than Montage at better quality and less people.  I can't say enough about the food and new restuarant.
Manager Response: ScottgU4079AO,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the service provided by our team, your dining experiences at Harvest Restaurant, the location of the resort in the canyon and your accommodation. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Lot's of activities and space for a family reunion or corporate gathering, The large banquet room with its spacious outdoor area would make a great venue for a wedding reception.  I loved the meeting room off of the dining area, spacious with a beautiful view!
Manager Response: D8370SSrhondam,  Thank you the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the meeting rooms and other event venues at the resort. The canyon definitely gives a nice backdrop for any event. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We loved the location, loved the amazing staff and breakfast at Harvest was awesome!  There were so many activities for the whole family.  We are already planning our next family reunion to take place at the "Coolest Hotel in Laguna Beach."
Manager Response: Laura P,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the service provided by our team, your dining experiences at Harvest Restaurant and the location of the resort in the canyon. We look forward to hosting your family reunion!  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were lucky enough to enjoy a night at The Ranch last week.  It exceeded any expectations we had.  The property is just minutes from beautiful Laguna Beach, but tucked away in the mountains giving it a secluded cozy feel with gorgeous views.  We dined at Harvest for both dinner and breakfast, which was an experience in itself, the food and wine were amazing, you could tell the menu was curated and carefully thought out by the chef.  At night we were greeted by a family of deer that came right up us.  The staff was also extremely helpful.  We plan on returning whenever we need to be in the area, such an amazing find.
Manager Response: Jill S,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. We are so thrilled to hear that your expectations were exceeded. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the service provided by our team, your dining experiences at Harvest Restaurant and the location of the resort in the canyon. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: What a beautiful Canyon location. Stress free golf on executive 9 hole course. Room decor is out of Architectural Digest. Pool experience enhanced by luxurious lounge covers and Tiki Hut bar service. Best breakfast burritos ever. Great photo collection of early Laguna Beach life. Midway between Main Beach in Laguna and Dana Point.
Manager Response: Wickh2016,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation, Ben Brown's Golf Course and the location of the resort in the canyon. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great vacation spot for families. Wish more was included for the price of the stay but overall, the resort is beautiful and the staff was amazing  The wildlife is wonderful and the golf course has fabulous greens.
Manager Response: KNoellP,  Thank you for staying with us and we are so glad that it was a great vacation for your family. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the service provided by our team, Ben Brown's Golf Course and the wildlife in the canyon. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Such a beautiful place to stay, the rooms were incredible and the scenery just as stunning. The facilities were great, the golf course was beautifully kept and waking up to see deer roaming around the ranch was lovely.
Manager Response: James B,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation, Ben Brown's Golf Course and the location of the resort in the canyon. The deer like to roam the property, so we are glad that they greeted you! That is definitely an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: A very beautiful resort set back in the Laguna Beach canyons.  They recently completed a lovely renovation.  The property is great.  The rooms were very nice and the bed was supper comfortable. We even saw numerous deer grazing on the lawns, which was fun to observe.
Manager Response: KathysU2670GC,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation and the location of the resort in the canyon. The deer like to say hello quite often, so we are glad that they greeted you! That is definitely an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A cheery find in the canyons!
Summary: Tucked away in a canyon immediately south of Laguna Beach lies The Ranch at Laguna.  Bright and warm, the hotel is a series of lawn connected rooms in short runs that allow visitors privacy at the same time welcoming them to a sort of unique "invite only" experience.  Pool and spa were clean, open late.  Rooms were generous in size, good amenities including twin sinks, large bathrooms and full range of cable TV options.  Grounds were well kept with mountain views of some merit.  Nice walking paths to the beach, quality food and quiet.  When there, we felt very much at home.  So we booked again to begin bi-monthly weekends with lost friends from San Diego.  Recommended highly.
Manager Response: MarksE1284KT,  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation, the resort amenities, and the location in the canyon. I will be sure to pass your compliments along to our team. We are honored that you have already booked a return stay and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Wait until construction is over, at least...
Summary: Place is gorgeous, but walls and accommodations are thin. Sewage truck and construction sounds at 7am did not make for a relaxing and restful vacation. For the price, I thought we deserved a bit better. That said, it is a gorgeous place and setting. With a better experience, I'd be back.
Manager Response: AmygY6064OY,  Thank you for staying with us and for the feedback. It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the location of the resort in the canyon. We apologize for the inconveniences caused by the renovation work and that is unacceptable that it caused you not to have a relaxing vacation. We would like to invite you back for a return stay and will reach out to you upon the completion of the resort. We want you to have a better impression of the resort than what you experienced.    Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our group was on a business retreat. The location, rooms, food and beverage, variety of activities ( golf, pool, hiking) allowed everyone enough accessibility to work hard, play hard. It's a very unique space unlike anything else in So CA. Kudos to the new owners for delivering a true laid-back surf-ranch classic CA hospitality.
Manager Response: CapistranoBeach,  Thank you for choosing us to host your business retreat. It is always great when you can work hard while still playing hard and we are thrilled that it was experienced in the canyon. We appreciate the kind words regarding the hospitality that was delivered and I will be sure to pass your compliments along to our team. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My boyfriend and I had the best weekend stay at this hotel. We already cannot wait to come back! We were upgraded to a suite after booking a canyon room, and we were so happy with what we got! The room was huge and had a beautiful, comfortable bed which made the night's sleep so easy! The shower was huge and had great water pressure, and the overall design of the room was to die for! The hotel grounds are well kept and beautiful, and we did not see an ounce of construction even though we were warned it was still going on! Harvest restaurant is also incredible and I definitely recommend going for breakfast. Thank you so much to The Ranch for making this couples getaway a relaxing time for us!
Manager Response: Emmaj408,  Thank you for staying with us and we are so glad that you were able to enjoy a relaxing couples getaway. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed your suite accommodation, Harvest Restaurant and the location of the resort in the canyon. I will be sure to pass your compliments along to our team. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A luxury alternative in Laguna Beach
Summary: There are many choices in Laguna, but few offer quiet, historical surroundings.  The Ranch at Laguna beach will excite your natural senses.  Beautiful canyons, a delightful pool and spa, and rooms with the latest luxuries; promise a great experience. They also have one of the nicest golf, restaurants and bars I have experienced.
Manager Response: 833meredithj,  Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate all of your kind words. It is so great to hear how much you enjoyed the experiences during your stay in the canyon. I will be sure to pass your compliments along to our team. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I have been to Laguna several times even staying at surf and sands and the montage which r very nice. But for the price and different scenery it was so lovely.  We went to Ranch at Laguna for a wedding and what a great venue it was
Manager Response: B8077GPandrewj,  Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate all of your kind words. The canyon definitely makes a beautiful backdrop for a wedding. We hope to be your resort of choice on your future visits to Laguna Beach and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful property but disappointing stay due to staff
Summary: Great place but beware of staff!  We did not get our room serviced once and we were there for 2 nights / the restaurant is extremely slow (almost missed our flight!) / check in and check out staff was rude / we were hit with extremely high incidentals after check out they were not helpful in understanding... the list could go on and on. Beautiful property but would suggest to stay somewhere else if you value being treated like a valued customer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for a wedding. The rooms are nicely appointed,  clean and charming. The breakfast was outstanding and the view made it a nice place to linger. The staff makes this hotel extra special because they were all so friendly and made you feel like family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a meeting at The Ranch for 2.5 days.  The staff was very detail oriented, our meeting room was perfect for 20 people and the catering staff/food was delicious!  A great experience for all attendees!
Manager Response: none

Summary: That was one of the best retreats ever. Cannot say enough about this place. Awsome was the scenery and landscapes, just so stunning and the entire staff is top notch. I can't wait for another opportunity to visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful view, wonderfully sized and furnished rooms, comfortable beds, delicious restaurant and great staff. Not too much more you can ask for! Very close to everything such as dining, shopping and the beach. Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at The Ranch. The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable and seem dedicated to you enjoying your stay. It is just up from the beach nestled in a canyon and the day I stayed there I woke to the most magical fog that had settled in the morning. It made the golf course look like out of Scotland itself. I really love the design of this place - it looks organic to the area with beautiful landscaping that is drought tolerant friendly and fun sort of backyard games like bocce ball and a pallet bean bag toss. And smartly designed pleasing interiors as well. I loved the tallavera tile in the bathroom and the big bed with chandeliers. Its the type of property you feel right at home in - no pretensions, typifying California cool!
Manager Response: Retrorich,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave a detailed review regarding all of your experiences! We appreciate the kind words as our team is dedicated to making our guests stay truly memorable. We are so glad that you enjoyed the location and design of the resort. The canyon sure is a beautiful backdrop. We look forward to your return visit soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: There was no restaurant or room service the first night we arrived.  The restaurant opened the second night we were there, but half of the items on the menu were not available.  After waiting forever for our food, we were served a hamburger that was so under cooked, it was dangerous.    There is a lot of noisy construction going on with many parts closed off.  We tried playing golf, but there were so many interruptions with cars and trucks on the course.
Manager Response: rgilmartin2016,  I can understand that the lack of service available would be very frustrating when you are expecting to enjoy everything on property. Please accept our sincere apologies that your experience was not up to your expectations or ours. The resort will not be fully open for another couple weeks, regardless it seems that you encountered misfires in multiple instances.   We’d like to redeem ourselves if at all possible, our Director of Food & Beverage can be reached at rj@ranchlb.com and we hope to hear from you!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing, beautiful, relaxing and peaceful stay in the nature !
Summary: Amazing, beautiful and peaceful setting in the mountains The staff is friendly, accommodating and very welcoming.  Great pool area and jacuzzi ! A lot of different place to play with kids. Amazing golf in the middle of the nature and animals. Very good food. Beautiful and cozy room, great balconies. This place is so relaxing and the view is unbelievable !
Manager Response: Karine L,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave a detailed review regarding all of your experiences! Great to hear that you enjoyed a variety of amenities! We are so glad that your experience at our resort was great from the beginning and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: A True Reflection of Laguna Beach
Summary: What a great place. It's not fully open yet, but it was still better than many resorts I've stayed.   The room was amazing - very beach cottage feel with furnishings that don't feel like generic hotel furnishings. More like staying in a very cool friend's beach house. It's so comfortable that it's hard to leave!  The service was amazing. Everyone I interacted with was so helpful, which is amazing considering they are not all the way finished/open yet. Custom food order? No problem. Drive me to a great place to ride bikes? Not a problem. Point out the Tesla parking/charging with asking, thank you very much. Everything is, no problem.  The grounds are beautiful. the property is in a canyon just up from the beach with Aliso creek running along side it. The property totally feels
Manager Response: Tom R,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave a detailed review regarding all of your experiences! This is wonderful feedback for our team as we get closer to completion. We are so glad that your experience at our resort was great from the beginning and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch is under construction - only in certain areas - but not on the weekend.  If this is what it is like under construction - I can't wait to come back for the finished product! We stayed in a creekside studio. High ceilings, wonderfully clean, nice decor, beautiful chandelier and large balcony overlooking the creek. The staff is amazing, friendly, accommodating, welcoming and seem to anticipate the needs of the guests - offered water poolside just as I was getting thirsty : ) Nice pool and jacuzzi area - with beautiful, clean lounge covers that slip over the back of the chair to ensure they stay in place. Beautiful and peaceful setting in the mountains. Even the guests seem friendly and relaxed! Overall - Amazing! The pictures don't do the rooms and grounds justice!
Manager Response: Kaybeet,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave a detailed review regarding all of your experiences! We are so glad that your experience at our resort and with our team was great from the beginning. The completion of the resort is scheduled for the new future, so we look forward to your return visit soon.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: There was PEE in the toilet, used soap & towels in our room!
Summary: SUPER disappointed.  My husband booked a little staycation here for our anniversary.  The Check in was in a room deep into the property that was just an empty room with desks and a printer.  It felt like we were signing papers for a crappy apartment we were going to rent.  The real check in was being used for a wedding as was the hotel restaurant...which means off limits to regular non wedding party guests.  The real kicker came when we checked into our room and noticed the toilet was bright yellow (someone forgot to flush) and had also washed their hands so the bar soap was used and a used towel was thrown on the sink.  The rest of the room was clean so I was very worried that someone was able to access the room after housekeeping came.  We immediately called the front desk and
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  I cannot apologize enough for your less than stellar experience with us.  The issues that you experienced are in no way acceptable, and we will be following up with our team members to ensure that our Resort Standards are upheld.  Quite honestly we were all very shocked when hearing about what happened during your stay!  Nobody should have to have an arrival experience like this and it disappoints us that your special weekend was marred by our lack of service.  We are also very eager for our final opening so that our resort will be more conventional in terms of our Front Desk Lobby as well as the amenities that we offer.  This will also provide ample space for groups and events to enjoy without limiting amenities for our leisure guests.  I have sent you an email and will call you personally so that we can discuss this in further detail, our only goal is that you know how much we value and appreciate your business and feedback.  Best, Kelly Dwyer

Summary: Nestled in Aliso Canyon this place is a gem! Well appointed rooms, superb food, excellent staff & a fun golf course. Located near beautiful Aliso Beach with easy access to public transit. Stay here eat here play here. You won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: TKO98144,  We appreciate the kind words! It is great to see how much you enjoyed your time in the canyon. I will take your compliments back to our team. We hope to welcome you back very soon. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: AN AMAZING REUNION AT AN AMAZING RESORT
Summary: Having grown up in Laguna Beach, our high school class made the easy decision to have both our All Alumni Party and our Class Reunion Party at The Ranch at Laguna Beach.The All Alumni was held outside on a beautiful patio overlooking the golf course. The service and the staff were so accommodating, and the food delicious. The evening was made even more special as we were visited by deer grazing just in front of us. It was a great precursor to what would be the best reunion we would ever have. Reunion day began with a very quick and organized check-in to our amazing room. Beautiful rooms, lovely, heavy robes, wonderful toiletries, gigantic shower with great water pressure, and beautiful tile work. We were shuttled into the exquisite canyon for a reception replete with drinks,
Manager Response: Lori L,  Thank you sincerely for your review. Just reading it was relaxing! Our team will be delighted to know that you enjoyed two memorable and magical celebrations at The Ranch LB. I will take your compliments back to our dining and events team. We hope to welcome you back very soon especially once the resort is complete! Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Being a Native of Laguna Beach, California (In fact I grew up on the hill just to the south of The Ranch) .......and having stayed in many of the hotels in Laguna Beach since I moved away from my home....I can tell you that The Ranch  at Laguna Beach probably comes closer to the actual "feel" of Old Laguna Beach than any other hotel in town.  Yes, the landmark Hotel Laguna is perhaps the city's most famous landmark but it is almost beyond repair.  The Ranch at Laguna Beach was formerly Ben Brown's Aliso Creek Inn, but has undergone an absolutely spectacular rebirth.  The true "Old Laguna" look is prevalent in the beautifully re-created rooms.  Tranquility abounds-something there isn't much of in Laguna Beach thanks to all the noise of PCH.  The simple fact is if it's that rare
Manager Response: Dear Mark L.,  Thank you for taking the time to review The Ranch LB! Our team will be thrilled that you compared the resort to “Old Laguna.” That was really the goal and heart behind the entire project. Laguna Beach is such a special place and the vision to update the property was inspired by the beauty surrounding.   It is great to hear that your group enjoyed the design and dining and we hope to welcome you back very soon!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hotel is currently being renovated.  The new rooms a stunning in a light airy sophisticated palate.  The grounds are beautiful and there's even a scout camp out past the end of the driveway.  Beautiful 9 hole golf course (Ben Brown's) winds back into the canyon.  Has a great pool with an outdoor bar.  The staff is friendly and outgoing.  Walking distance to the beach (across S. Coast Hwy).  Very nice restaurant at the top of the hill with patio seating.  I'd give it 5 stars, however it isn't right on the beach.  Only complaint is that in the almost bedroom-sized shower there isn't a bench or shelf to put your leg up to shave.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your kind feedback! I will absolutely take your notes back to our team regarding the shower bench, which is a great idea. Also, lovely to hear that you appreciated the design palate and color selections, I think you will enjoy the ambiance in Harvest and Sycamore Spa as well!   Our team will be proud to hear that they made a great impression and we hope to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Overall, a very peaceful place to stay.  Was unhappy with the amount of construction going on.  Poor dining options during construction made worse by the hotel reserving the Harvest patio area to local events all 3 nights we stayed.  We intended to get onsite massage but spa was closed.  Based on overall quality of the hotel, it will be very nice when construction complete.  Would recommend; just not during construction.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  It is great to hear that you found RLB a peaceful place to stay and thank you sincerely for taking the time to leave a review. Please accept our sincere apologies that the experience was not what you expected and service limited due to construction and private events throughout your stay.   We hope you'll visit us again once we are fully open and you have a chance to experience the spa and full dining.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a delightful relaxing four day stay here!  Service was amazing!  Room beautiful and comfortable! Quiet secluded location but within minutes of every amenity of Laguna Beach! Front desk recommended great hikes and restaurants!
Manager Response: Julie J,  We are so glad that you got to relax in the canyon! Thank you for the kind words regarding the service and rooms. I will take your compliments back to our team.  We hope to welcome you back very soon. Thank you again for choosing to stay with us for four days!  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: One of our new favorite breakfast spots.  The patio overlooks the golf course and the peaceful setting is enhanced by the view.  If you have to wait for a table you can get coffee at the coffee bar and enjoy the view form well placed rocking chairs.  There is even a corn hole game to pass some time.  And then . . . The food is great.  Don't miss the cinnamon roll!
Manager Response: Michael M,  We are excited to hear that we are one of your new favorite breakfast spots! The cinnamon rolls are delicious. We agree that the view of the canyon from the patio rocking chairs is breathtaking. Thank you again for choosing to dine with us.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Very nice resort and I would come back again. Hopefully the restaurants would be opened and there would be a bigger variety on the menus.  There needs to be some activities for children to enjoy the resort more.
Manager Response: Tawfeg A,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! Harvest Restaurant will be opening in the near future and will have a bigger variety on the menu. We are working on expanding our Junior Rangers kid's program so hopefully you can take advantage of that during your next stay.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I would defiantly never stay at the ranch again. The rooms were nicely furnished, but it was the ugliest hotel I have ever been to on the outside. The pool was small, but the drinks were ok. Every building is just a big brown block. The food was fine. Other than the pool and volleyball court, there wasn't much to do. Save yourself a bad experience and just go to The Montage.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The positives are an exceptionally comfortable bed, good bathrobes, attractive room furnishings, and comfortable loungers by the pool.  That apart, my stay was a huge disappointment. Forget the arcadian images on the website. The hotel is a series of austere motel-style blocks, spaced quite tightly together. Many rooms have views/patios directly overlooking the car parks. There is zero privacy with the patios. Sound insulation between the rooms is poor.   What was even more disappointing was the service. Check-in was pretty unwelcoming, a $400 upfront provisional charge, and strict admonition regarding smoking (fine), and any noise after 10pm; no turn-down service as highlighted; 10-15 minutes to receive the drink I had ordered at the bar (Happy Hour means 20% off); a pool bar
Manager Response: pnlaw,  We are sincerely disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations. We can appreciate that the hotel design and layout is not for everyone, while maintaining the original footprint our team chose to reflect and blend with the surrounding canyon landscape and pay tribute to the first homestead in Laguna.   Regardless, I can understand that it is hit or miss in terms of preference. The images on our website are also something we have combed through in great detail to make sure that it showcases exactly what The Ranch LB will offer when fully open and also what we offer at this point. Again, we apologize for  your disappointment.  As for lack of service and the feeling that events and function were given higher priority, that is never the way we want any guest to feel and is truly the biggest disappointment but valuable feedback.   Thank you for taking the time to review us and we hope you’ll visit us once we are open and for an opportunity to redeem the experience you had.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our stay at the Ranch at Laguna was wonderful. Right from the beginning before booking I received prompt answers to my questions from Madison. I was able to book the Laguna Escape package, which was the same price as the best available but offered $100 in resort credit, which was great to use at the harvest restaurant. I am in love with the fact that they don't charge a resort fee (and they are an actual resort), nor do they charge for WI fi or parking. This just seems to be unheard of these days and it’s so nice to know that you don't have these extra charges added to your bill. I don't know if once it is fully finished if they will start charging but I really hope they don't.  I received e-mail prior to my stay asking for any requests I may have which I thought was very
Manager Response: Boopbabe23,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave a detailed review regarding all of your experiences! This is wonderful feedback for our team as we get closer to completion. We are so glad that your experience with our team was great from the beginning and look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The construction is still in a full swing. The noise around the restaurant and the pool is significant . There is plenty of work done outside, rather then internal decoration. The suite we stayed in was lovely. Nice, home like feeling. Furnishings were chosen well and the stay was pleasant. I lot of services are in a temporary locations. The check in must be improved now. The hotel is not cheap and the guest should feel more special, when they arrived. Bell staff is very good. We were shown around by Cole, Articulate and very pleasant
Manager Response: Fivegirls2000,  Thank you for the feedback as this is important to our team as we get closer to completion. The arrival experience will be enhanced in the near future as we are putting the final touches on our new front desk in The Ranch House. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your suite accommodation and look forward to your return trip.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our visit to the newly renovated Ranch at Laguna Beach.   Our suite was virtually a condo (minus the kitchen). Two story, two bath, two bedrooms with beautiful views of the golf course, trees, and mountains. Did I mention the downstairs patio AND upstairs balcony (niiiiice)? The decor was rustic, simple and chic.   I appreciated the little details and many surprises. One of which was a note mentioning their dedication to #conservation and #sustainability with a genius action plan to use all discarded coffee grounds in their gardens. The map of the property included a map of Laguna and was clever and helpful! How did they get the buck and deer to greet us at sunrise? Seriously, we had a beautiful view of the golf course and wildlife.   There's more ... Upon
Manager Response: HollydayEveryday,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for providing such great feedback. We are delighted to hear that our team provided your family with such wonderful service during your stay. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is the perfect accommodation for families and we are thrilled that yours enjoyed the features and amenities. We do hope that you can play a round of golf at Ben Brown's soon as you will love the layout as you wind through the canyon.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful Canyon Retreat with Easy Beach Access
Summary: My boyfriend and I absolutely loved the remote location, absolute silence of our room, and welcoming staff! The views from the pool and dining patio are gorgeous (think: clear blue skies, crisp breeze, and tall canyon hills surrounding the endless green gold course below). We spent our time eating at the Harvest Patio, lounging by the pool (huge beach sized towels are at the pool, and we sat with drinks in hand from the pool bar), and in the early morning we took a quarter-mile walk down to the beach to watch the early-bird body surfers coast down the crashing waves. So relaxing! This is set back from the beach and five minutes south of the Downtown Laguna bustle, so you can easily drive or catch a ride to the Laguna action without being in the center of it (i.e., you skip the
Manager Response: Ellen_bittner,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for providing such great feedback. We are delighted to hear how much you enjoyed the ambiance in the canyon. Eating at Harvest Patio and lounging by the pool sounds so relaxing! The walk to the beach is very popular among our guests and we are glad you took advantage of it. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: For those visitors to the Laguna Beach area that wish to seek a more private and intimate breakfast or lunch away from the crowds in downtown, you should try the outdoor restaurant at The Ranch at Laguna Beach, formerly The Aliso Creek Resort.  There have been major updates to this iconic hotel with a new conference center, golf shop and new residence buildings.  We came to enjoy a quiet, relaxing meal away from the crowds.  The lunch menu had several nice selections from the standard hamburger, pulled pork sandwiches etc but there are "chef's specials" daily.  I had a carnitas soft tacos with guacamole, fresh salsa and lime.  My brother-in-law had breakfast (served all day).  The service was great, not rushed, the views of the canyons and mountains were beautiful, and if time
Manager Response: Kent S,  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a quiet and relaxing meal on the Harvest Patio. The carnitas soft tacos are delicious and the pulled pork sandwich is my personal favorite. The view of the canyon from the patio is breathtaking and makes the dining ambiance even better. We look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent hotel and property.  Quiet, yet close enough to the chaos if that is your thing; just a quick ride on the Laguna Beach Free Shuttle and you are in the mix with thousands of your closest friends.  Or better yet, just hang around the Ranch for a quiet, relaxing, and decadent experience.
Manager Response: SebH8826HX,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. Great to hear that you loved the ambiance of the property in the canyon. We look forward to your return trip.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice quiet location - close to downtown - shuttle service and beach access close.  Aliso Beach was very quick access.  The golf cart shuttle to PCH was a convenient.  Food was excellent and service supreme.
Manager Response: Pmadden55,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for the kind words about your experience in the canyon. We are glad that you got to also enjoy Aliso Beach during your stay. The food is delicious and great to hear that you loved it. We look forward to your return trip.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful location.   Lovely rooms.    Food was good.  A little noisy by volleyball field.  Woodland retreat. Need to put in restaurant for dinner.  Also bath tb in room would be nice.  Early check in would be nice.
Manager Response: joerT8645PQ,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! It is great to hear how much you enjoyed the canyon location and your accommodation. Harvest Restaurant will be opening in the near future and we invite you for dinner when it does open. We do our very best to accommodate all guest requests, including early check-in, but cannot guarantee it before 4:00pm. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were disappointed in the amount and noise of construction. The lack of parking. The bar being closed. No room service quality of pool setting. Lack of services. No shuttle service and minimal space for family activities.
Manager Response: Dear Timm,  We are truly sorry for your experience during your stay.  We have tried very hard to make sure all our guests understand the impact construction will have on their stay. Please note that the majority of the issues you mention: Construction, Parking, Bar and Room service will be rectified in the next 2-3 weeks as we conclude the construction process. Once complete all of the afore mentioned services will be readily available with consistent hours of operation.  As for family activities, as the remaining grounds are completed there will be more public spaces and areas for more family fun.  In addition to the pool, volleyball court, the beach and golf we offer now will be offer more lawn style games for families to enjoy.  These activities will be in addition to the family programming we already have in place.  I hope you will consider another visit once we are complete.  If so please contact me directly at Caitlin@ranchlb.com and I would be glad to assist you in making your future reservations.    Best,  Caitlin Curry

Summary: Beautiful setting. The cottage was not truly a cottage/separate building as one would expect from the description. It was lovely inside but was really a plain, unattractive multi-unit building! Valet asked if we wanted help after leading us  to the room..Huh? We knew the full service restaurant was not ready but not to be able to get even a soda after 9pm on a Saturday night was absurd. When checking out the front desk seemed to genuinely care about our feedback and duds not seem surprised at our comments. They did comp our breakfast.    Why would a family of 4 merely want a tour guide to watch us retrieve the luggage from the car  rather than help us?
Manager Response: Gilley66,  Please accept our apologies that the experience was not up to your expectations. Your feedback is very important to our team especially at this stage in our soft opening. The, details do in fact, make all the difference in a guest’s experience and these will be covered with the teams you addressed.   My assumption with the Valet mishap would be unintentional and a result of guests declining assistance. Nonetheless, we never want our guests to encounter a lack of service in any way. We are limited with room service as the kitchen and restaurant will fully open this Fall, however it shouldn’t be an issue to deliver a beverage after 9am.  To note, the building were built in the 60s and were renovated for design purposes (maintain the history of the original property) and to minimize our footprint with construction. We can appreciate that the aesthetic is not everyone’s taste. Our two bedrooms are called cottages because of their size and design. The board and batten walls, roped mirrors, and plein air paintings are reminiscent of the crystal cove cottages and not a standard hotel room décor.  Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback as this is quite helpful to our team as we near our grand opening this Fall. We hope to welcome you back to redeem the first impression you received. We have other room layouts available that are more private and am confident in the hospitality you’ll find at RLB.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Nice quiet location. Nice to be in the canyon surrounded by mountains. Close to downtown with the shuttle service. The rooms were well appointed and it was nice to have a fridge with and microwave. The staff were friendly and accomodating
Manager Response: Lauren B,  It is our pleasure to have you stay with us pre-opening! Thank you also for taking the time to leave such a kind review. We hope our guests will have a moment to retreat in the canyon and find the atmosphere welcoming and friendly. Please visit us again soon and thank you again!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great stay. Nice quiet and very comfortable and updated rooms.Great property location and close to beachfront at Alisio Beach. The golf cart shuttle to the Pacific Coast Hiwy very important so you can grab the free Trolley to the beach without having to deal with traffic in Laguna
Manager Response: Lon F,  Thank you for your notes! Our team will be happy to hear that you enjoyed the rooms, property and convenience of the beach shuttle. More amenities to come! We hope to welcome you back very soon. Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful stay and loved the golf! The location was nestled in the heart of Laguna and made for quiet atmosphere with mountain like setting, we loved it! Can't wait for the Harvest Dining experience in the future!
Manager Response: tessam874,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! This means a ton to our team and it is great to hear that you enjoyed the golf, location and vibe. Please visit again soon, Harvest will open for breakfast, lunch and dinner this Fall!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The only "but" I have in the entire experience (which was nothing short of amazing) is the cell service.  There might not be anything you can do about this, but it is literally my only complaint, and I wouldn't necessarily even call it a complaint.  There might be some tech means of helping this problem and would be worth looking into.  Otherwise, your hotel is nothing short of amazing!  Thank you so much.
Manager Response: 353codyc,  Thank you for the kind review! It is great to hear that you enjoyed your stay. Cell service is spotty in the canyon and our management team continues to brainstorm ways to make staying connected simpler for our guests. Next time you visit, please feel free to ask for assistance from a concierge and they would be happy to trouble shoot connecting with wifi calling or apps specific to your provider.   Looking forward to welcoming you back for another staycation and thank you again for the feedback on your stay!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Enjoyed family vacation, post Disneyland, and we had a chill time at The Ranch Laguna Beach. Quite, relaxing and kids enjoyed the pool & hot tub and we enjoyed the golf, weekend yoga & breakfast and patio on the Harvest Patio.  Drove up the street to the beach behind the Montage resort & calm waters there nice with younger kids. Also picked up pizza nearby at Z pizza, picked up snacks & drinks from Gelson's (grocery store) along with eating at Starfish restaurant. Picked up inexpensive wake boards from CVS in the same shopping complex. Enjoyed the pizza & salad at Nea politan pizzeria too.
Manager Response: Luxuryfinder,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! It is great to hear that your family was able to experience quite a few different amenities on property. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the golf course. The beaches in Laguna are very family friendly so it is wonderful to hear that the kids were able to enjoy it. We look forward to your return trip.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team
