Summary: My team continues to enjoy their offsites at your resort and I always get great feedback. The peaceful environment and location are key for us. We will be booking again soon. Thank you for all your assistance.
Manager Response: 705ellie,  Thank you for choosing to host your team offsites at our resort!! It is great to hear the wonderful feedback that you receive about the experiences at our property. We look forward to hosting the next offsite soon. Let us know how we can be of further assistance.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Beautiful rooms and resort. Everything has been done with great taste, without being "posh". We loved sitting on our terrace (building 9), enjoy the pool and the view from Ben's Pantry (a little like "out of Africa"). Also small dishes at Ben's great quality for reasonable prices. Fares are expensive, but worth it. Construction was going on, but not annoying.
Manager Response: Peterpost0611,  Thank you for the kind words about the accommodations and the resort. The view in the canyon is breathtaking and it is good to hear that you got to enjoy it on the patio. We appreciate that you have stayed with us multiple times recently and look forward to your return visit.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The room and grounds were excellent. And the short walk to the beach was convenient. We had a few service issues, but nothing big and I chalk it up to the hotel still being worked on. We had breakfast there, and the food was good with interesting choices. I would definitely go again once the construction is completed.
Manager Response: ADRINHB,  Thank you for the kind words about the accommodations and the resort. The walk to the beach is very relaxing so we are glad that you got to experience it. We appreciate the feedback about the service as that is very important as we get closer to the completion of the property. We would love to invite you back in the near future upon the full opening of the resort.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel...can't wait to completion!
Summary: Clean, large rooms, and great amenities.  I can't wait until the spa is open and the resort is completed.  The food was delicious although it was a limited menu.  Golf course was fun and relaxing.  it was very convenient for the resort to supply beach chairs, beach umbrellas and towels.  Sand volleyball pit was wonderful.  A great place to relax with the family!
Manager Response: Kayvan E,  Thank you for the kind words about the accommodations and the amenities. Hopefully some deer greeted you on the golf course. Aliso Beach is very family friendly, so glad to hear that your family got to enjoy it. Sycamore Spa and Harvest Restaurant will both be opening in the near future, so we invite you to experience the new outlets soon.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Loved our stay! We were here celebrating our 4 year anniversary with our kids, and the location was perfect! Can't hear the traffic on PCH but close enough to head out and explore the beauty of the beach! We will definitely be back
Manager Response: Mommyoftwo2016,  Congrats on the 4 year anniversary and thank you for the choosing to celebrate it with a stay at our property. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the peacefulness of the canyon. We look forward to your return visit.  Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I liked the hotel very much but was expected a little different from what I read on the website. In any case it is a lovely hotel, the colors matching the environment making a more relaxing feel. Room decoration and furniture were exceptionally beautiful. Once the restaurant and the other sections are fully completed they will probably feel more spacious, at the time we felt we were in an enclosed area even though of the extensive grounds. Pool has a very nice design. Overall I'll say it has a very relaxing feeling however if full it may feel very crowded. I could consider returning
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your sincere review and taking the time to provide feedback. In regard to the design of the website we have carefully tried to list the completion of each area and to indicate what to expect once construction is complete. During the soft opening, we still have some construction finishing and certainly understand how that would not reflect on the website.    With that said, our team will take into consideration the notes we’ve received from you and other guests to provide the best experience from booking to departure. We really feel there is something special about this place. Our team will be thrilled to hear that you enjoy the nature-inspired palette of the exteriors (that is actually something we don’t hear a lot!) and the rooms.   We hope to welcome you back soon especially once the spa, restaurant and construction is all completed.  Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin

Summary Heading: Enjoyable Summer Stay with 21 month old
Summary: We are Southern California locals who wanted a quick 2-day get-a-way to the beach.  The location of The Ranch was great because it was near the beach but also had a secluded feel.  It felt like you were in the middle of nowhere, especially at night, it was very quiet at night. We loved the rocking chairs on the small patio off of our room. We traveled with our 21 month old daughter and stayed in the basic Canyon room.  We brought our own travel crib. The travel crib sets up on the ground so we were worried that the floors were going to be too hard for her to sleep on but we used the extra blanket in the closet for padding and it worked out okay. She slept fine. We enjoyed the character of the room, especially the ceilings.  It was a very pretty room.  The bed was also super
Manager Response: Bernv78,  Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for the thoughtful review. Your notes are very helpful to us in this stage as well. The inflatable bath tub and baby friendly bathroom amenities is a fantastic idea. I will run this by the Front Desk to see how we can make that happen. Even if made available upon request, I am sure other families would use these child amenities.   Overall it is great to hear that you enjoyed the dining, pool and property. We hope you’ll bring the family again especially once the construction is complete!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful stay at the Laguna Ranch... We loved the staff and the hotel. Can hardly wait to go back. We enjoyed the dining and the pool and hot tub were wonderful. We couldn't have asked for a better vacation!
Manager Response: rebeccarQ5892ET,  It is so great to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, staff, Pond Pool and hope to welcome you back soon especially once the resort is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Excellent Place, good privacy, superb room&bed
Summary: We Stayed 3 Nights with our 13 year old daughter and enjoyed the quiet  Place in the middle of Nature but only steps Away from pulsating Laguna Beach. The room was spacious and the Service  Excellent . We also Recommend the Restaurant for breakfast especially the pancakes.
Manager Response: oliverl824,  Thank you for your review! Our team is delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing, family stay. We hope to welcome you back especially once all is complete!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Was there for my sons wedding. Wedding was delayed because of construction. They said it would be done in time if they postponed wedding. Waited another another 3 months when promised and still wasn't done. We had to stop the reception at 10 pm. Wedding started at 5pm. the grounds promised grass, and was just dirt! Had to ask for runner for bride. Laguna promised much and had poor follow through. Thank goodness we have great families and were able to just focus on the wedding and not the disappointment of the overall promises and wedding coordinator at the site.
Manager Response: Melody, Thank you for taking the time to provide your review.  We did continue to have some unexpected setbacks that caused us to not be complete before your son's wedding.  However we cannot make any excuses.  Please know that we had offered some alternative spaces for the ceremony and reception prior to the date.   We also offered the reception space (Tree Grove) for the dinner to assist with the ballroom not being ready.  We heard amazing feedback from your attendees about this space, the food and service we are hopeful you did as well. Please know that we did our absolute best to make sure your Son and Daughter in-law had a great evening in spite of not being complete. Please accept our apologies for any inconveniences you may have experienced.    Best Regards,  Caitlin C and The Ranch at Laguna Beach Team

Summary: First off wanted to say thank you.  For the most part, my wife had a wonderful time.  With that said, there is some feedback she wanted me to share.  Maybe some of this is "small", but we have four kids under 5 years old and a break of any type for us is huge and this was my wife's first night away in a very long time...  Room was beautiful and extremely comfortable.  Shower was amazing and the amenities perfect.  Only problem in the room was that the kuerig coffee maker did not work.  We have one at home so it was not operator error. Also, the coffee cup in the room was already used and very dirty.  The pool once opened was great.  That was the main reason I booked this location.  Unfortunately the pool and jacuzzi were both closed until 6pm on the first day she arrived...
Manager Response: 543bryanw,  Thank you for taking the time to provide our team with this feedback. It is very important to us. It is great to hear how much you loved your accommodation. We apologize for the inconveniences experienced due to the coffee machine not functioning and also the closure of the pool, hot tub and pool bar. Please contact me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further and I would love to invite you back upon the completion of our property.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The walls are thin, so I was awoken early in the morning by someone's yelling children. Too bad, because the bed is gorgeous and the blackout blinds are smart. The check in felt like one of those movies theaters, where four 20 year-old employees walk around with their iPads, selling you a 'fancy' movie ticket. Awkward. Everything in the room worked well. The bell boy who helped me with my luggage seemed to flip an attitude after i gave him a ten dollar bill. That is a very high tip, so not sure what his issue was, but it was off putting. I usually tip bell captain 5 but he got me ice so i was trying to be nice and was excited to try your hotel. Cleanliness was perfect but price point was way too high for a hotel under construction with no screens on the window and no restaurant
Manager Response: Ulysses266,  Thank you for taking the time to provide our team with this feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences experienced during the stay. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further and I would love to invite you back upon the completion of our property.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Skip the Montage and stay at the Ranch.  Much cooler property and the owner is a long time resident of Laguna and has built a really nice property that has a overall awesome feel.  We stayed there as part of an event and even though they were finishing construction everything was Super Nice.  Rooms are super nice with very comfortable beds and dedicated large showers.  They have the quietest A/C units I have ever experienced.  Room decor is very nice.  Breakfast on the terrace was very good and the cinnamon roll is highly suggested as it is a proper pastry that has had time to rise so it is light and fluffy with Bacon!
Manager Response: michaelnF6381BA,  Thank you for the kind words! Our owner and team strive to provide an authentic Laguna experience and will be very pleased to hear that you enjoyed the rooms, dining and overall resort vibe. We hope to welcome you back very soon for more Laguna fun and a Bacon Bourbon Roll, especially when the resort is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The ranch at laguna is a nice hotel, a bit over priced. Check in is at a room which makes me feel i was checking in into motel 6. Rooms are nice. Bed very comfortable. Thin walls. Maybe we will return
Manager Response: M653JFmariac,  Thank you for staying with us during pre-opening and for taking the time to leave a review! It is great to hear that you found the rooms nice and bed comfortable and we hope you will return! Once construction is complete, you'll have an entirely different arrival experience and can understand that the interim front desk is not the best first impression.   Once complete, you'll arrive at the porte-cochère that leads into the Front Desk area where our Ranch Hands will welcome you and transport any luggage to the room. There shouldn't be an issue with the acoustics but if you wouldn't mind emailing me with further detail (which room or building you stayed in and if the noise was other guests or construction) I can relay the information to our Engineering Team. Thank you again for your time!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team  caitlin@ranchlb.com

Summary: Can't say enough about this resort. They take care of everything. You need a ride to the beach no problem they drop you off in a golf cart and when your done they pick you up in front of the resort just call. Good food great atmosphere rooms were elegant on the inside and rustic on the outside. Vaulted ceilings, patio with rocking chairs, queen bed and a robe to go with it. My favorite part was everyone who worked at the resort was helpful and always went out of their way to say hi and help you out. Unlike other hotels where employees can be angry, or just give off bad vibes the workers seem to be enjoying themselves while doing a great job. Big thanks to Brett who helped us our two days there along with Charlie, Madison, and Kayla. Hands down the best hotel we will be back.
Manager Response: dantea491,  Thank you for staying with us during pre-opening and for your thoughtful review! We have some pretty amazing staff here including Charlie, Madison, Kayle and Brett and they will be proud to know that they contributed to an enjoyable stay. Good vibes all around!  We hope to welcome you back soon especially once all is complete, we think you'll be very pleased. Thank you again!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Ranch will be very attractive when completed.maybe over priced. IMPORTANT it's situated in a canyon and there is NO cell service! I have Verizon service and had to drive out to PCH to use my phone.
Manager Response: Betsyh942,  Thank you for taking the time to provide our team with this feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences experienced during the stay. Please contact me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further and I would love to invite you back upon the completion of our property.   Sincerely, Sean and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Hidden gem in Laguna Beach.  The property was very nice even with the construction going on.  Rooms were lovely  and excellent amenities.  The only negative thing I would say is the office is very hard to find especially if you arrive in the evening.
Manager Response: staceyp728,  Thank you for your review! Thrilled to have you stay during our pre-opening and taking the time to leave a review. Our team will be proud to hear that you enjoyed the rooms, amenities and property.   We are eager to open the resort and especially the arrival experience for our guests. In a few weeks when our guests arrive, they will enter the Porte-cochère and from there enter the Front Desk area. You won't have to hunt for The Front Desk! I can understand it is difficult to locate especially at night.  Thank you again for your thoughtful notes and we hope to welcome you back very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here when this was the Alisio Creek and it was nice then, but what a difference today makes. . . it's beautiful and the staff was a delight to deal with.  Requiring someone to write a 200 word comment is nonsense.  Get a life. . .
Manager Response: X7244RHrobertw,  Thank you for your feedback! It's great to hear that you enjoyed the resort updates so far. Also, our team will be proud to know they had a pleasant impact on your stay.   We hope to welcome you back soon and thank you again for your time!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Service was wonderful. This made everything else more enjoyable, The room was somewhat larger than expected, including the wonderful amenities. Where the Ranch is located is perfect, as it avoids much of the local traffic. Beach was so close and very convenient. Thank you.
Manager Response: Larry C,  Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for leaving such a thoughtful review! This means so much to myself and our team.   Please visit again soon especially once all is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I like it, keeping in mind it's a soft opening
Summary: There's some good and bad here, let's hope by the time they open they get everything sorted out.  The good:  The rooms are large and comfortable.  Parking is convenient.  The location is great for south Laguna, the scenery is fantastic in the protected natural valley. The food was great, the service (the little that they had) was very good.   The bad:  The layout is a bit strange, most rooms are near parking, the hotel looks like a bunch of motels grouped together.  The one bedroom rooms are very large but a bit empty feeling. Entering a standard room takes you into the bathroom first, then pass through to the bedroom - odd. The hotel was woefully understaffed, but understood that this may be worked out by the time they officially open.  The price... our preview rate was
Manager Response: Chris S.,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! I am confident all will be sorted out upon grand opening and it is good to hear that you enjoyed the rooms, location, and food.   As for the layout, our owners and designer chose to maintain the distinctive design and history of this 60s-built property. We think there is something special and charming about this place and decided to preserve it rather than change it. We appreciate the feedback however and I’m sure others will feel the same way. We are completely separate from Montage and will not price or compare ourselves to the resort, we are a Small independent property that is located in the canyon and not oceanfront. Guests will visit our properties for entirely different experiences. With that said, we adore Montage!   We hope to welcome you back soon once construction is complete.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Veryy nice, peaceful location.  Rooms were comfortable and service was excellent. No cell phone coverage in the canyon a nuisance. Beach is an easy walk and a number of restaurants are close by. Short hop from John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: biztraveler349,  Thank you sincerely for you feedback! Our team will be thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our rooms, service and location.   I'm sorry to hear that you had trouble connecting in the canyon and apologize for the inconvenience. Cell service can be spotty but our team is happy to assist guests with free wifi or Viber app.   We hope you'll visit us again very soon and thank you for taking the time to review your stay!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great location, nice rooms and pool .. has real potential when restaurant and spa open, especially if some of the service level is stepped up a bit deliver.     We enjoyed the pool, the pool bar, and the 2 bedroom layout immensely!!!
Manager Response: Nathan M,  We hope to welcome you back especially once the restaurant and spa are complete this Fall! If you have any specific notes on room for improvement, please email me directly at caitlin@ranchlb.com. I will relay this feedback to our team. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you soon!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Keep in mind as you read this review, the property is still not done with construction, work in progress...The property is beautiful, situated in the valley of LB, quiet, serene, away from the busy side of LB. If you're looking to get some rest and a quick getaway this is the place. However it lacks privacy, proximity of the rooms are too close to each other, and very open, you hear the other guests, and if there is an event going on the property you do hear it. Overall we loved the room and the staff were accommodating. Will go back once construction is complete, and they are fully operating.
Manager Response: 213victoriap,  Thank you for taking the time to review RLB, we very much appreciate your feedback. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location and found the staff to be accommodating. We would love to welcome you back especially once construction is complete to gain the full RLB experience.   We have many different layouts and rooms that offer more privacy than others. Please let the reservation agent know what you'd prefer and they'll be able to recommend accommodations. We apologize that we did not meet those expectations on your first visit but welcome the opportunity to exceed them on a future stay.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Perfect for the mini getaway! Rooms are gorgeous, staff is friendly and the location is perfect! In the middle of everything, just a quick drive to the beach. Loved every minute, will definitely be back!
Manager Response: lisadX5609IM,  Great to hear that you enjoyed a mini getaway and found the staff friendly and location perfect! We hope to welcome you back very soon for the full Ranch LB experience, expected early this Fall!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Construction severly limits the amenities offered. Staff seemed friendly, but unorganized and often confused. Very nice and clean rooms however.  In addition, the canyon location limits cell service, so make sure you have wifi calling available on your phone.
Manager Response: BattleCamel,  Thank you for staying at The Ranch LB during our pre-opening and for the notes on your stay. Our team reads each review and takes them very seriously. Although the construction on property is extensive, we do our best to notify each and every guest of the status of construction and determine if best to reschedule their stay for a later date or if their stay will not be impacted by the construction.   We try to assist each guest individually on their trip and expectations. With that said, we are sorry to hear that we did not meet your expectations and would not want you first impression of The RanchLB to be based upon construction.   It is great to hear that you enjoyed the rooms and found the staff friendly but we apologize for any confusion or disorganization you encountered. To address the cell service, it can be spotty based upon our location in the canyon, however we do offer free wifi for all guests in house and are also happy to assist if any additional assistance required to connect.   We hope you will visit us again soon once construction is complete and thank you again for taking the time to review RLB!  Sincerely, Caitlin

Summary Heading: Nice resort, but could use some improvement
Summary: We had a nice time, but the resort did not live up to the advertisements. The creek was stagnant, and our "canyon" view was a wooden fence separating us from a parking lot.  It was okay, just not what we expected.  The room was very nice, and the shower head was wonderful. It took 4.5 hours to confirm a massage appointment.  Very difficult to plan the day.  I was told that staff would arrive 10 min before the appointment to set up.  I had to call the desk at 20 min after appt time to get an update.  Masseuse was running late.  That can happen; but I should have been updated. Overall, we were glad we went, but will probably  not return.
Manager Response: staceyp921,  I understand that booking an spa appointment and waiting to hear back for 4+ hours is not at all ideal. I can assure you that this will be resolved as soon as Sycamore Spa opens, early this Fall. You’ll be able to call the spa or walk-in and the Spa Front Desk Attendant will let you know when you can book a treatment.   We have offered pre-opening rates to our guests during construction to account for some of the hotel amenities not being available such as room service and the spa, however we never want our guests to be inconvenienced. We hope that you will consider a return visit once we are complete, I would be glad to personally handle your arrangements, you will not be disappointed.   It is great to hear that you enjoyed the room and shower, our designer has done an incredible work with the interiors and was thrilled to hear that you were impressed. Also on property we have many different views overlooking the golf course, the pool, the canyon etc. We have noted your concerns and will be able to address this for you in the future.  Again, we hope you’ll visit us again soon for the full Ranch LB experience and appreciate your feedback.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team  caitlin@ranchlb.com

Summary: During our stay major construction was occurring opposite the hotel pool - Very loud power tools could be heard while trying to relax in the pool area. Construction was also occurring at the hotel's 'Harvest Restaurant' - Tradesman were drilling into walls within metres of hotel guests dining. The hotel manager was contacted during our stay and stated that because we had booked through hotels.com she could not offer any compensation to us and seemed unconcerned if we were enjoying our stay or not. This is currently not a place to come to relax and unwind. This hotel should be closed until all renovations are finished so guests can have a peaceful stay. A number of hotel facilities are currently closed including the spa and fitness centre which currently operates out of a spare
Manager Response: none

Summary: A truly unique offering in the canyons of Laguna. Vast improvement over what was here. The creek running through the property is a bit brackish and industrial looking, but it's not really a featured element and doesn't detract from the beauty. Great vistas even though you can't see the beach. Not your typical beach resort. Takes a little effort to get into town, but shuttle stops are nearby.
Manager Response: 66jordank - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. It is truly a unique experience to enjoy the best of both worlds by staying in the canyon, yet close to the beach! The trolley into downtown is a great way for our guests to experience all that Laguna Beach has to offer. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting, rustic details and great food
Summary: The hotel is in a great location, close proximity to the beach and a gorgeous canyon setting.  The landscaping is  California native (drought tolerant) plants and the hills are spectacular.  However, the view while sitting at the pool could be better had they thought of planting to obscure the parking lot above one of the buildings.  We reserved the one bedroom suite, which was a disappointment.  The room configuration was odd, the bathroom could have been more private and there was room for a tub if designed properly.  The large space was empty and not curated (no books or personal touches), it felt unfinished.  The closet light could not be turned off, no switch anywhere to be found.  The bedroom was in the corner and the condensation at night made a ticking noise on the tin
Manager Response: Stephanie,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property!  There are several great notes that you mention that will be addressed upon completion when the full food and beverage programming can be put in place.  The spa and restaurant will be completed this September and we believe you will be very pleased with the final improvements.  As for room design we do have some other room types that we are sure you would love.   We look forward to your return visit!  If there is anything else I can help address for you please let me know, feel free to contact me directly at caitlin@ranchlb.com.  Best Regards,  Caitlin

Summary: Had a wonderful weekend getaway. Restaurant, Golf course and staff were as good as it gets. So nice to be able to walk to the beach yet not be right in the tourist crush of Laguna Beach. And the salt water pool was fantastic. Looking forward to returning soon.
Manager Response: Dear E2677RYkevinm,  Thank you for the kind words we are so grateful that you chose The Ranch at Laguna Beach for your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort soon!  Best,  Caitlin,

Summary: The best way to describe this place is that it's exactly like a motel 6, the difference being the interiors of the room are much nicer. There are barely any amenities. The pool area looks like a motel pool. The website and the pictures posted on the Yelp reviews is completely false advertisement so buyer beware. The price is absurd. For $400 plus dollars you can find beautiful ocean view rooms at Surf and Sand and a few other places in Laguna. The Ranch website makes you think you're purchasing a room in a serene environment overlooking a golf course and ocean views. I'm not sure from what part of the mountains they took the backdrop picture that shows the golf course and ocean, but beware the rooms ARE NOT in that kind of setting. And I did not see that view from any part of
Manager Response: 893mariamj,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. I am disheartened to hear about your unsatisfactory experience, as we missed the mark regarding the service level and delays that you experienced on Harvest Patio. I apologize that your dining experience was anything less than perfect. We have addressed your concerns with our Restaurant staff and management team.  The aerial photo you are referring to on Yelp is taken from a hike above our property and simply depicts where our hotel property is located within the canyon and apologize if this was misleading anyone to think this was taken from a guest room. We do not claim that we have ocean views from any of our room categories; however, we do market to say that we are a short walk from Aliso State Beach.   We understand that our style will not be to everyone’s liking and taste level. Our owners and local Laguna Beach design team have done an great job maintaining the history of a 50 year old property, protecting the canyon and wilderness while simultaneously updating a beloved, community resort and clubhouse built in the 1960s. Guests will soon see our property featured in several design, travel and lifestyle magazines – so many do indeed find our property incredible. Our goal for our guests is to experience Laguna as a local. Every detail from the Sand Volleyball Court to the Palapa Bar at The Pond Pool is quirky, fun and distinctive to Laguna’s bohemian style. Again, we anticipate that it is not everyone’s taste but we also know that for many families and travelers, it is exactly the retreat they are looking for.  Sincerely, Jon

Summary Heading: New place in Laguna offers great option to unwind in quiet setting!!
Summary: The new hotel offers a quiet spot with access to busier area of Laguna when you choose.  Love the location, the service,the quiet, the view of the golf course, the interior decoration and comfort of the rooms.  Did not like the drab dark brown color of the buildings and unattactive roofs---made it look like barracks.  Also, the pool area is too close to the adjacent structures.  Gives it a motel feel.  Otherwise, I would definitely recommend this hotel for a relaxing getaway in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear mypuffball,  Thank you for your comments!  We are so glad you enjoyed the interior decor and services of our resort.  As for the exteriors our goal was to blend into the natural landscape of this amazing canyon but certainly understand if it is not to everyone's taste.  We are hopeful that you will still return and enjoy the service, serenity and the authentic Laguna experience that we striving to provide for every guest that stays with us!  If there is anything I can personally do to assist you in the future please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly at caitlin@ranchlb.com.  Best regards,  Caitlin C.

Summary: We stayed in a Creekside Suite. Spacious and beautifully furnished. I notified the resort in advance that we were celebrating a birthday ( early ) but there was no recognition of it during our stay. Front desk personnel could be a bit more friendly and helpful.  Bell staff and wait staff excellent at their jobs. Value wise, during this pre opening phase without a spa and gym and sit down restaurant for dinner, a little pricey.  Would like to see it when fully completed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review!  The Team really appreciates your business and feedback.  We are sorry that we missed the birthday - not sure how we missed it, our apologies.  We use each review to make ourselves a better resort, your comments regarding the front desk will be used to improve our overall guest experience.  Thank you again for staying with us, and we would love to see you back when we are complete -- we are almost there!

Summary: Our second trip with family and have signed up for a third. It's good to have an entire reunion all in one place and there is no reason to leave The Ranch Camus...swimming, golf, food etc...it's all there and top quality.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review!  We love to hear from our guests and are very happy that you and the family enjoyed your visit.  See you again soon!

Summary: Wait til construction is complete before you stay at the ranch. We were told construction would be finished by our the time of our stay. Rooms are lovely. Pool is ok. Food at outdoor restaurant (only one open) was very good. Service was very nice
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our property here on TripAdvisor! Your comments are very important to us.  Construction is almost complete, we apologize for any miscommunication regarding the completion date.  Our goal is to be very clear with all of our guests regarding where we are with the project, we are sorry that this did not happen with you for this visit.  We certainly look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Unparalleled and breath-taking natural surroundings, fantastic team and food and drinks that never disappoint make this our family's favorite local get-away.  For breakfast, my boys love the chicken, waffle and gravy dish and I love the egg frittata and bloody mary's. This is a true local gem!
Manager Response: Thank you for posting such a wonderful review!  The Team is thrilled that you enjoyed your visit and our incredible surroundings!  I have to agree with the chicken and waffle breakfast - one of my favorites too!  We look forward to seeing you and the family again soon!

Summary: Beautifully decorated hotel with beds to die for! So comfortable- did not want to wake up! Close proximity to the beach, restaurants, and shopping. The restaurant was good, but the bacon bourbon cinnamon roll was heavenly!
Manager Response: We have to agree -- the Bacon Bourbon Glazed Cinnamon Roll is the perfect way to start a day here in our canyon!  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to submit this review.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is our favorite place to stay when in Laguna. We arrived at The Ranch on Thursday, Movie Night, and what a wonderful way to relax and unwind. The Harvest Patio was open for popcorn, hamburgers and hotdogs. We stayed in building 14, over the bridge, in a mini suite and it was absolutely perfect. Very quiet and peaceful. Thank you so much RanchLB, we can't wait till the grand opening to be able to see the completed property. I know it will be stunning!
Manager Response: We are so happy to have seen you again!  Movie night was a lot of fun!  The Team is excited to welcome you back when everything is finished - almost there!  Thanks for your continued support and taking the time to post this review!

Summary Heading: Bartender says "they aren't really open yet"
Summary: We booked online, the rate jumped $50 while we were booking on Expedia. We get here and then place is undergoing major construction.  Check in is temporarily in a hotel room and Nicole tells us to go to Ben's Pantry for tapas and happy hour drinks. We go, it's closed for a wedding. So we go to the pool bar (only other choice). They have complimentary chips and dip, they are out of Pinot noir and Pinot Grigio (even though it's on the menu) and there is no room service because according to our bartender Sam "we aren't really open yet". That would have been good to know before I booked. I did love our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post this review, your comments are really important to us!  We want to apologize for your not so perfect experiences while visiting our resort.  Expedia does indicate that our property is under construction, however we understand that it is not always clear while booking.  In the future we invite you to book direct with us, we have more of an ability to communicate directly with you that way and make sure you have an incredible stay!  We are truly sorry about the lack of room service and the pool bar experience.  Room Service is coming soon, but it is not ready just yet.  There is really no excuse for not having the Pinot available  - I apologize for that.  The F&B team has gone over your unfortunate negative experience and we can assure you it will not happen again.  We hope you visit us again once our resort is complete, it is right around the corner.  Please take a look at our website and sign up to receive construction updates and special offers!

Summary: We had a fabulous 2 night stay here in this beautiful resort.  The inconspicuous sign for the entrance is easy to miss and the drive up also leaves you wondering "Are we at the right place??"  Looks like you have arrived at scout lodge but a fabulous surprise awaits once you open the door to your suite.  Our 2 bedroom condo was superiorly clean and gorgeously decorated.  All the staff were very friendly and went out of their way to make sure we enjoyed our stay.  The beach was a short easy walk away,the resort provided beach chairs to use.  It was kind of expensive but we decided worth it away from the busy strip and hope to get to stay here again one day to see the finished projects still under construction. Don't miss the hot tub late night under the stars!
Manager Response: Markay163 - Thank you for the kind words and for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time at the resort in the Cottage Two Bedroom Suite and Aliso Beach! Great tip on the view of the stars in the canyon at night! It is a beautiful sight! We look forward to welcoming you back upon our completion!

Summary: Nestled just off the PCH (Pacific Coast Highway) and Aliso State Beach, The Ranch at Laguna Beach is destined to be a favorite getaway for anyone wanting a few days of respite and relaxation.  The non-flashy entrance to The Ranch belies the luxury found once you check into your room, easily befitting of 4 Stars (watch for a new entrance in the future).  As of this writing, the Resort is still in pre-opening mode, leading the writer to look forward to seeing the remaining areas under construction once the ribbon is cut for her hard opening.  Areas scheduled to open by September 2016 include the Sycamore Spa, a ballroom and other meeting space, a restaurant, bar and reception areas.  Next to the spa is the pool and hot tub, inviting areas for sun bathing and a refreshment gazebo
Manager Response: JosephEllis - Thank you for writing such a detailed experience of your stay with us during our preview phase! We are so glad that you enjoyed relaxing in the canyon and can't wait for you to experience the Sycamore Spa and the Harvest Restaurant during your return visit!

Summary: Absolutely beautiful grounds, amazing breakfast, gorgeous rooms. Just wish they had a second full bathroom,(shower took forever with 6 people) and maybe a sink in the dinette, other then that we had an amazing time. time.
Manager Response: Shireefah - We appreciate the kind words regarding the property grounds, breakfast, and the rooms. It is great to see our guests enjoying their time in the canyon! Thank you for the feedback, it is very important to receive it from our guests. We hope to welcome you back again soon once the resort is complete.

Summary: A quiet, luxurious and well-run resort in a spectacular canyon setting insulated from the Summertime busyness of Laguna Beach. The rooms are beautifully decorated and thoughtfully appointed, the pool is a fabulous place to lounge away an afternoon, the golf course is impeccable, and we look forward to enjoying the restaurant/clubhouse and spa once completed.
Manager Response: 825andrewo - We are so glad that you enjoyed relaxing in the peacefulness of the canyon at The Pond Pool and with a round of golf at Ben Brown's. We look forward to you experiencing the Sycamore Spa and Harvest Restaurant once the resort is complete.

Summary Heading: A nice little resort with amazing rooms and a 9 hole golf course
Summary: Superfriendly staff made this a great stay. The rooms are modern and amazing. Pool is pretty much at the center of the hotel. The pool bar closed at 6p which was too early for us. The golf course didn't bring us anything, because we had a work meeting here. Beside that, super close to the beach. A nice view.  Be careful walking down the streets. They are very steep. Stayed here during pre-opening. Still a lot of construction was going on.
Manager Response: Myfear - We are thrilled to hear the kind words about our team and love assisting our guests in making the stay truly memorable. Thank you for choosing our resort for the work meeting and we look forward to welcoming you back once the resort is complete!

Summary Heading: The coolest Hotel in Laguna Beach!!
Summary: The coolest hotel in Laguna Beach!! Beautiful accommodations, great service and delicious, high quality food.  We Celebrated my husband's birthday and we were greeted with a warm happy birthday sign and macaroons.  Such a nice touch!  My husband and daughter also golfed at Ben Browns and they loved it!  We dined at Harvest Patio and the food was outstanding.  Such a wonderful place, can't wait for the renovation to be fully completed by the end of the summer.
Manager Response: Juarezcp - Thank you for choosing to stay with us in celebration of your husband's birthday. We are glad that he and your daughter got to enjoy a round of golf at Ben Brown's. The food is delicious and we look forward to you experiencing the Harvest Restaurant upon the completion of the resort.

Summary Heading: Why is this place SO expensive
Summary: It was very expensive and I'm not sure why.  I complained to the reception about minor customer service issues.  The view of the canyon is nice, but there isn't safe beach access.  The rooms are nice, but to me it's worth $150/night for 2 people at most.
Manager Response: 729caitlins - We appreciate your feedback. I would love to welcome you back at the completion of the resort. Please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary: We celebrated our 10 year anniversary here and had a wonderful stay.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The location is peaceful.  Rooms are completely renovated. The food was fantastic.    We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: ThomasFromSanDiego - Congrats on your 10 year anniversary and thank you so much for choosing to spend it with us! We appreciate the kinds words about our property and team. We look forward to welcoming you back at the completion of the resort.

Summary: Overall a great resort.  Looking forward to coming back very soon.   There are some areas that I believe can be stepped up a bit.   For example, pool bar, way-finding, a slow close on the gate at the pool, a turn down service.  A very nice resort.  We are considering having our wedding here.
Manager Response: Deany8h - We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your first impression of our canyon escape! We appreciate the feedback about areas of improvement as it is very important to us as we near the completion of the resort. It would be an honor to host your wedding. Please reach out to me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can set up a wedding venue tour.

Summary: We only live an hour from Laguna but staying at The Ranch felt like we were far away from home! We stayed for one night (next year it will def be 2!) for our 17th anniversary. The staff emailed a few weeks before to ask if we were celebrating anything special so they knew it was our anniversary. We arrived to wine and a sweet note in our room. The room was absolutely gorgeous, right out of Pottery Barn and so comfortable! Giant shower, soft fluffy bed... Amazing. The grounds were super quiet and tranquil. Breakfast was delicious and the surroundings so peaceful. Eggs Benedict was fabulous! Lots of healthy choices like green juices, but also indulgent choices like bourbon smoked bacon cinnamon rolls!!! We can't wait to go back next year. Everything was above what we expected.
Manager Response: U2758WGmandyb - Congrats on your 17th anniversary and thank you for choosing to spend it with us! We are so glad that your expectations were exceeded and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, will be even better when completed!
Summary: We stayed in a 2 bed cottage which was immaculately clean and really gorgeously decorated inside.... The place looks a bit like a Cub Scout camp from the outside but this is deceptive, inside is beautiful and the facilities (altho not all yet fully up and running) are top notch. The staff are really helpful and run you down to the end of the road (for beach or shuttle into town) in a golf cart (kids loved that!) whenever you like! Kids also really enjoyed the campfire singalong and hot choc on our first night! The breakfast at the Patio was lovely, with stunning views to boot. Would definately recommend this hotel as long as you don't mind being slightly off the beaten track...
Manager Response: Emeraldrach - We are so thrilled that your family had such a wonderful experience! Our team loves assisting in make our guest stays truly memorable. Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase and we look forward to welcoming you back after the completion of the resort.

Summary: Visited with family consisting of 2 kids (3&5) and we had a great time. Beach close by and lots of great places to explore. Rooms are nice and well presented, staff are all lovely and food was very good. The construction work didn't affect our stay at all and the place will be awesome when fully complete
Manager Response: H5867STbenf - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview period. It is great to hear that the family enjoyed our resort, Aliso Beach and the great places to explore in Laguna Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back at the completion of our resort.

Summary: Relaxing quiet fun. Yes, it's under construction but they did a good job minimizing the impact. Great solitude, yet so close to the ocean and a great series of beaches to explore. Staff was great - very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Tcronlineorders - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase. We are so glad that you enjoyed both the canyon and the variety of beaches in town. We hope to welcome you back again as our guest soon!

Summary: Our stay was absolutely wonderful. Peaceful and relaxing. Loved everything from pool, rooms, dining, golf, staff. Felt like we were miles from anywhere. We will definitely be back soon. Thank you thank you!
Manager Response: Loranf990 - We are so thrilled that you got to relax in the peacefulness of the canyon. It is great to hear about the wonderful stay that you had. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Great hotel and location. Staff is very accommodating and attentive. Nice relaxing property away from the street noise, but only minutes from the beach. Caution, no cell service, which is fine if you want to disconnect, but does prove challenging if you need your phone service. Great for couples to get away. golf course looked inviting, but I am not a golfer and can't really comment further.
Manager Response: Amitp435 - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase. We are so glad that you enjoyed both the canyon and the beach. We are thrilled to hear that our team was so accommodating and attentive during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: This was a great property. Perfect for families or couples. It is nice that it is back in the canyon as you get the best of both worlds; beach and mountains. Parking is easy in front of your guest room to access your car to go off property to explore. The golf course is a wonderful addition. The service was great. Accommodating to children, too.  Linens are lovely. Guest rooms are well appointed and amenities are very nice. We look forward to coming back after their Grand Opening. It will be so nice to have a formal entrance and lobby that ties into the rest of the property. They have a done a great job.  Lauren and Maddie were fantastic!
Manager Response: Cammy P - Wow! Thank you for such kind words! We are so thrilled that you enjoyed the best of both worlds. That is what makes our property so special to our guests. We look forward to welcoming you back after the resort is completed.

Summary Heading: Needs some work but could be great one day
Summary: This could be a great place, but some things are missing. I usually stay in a very high caliber of hotel so my thoughts here are picky. Here are the issues as I see them:  The foliage you look out onto on your patio is nothing but green--and not in a golf course beautiful kind of way.  We also looked at the back of some fan equipment which was not nice. The back of the building you are staring out when they say you have a mountain view (in 1206) is just brown, on brown. The It looks like army barracks, with some manicured grasses. If it's an adjoining room, you can hear your neighbor.  Which is not fun when they come home drunk from a wedding at 1am.  The pool door SLAMS so loud when someone enters or leaves. How is this not something that gets fixed immediately? The pool music
Manager Response: Schoolofish - Thank you for the detailed feedback. We really appreciate that you took the time to give us a clear understanding from the guest perspective and this is very important to us as we near the completion of our resort. We would love to welcome you back upon the completion of our resort.

Summary Heading: Lovely, warm, quaint, quite, tucked away, yet very convenient to the gorgeous Laguna beaches!!
Summary: This choice was a win-win!!  The Ranch is tucked away, allowing it to be private in a lovely, quiet setting with beautiful views of the canyon.  Yet, it is very convenient to the gorgeous Laguna beaches, but tucked away enough to have peace and quiet (and not hear the busy Pacific Coast Highway).  Easy golf cart ride up to the Coast highway where you can walk to the beaches, restaurants, downtown, or catch the free trolley to other areas along the Coast.  Truly a winner and we will go back!
Manager Response: RobertcP1409JW - We are so glad that choosing to stay with us was a win-win! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the best of both worlds by experiencing both the canyon and the beach. We look forward to welcoming you back again as our guest soon!

Summary: We held a company event in one of the Conference Rooms at the Ranch. The meeting space was right next to the golf course, fantastic view, amazing catering and food services, and the event planner was absolutely wonderful to work with. I would definitely recommend and we will be utilizing the space again.
Manager Response: Kassidyg622 - Thank you for holding your company event at our resort! We enjoyed working with your company and we look forward to hosting your company event again soon!

Summary: Rocky at first due to a confusion with upgrades and our booking but the office manager made things right and we had a very enjoyable time. We were not offered an upgrade like our booking had promised however we were given a complimentary breakfast that made up for the misunderstanding between the property and third party that we booked through.
Manager Response: Nakia S - Thank you for choosing to stay at our resort in celebration of your anniversary. We apologize for the misunderstanding and are glad that the situation was handled. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Get Swept Away by The Ranch at Laguna Beach
Summary: The perfect place to getaway! Serene and peaceful grounds in the middle of beautiful landscape but also within walking distance to a beautiful beach. The Ranch has thought of EVERYTHING and spared little in executing a family and couple friendly resort. Accommodations are stellar but staff are above even that. The Harvest restaurant is the best food in Laguna Beach and The Pond is super fun! Can't wait to come back with the kids!
Manager Response: V2797FMmonicas - We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the best of both worlds by experiencing both the canyon and the beach. Thank you for the kind words about our team, accommodations, and other property amenities. We look forward to your return trip with the kids!

Summary Heading: The Ranch Resort at Laguna Beach
Summary: While you stay at The Ranch, have drinks outside by the golf course.  Also, breakfast by the golf course is delicious and what a view!  I had eggs benedict, and my husband loved the pancakes. Our beds were so comfortable I asked the front desk where I could purchase the pillows for my own bed.
Manager Response: Campol2016 - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We agree, the view of the canyon is pretty spectacular! Great to hear that you enjoyed a good night's sleep on the comfortable beds. We appreciate the kind words about the breakfast and we can't wait for you to experience the Harvest Restaurant upon completion of the resort.

Summary: the ranch at laguna beach will improve after the renovations are completed.  unfortunately my stay there was not as good as it could be due to no food service at the pool or rooms and extremely poor service at the harvest.
Manager Response: 675neils - Thank you for the feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced. Amenities such as room service will be available in the near future. I would love to invite you back upon the completion of the resort. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay in this beautiful and serene setting.  The beach was easily accessible as well.  The room felt very private, and the food was excellent.  The ongoing construction did not bother us in the least.
Manager Response: ElenakT7575KQ - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase. We are so glad that you got to relax in the peacefulness of the canyon and also enjoy the beach. We appreciate the kind words about the accommodations/dining and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Best resort to stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: We have stayed in many different hotels over the years in Laguna but The Ranch LB is our new favorite! We stayed over the July 4th weekend and had the most amazing time! It is much different than staying downtown, much more relaxing but easy to take the free trolly downtown. The front desk and bell staff were very welcoming and hospitable in fact, each and every staff member we encountered was as such.  We stayed in room 1206 and loved it. They did an excellent job in renovating the rooms to feel like you are at home (or someone else's nice home) with lots of space, high ceilings and unique design it had a perfect mix of luxury and comfort. The bathroom was a great size with dual vanities, large shower with perfect water pressure (I am a stickler for this). The best thing about
Manager Response: Travelbug7092 - We are so glad that you felt like you were at home during the stay! It is great to hear about how much you enjoyed the relaxing weekend at the resort while also experiencing all that Laguna Beach has to offer. We would love for you to come experience the Sycamore Spa and Harvest Restaurant upon completion of the resort. Thank you for taking the time to write such detailed feedback. We really appreciate it!

Summary: Nice place to stay, very secluded, definitely good for families.  The construction going on right now starts too early in the morning, need to request a room as far away as possible.  Pool area is a little small.
Manager Response: Gerry894 - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase. We appreciate the feedback and welcome you to stay with us again upon completion of the resort.

Summary: The newly remodeled rooms were beautiful and very nicely done! The only reason we didn't give it five stars is because we did not have any Wi-Fi/service and even our own in our room didn't work… Other than that I thought the property was great!
Manager Response: Becky C - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase. We apologize for the inconvenience regarding the WiFi. Glad that you enjoyed the property and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The Ranch has substantial promise. However, it still very much under construction and is not at the 5* level they claim it is. The setting in the canyon is beautiful and the rooms are well appointed and comfortable. However, the noise levels, both due to the construction as well as the lack of proper insulation between rooms, makes it very difficult to enjoy the relaxing setting. The service, while trying hard, is lacking and not the professional quality you'd find from other resorts in the area. On a positive note, the food is delicious and fresh even though the restaurant setting is completely unrefined. The most difficult part of the stay was the fact that the rates are so high despite the fact that the resort is far from being complete. Major disappointment. Once all the
Manager Response: Gabriele48 - We appreciate the feedback and this is important to us as we prepare for the completion of the resort. Thank you for the kind words about the rooms/dining. I would love to welcome you back upon completion, so please email me directly at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary: disappointed - felt like i was driving up to army barracks.  Inside the rooms were lovely - new, tasteful, very clean, beds very comfortable!  Grounds however are ho hum - camp-like.  Perhaps good for young families who don't mind forgoing luxury and high end amenities.  Marketing suggests more high end experience - misleading!
Manager Response: Kimberlee52 - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We appreciate the kind words about the design of the rooms. We apologize for not meeting your expectations, but would love to welcome you back upon the completion of the property. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary Heading: the best place to stay in Laguna.
Summary: The hotel staff couldn't be any more welcoming. They cater to your every need. The location is beautiful. It's nice, quite and dark at night. The food is delicious. I loved every day I spent at the ranch
Manager Response: Cathie_wynkoop - We are glad that our team helped make your stay truly memorable. We appreciate the kind words and that you chose to stay with us during our preview period. Great to hear that you loved every day you spent with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Relaxing.  Family oriented.   Clean.   Quiet.  Great value.  We had plans to leave on Sunday, we had breakfast on site, then felt so full we sat at the pool to relax a moment before checking out and next thing we knew it was 4 hours later.   So nice!  So friendly!
Manager Response: J8138EWdavidf - Great to hear how relaxing and enjoyable your stay was. Thank you for choosing to spend your vacation with us. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We stayed prior to the opening so not all facilities were open. But the room was gorgeous, spacious and relaxing. The pool service was great. The location is awesome - beautiful beach across the road. In Laguna we caught the trolley into town for dinner. A very nice weekend!
Manager Response: 622michalad - We are thrilled to hear that you had a very nice weekend staying with us. The trolley is a great way for our guests to experience Laguna Beach, so we are glad that you took advantage of that. We appreciate that you chose to stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Maybe when the work is all done it will be worth going to
Summary: The room was very good. The parking good though it is tough to get used to all the asphalt surface running throughout the grounds, the construction was the greatest impediment to enjoying the environment, the views of mountains and golf course was great, the garden not mature enough to really say that they enhanced the level beauty and overall the hotel structures not impressive.  Where is the spa/health club/amenities?
Manager Response: Gordon M - Thank you for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us. It is important to us as we prepare for the completion of our resort. Sycamore Spa will be opening in Fall 2016. I would love to invite you back to stay with us again upon the completion of the resort. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary Heading: First Visit to The Ranch at Laguna Beach
Summary: I love Laguna and have visited this hotel before it was remodeled. I was excited to try the newly renovated version and overall was very happy with my stay.  I paid for a suite and came with a party of five. The hotel called ahead to confirm, and asked if we needed the pull out couch made and I confirmed we did.  When we arrived, the bed was not made and when we called the front desk and they sent us sheets for the bed, but we had to make it ourselves!  This was not acceptable seeing that we paid over $700 for the suite.  We also did not have enough towels or robes for our party, but they were able to bring them upon our request.  We loved eating breakfast on the hill overlooking the canyon, the pool area, and how close the hotel is to the beach.  The staff were friendly and
Manager Response: 317peggyp - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview phase. We apologize for the situation regarding the sofa bed as that should have been handled by our team. We love that you enjoyed the views of the canyon when eating breakfast and that you got to relax by the pool and at the beach. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: We've been here a few times during construction, which seems to be nearing completion and was barely noticeable this visit. Every staff member is friendly & eager to help. Comfortable, well-designed  rooms (we've stayed in both the larger suite and a regular room. Nice pool with a bar.
Manager Response: DavidhY9442TH - We appreciate that you have stayed with us multiple times during our preview phase. It means a lot to have repeat guests, so thank you!! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel is wonderful. Tucked away just south of Laguna this hotel is a hidden gem. The rooms are gorgeous and the staff is outstanding. They are currently upgrading their clubhouse so it will just add to the experience. Love love love this place!
Manager Response: MatthewkC8582IO - Thank you for choosing to stay with us during our preview period. We are so thrilled to hear that you love our resort. We appreciate the kind feedback and definitely would love for you to experience our resort again upon completion.

Summary: We were there for a wedding and absolutely loved the accommodations and the service.  Big shout out to Sam at the pool bar and Charlie in guest services.  They did well hiding the current renovations and we look forward to seeing the finish product in the future!!
Manager Response: Phil G - We are so glad that you loved the accommodations and service! We will be sure to pass along the shout out! We look forward to you staying with us again in the near future!

Summary: Normally when we go to the Laguna area, we cash in our star points and stay at the St Regis in Dana Point.  However, since that particular St. Regis is no longer a Starwood property (boo!) we decided to look elsewhere and found The Ranch.    We knew when we booked that the resort was in the tail end of a total refurbishment and certain things wouldn't be open such as the Spa and their main restaurant.  In return, we got a discounted rate for a Creekside studio for a relaxing 3 day weekend.  We were surprised by how much we loved this hotel.  It's tucked away in a beautiful canyon, so you are literally surrounded by mountains on 3 sides.  As such, you may see an occasional deer or two roaming the property.  The property overall has an elegantly rustic vibe and a really chill
Manager Response: Likeanicehotel - Wow! Thank you so much for taking the time to post such a detailed account of your experience at our resort! We are so thrilled that you chose to stay with us and that you loved it so much. We look forward to your next stay at our resort.

Summary: We had a couple issues with housekeeping during our stay, entering our room when they weren't supposed to, removing items from the room and eating our food, taking our towels and not leaving new towels, not enough guest parking. Management would rather argue that they couldn't find my box or items rather than practice any customer service skills.
Manager Response: 11jackia,  Needless to say we are very disappointed to hear this news. Our guests feeling at home is our highest priority. We did investigate this matter and were not able to find any evidence that our staff had removed any items from your room. Regardless of whether these items were in fact lost or stolen, I spoke with our Director of Operations and he informed me that you were refunded the amount of the items taken as a gesture of goodwill. Also please note the challenges with parking will be addressed once construction is complete   I can assure you the integrity of our team is paramount and our focus is solely to provide an amazing guest experience. We apologize we did not meet your expectations.   If you would like to discuss further or have any additional information, please email me directly at caitlin@ranchlb.com.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This June, my wife and I spent our honeymoon at The Ranch at Laguna Beach and it was such an awesome experience that instead of just staying six nights, we extended our stay for an extra two nights !!! Our room was top notch and very romantic. The bed and pillows were so comfy that I felt I was laying on clouds (The only downside was that it also made me hate my bed and pillows when I got home). The staff made sure to give us suggestions about and a map of the must-see local sights and eateries, and told us of Laguna Beach's free trolley service around town. Every request that we made, was promptly taken care of and allowed my wife and I to focus on one another and fully enjoy our time together. I would not hesitate to book another stay there. Their first rate staff, including
Manager Response: John O - Congrats and thank you for choosing to spend your honeymoon at our resort! We are so thrilled that our team assisted in making your stay truly memorable. We appreciate that you chose to extend your stay and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This resort property was just redone from the bottom up and it is, without doubt, a 5 star experience. We stayed in one of the 1 bedroom suites near the Creek. It had an oversized living room and firm couch; large master bedroom with a comfortable and firm mattress; plenty of closet space. The shower is a spa-type affair and lovely. The pool is nothing special but the ambiance and furniture surrounding the pool make it a wonderful spot to spend a lazy afternoon. We had breakfast 3 mornings outdoors overlooking the "pitch & putt" golf course. The food was excellent. Bacon and eggs with toast and coffee was delicious. On another day I had a scramble with cheese grits and a terrific salsa made with jalapeno's that were recooked so the spice was very light but full of flavor. The
Manager Response: Robin, Thank you for the kind words!  We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay.  Please do not wait until your next anniversary to visit us again, we hope to see you soon!  Best,  Caitlin

Summary: My husband and i wanted to be by the beach but also wanted peace and privacy away from the beach noise and the ranch was PERFECT. Our room was beautiful. Bed was super comfy we just wanted to lay in it all day and night. Shower was big and the room was just so clean especially the carpet, WOW. It was definitely home away from home  We will definitely be returning. Thank you all for a fabulous stay.
Manager Response: 841sb11,  Thank you for choosing The Ranch at Laguna Beach for your getaway!  We think that is one of the things we really do best.  We are are excited that you enjoyed your stay, We look forward to welcoming you and you husband back soon!  Best,  Caitlin

Summary: Our stay was initially planned for 3 night stay, to cap off our family trip to Southern Cal.  I want to preface this review with the fact we were told there was still construction going on, with the lobby/rest. and had reviewed the website pics that showed updated rooms decorated beautifully.  What we did not see was the "summer camp like" exteriors, pool area etc.  Upon driving into the entrance, we were a little taken aback, but kept pushing forward.  Our room was "creekside", a very literal term in what looked like a Motel 6 building.  However, we kept moving forward, got into the room which was very nicely remodeled, clean.  We were still skeptical, but the tip of the iceberg came with the bugs.  You cannot leave your room at night to get ice, bring something in from your
Manager Response: Ms. Purcell,  First, thank you for taking the time to send us your review.  Please know we are very disappointed the your experience was not what you expected.  Please know that we agree having bugs in your guest room is unacceptable.  Please note we have taken steps to insure this problem is resolved.  As for the appearance of the exterior of the building, we did make the conscience  choice to try and blend wit the natural surrounding of the canyon we are set with in.  We apologize it did not meet your expectations.    Please know that we would love to have you and your family back for a night with our compliments once we have completed our revitalization this September.  Please feel free to call me directly at 949-715-1409 or email at caitlin@ranchlb.com and I can personally arrange you stay.   Again, thank you for your candid feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon.   Best,  Caitlin.

Summary Heading: Family Reunion at Our Old Stomping Grounds
Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Ranch at Laguna Beach for the last two nights of a driving trip down the Coast from San Francisco. We attended a family reunion of sorts in Mission Viejo, then hosted several family members for breakfast and some R&R the next day. It is a peaceful, comfortable, and lovely spot. We have been playing Ben Brown's golf and visiting Aliso Canyon for many, many years. It was a treat to see that local investors have recognized this old gem's potential and are committed to making this a first-rate destination.  Our room was clean and cozy, with very comfortable bedding. We enjoyed the pool and the peaceful surroundings, despite the construction. The golf shop was great and our breakfast was terrific. Lastly, the staff helped hook me up with a local florist
Manager Response: Brian L.  This is the kind of thing we love to read about.  We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We will be eagerly looking forward to your return.   Best,  Caitlin

Summary Heading: Not wowed but enjoyed the stay.
Summary: Nice resort. Not great food or happy hour and service was poor. Beautiful rooms. Very quiet. Nice pool. Beautiful location. Staff is very friendly. Not sure I would pay full price when it's completely open.
Manager Response: GregsA4021IL - Thank you for staying with us during our preview period. Great to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations and pool. We appreciate your feedback regarding Happy Hour and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Good value for a very nice room
Summary: The Ranch is a very good value for such a nice room and pool facility in Laguna Beach... the only thing to overlook is the odd approach on the road that leads to the meadow where the hotel & gold course are located.  With the improvements (new Spa and new Restaurant buildings), it will be hard to beat
Manager Response: Alintner162 - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. The resort is nearing completion, so the Sycamore Spa and Harvest Restaurant will debut in the near future. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Nice property. Restaurant service is questionable. No notices given when restaurant/bar closed for an event during prime hours. Guests not given priority at the restaurant. Golfers given priority.  Lovely location, but service is lacking in the restaurant/bar.
Manager Response: L2108WIdonnal - We appreciate your feedback and apologize for the lack of communication regarding the restaurant hours. I would love to invite you to stay with us upon completion of the resort. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary: The updated property is very trendy/cool with great landscape and room decor. The food was really good and the view of the golf course was great. The beach access was acceptable - either a walk or a golf cart ride. The trade off - not beach front but a very nice property and it worked well for us.
Manager Response: C9808WDpaull - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled that you really enjoyed the food and view of the canyon. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Very beautiful accommodations in the two story, 1125 SF, two bedroom rooms.  The canyon atmosphere is such a shark difference from the beach environment a half mile away!   Great staff and a nicely laid-out grounds.
Manager Response: Michel W - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Great to hear that you got to enjoy the best of both worlds in the canyon and at the beach. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We were visiting San Juan Capistrano from Los Angeles for a fundraising event at The Ecology Center (must visit, especially if you have kids...or have an interest in sustainable food). Although we live relatively nearby, we wanted to make a mini-getaway out of it, and chose The Ranch at Laguna Beach for one night. We loved the natural beauty of the canyon setting, the room was spacious and well-designed, and found service to be on-point. Oh, and the salt-water pool was a great way to escape the heat. Although we were there less than 24 hours, it felt like a much longer escape.
Manager Response: Eric G - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your accommodation in the canyon and that our staff was able to make your stay truly memorable. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Perfect setting to enjoy our new engagement!!  Loved the 2 bedroom unit overlooking the golf course! We enjoyed the serene setting and wonderful wildlife. The service was friendly and the food was resonably priced and fresh.  We will be back every year!!
Manager Response: LaurawR2422JZ - Congrats on your engagement and glad that you got to celebrate in the canyon. Great to hear that you will be back every year and we look forward to it!

Summary: Service was excellent, Staff was very attentive and friendly. The grounds were well kept and the rooms were clean and comfortable. We dined at Ben's Pantry, the food was very affordable and much more that hotel style food. The Ranch at Laguna will become my new getaway.
Manager Response: Henry S - Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us! We are thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed the dining, staff, accommodations. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The room was great and for the event I was at was more than adequate.  My arrival not the best and my ability to not get a late check out not such a great situation.  I am looking forward to coming back as it would seem better suited for a rip with my wife and kids, than solo.
Manager Response: DanielhS5188UV - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Glad to hear how much you enjoyed the guest room. We apologize for the check-in experience and we always try to do our best accommodate our guest requests. We look forward to your return visit with the family!

Summary: We loved The Ranch at Laguna. We have been coming to Laguna Beach for 26 years, and have stayed in most hotels. Our favorites are normally on the water, but this location and property are our new favorite. We can't wait to come back and see the improvements.
Manager Response: Rfinken2016 - Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us!! We appreciate the kind words. The completion of the property is scheduled for the near future, so we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Beautifully designed indoors and outdoors, everywhere was very clean and comfy, friendly staff, free quality wifi, nice pool, beach at walking distance and there is also shuttle service, close to city
Manager Response: Duygu C - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Glad that you loved the design of the property and the amenities. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: ok but stop the theft. the property and front dest as well as the bell service were fine the property is decent. golf course looks nice. due to the theft from my room I would not recommend anyone stay here
Manager Response: daviddK1496UT,  This is never something we want our guests to experience or question. Our Director of Operations contacted you to investigate whether these items were lost or stolen. Each employee that entered the room was questioned and we did not have an evidence to suggest that these items were stolen.   We do understand the frustration and sincerely hope these items were recovered. Our team is built on a code of honestly and are very disappointed to hear about this event.
