If there is a way we can rectify the situation or if the items were found, please email me directly at caitlin@ranchlb.com.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our family loved the well appointed apartment style cottage. The pool and sand volleyball court were fun and pool service and vibe was lively. Really appreciated feeling away from the crowds yet close to beach and shopping. Food and drinks were amazing. Thank you for a perfect getaway!
Manager Response: Teanhoney - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. The Cottage Two Bedroom Suite is very popular among families, so we are happy to hear that your family enjoyed it so much. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Service was exhalant, gorgeous property. Very relaxing. Did not enjoy the group of men chanting and using foul words, it lasted about 30 min. I will defiantly be returning to stay some day soon.  Can not wait until the place is fully complete.
Manager Response: 853marcelc - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Great to hear that you had such a relaxing stay in the canyon. We apologize for the experience you had with the group of men. The completion of the resort will be in the near future, so we invite you to stay with us again soon!

Summary: Our stay was short, but we enjoyed every minute! So many wonderful changes!! Still lots to do but the future finish looks so rewarding!! We did see a group of deer and lots of squirrels and ground squirrels on the golf course. We enjoyed breakfast on the Harvest Patio. The room was pleasant and no problem with anything.
Manager Response: 773wardt - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase and we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed every minute of your stay!! Our deer friends love to come say hi, so we are glad that you got to experience it. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Great rooms with unique character and very roomy.  Best hotel breakfast ever!  Staff was great.  Pool area is very nice, if the beach is not your style.    The area is quite, even though it is popular with golfers.
Manager Response: 303myb - Thank you to you and the family for staying with us during our preview phase. We are honored by your comments about the best hotel breakfast ever and that our staff was able to make your stay truly special. We look forward to your next stay with us!!

Summary Heading: Relaxing stay at the great Ranch!
Summary: Good location with enough distance to the highway to create a calm and relaxing athmosphere, yet only a few minutes walk (even with a double stroller) to Aliso beach.  All staff members were fantastic. A nice bottle of wine and macarons were awaiting us at check-in. Excellent kick-off for our honey moon (well, week...).  Thank you the Ranch for the great ending of our California/Nevada experience!
Manager Response: Martin P - Thank you for spending your honeymoon with us!! We are thrilled that you enjoyed the peacefulness of the canyon and also the time at Aliso Beach. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: The ranch will be spectacular when done
Summary: It was our birthday weekend and they promised to do something nice and it was as if they forgot about us.  The room was near the parking lot.  Lovely hotel but I thought they would at least be a bit more considerate given it was a 40th birthday event
Manager Response: Fernando A - We appreciate your feedback and apologize about the birthday situation as it was a missed opportunity for us to make it truly special. I would love to invite you to stay with us again upon the completion of the resort. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary: The hotel doesn't look like much as you drive up, but hopefully that will change once construction is complete. The staff was so accommodating and went above and beyond to make sure we had a perfect stay. The rooms were beautifully decorated, very clean, and the bed was super comfortable.  We had a great stay and would love to come back.
Manager Response: Marianne M - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled to hear that our staff went above and beyond to make your stay truly memorable. The entrance to the property is part of the ongoing renovations and we invite you to stay with us again upon the completion of the resort.

Summary: What a great property and resort. We only stayed one night but everything was perfect. I highly recommend the Ranch if you are looking for a secluded getaway to relax and enjoy the canyon. The front desk was very welcoming and helped us find a late night dining spot. We had a couple of additional requests which were met immediately with a smile. The property is located within a narrow canyon and the resort was very helpful in making sure we had internet and cell connection over the internet.
Manager Response: 734marshallw - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase and for the recommendation. We are thrilled to hear that our staff was able to meet your requests with a smile and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Very relaxing! Beautiful views! Jacuzzi was wonderful! Perfect getaway! It was a great way to spend my birthday. The staff was very accommodating! Would recommend the place to couples and families. A very special retreat!
Manager Response: Lia20162016 - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase in celebration of your birthday! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the peacefulness and beauty of the canyon! We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The Ranch, a truly a beautiful spot off the coast offering well appointed accommodations. The meals on the Patio were delicious as well as our catered lunch. The staff throughout the property was especially helpful.
Manager Response: Michelle H - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled that enjoyed the accommodations, meals and our staff. We look forward to your next stay with us!!

Summary: We had our ceremony and reception at here and it was perfect! Their staff is awesome and provided excellent customer service. They did everything to make our wedding day special. Exceeded our expectations
Manager Response: Jewelle R - We were honored to host your special day and thank you for choosing The Ranch at Laguna Beach!! We are thrilled that your wedding day was so special and that your expectations were exceeded. CONGRATS!!

Summary Heading: Hidden beach destination that's a world unto itself!
Summary: Stayed for a night here to attend a birthday celebration.  Very nicely redone in an earthy contemporary California beach vibe, from inside to out.  Service and food were terrific and it can only get better as they finish the main building and are 100% complete (Aug 2016).  The room was large and well appointed.  The Treehouse room (2 bedroom, 2 story, full kitchen, living, dining), which we used as the birthday headquarters was great and is definitely recommended.  The best thing though is the hotel's location.!  Walkable to the beach but up a canyon, so while by the water, is in it's own quiet world surrounded by coastal hills and a golf course.  Great for families and those not wanting the chaos on Coast Highway!
Manager Response: Travelanj - We really enjoyed having your group in-house and thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Glad that you enjoyed the best of the both worlds in the canyon and at the beach. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Everything was great except not having a place on the premises to eat dinner was a bummer. We wanted to stay within the property the entire time. Wil be back hopefully after your renovations are complete.
Manager Response: Q8786QGsarahh - Thank you for staying with us during our preview period. The Harvest Restaurant will be opening in the near future, so we would love for you to come back and enjoy dinner in the canyon!

Summary Heading: Birthday weekend at The Ranch at LB
Summary: An amazing experience. Beautiful location. Fun, friendly and professional staff. The rooms are decorated very nicely and the place has both a rustic, yet elegant feel. I give them my highest recommendation and will definitely return.
Manager Response: 530arthurp - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the location, staff, and design of the accommodations. We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: they are under construction.  the room was nice but thats all you get.  no real resort amenities at this time.  My wife and I booked the weekend for our anniversary.  We were debating between the Ranch and the Ritz Carlton or the Montage as alternatives.  They are in different leagues of service by an order of magnitude or two.  The Ranch is a room near the beach for modest price.  Thats all you get until their construction is completed.  No bar.  No room service.  No lobby.  House car was never available for transport.  This is just a room.
Manager Response: RonaldhL2986KJ - Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us. I would like to invite you back to stay with us upon completion of the resort. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary Heading: An absolut must! Calm and close to everything.
Summary: This place is a gem. Almost all of Laguna Beach hotel are on the main street witch is really noisy. This place is just two minutes away from the big boulevard in a canyon. Calm, relaxing but still minutes away from the big action of the city and the beach.
Manager Response: Josee P - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Glad to hear that you enjoyed the peacefulness of the canyon and the beach. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: My husband and I had a nice and relaxing stay. The resort was quiet. Construction did not bother us at all. Great and attentive service. Room is big, newly decorated, and clean. Big shower with awesome water pressure.
Manager Response: Aireentiuc - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Glad to hear that you enjoyed the peacefulness of the canyon and the accommodations. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The Ranch is a beautiful hotel with all the amenities you could want. Lovely rooms/patios; restaurant location and food and service is excellent; golf, pool and spa services. The mountain views are great and the location is serene. A short walk to the beach.
Manager Response: Z1714NCsandraj - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the location, accommodations, dining, and service. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Great resort... tucked away nicely in the Foothills close to the beach. Only issue we had was the phone service in the area was limited. Regardless our family had a great time. The food especially the breakfast menu items were all delicious and there were no complaints. Also if you are golfer the Ben Browns golf course is really a special little course that golfers of all levels will enjoy.
Manager Response: DaveGlendaleDude - Thank you for the feedback on your stay. The service can be tricky in the canyon but our Front Desk is available to help guests connect to Viber and Ranch WiFi to connect that way, but understand that it can be spotty in the canyon. Our team is thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Harvest Restaurant and our special hidden course. We you'll visit us again soon especially once all is complete!

Summary: Beautiful location and property!  During our recent stay they were still remodeling...best to make sure the restaurant and patio will be available before booking reservation!   We stayed in the              2-bedroom cottage they are very roomy and tastefully decorated.
Manager Response: 210christak - Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for the notes on your stay! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location, rooms and design. We hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: I gave my girlfriend and her new husband a gift of a 2-night stay for their honeymoon. The staff worked with me prior to their stay, to make their registration and stay as seamless as possible. They raved about how nice it was and especially loved that the resort had a "24-hour" pool!
Manager Response: Donna F - Thank you for sending your friends to RLB and providing feedback to our team. We are thrilled to hear that they enjoyed their honeymoon stay and the Pond Pool!

Summary: Laguna has so few luxury accommodations with the exception of the bigger hotels like The Montage and The St. Regis.  The Ranch is the answer to that. If you are looking for luxury in a more boutique size setting, book this hotel.  If you are looking for a hidden gem, book this hotel. It's still under construction (almost completed....by mid august), but quite frankly we were not affected.  We truly felt like were in an oasis, one long block away from the beach and a few minute drive away from the main Laguna strip of cute shops and restaurants. We will be back!
Manager Response: Wendyk402 - Thank you for your kind words. It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location and the small luxury feel of The Ranch LB! Also, thrilled to hear that construction did not have an impact on your experience. We hope to welcome you back very soon for a Laguna Beach getaway!

Summary Heading: Great stay on our first month anniversary
Summary: This is one of the best new properties I have been to in a long time.... Romantic , beautiful, and relaxing!! Everything one would need on a weekend or week getaway . We will be back! The sooner the better
Manager Response: O7745CBkarenm - Thank you for spending your anniversary with us! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed relaxing in the canyon and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: The rooms are beautiful and comfortable- but they're still being finished overall and the details are lacking. Give it time and book there when you want to disconnect from the world. It'll be a perfect oasis depending on who else is also staying there ;)
Manager Response: Hi Tonya T,  Thank you for taking the time to review RLB and your stay. We are disappointed to hear that you found details to be lacking, however we agree that once complete, the resort will be a great retreat . We hope you'll visit again once construction is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: beach . The hotel room  was amazing and a short inexpensive uber ride into downtown Laguna. The beach is at the end of the road but there is a tunnel under highway 1 and a shuttle. Cell service is limited based on being in between the mountains but wifi worked great.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review RLB and we hope to welcome you back soon especially once construction is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Really enjoyed this sanctuary just right off the busy PCH. Construction was not nearly as bad as I thought it would be and the service was first class throughout. I guess my only complaint was that room service wasn't available, but will be as soon as the remodel is done. Once the remodel is finished I believe the resort will become very popular, I just hope the prices don't go too high, because I would like to come back
Manager Response: Dear GD343434,  Thank you for your thoughtful review of RLB! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the service and location. We are also eager to offer room service for our guests and hope you'll make your way back very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights on our way to Las Vegas for a wedding and couldnt have had a nicer start to our holiday.  We had the 2 bedroom king suite and it was immaculate with the comfiest bed I think I have ever slept in! The bathroom was super clean and modern with lovely toiletries, a hairdryer and plenty of towells. The Harvest restaurant is excellent value with a gorgeous view over the golf course and surrounding mountains. Would highly recommend a stay here.
Manager Response: Dear TheThatchersTwo,  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay and the amenities at RLB. We hope you'll visit us again soon especially once all is complete!  Sincerely, Caitlin

Summary Heading: This property is NOT to be missed!!
Summary: This is one incredible property.   Upon the moment you turn off of Highway One, you will realize just have amazing and special this unique property is.   It is tucked back into the Canyon and has some of the best scenery that you could ask for and still have the convenience of being 365 yards from the Aliso Beach.   I have been coming to this property for over 10+ years and the renovations they have done to the rooms, grounds and restaurant are exciting to see!  The rooms are detailed and luxury is one area that they did not lose sight of.   Although there are some construction projects still underway, the interruptions to our stay were minimal and still had a great relaxing stay!  Turn your cell phone off and enjoy the serenity of the Aliso Canyon.
Manager Response: Dear trvlr16,  Thank you for your thoughtful notes on your stay. This means the world to our team and are happy to hear that you've enjoyed the renovations and wilderness surrounding. We hope to welcome you back very soon for more R&R and you find it keeps getting better and better. Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Our son and daughter-in-law had their rehearsal dinner, wedding and wedding reception at The Ranch.  Everything was perfectly scheduled and top notch.  We've only experienced customer service like this at the Ritz Carlton in Pasadena (changed ownership), and some 5 star hotels in southeast Asia.  Our out of state friends were blown away.  If you're looking for a fantastic experience, at least go look at the place and kick the tires.  It's being completely remodeled, but the construction did not impact the setting or logistics of our event at all.  On a scale of 1---10, I would give it a 27.
Manager Response: Frank G - 27, alright!! Thank you for taking the time to provide you feedback and we are thrilled that you enjoyed your family's wedding on property and found the service to be excellent. We hope to welcome you and your family back to The Ranch at Laguna Beach especially once all is complete!

Summary: The hotel is in South Laguna beach and across the street from the ocean nestled in a canyon, which is quiet and relaxing.  Our room was lovely, it was clean and had a great big shower.  It also had a small refrigerator and microwave and a nice patio that opened into a courtyard.   There was construction going on during our stay but we knew this when we booked so we planned accordingly and it did not affect our stay.  We were warmly greeted when we arrived and every staff member we encountered was very friendly.  I would recommend this resort if you are looking for a beautiful setting and out of the hustle and bustle of downtown Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Blong14 - We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the secluded location of RLB and that you found the staff friendly! We are very excited to unveil the full Ranch LB for our guests in early Fall and hope to welcome you back very soon! Thank you for the thoughtful review.

Summary: It was very relaxing, away from any noise. Rested very well, kids enjoyed clean pool. Bar was awesome and everything from scratch. Enjoyed the idea of going green through the whole hotel and not using any corn syrup instead using agave syrup and fresh fruits. Overall excellent !!!
Manager Response: Yourik N - Thank you for your review! It is so great to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing stay, fresh dining and Pond pool. We hope to welcome the family back very soon especially once the resort is complete.

Summary: Add a business center (two computers in the interim) and privacy plaques for the rooms. You may want to add small trash cans and a some dinner wear (small plates, bowls and utensils) to the two-bedroom cottages.
Manager Response: Nikks78 - Thank you for your feedback. This info is very important to use especially prior to opening. We hope to welcome you back soon especially once the resort is complete.

Summary: Would definitely recommend staying at the ranch. The service was great - rooms were fantastic - beds very comfortable. Loved the little chocolates they left in the room each day. Very close to beach but still had a mountain feel. I would stay at the ranch again for sure.
Manager Response: 871grantb - It means so much to us that you enjoyed your stay! Please visit us again soon for another Laguna vacation, especially once all is complete. Thank you kindly for your feedback.

Summary: After a 15 hour long haul trip from Sydney with 2 children under 4, we were so happy when we saw the beautiful rooms waiting for us at The Ranch. The staff switched our room to a quieter location to ensure our children could rest during the day. We were in a 2 bedroom double story villa. It was huge! The Ranch is right across the road from the beach with easy access. Bens Pantry, incredible!!!! The food is soooo yummy. We will be back for sure we adored The Ranch.
Manager Response: StefGlennAug - Thank you for staying at The Ranch at Laguna Beach during our pre-opening after making the long trip! It is so great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and found the service, dining and rooms exceptional. We hope to welcome you and your back very soon!

Summary: in vacation fronte italy web found a jewel. With attention To details made The ranch a special Place. They are still finishing rennovations But It didn 't disturb us. staff excellent. a real laguna experience
Manager Response: Mauro D - It was such a pleasure to have you stay during our pre-opening and sincerely appreciate you taking the time to review us! We hope you'll venture west again very soon especially once the resort is complete! Thank you again.

Summary: The room was very clean, smelled like new, and was very nice sized. Bed was comfortable. Nice big shower. Great water pressure and very soft water. Wonderful customer service with highly attentive staff. This is a great property for families with inventive kids programs. We will definitely be recommending this resort and visiting again very soon
Manager Response: John H - Thank you for taking the time to review RLB! Our team is glad to hear that you enjoyed the room, amenities and service. Also we think our kids program will be a hit and are thrilled to hear that you were impressed with the family activities. We hope to see you again very soon especially once all is complete!

Summary: Potential, pleasant yet PRICEY...   Interesting/isolated location that is unique.  Still "soft opening" so no/little food, parking or resources... making the experience far too rugged than what they are billing for.  Diamond in the rough?  I hope so, I'd like to return.
Manager Response: Dr_kmwilliams - We appreciate your feedback. I would love to have you stay with us again upon completion of the resort in the near future. Please email me at sean@ranchlb.com so we can discuss further.

Summary Heading: Great serene location for the wedding we attended.
Summary: The room was very clean, smelled like new, and was very nice sized.  Bed was comfortable.  Nice big shower.  Great water pressure and very soft water.  The food was great, very tasty and portions were large.  Very well priced. Staff was very attentive.
Manager Response: JimG1972,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Our team was pleased to hear that you enjoyed the room and dining and staff were a highlight.   We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wonderful customer service with highly attentive staff. This is a great property for families with inventive kids programs. We will definitely be recommending this resort and visiting again very soon. Thank you for memorable weekend.
Manager Response: Marcus S,  Thank you for taking the time to review RLB. It is so great to hear that you enjoyed your stay and were impressed with the staff, property and kids programming and we hope to welcome you back soon for another family trip!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Excellent setting, service impeccable, serene environment with gorgeous views.  The patio restaurant is amazing and the staff are so attentive. We would definitely come back again.  Hotel expected to complete construction in August 2016
Manager Response: irinal931,  Thank you for your kind review! Resort is now set to open early Fall. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We are local Laguna Beach residents and have enjoyed all the wonderful things The Tanch has offered to the community. We were finally able to leave our 3 children with the grandparents and enjoy a 24 hour Staycation. It was a wonderful experience, the rooms are so warm and welcoming, and he staff was always accommodative.  Thank for a special and nmuch needed 24 hour vacation.
Manager Response: Aaegea_Lee,  Thank you for your kind words and for reviewing your 24 hours staycation! Our team was thrilled to receive this. We hope to welcome you back soon for another couples getaway or family trip especially once the resort is fully open!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed at The Ranch at Laguna Beach for a wedding. Had a great time. Very comfortable rooms. Laguna Beach is a beautiful place and the location of The Ranch is perfect for seclusion. It's very quiet and peaceful, in the canyon. Great service from top to bottom.
Manager Response: parrotkind,  Thank you for the review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the seclusion of the canyon and rooms. We hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The current construction can take away from the otherwise, serene atmosphere and setting.  Otherwise, it’s a beautiful near beach oasis tucked away in a quite canyon which you could miss if you blink driving down PCH.  Food was great, easy walk (via a safe tunnel) to the beach.  Hot tub was consistently 100 degrees with good jets; (salt water) pool was nice as well. The staff was very helpful and accommodating during the entire stay. I can’t wait to visit again once construction is complete.
Manager Response: StevesL2689BH - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are glad that you got to enjoy the nearby beach and the Pond Pool.  Great to hear that our staff was helpful and accommodating during your entire stay and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Our trip to The Ranch was amazing! We had the best time. The rooms are lovely ~ very well appointed and decorated beautifully. The staff was super helpful and customer service driven ~ they even helped us rent mountain bikes, got a bike rack for their car (to hold the bikes as we didn't have one) and found us a beginner trail to ride! Also, while the full restaurant wasn't open, we had breakfast and lunch at the Harvest Patio and both meals were delicious. We absolutely will be back again and I've already recommended it to a few folks ~ some with kids, some without!!
Manager Response: 934jacquelinen - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled that you had such a wonderful time at the resort and on the trails! We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel - newly renovated, very comfortable, good food
Summary: The title says it all. I will absolutely be returning to this hotel. The Harvest Patio has great food and drinks + a pool bar. There is construction that should complete by summer 2016, but the hotel has done a good job of minimizing the impact. We did not hear any work being done from our end of the hotel.
Manager Response: Roxannee777 - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled to hear that you loved food/drinks and that the renovation work was minimal. The Harvest Restaurant will be opening in the near future, so look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy the completed resort.

Summary Heading: Would love to go back there and stay longer
Summary: We were there just for two nights for a wedding.  The hotel is very close to the wedding venue.  If you are not in a hurry, there is a free bus down the road to take you around.  It's very peace and quiet place fro a leisure.  I really like to go bak there for a ten-day vocation, so that i can walk around the hotel and the beach, enjoy sunhsine.
Manager Response: 698yuec - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the peacefulness of the canyon and look forward to your upcoming ten-day vacation!

Summary: The grounds and facilities were clean, updated and beautiful. Although there was construction going on, it had minimal impact on my stay as it was occurring during the day. I look forward to returning and seeing the finished product
Manager Response: AdamsC3716LD - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the location and facilities. The resort is nearing completion, so we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We were lured to to the location by a sponsored email on Robb Report.   This place is incredibly misleading in almost all aspects of its materials.  We rented a 2 bedroom cottage. 'Cottage' by any common definition is a free standing building. In the Ranch's case, the cottage turns out to be a 2 story apartment in a long track building of other apartments. What's clear when you see the property is that some sort of old set of dorms or maybe a retirement home was refurbished with new paint and furniture. The whole place looks like building design circa 1950 re-purposes.   The pool area is classless with some sort of party music playing on speakers and a thatched hut where one poor bartender batted flies away.   The crown jewel of the experience is the entrance which doubles as a
Manager Response: Lgf101,  We have taken great caution and have actually been commended on being fully transparent regarding the ongoing construction.  We do not control all the content on third party booking sites, but do work with them to communicate as much as we can regarding our construction phase.  We also personally call each guest prior to arrival and go over the construction impact that may occur during their stay.  Again this call is made to guests who book directly through us or a travel agent, and not via a third party booking site.    We understand that our style will not be everyone’s taste. Our owners and local Laguna Beach design team have done an incredible job maintaining the history of a 50 year old property, protecting the canyon and wildness while simultaneously updating a beloved, community resort and clubhouse built in the 60s.  Guests will soon see our property featured in several design, travel and lifestyle magazines – so many do indeed find our property incredible.    The Two Bedroom Cottages got their name from the style of design which is reminiscent of the Crystal Cove Cottages many locals visited for summer staycations, also the detailing of the board-and-batten paneling and beach residential design has been one of the highlights of our hotel as guests have said they feel as if they are at their own vacation home or cottage. It has less to do with the exterior of the building however images of those are located all over our website and readily available. We do appreciate this feedback, however, and will further display the exteriors of the hotel on our website and marketing materials.  Our goal for our guests is to experience Laguna as a local. Every detail from the Sand Volleyball Court to the Palapa Bar at The Pond Pool is quirky, fun and distinctive to Laguna’s bohemian style. Again, we anticipate that it is not everyone’s taste but know that for many families and travelers it’s exactly the retreat they are looking for.   Our entrance also is under construction, we are working with the various stakeholder of this road to improve the arrival experience.   Best, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Tucked in a canyon with rugged rock hillside, this is really a hidden little piece of paradise. The remodel is almost complete and the new rooms are contemporary and well appointed.  Restaurants were in full operation yet, but if the same standard is followed, this will be a must-stay place.
Manager Response: Charles S - We appreciate the kind words and thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. The Harvest Restaurant will be opening in the near future, so we look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy it soon!

Summary: First drawback is that until main building is finished have to park, although they did have an employee in the lot directing you, walk through grounds to temporary office then walk back to car. Everybody was very nice, except for when I walked back to car a rather grumpy employee snapped, "This car has to be moved!" I told him I was told to park there by an employee. During the discussion as to where to park, I was directed towards an employee in a golf cart and I took it mean I was to follow him, which I did all the way to the upper lot. Turned out that was a miscommunication, so had to return to lower lot. Room was excellent and very nicely decorated, and with about a 15sf shower! Had a cheese plate, which was delicious, at the golf course snack bar overlooking the canyon.
Manager Response: 5ft17 - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We apologize about the miscommunication regarding parking and appreciate the feedback as it is very important to us. Glad to hear that you enjoyed the design of your accommodation and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary Heading: The Ranch a best kept secret....ssshhhhh....
Summary: The Ranch made our 15th wedding anniversary extra special by all the little things that they did.  It is wonderful to know that others care about you and your milestones.  The accommodations were exquisite, the service was the best.  The Ranch left no stone unturned.  They go above and beyond to make your stay with them the best ever.  I highly recommend The Ranch at Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: 433rhondah - Congrats on your 15th wedding anniversary and thank you for spending it with us! We are thrilled that you loved the accommodations and service! Thank you for the recommendation and we look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Very nice relaxing stay. Had mountain view room, next to the pool in a two story cottage. Everything is brand new and inviting. The only thing pool is not heated enough, but open 24 hours with room keys.
Manager Response: Svetlana L - Thank you for celebrating your birthday with us! Great to hear that you had a relaxing stay with a beautiful view of the canyon from your Cottage Two Bedroom Suite! We appreciate your feedback on the pool temperature and look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We spent two nights here in room #1104 for our 17th anniversary. It was quiet. The room was comfortable, large enough to move around and not trip over your suitcase. Very nice remodel. We had a lovely porch where we rocked in our rocking chairs and had a glass of wine, looking at the hills in the Aliso Creek Canyon. Service is competent, spotty, not quite up to par during this build-out phase. It was curious that there were no signs "pardon our dust" or apologies for being under construction. Rates are a bit discounted during this phase. The brunch was wonderful in the small cafe next to the golf course.  Great bloody mary's from the bar off the patio. The main reason we were here was the golf. We played the sweet 9 hole three times! We enjoyed the pool, jacuzzi, and the pool
Manager Response: Judy S - Congrats on your 17th anniversary and thank you for spending it with us!! Great to hear that you played 27 holes of golf during your stay! Hopefully you saw some of our deer friends on the course! The pool and hot tub are relaxing and glad that you took advantage of that along with the Pond Bar. We look forward to your next stay with us soon!

Summary: I stayed here for some business meetings in Laguna. Was able to host many meetings in my amazing room and on the patio. Such a cool environment - great break from the beach, yet so close to everything. Like staying in my own Valley. Awesome... The rooms were the best I've stayed in, in awhile. Didn't feel like a hotel at all, more like a friends home.
Manager Response: ajcole2016,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your business meetings and getaway at The Ranch LB. When designing the rooms, the vision was to create a private vacation cottage feel so our guests would feel at home. They will be proud to hear that they accomplished this vibe for your stay.   Please visit us again soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Detail detail detail! Lap blankets offered when you're relaxing on the patio. Free shuttles to the beach with all the amenities provided.  And excellent customer service!!  This is our new home away from home!
Manager Response: buzzrubio,  Thank you for your kind feedback! We are beyond excited to hear that RLB felt like a home away from home. We strive to make each and every guest feel that way and have them pleased with the hospitality and details.   It was a pleasure to have you stay and we hope you make your way back very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: I can't wait for the completion!
Summary: We've been coming to this location since 1963.  It has such beautiful views, quiet and peaceful,  an amazing locale, attentive bell staff (Thank You Matthew), wait staff catered to our every request, construction is what it is and I look forward to it being finished. We didn't use the housekeeping services much because we would rather take care of things ourselves, but if a request was placed they were at our door in minutes.  A little taken aback by the trash in the foliage, but that was the only negative. The beds were like clouds and the shower had very strong water pressure which was surprising. We didn't make it to the pool - just too cold and overcast, but it looked amazing.  So many changes since the last time we were there, all for the better.  Such a a beautiful job
Manager Response: Zoopasmom - Thank you for being a guest of the property since 1963! We appreciate the loyalty and continued support! We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We tend to take a family trip each December, but due to our upcoming wedding in January decided it was best to keep it local. The Ranch at Laguna Beach made it feel as if we actually got away. Due to great rates during their not-yet-finished preview rates, we scored a great deal on a two-bedroom cottage. It was gorgeous, well appointed, spacious, and very relaxing.   It may be a little unfair to judge the food because the restaurant was a tent and an outdoor area for the time being, but we got some happy hour food and it was real bad - like bad frozen party food cooked poorly in a toaster oven bad. As a result, I would suggest offering some delivery options, or menus to places that will deliver locally. Fortunately for us we're local and had a car to freely get around the
Manager Response: Amy R - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. Great to hear that you enjoyed the spacious Cottage Two Bedroom accommodation. We appreciate the feedback regarding the dining situation. It is important to us as we move closer to the completion of the resort. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: We stayed at the Ranch for two nights. Our room was lovely 304. Beautifully appointed with a mattress from heaven. We slept like babies. Everything was new and tastefully done. The soaps and shampoos were delightfully scented.  Turn down service included fresh Sees chocolates. Nice touch.  There are a few kinks to work out which the staff was more than eager to correct.  We had authentic enchiladas for breakfast. A must if you enjoy Mexican. The manager was welcoming and eager to please.  What a warm and welcoming hotel.  We will recommend this with conviction.
Manager Response: Linda L - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the design and comfort of the accommodations. We agree, the enchiladas are delicious! We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The place needs to be so badly update from the old carpeting to the completely out dated furnishing overall.  This place is completely over priced and the staff is RUDE and totally inconsiderate of any one who stays there.  My favorite part is the trailer park surroundings as you drive up to this old property.....
Manager Response: Edunbar3,  After researching the details of your stay, we understand your comments are stemming from the issue you and your family had with our enforcement of not allowing you to take un-approved wedding photography on our property.  When you made your room reservation, you were expressly told that under no circumstances was wedding photography allowed to take place anywhere on property.  We reserve that only for weddings actually occurring at our facility to protect the integrity of our wedding clientele.    Unfortunately you did not choose to adhere to our policy and proceeded to use our resort and golf course grounds to photograph your party.  Our clients who had spent months planning their special wedding with us were shocked to see another bride and groom taking photos right next to their ceremony area - within moments of taking their vows.  We had no choice but to ask your group to leave and respect the policy that had been clearly communicated to you during the reservation process. As far as your comments go regarding our facility - our resort was completely restored at incredible cost and last year and has received worldwide accolades.  Your comments about referring to our resort as a trailer park and having 1970’s era décor is simply untrue and malicious.  We are saddened that you chose to use anger and lies to frame what should have been a very special day for your family.

Summary: My husband and I came here for a 1 night stay for our anniversary.  We wanted to "get away from it all" and chose this resort among many others we were looking at online.  Everything was fine until we discovered a mouse in our room before going to bed.  The front desk initially offered us a free breakfast to make up for the incident, which I found completely insulting.  Free breakfast for a mouse?  Who knows how long it had been in there and we left to eat dinner so it could have walked on our belongings.  (just thinking about it makes me cringe)  We got moved to another room a few doors down.  But at that point, we were just paranoid and our one night getaway had been dampered.  The front desk told us that they would send someone to check on it in the morning....let the mouse
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are disappointed to hear about your experience and can completely understand the frustration regarding your anniversary stay. Please know this has not occurred prior to your stay, but our team has addressed the issue and has been briefed should something like this happen again.  We expect not!   We sincerely want to apologize for the manner in which this situation was handled, in no way was this acceptable and we have reviewed the entire issue with our team so that it will never reoccur.  We would like to offer you and your husband complimentary night and a spa treatment once Sycamore Spa is open in August. We hope to make up for this shortcoming in any way that we can. Please contact me directly if you’d like to discuss this further or to visit Sycamore Spa.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team caitlin@ranchlb.com

Summary: I booked this location as a Mother's Day getaway for myself and my mom. Upon check-in to the hotel, we were escorted through the grounds to our room, by a hotel attendant. He was very nice, and explained the details of the grounds and the room where we stayed. Our room was a Creekside suite, which was very spacious and had everything needed for an excellent stay. I was very impressed by the huge shower and walk-in closet!   We had breakfast at the Harvest Patio, which has a breathtaking mountain and golf course view. The food was delicious; plenty of variety in the breakfast drink and food menu options. And the waiters were very friendly and accommodating.   The only unfavorable mention I have was the wait we had for turndown service of our sofa bed, the night of our stay. We
Manager Response: Lyndseyh421 - Thank you for celebrating Mother's Day with us! We are so thrilled that you enjoyed the accommodations, breakfast, and the views of the canyon. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Terrific surroundings. Terrific accommodation. Terrific location. The minute we arrived at The Ranch we got overwhelmed from the surroundings and the resort itself. The chosen colors and all details in our cottage were very selected and nice. The guest service was state-of-the-art. 24 hour pool was very convenient and our daughter loved it :-) Breakfast on the outdoor patio with stunning views on the golf course was the best start we had so far. I can't think of anything to complain about. No doubt - best place to stay in Laguna Beach and this area !!!
Manager Response: Henning O - Thank you for staying with us during our preview phase! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location, breakfast and the pool. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: Staff was very welcoming and friendly. It was my birthday and they left a huge, freshly baked cookie in the room for me. Quiet location, love the 24hr amenities. The restaurant wasn't fully open yet, so that was a bummer, but I look forward to trying it out when we go back.
Manager Response: EmBentley - Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening in celebration of your birthday! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location, staff and amenities. The Harvest Restaurant will be opening in the near future. We would love for you to stay with us again and dine at the new restaurant!

Summary Heading: Loved EVERY Minute of our stay
Summary: This is an awesome property. The great location is an added bonus.  The staff was absolutely incredible, very accommodating and friendly.  The rooms were beautifully decorated and spacious. We can not wait to return.
Manager Response: JLBowens - Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for the notes on your stay! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location, staff, rooms and design. We hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: Perfect place to escape to! The rooms are spectacular, and the bed is probably the most comfortable I've ever slept in. Hospitality from the team is outstanding, particularly at the pool bar where Sam, Michael and Maddy made great drinks and even better company. The ranch does a great job of delivering a luxury experience without having to deal with the pretensions that usually come as a by-product. I love it here, and expect is going to keep getting better as more amenities open up on the property.   Oh, and there's a golf course!
Manager Response: Sam S - Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for the notes on your stay! We are glad to hear that the bed was the most comfortable that you have ever slept in! We look forward to your next visit soon!

Summary: Spent a couple of days with old friends.  This turned out to be the perfect setting.  Beautiful surroundings, great service, wonderful rooms, delicious food, and the golfing with friends and the local deer was very enjoyable.  We all thoroughly enjoyed our time.
Manager Response: Walt T,  Thank you for taking the time to review The Ranch! It is great to hear that you and your friends enjoyed a couple days in the canyon. Our team will be pleased to hear that your group enjoyed the service, rooms, dining and property and we hope to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Recently some friends and I visited The Ranch for some golf and good times. From the golf, the cuisine, the rooms and the service I have never felt more comfortable at a resort. And it rained on our second day! Who cares. A beautiful view of the golf course from our deck and a hot cup of coffee. It was a truly fantastic experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words!  We could not agree more, we think that this comfortable and relaxing experience is truly something special.  We look forward to you return!  Best,

Summary: A group of 8 of us thoroughly enjoyed a quiet, yet eventful stay at Laguna's newest and finest resort, The Ranch at Laguna Beach. The resort is off the beaten path, tucked up a serene canyon, yet only a short stroll to spectacular Aliso Beach. We booked 4 of the two bedroom suites, and found them to be incredibly spacious, spotlessly clean, amazingly quiet and decorated to the tens. Each room enjoyed a private patio and balcony overlooking the gorgeous golf course, where deer casually walked by undeterred by the passing golfers. We dined on the patio overlooking the first tee box before our own round of golf, and found the food and refreshing cocktails to be delicious and a very good value. The staff was extremely attentive and accommodating, without being too intrusive.
Manager Response: Buck92016 - Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for the notes on your stay! We are glad that everyone in the group had such a great time! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location, golf, food, rooms and design. We hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary: Having recently visited The Ranch at Laguna Beach for a reunion I must say it makes for a fun and relaxing visit and a wonderful spot for such an event. We first met on the patio overlooking the golf course for a delicious lunch and cocktails prior to a round of golf on the Ben Brown course. The service was friendly but not overstated. The setting for the inn and golf course is a beautiful canyon set back from the coast highway. Our room was impeccably done with a taste of old Laguna with today's modern yet classic interpretation. We were in one of the two bedroom cottages which provides living, dining and a half bath downstairs with a patio overlooking the golf course and two bedrooms and a full bath upstairs. The beds are so comfortable and the rooms so quiet. One had a
Manager Response: Timineer - Thank you for staying with us during our pre-opening and for the notes on your stay! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the location, rooms and design. We hope to welcome you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Most fantastic weekend to celebrate Mother's Day. Played golf, walking, swimming, fabulous food!
Summary: The nine hole golf course is so lush and green. Back into a majestic canyon, no wonder the deer are close by. The management was very friendly and hospitable. I felt like I was in a sanctuary. So beautiful and peaceful.  Definetly  a hidden treasure!! The room was a beach feeling with bead board and elegant decor, my favorite. Cozy robes and so piece full 😌 The staff at the pool were great, Mike and Sam were great at making our favorite cocktails 🍸🍷Will Definetly come back soon! The new spa is opening June? Can't wait. This place is gorgeous!
Manager Response: obietigervp,  Thank you sincerely for your feedback regarding your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back for another canyon retreat especially once the spa and restaurant are complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Slept like a baby immersed in down feathers both under and over me. Ultra comfortable bed, which made for a very pleasant overnight prior to a day full of meetings. Room has been completely re-furnished. Very classy fixtures and furnishings. Shower was huge, walk in with amazing shower pressure.
Manager Response: Dr_C_and_E,  It is great to hear that you enjoyed the in-room amenities during a business trip! We hope to welcome you back very soon to experience the property when all is complete. Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Incredibly romantic weekend!  Great round of golf in a beautiful canyon setting, long beach walks through stunning Laguna coves, relaxing with a cocktail poolside and great food.  What more do you need? Highly recommend this newly renovated gem of a spot!
Manager Response: lrobhenley,  Thank you for the lovely review! Our team will be so proud to know that you enjoyed golf, the Pond pool, dining and location. We hope to welcome you back soon for another SoCal getaway.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Patio is a superb place to relax
Summary: The Patio overlooks the golf course and is set in a steep canyon with native vegetation on all sides.  Sitting there in the late afternoon with a drink is a pure delight.  The location is important - you do not believe you are basically a stone's throw from Coast Highway - but the service and food are also excellent.  Happy hour is well worth it.  You can meet up with friends, or simply settle into an Adirondack chair by yourself. Be warned that the carnitos nachos are a meal for two or three by themselves.  There's a small, but well chosen, list of wines by the glass and several good options for beer drinkers.  Lunch is also quite good, but the experience is tempered somewhat by the construction on-site.
Manager Response: Jane H,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at RLB! It is great to hear that you enjoyed happy hour on the Patio and we absolutely cannot wait to open up The Ranch House for breakfast, lunch and dinner once construction is complete.   We hope to see you again very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I've tried to call 3 times regarding general inquiries before making my reservation. The first time I was stuck in the please hold loop for 15 minutes before receiving a message that I would need to leave my number to receive a call back.  I tried calling back twice again choosing the option to speak with the hotel operator.  Both times the phone just rang and rang and no one ever picked up.  I'm wondering if they are even open for business.  Their website provides scant details about reservations.  Fail.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Please accept our apologies for the difficulties you experienced in reaching our phone staff. We greatly appreciate you advising of this issue and know we are working to determine the cause.  We would be pleased to answer any questions you may have regarding our property.  Please do not hesitate to call me directly at 949-715-1409 and I will be glad to assist you.

Summary Heading: Great place for a weekend escape
Summary: Loved every single moment at the ranch. Perfect studio rooms with all facilities. Quality price was unbeatable although part of the hotel was under construction we barely felt it. Highly recommend to families with children. Laguna beach was amazing!
Manager Response: Sahbi K,  Thank you very much for the review of RLB! It is our pleasure to welcome you and your family during our pre-opening and are happy to hear that you enjoyed every aspect of your stay! Please visit us again soon especially once our kids programming is up and running.   Thank you again!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I'm not from the area so I don't know the history of the Ranch, but it looks like there are new owners who are TOTALLY renovating a 1960s area resort. The Ranch is just off Hwy1 just south of the Montage in Laguna Beach. It is located on the inland side of the road in a quiet valley. I would recommend arriving before dark because you need to drive about a half mile down an unlighted service alley to get there. The Ranch has a casual feel which we liked. If you like the nearby Ritz and St Regis which are a little too marbled for my taste, the Ranch may not be to your liking. The standard rooms looked nice but a little small. We stayed in a 2 level unit with 2 bed rooms and a 3/4 bath on 2 level and had separate living space and 1/2 bath on first level. We had our 25 daughter with
Manager Response: Dan H.,  Thank you for your thoughtful review of The Ranch LB! We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed the 2 bedroom cottage and and pool. Once The Ranch House is open we will have full dining service and in-room dining and hope to welcome you back once all is complete!   Thank you again for visiting The Ranch LB during pre-opening and for taking the time to review the resort.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The staff is amazing, grounds are really pretty and the proximity to an amazing beach made our time at the Ranch a very good stay.  We visited with our young girls, one of which woke up on the wrong side of the bed one morning.  The friendly staff at Bens pantry noticed the situation quickly getting out of Dads control and stepped in with a free chocolate chip cookie to neutralize the tears.  The grounds are great, granted construction is still in full swing, but even the construction crews greeted us with pleasantries.   We stayed in a two bed suite which was very nicely decorated.  A quick golf cart ride will bring you to a beautiful beach, and phone the ranch hands for a prompt pick up when you are done.  They also offered sand toys for the kids.  Also, you are a quick uber
Manager Response: Joseph S.,  Such a pleasure to read your review, we are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay during pre-opening. Chocolate Chip Cookies usually do the trick, happy to hear The Pantry Team was able to help out! More to come with kid's activities and final opening of the resort. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon and thank you  for the kind notes!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: I spent a day with my crew at the resort a few days ago and upon pulling into the property I was amazed at the landscape and seeing how the lot was surrounded by beautiful mountails and sprawling hills. The staff was extremely nice and more accomodating than any hotel I have ever visited. Being so close to the beach makes this place an ideal paradise to get lost in. The food was delightful and the rooms were fabolous and made you feel at home. The coolest part was having the little grey squirrels run up to you with no fear, deer coming out of the trees, truly great place. I'd highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: ParisBleu,  Thank you for taking the time to review RLB! It was a pleasure to host your crew and are happy to hear that you enjoyed the property, dining and rooms. We hope to welcome you back soon and thank you again!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Amazing Resort in Laguna Beach for Golfing and Relaxing
Summary: I had a wonderful time at the Ranch at Laguna Beach.  It's absolutely beautiful. It's in a canyon with a gorgeous 9 hole golf course.  It's got a huge pool with a bar and jacuzzi. I've stayed there twice.  Once in a single room and the second time in a two story unit with two bedrooms, dining area and living room.  Both of them were really deluxe.  We had breakfast at their restaurant and room service, all of the meals were delicious.  It's a 5 minute drive from all the stores and restaurants in Laguna Beach.  Which is really nice because you have all the perks of being close by without all the congestion.  It's about a 10 minute walk to a really lovely beach too.  I would highly recommend the Ranch!
Manager Response: V8792NNmark,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! Our team will be proud to know that you enjoyed the location, dining, pool and rooms. Also great to hear that you enjoyed the escape of the canyon but still proximity to beaches and downtown.   Please visit us soon especially once the resort is complete! Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My daughter was married here last weekend. All my wife and I can say about the weekend is that it was Magical. Starting 6 months ago with Lindsey, the event coordinator, and ending with a farewell breakfast on Sunday morning, the entire experience was nothing short of perfect. The newly remodeled rooms are 5 star, the wedding and reception area was picturesque, and the service was magnificent. We did not encounter one single mediocre employee during our 3 day stay. Every single one went above and beyond to make sure we were well taken care of. I highly recommend this hidden gem in the heart of Laguna Beach to everyone. They are finishing up final stages of construction on the restaurant and spa, but it did nothing to dampen our stay. We will be back....and soon. Thanks to all
Manager Response: K7500VNrobertm,  Thank you for reviewing your stay and daughter's wedding! On behalf of our team, we are thrilled to be a small part of this important day for you, your family and friends. It is so nice to hear that you enjoyed the weekend, service and the construction did not impact the experience. Lindsey is fantastic and we are so lucky to have her attention-to-detail and care for each bride and vision for their day.   We look forward to welcoming you back very soon and thank you again for the kind feedback.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful location and rooms, warm welcome, charming staff
Summary: Can't recommend highly enough. Hotel, spa, golf course beautifully situated in hidden canyon next to beach. Lovely peaceful setting, gorgeous high-spec rooms, delicious food and attentive staff. Nothing too much trouble. Would always be number one choice in Laguna Beach
Manager Response: Dear Alison,  Thank you for the kind review! It is such a compliment and our team will be very pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location, dining, rooms and service. Please visit us again soon especially once construction is complete!    Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed here for one Saturday night in April. This place is tucked back into a canyon across PCH from Aliso Beach. I wasn't sure what to expect pulling in to the parking lot, but was very pleasantly surprised when the staff member showed us to our room. Really nice room with plenty of space, a huge shower (with excellent water pressure), and a nice little patio area with rockers to relax in. The place is surrounded by the canyon and the trees. It was very relaxing and we felt miles away from the beach crowds within walking distance. They have a golf course with a nice patio restaurant/bar overlooking the course. we went out to have some drinks by the fire pit at night and it was extremely relaxing. Every single staff member we had contact with was awesome - very friendly and
Manager Response: BCreview,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at The Ranch LB! We are thrilled that you enjoyed the location, service, room and views. Also great to hear that the construction did not impact a relaxing stay. Please visit us again soon! Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had 4 nights here in April and thought room was amazing and slept peacefully as it was wonderfully quiet at night. On arrival we were quite shocked at the amount of work going on and noise levels during the day and first appearences in our opinion thought building looked like army barracks and functional. But once inside it was amazing. We found staff very helpful and quite charming. Conseige Paullyne in particular got us reservations in great (not expensive) restaurants which we apprecaited as well as a map for walk (10 minute drive away) We thought we could walk up the river but there is no access but beach easily accessible and lovely. Restaurant was closed most of our stay at lunch time and no service in the evening so we had to drive into town more than we thought. If
Manager Response: Fransimon,  Thank you for your thoughtful review of the resort! We can absolutely understand your impression upon arrival but are thrilled that you were able to experience happy hour and enjoyed the service . Please visit again soon especially once all is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort, will be nice when it's finished
Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom cottage, found it online for a reduced price while the finishing touches were being made to the resort. The room was immaculate and everything was new, the beds were excellent, really comfortable with nice bedding.  The pool is great, heated saline with hot tub, our kids (5 and 7) loved them both. We were told the pool was 24hrs at check in, but that no noise was allowed after 10 in the resort, fair enough. Although there was often a lot of noise in and around the pool, to be fair it did stop at 10, but it was lucky our kids are sound sleepers as our room overlooked the pool. The resort seems to be aimed at people without kids, or with children older than ours, with a big emphasis on golf and not a great deal other than the pool for the kids to do.  It's
Manager Response: Jonathan2376,  Thank you for your thoughtful review and for staying with us during the pre-opening! It's great to hear that you enjoyed the rooms, dining, pool and beach proximity. I can completely understand the difficulty with a running trails although our full fitness center and activities will be available this summer. Also, our full kid's programming will start in July so we hope you'll make it back once everything is complete for the full Ranch family experience. I will relay your decor recommendations and notes to our Rooms Team. Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: no four seasons in laguna beach, but the ranch (and their service) fit the bill.
Summary: staying here four nights during spring break, our experience here was wonderful.  customer service is everything to me, especially at a resort.  the other thing that is important to me is that all employees, especially those behind the scenes) are respected and well cared for by management.  this was the case here, as far as i could tell.  all around, my expectations were high and the ranch met and exceeded them.  as there could be anywhere, there were a few glitches (broken ice machine, turndown no-show one night, mistaken overcharge, etc.) but they were taken care of immidiately with exceeding courtesy.  we booked at a ridiculously great rate for a two bedroom, since construction is going on.  and free parking!!  i truly hope to return sometime when the spa, clubhouse, and
Manager Response: chromaspace,  Thank you for the kind review of your spring break stay! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the the rooms, service and dining on property. We are blessed with a stellar team including Francisco! It is so great that you were able to connect with him, he is such an asset to our team, very attentive and always smiling. We are lucky to have owners and management that genuinely care that each team member and guest is enjoying this incredible place.   We hope to welcome you back again soon and thank you again for the review.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: The Ranch at Laguna Beach during renovation
Summary: My teenage daughter and I stayed at the Ranch at Laguna Beach during their renovations.  The noise of renovation didn't bother us at all.  The pool is really nice.  The room was spacious and very clean.  Housekeeping comes in the evening to take the decorative pillows off the bed.  Today, they brought us chocolates.  The restaurant was closed due to the renovations, so they offered a free continental breakfast and a lunch of sandwiches and salads.  Both were actually delicious.  Every staff member was very friendly.  They all went out of their way to make us comfortable.  We love this place!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We celebrated my birthday at The Ranch. The rooms are beautiful and the bed is so comfortable that its difficult to get out of it in the morning! You have the best of both worlds there as it is only a short walk to the beach. On the property your eyes have a feast of the gorgeous canyon views. The staff is very attentive and eager to please each guest. We look forward to coming back again soon.
Manager Response: Laurie B.,  Thank you for your kind review! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your birthday at the resort and were pleased with the location of canyon, beach, rooms and service. Please visit us again soon for more R&R! Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: One breakfast away from being great
Summary: It would've been hard to fault the hotel - we enjoyed it more than the overly prim Four Seasons in Santa Barbara - for its vibe, setting and service. Just one downer on our one night stay was the breakfast provision made due to the closure of the dining area for renovation. In a nutshell of the promised array of goodies available to guests the only thing left by 9am (hardly a late hour) was some granola, a few lonely blueberries and a mountain of cottage cheese and hard boiled eggs. No bread, no pastries, no yogurt, no oatmeal and no reinforcements. I think even Wolfgang Puck would be pushed to create a meaningful breakfast from that.   It meant an unplanned drive into town and paying for a breakfast when it should've been included and from other arrivals around that time we
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are thrilled you chose The Ranch LB for a SoCal getaway. It is also great to hear that you enjoyed the vibe, setting and service at the resort. I apologize for the lack of breakfast service and the inconvenience of finding dining off property. Unfortunately during your stay we had to close the kitchen due to an unplanned construction change. We hope you’ll make your way back and enjoy breakfast on us. Please email me directly so we can credit you upon booking at caitlin@ranchlb.com.   Thank you again and safe travels!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: In Transition and Worth a Try
Summary: I booked a 1 bedroom suite for my son, grandson and myself for a 2 day stay last weekend. Let me say the staff was incredible and so helpful at every turn. The grounds and buildings had undergone extensive renovation...colors were good, quality of materials showed and space abundant. But it still retained the feel of an older property that had been rehabed but was limited in what could be accomplished.  We were disappointed at the approach and both of us had serious doubts about our choice...but as time went on, we settled in and enjoyed ourselves.  If we had to make a concise evaluation, it would be we liked it but felt the price should have been lower to be really considered very good because value is always a key element in our travel choices. We would propbably stay there
Manager Response: Dear greenchili21,  Thank you for your thoughtful notes on your stay with us. I can assure you that our team considers each review thoroughly especially during our pre-opening. We appreciate your feedback on pricing, the beach, renovation and service and hope to welcome you back soon! Thank you again for taking the time to review The Ranch LB.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary Heading: Gorgeous, attentive service, private canyon setting
Summary: We just stayed in a 2 bedroom Creekside cottage suite for 3 nights during our teenagers' spring break. Units 1002-1006 would be perfect-- The most comfortable bed ever.  During the construction of the new restaurant and clubhouse, rates were great and there was very little inconvenience. The staff was quickly responsive to any request-- when housekeeping threw away a bag that wasn't meant as trash, they actually found the bag and returned it within 20 minutes! Beautiful heated pool with a hot tub and bar. Delicious happy hour appetizers and drink atop the first tee of the gorgeous 9 hole course. Easy 7 minute walk to pretty and popular Aliso beach. Right now there's no indoor restaurant, just the patio restaurant mentioned above, but it was fantastic. Chilly at night but they
Manager Response: Dear mhershey,  Thank you for your kind review! Our team will be very proud to know that they contributed to an enjoyable stay. We hope to welcome you back very soon for more R&R and Laguna Beach adventures!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great weekend getaway with unique amenities
Summary: The Ranch is a beautiful place to enjoy privacy and golf in an oasis. Overlooking the golf course is a nice patio restaurant with a view of the sunset. One does not need to play golf in order to participate in its beauty...lounge chairs are available all over a vantage point that makes this spot a nice place to relax; and if a little sport is requested, the game of cornhole for The Ranch guests. The rooms are luxurious complete with state of the art bathrooms and window panes to provide access and/or limit the amount of sunshine that is needed. The jacuzzi is open indefinitely and the pool provides a balance with its saltwater advantage. I would return to this place as its a great weekend getaway with unique amentiies.
Manager Response: Hi Jayne D,  It is so great to hear that you enjoyed Harvest Restaurant and the golf course! The pool is a fun area also, we love that it is salt water and open 24 hours. We look forward to welcoming you back for another staycation especially once the resort is complete! Thank you again for your kind feedback.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My son and I recently visited the resort to get in 9 holes and spend some quality time. The setting is outstanding, tucked in from the coast in the beautiful Aliso Creek watershed. We thoroughly enjoyed the setting and our play as well as the good quality food at the outdoor grill. The location and the environment is outstanding but it lacks in one regard in that the rear part of the property is blocked off from the Aliso/Woods canyon trail which offers some of the best hiking and biking anywhere. Access to the trail/s would make this resort a truly 5 star experience and increase patronage as well as enjoyment of the area for those who are not golfers.
Manager Response: Dear Richard B.,  Thank you for your time and thoughtful review. It is great to hear that you and your son enjoyed the setting, dining and golf at The Ranch LB. Please know that for safety reasons we do not have access through the golf course.  We apologize for the inconvenience, we do, however, offer hiking and biking through Laguna Canyon Foundation and Laguna Cyclery and encourage guests to explore such a beautiful part of Laguna.  Thank you again for your notes and we hope to welcome you and your family back soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Scenic Privacy & Great Food Close to the Beach
Summary: My parents and I spent a weekend at The Ranch while it was undergoing an expansion on its restaurant and select guest rooms. It managed to be incredibly peaceful and idyllic while partially under construction, so I can only imagine how amazing it'll be once it's complete, which should be within a matter of months.  The Ranch is perfect for anyone who wants to be walking distance from the beach but well away from the touristy fray. The décor reflects the natural surroundings, with a clean, modern wood/concrete aesthetic whose splashes of color and judicious shabby chic elements keeps everything in the "warm and cozy" realm, rather than veering into cold industrial. We had a suite for the three of us. My parents slept in the (incredibly plush-looking) bed, and I took the pull-out
Manager Response: Kristinaten,  Wow! We really appreciate the kindness used in this detailed review of the different experiences you had during your stay! It is great to see the enjoyment that you experienced in the canyon and we look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: My husband, baby, and I stayed here at the recommendation of my sister-in-law who lives close by. It is such a beautiful property and everyone who works there is very friendly and ready to go the extra mile. Our visit coincided with my husband's birthday and they surprised him with a little gift. Some of the property was still under construction while we were there, but they've done a wonderful job at making the place feel complete and fully operational... and we never heard a bit of construction noise! Plus, the entire visit was very easy with a 6 month old, made even easier by a pack and play provided by the place. Can't wait to go back to this paradise! P.S. Whether or not you're staying there, if you're in the area, breakfast is delicious and not to be missed!
Manager Response: HayBer208,  Thank you for the kind notes on your stay! It is great to hear that construction did not have an impact on your stay and your family was welcomed and enjoyed a relaxing vacation! Visit again soon especially once all is complete for more family fun! Thank you again.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice atmosphere, away from the bustle
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here-   I would probably give it 5 stars when the restaurant is complete.   It is nice to stay a little away from the crowds and the traffic-  just a 5 min ride off the main road.   You can get nice hors d'oeuvres and wine at their little bar-  It's busy there though- they seem understaffed.   The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room is large and comfortable.   Beautiful bathroom.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review. We are glad that you enjoyed both the service and the décor in the rooms! The Harvest Restaurant will debut in Late Spring 2016, so we invite you to return this summer to experience it!

Summary Heading: Great customer service for the hotel, pool and golf course.
Summary: My room was bare foot elegant beach themed.  We played the most beautiful course in Orange County, played volleyball right after golf and hung out at the pool afterward.  My wife and I went with a group of friends and we were blown away by the service and the food.  Best breakfast in OC too.  Can't wait until the clubhouse is done.  I will live there.  Congratulations the the Ranch team for executing!
Manager Response: Mr. Yelich,  We are extremely thankful for our longtime loyal guests like yourself! We enjoyed meeting your group of friends and are glad that you enjoyed the property amenities! You are going to love the new Harvest Restaurant!

Summary: This place is amazing.  If you are looking to stay somewhere cool and totally different than the typical big boxy hotel then stay here.  It is tucked back into a beautiful canyon    The food is incredible.  We played golf, volleyball and bocci ball. The pool has a little palapa bar.  This rooms were remodeled recently and when the word gets out how cool  the vibe is it will be the in place to stay in LAGUNA.
Manager Response: Chris R,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We strive to provide an authentic Laguna experience and our team will be thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the quirky details that make Laguna so fun and different.
