We hope to welcome you back soon especially once all is complete!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Having grown up in Laguna I have fond memories of this property and was hopeful that the new ownership and renovations would keep the Laguna vibe alive.  They have!  The service is amazing-professional without pretense.  The room interiors are decorated to perfection with an elegant beach décor.  The robes, bed, and pillows are just dreamy.  And the food and wine, delicious.  I think the location offers the best of two worlds, a beautiful serene canyon experience near the beach.  I cannot wait until my next stay at The Ranch!
Manager Response: BurkeAdams,  We are so glad that you have been able to see the reimagination of our property! Thank you for the kind words about your experiences in the canyon! We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a slightly different experience from the typical visit to a California Beach.  It is close enough to the beach and its community of shops and restaurants, but far enough away to give you a feeling of being in a mountain resort. Provided at the resort is a small golf course, a large swimming pool area, and a restaurant, when it is complete sometime this year.  The staff specialize in customer service, with immediate attention to your special needs.  Even shuttle service to the beach, complete with towels, chairs, and umbrella.  We would like to return when the restaurant and reception is complete, because it will highlight a truly worthwhile experience.
Manager Response: DrDSanDiego_CA,  It was such a pleasure to have you stay during our pre-opening and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the location and service on property. Please visit us again soon especially after our grand opening! Thank you again for your wonderful feedback, our team will be very proud.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We had to attend an early event, so we asked for early check-in.  On three separate phone calls, we received three completely different answers, all contradictory in some way, which was quite off-putting, and indicated bad training.  Once we checked in, however, the rooms were ready and the staff could not have been better from that moment on, including the hotel, the event services, the restaurant, who all went the extra mile, cheerfully.  The restaurant is under a tent (maybe because of the massive construction that was supposed to be finished in December and now in February it looks quite far from completion, and not pretty.  The food for lunch, breakfast and for the event was all very tasty and the portions were quite large for the mid-range price. The rooms were spacious,
Manager Response: Artsy12,   Thank you for taking the time to review RLB! Your feedback is very important to us especially pre-opening. Please accept our sincere apologies for the confusion surrounding early check-in. These details have been addressed with each department. Also the pillow recommendation is something I will pass on to our rooms division, thank you for noting such.   Once the Ranch House is complete, we will have more indoor and outdoor options to accommodate whatever the weather! It is great to hear that you enjoyed the hospitality post arrival and dining. We hope to welcome you back shortly especially once renovations are complete.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We came for a wedding. The hotel is off the coast highway between a canyon and has a nice looking 9 home gold course attached to property. They are doing construction so the look of the hotel is not great now. Lobby in a small sliding glass door entrance to a room, kind of strange. But the rooms were spectacular and new. We had a king room and children had a cottage 2 bedroom. Both very nice, new, and clean. We really liked the rooms at this remodeled hotel. The wedding was on the golf course outside as construction was a visible problem and it was cold. We liked the only restaurant for breakfast or lunch for convenience. The staff was nice and we would come back after construction is completed whenever that maybe. It looks like a very slow process. No phone coverage but very
Manager Response: Dear Rick N.,  Thank you for your time and feedback on your experience at RLB! The current Front Desk is in a temporary space while the Ranch House is under renovation and reopening in June. We apologize for the challenges with phone reception and aesthetic impact of construction, our team is working to complete the last two buildings that will open end of June. Thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back once the resort is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: The Rooms at The Ranch have been renovated and play true to what Laguna is all about.  We have stayed at this property prior to the renovation and recently returned.  The beds were comfortable, and the decor is top notch.  You feel as if you are staying at well appointed home not a hotel.  I cannot wait to return when the spa is and more dining options are open as I am sure they will follow suit.
Manager Response: Dori B,   It was such a pleasure to have you stay at RLB and to read your review. You hit the nail on the head! Our designer wanted our guests to feel as if they were vacationing at their private beach residence. Happy to hear that you experienced that!   The Spa and Restaurant will be complete this summer and we cannot wait to welcome you back!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Great place to stay.  Very friendly staff, beautiful location, all around good experience.  Room was very nice and spacious.  Bed was comfortable.  Food was excellent.  Great place for a quick getaway or a longer stay.
Manager Response: Leonard K,  Thank you for your feedback, it means so much to our team that you enjoyed your time here. We hope to see you again very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort but paper thin walls..
Summary: We visited this resort February 11-14.  It is located a little out of Laguna Beach but perfect for relaxing.   We stayed in Building 12 which was very central to the pool, parking lot, volleyball courts and restaurant.   Rooms are STUNNING!!  It has the most comfy beds and linens.  Pillows are nice and fluffy!!  Our view was of the mountains.   Restaurant was very good.  Small selection but well prepared.  Great service!   Pool & hot tub are very nice.    My only complaint is the noise in the next room.  We had neighbors every night, and you can hear EVERYTHING...and every word spoken.  (Cell phones ringing etc.) I am not sure how this can be prevented but I assure you, part of relaxing is getting sleep.    Everything else is A+
Manager Response: trishl3,  Thank you for your kind review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the rooms, pool, restaurant and service. We hope to offer a getaway where guests can be as secluded as they want but also have the beach and downtown easily accessible. I am disappointed to hear that there were issues with noise during your visit I can completely understand that would detract from a perfect experience. Please note we have identified the problem and are taking steps to minimize this going forward.   We hope to welcome you back once the resort is complete! Thank you again for your notes.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Girl at front desk was very evasive, intentionally not helpful.   She said there were no rooms available when we showed up at 7:30pm.    Soon after I was able to book online from my car.   Than she suddenly found a room available.  Than she said she could only give me a room with a single bed.    She let it slip earlier a large wedding party was coming in over the weekend.   I would bet good money the front desk girl didn't want any kids hanging around this weekend.   She belongs on a mid level rung on dante's circles of hell.   You know what they say about Karma?    I hope she gets it good.   Adios
Manager Response: DomVivona,  Although you were able to bypass booking with our front desk, the room you secured was not able to accommodate your entire party, the 2 Bedroom Cottage our staff offered was appropriate. The comments above are false.  Be assured you that it had nothing to do with having kids at the resort, our 20 Two bedroom cottages were specially designed for families and regardless of an event on property, children are always welcome. Your last comments are completely inappropriate and unworthy of a response. We wish you the best.   Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Laguna
Summary: Our family stayed at The Ranch at the end of December.  We had a nice stay - the 2-bedroom "cottage" is really more of a townhouse setup, but it was brand new, spacious and very comfortable.  I thought the layout of the hotel rooms was more like a hotel or camp than a Ranch - they are all very close together and surround the pool.  We missed not having a kichenette. Good location - very quick drive to Laguna Beach, and the beach just on the other side of the highway is great. I was aware that this property was still under construction, but there was more construction than I thought there would be.  Very quiet and tranquil at night and Sunday, but there is considerable construction noise during the day (not a problem if you are spending your days outside the hotel).  The outdoor
Manager Response: differentviews,  Thank you for taking time to review RLB! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the Cottage layout, we did remove the kitchenettes to go to a more traditional style resort hotel guest room. But the Treehouse does have a full kitchen and was just completely remodeled and is now available! So if your family likes to cook on vacations (mine does also), that will be the best option.   Also happy to hear that you enjoyed the dining and location, there is a considerable amount of construction on property over the next three months. But we are eager and excited for the full transformation! It will be work it. We hope to welcome you and your family back this summer. Thank you again for the review.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great new iteration of an old favorite
Summary: My husband and I stayed overnight this past Saturday.  The property is undergoing a major renovation (much needed), as well as change of name, etc.  The resort had become quite tired looking but now is clean, new and quite attractive.  We had spent time over several summers at the resort years ago when it was Aliso Creek and are pleased to see the improvements.  The setting is beautiful and while not on the beach, is close enough to easily walk, plus is in a quiet and very pretty canyon.  The staff is friendly and eager to make your stay pleasant.  The 9-hole golf course was fun for my husband.  All amenities are not yet in place, so the fitness center is quite limited and dining options are also minimal.  However, Hugo at the coffee/beverage/snack bar is a friendly and very
Manager Response: MjsAjs,  Thank you for reviewing RLB! We very much appreciate your time and feedback. Hugo is a fantastic addition to our team and will be pleased to hear that you enjoyed Ben's Pantry!   Please accept our sincere apologies for any noise disturbance during your stay, our engineering team has addressed the noise issue in the building you stayed it.   We look forward to welcoming you back once the resort is complete and thank you again for your review!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This is a lovely property and a nice addition to the offerings in Laguna. The public beach is an easy walk via a safe tunnel, right across PCH. Make sure to head over for sunset. The staff at the hotel is gracious and so eager to please. The front desk staff needs a bit more training in responding to requests, but not for lack of effort. This will all come with time. The only real cons during the stay were the complete lack of cellular reception because you are set into a canyon. The WiFi is strong throughout, but making cell phone calls is impossible. Our thermostat was difficult to regulate so the room was too hot even when we turned it off at the end of the day. Also, the Creekside 1-bedroom suites need more lighting on the back side of the building at night. We would return
Manager Response: ReviewerMaryland1,  Thank you for taking the time to provide notes on your stay. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the location and sunset at Aliso Beach! Cell service can be an issue in the canyons and our team is incorporating apps and additional guest phones to make connecting easier. Also our Engineering Team has been informed about the thermostat and will review additional lighting. Thank you again for this valuable feedback. Visit us again soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My Guess would be if you are reading reviews other than recent you are wasting your time.  We stayed here during the last week of December. The room was perfect, clean, spacious and comfortable. We have stayed in many 5 star hotels and the service at "The Ranch" was as good if not better than we have ever experienced. We are already planning our return in April. I have read a few comments about construction going on but honestly we didn't even notice. Everything has been thought of to make the construction feel seamless. Breakfast, lunch, happy hour, golf etc. was exceptional. Its a great place to stay and relax.  My wife and I are already counting down the days until we return.
Manager Response: timstacy1212,  Thank you for your review of The Ranch LB, our guest's experience is of highest importance to us. We are glad to hear the construction had little to no bearing on your stay and look forward to welcoming you back in April! Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Me and my husband stay for 5 nights (january 4 to 9), We stay at creeckside studio and it is very nice and well furnished so comfortable. The room`s size is excellent, the bathroom is nice too, the views is wonderful so the property. And everything is new. No bad word to say about that.   But the service is not good at all and the construction affects our stay. The first day we took breakfast at the hotel but the construction beside the `restaurant` disturbed and bothered as the noise did not allowed us to enjoy the tranquility and the wonderful views of the golf course and mountains while we ate. At the second day we were advised that the restaurant will be closed. We decided do not have breakfast at hotel for the rest of our stay.  At the second day, we stayed all day out of
Manager Response: giselevalle2015,   Please accept our sincere apology that the service you received was not up to your standards or ours simply. We strive to provide an enjoyable and memorable experience for our guests despite any construction on property. I am sorry to hear that this was not your experience. Should you travel back to Laguna Beach, please email me directly prior to booking. I would like to offer a room upgrade on any future stay with us, I am confident that our team can make up for this shortcoming. Here is my personal email:caitlin@ranchlb.com if you have any additional feedback to note as well. Safe Travels.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Preview time: Quiet and enjoyable. We will be back.
Summary: The resort is 2-3 months from being 100% renovated, but this had no effect on our stay, as we just wanted a room in a nice setting--no golf, spa, etc. We stayed in a Canyon Room, the least expensive choice, and it was perfect for the two of us. We cannot comment on the soundproofing, as we had no neighbors this weekend. We certainly did not hear the people two doors down.  The only negatives were few. For instance, it was cold this weekend, and the bathroom has no heating vents. If you leave the door closed, it's freezing. The other issue was also weather related--the "restaurant" (a tent) had no heat, either. We went elsewhere for breakfast. This will, of course, be remedied in a few weeks when the "real" restaurant opens.  Definitely worth a visit.
Manager Response: Dear Lapsrus,   Thank you for your time in reviewing RLB! It is great to hear that the construction did not deter from an enjoyable stay. We are eager to open the Harvest Restaurant opening and apologize for the heating issue in the temporary dining tent. It is also helpful to know about the bathroom heating vents, as this has not yet been suggested. Our team will review your feedback and we hope to welcome you back soon once all is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary Heading: A Secret Spot with love and nature
Summary: The Ranch is a secret spot place to come and relax. The property is in nature beyond beauty, the deer, the canyons and the ocean all within arms distance puts you in a peaceful state of mind. The food is delicious, the drinks, green ones or alcoholic are progressive and organic. A great secret getaway yet a trolley ride to downtown Laguna.
Manager Response: Suzy,  Thank you for your kind review of your experience at The Ranch LB! Our team will be delighted to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing escape and were pleased with the location, and dining at RLB. Please visit us again for more adventures and relaxation! Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: We usually stayed at hotels by the beach, this time decide give this new place a try, we are aware all the construction going on so we were not surprise. There is a lot to like about this place Unique geographic location, extremely attentive and friendly staff, onsite golf and upcoming spa and restaurants., seem like great happening place.  So this review is strictly on the room,the amenity and facility at present stage. The ranch position themselves inbetween the high end Montaga vs Sand or Inn. Yet their location isn't exactly walk down to the beach. We stayed in their 2bed 2 floor cottage suite designed to accommodate 6; priced about $600 after tax(our preview price bring in down to $1200/3N. We have a over size living room but rather smaller dinning table, tinny fridge.
Manager Response: Malicia88,  Thank you for choosing The Ranch LB and for your detailed feedback. These notes are very important to us as we review overall guest experiences. We kept the existing buildings and design on property to minimize the eco footprint and maintain the history established here. Our designer chose to go with showers based on design and water usage. However, we have one room that I would recommend for any future stay. It is a 2 bedroom and 3 full bathroom layout with a bathtub (available in February). Please accept our sincere apology regarding any noise between rooms, our Engineers will take care of that issue immediately.  With that said, I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the location and staff and am confident that once the resort is complete, we will exceed your expectations. Should you stay with us in the future, please contact me directly and I will make sure that you and your guests enjoy a flawless stay. Thank you again for your valuable feedback.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team  caitlin@ranchlb.com

Summary: What a beautiful setting. We felt like we were in our own personal retreat. We loved our room and all the fabulous activities. We golfed with our kids and took the shuttle to a beautiful beach across the street! The food was excellent and the staff was very attentive. If you've never been to Laguna Beach, you've got to stay here. We can't wait to go back to enjoy all that The Ranch has to offer, too many to do in one trip.
Manager Response: Keith G.,   Thank you for your kind review. It means a lot to our team that you enjoyed the rooms, golf, location and dining. We hope to welcome you and your family back soon! Stay tuned for more kid's and family activities to come.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: 2016 is off to a relaxing start - thanks to a New Year's stay at the Ranch at Laguna Beach!  The rustic luxury of this special place was perfect for visitors from Colorado; yet the hidden canyon location of The Ranch is an easy launching point for beach, trail and sea exploration.  And, the imposing canyon walls and wandering Aliso creek proved to be an intimate setting for golf in an unpretentious yet beautiful place.   The Ranch is still under construction; some visitors might want to wait until the construction trucks have cleared out.  But, there are tangible signs of the lovely and intimate natural settings that will be available for weddings and other special events.  As "preview" visitors, we sampled the fresh fare at Harvest restaurant and will gladly return for expanded
Manager Response: Dear 491Carla2016,  Thank you for your thoughtful review of The Ranch at Laguna Beach! It was a pleasure to have you and your family stay with us and celebrate New Year's Eve.  Our team will be proud to know that the rooms, location, food and staff all contributed to an enjoyable and adventurous stay. It means the most to us that you found the team to be attentive, welcoming and informative.   We look forward to the completion of the resort in June and hope to welcome you back very soon. Thank you again!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We stayed during the construction phase which had discounted room nights and the restaurant/spa still under construction. The construction had relatively little impact on our stay. You can not hear anything and they block it off very well.   The location is ideal in Laguna, walking distance from the montage. Service is very good, the staff is really working hard to make you feel great when there is parts of the hotel closed. They answered every need with a big smile.   Rooms are big and brand new. Soft comfy beds, big showers, so quiet, great air control.   Hotel has a ranch country feel as opposed to the main more beach type of resorts nearby but you still have super close access to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear BookerTravel,  Thank you for your review of RLB. It means the most to myself and our team that you enjoyed your stay and found the rooms, location and staff to meet your expectations.   We hope to welcome you back again when construction is complete and the spa and restaurant open. Thank you again.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We were there at the end of the month for Vow Renewal and for a second honeymoon. The grounds are beautiful, and the hotel secluded.   The restaurant and several rooms are being renovated. Beyond that, it's great looking. Our room was in what I call a bungalow. Amenities were nice, with a king size bed and a large TV. Looking out the patio windows, is a view of the canyon and the golf course next door.   The staff mostly did a great job. One rubbed me the wrong way, by responding to my "thank you" with "Not a problem." Otherwise, they were mostly proactive and worked with a sense of urgency.   The food was very good. We enjoyed everything we had, which was almost everything. For a hotel, prices were reasonable. Speaking of prices, the room rate was pretty good, considering the
Manager Response: Michael,  Thank you for your feedback following your stay at RLB. We are delighted that you and your wife spent your Vow Renewal and second honeymoon at the resort.   It is great to hear that the rooms, food, views and staff met your expectations and that you enjoyed the secluded nature surrounding.   I am sorry to hear that you were rubbed the wrong way by the staff comment. Our guests feeling welcome and enjoying their stay is the most important thing to us.   We hope to welcome you back soon, especially once the resort is complete.   Thank you again for your feedback!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My friends and I stayed there in three separate rooms. We arrived on a Saturday afternoon, played an amazing round of golf, hit the jacuzzi and saline pool afterwards and woke up early Sunday morning for some fun sand volleyball play. We had lots of laughs, great food and very courteous service throughout our stay. The Aliso Canyon is an amazingly beautiful place and we plan on spending a lot more time there!
Manager Response: 1cabobobo,  Thank you for reviewing your stay at The Ranch LB! Our team will be very excited to hear that you and your guests enjoyed golf, pool, volleyball, and dining. Come visit us again soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: We felt like we were at the Grand Canyon, but just a 5 minute drive from our home in Laguna. Amazing natural setting, cliff walls all around, stars at night, really quiet, completely different than anything I know of along the Southern California coast. The food from the Pantry was great-I can't wait for the full restaurant to open. The Creekside Studios where we stayed are spacious and wonderfully appointed, with a view of the creek and hills beyond. The Staff was very helpful and pleasant. The pool and spa were heated just right, despite the December cold. Don't forget your clubs-it's a short but picturesque, challenging course-and your volleyball for the tournament grade sand court!
Manager Response: Dear Lagunatic13,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us! The canyons are really extraordinary and peaceful at night. It’s surprising that resort is across from the beach and down the street from downtown Laguna when you are here.  Our team will be very proud to hear that you enjoyed Ben’s Pantry, rooms and activities on property.   We hope to welcome you back soon, Happy New Year!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: After walking out from a different hotel which was terrible we decided to try out The Ranch as had heard a lot about it. We were very impressed to say the least. Alex who checked us in went above and beyond to ensure we had a marvelous night and felt welcomed at the property. Then she has Travis assist us to our room and he was very kind and thoughtful. We are very thankful for the amazing amenity we received! Was the greatest cheese plate we both had ever seen which is saying a lot!! The rooms are very trendy, spacious and well designed. The room has lots of lighting, very comfortable bed and a massive shower with excellent water pressure. There was some noise in the morning from the construction which was unfortunate as wanted to sleep in though as we knew they property was
Manager Response: Brendan88,  Thank you for visiting The Ranch LB and for your review. This means so much to myself and our team that you enjoyed your time here and were impressed with the friendly service. We are blessed with an incredible staff like Alex and Travis that go above and beyond to make our guests feel at home. They will be pleased to hear that they contributed to a great staycation. I’ll make sure that the Chef gets your feedback on the cheese plate amenity, he and the team are really incredible.   We hope to welcome you back very soon once construction is complete on Harvest Restaurant and Sycamore Spa.   Happy Holidays!  Sincerely, Caitlin

Summary: The setting of this hotel is unlike any other in Orange County.  It is still under construction, be advised, but the existing facilities are truly beautiful.  The remodel of the rooms are drop dead gorgeous, with HUGE showers, deluxe Rohle bath fixtures, big screen TV's in each room,and balconies/patios overlooking Aliso Creek or the pool or the golf course.  The staff is exceptionally courteous and helpful, and make the small inconveniences during construction much more amenable.  Breakfast is great (try the maple bacon cinnamon roll) and the pork sliders at lunch are the best I've had out of North Carolina.  The dining room will be completely remodeled by May, when the full service spa will also be opened. The golf course is a kick to play - tight, good traps, and quick; and
Manager Response: Joe,  Thank you for your review of RLB! Chef Woods makes a mean bacon cinnamon roll, great recommendation! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the food, golf and rooms.  We hope you’ll venture back for another staycation especially once the resort is complete.   Happy Holidays!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Most amazing place to stay in Orange County
Summary: I had one of the best experiences ever. The first day I got on property we played nine holes of golf on the coolest course I have ever played. I was with a large group of people and they helped us all get out and play golf.  The food was incredible. I ate breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The cheesecake dessert was amazing. When I walked in my room I was blown away. It was comfortable and very clean. I slept incredible.  I loved that the pool is open 24 hours. I was in the pool at 6:00 am. Watching the sun come up from the hot tub was a great way to start the day.  I cant wait to get back.
Manager Response: BostonT949, Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. Your feedback is invaluable to our team at the stage of opening and they will be very proud to hear of their contribution to a great experience from golf, food, rooms and the pool. It is a nice surprise to have the pool open 24 hours!   Please visit us again soon and happy holidays!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Had a lovely night stay at The Ranch! Staff were extremely accommodating and even did a walk through/show of he room upon check in, in which I have never experienced in the past. They made you feel welcomed and appreciated. Loved the modern look and feel as well as the overall comfort of having a super comfy bed, what feels like luxurious robes, and pillows that your head sinks into! Would definitely recommend to a future guest and can't wait until my next visit!
Manager Response: Heather,  Thank you for visiting The Ranch LB and for taking the time to review your stay. We are delighted that you enjoyed the room, décor and bed. Our team wanted our guests to feel as if they were at home in their private beach residence.   Also, it means the most to our team that you were welcomed and appreciated by our staff. We hope to welcome you back very soon and thank you again for your review.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This property looks like tenement housing under construction.  It is not attractive from the outside.  Construction is everywhere, and good luck finding the check-in desk.  The dining area is under a pitched tent, and I hope you like porta potties.  You know you're in trouble when check-in includes a guide to the local eateries that deliver.  The room was nice enough, but it would have been way over priced at half the rate I paid.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   We are very disappointed that you were unhappy with your experience. We have done our best to be upfront that our property is under major construction. The Ranch House is where our Harvest Restaurant will be located. Sycamore Spa is being built in addition to many of the rooms.   The bathrooms and dining tent are temporary until renovations are complete.   If you were given the impression that we were not in a preview period then I apologize for the miscommunication there.   Please contact me directly if you would like to discuss this further and thank you for your feedback.   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team  Caitlin@ranchlb.com

Summary: We stayed here for three nights. During the day they were finishing off the Renos (however we knew this before hand) and it wasn't a big deal for us.   Firstly the staff were very good. Polite and helpful. They didn't hesitate to accommodate our requests.  The rooms themselves were excellent. Very comfortable and modern. Beds great! The outlook of the canyon in the morning over the golf course was also great.  We had breakfast there all 3 mornings and it was very nice food.   Would have given 5 stars however the only thing we noticed was that the walls were quite thin and we could hear guests in the rooms on each side of us. (Maybe request a room away from others if possible) Through the night however it was very peaceful. It was Nice being off the Main Street.   Would we stay
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Good: Although no sea views, it was set in beautiful, quiet canyon on other side of street from nice beach.  Golf course surrounds the property so large expansive views.  You can walk to beach (5 min) or drive and park in paid lot.  Secluded rooms were tastefully decorated with soothing colors, interesting textures and area artwork.   Vaulted ceiling, unique decorator finishes, comfortable bed/pilliows, dimmers, granite, undermount sinks created luxurious feel.  Private patios had rocking chairs from which to enjoy the views.  Shower was roomy with great water pressure.  Plenty of hanging storage.  Room service was packaged in quaint mason jars and they offer picnic lunches for day excursions to the beach.  Service was good overall.    The Bad: No dresser for folded clothes.
Manager Response: Andrea,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the room amenities, design and nature surrounding. We do apologize that you were not made aware of the construction on property prior to your arrival. We do our very best to notify guests throughout our website booking and emails however that was not the case with your reservation and please accept our sincere apology for that miscommunication. We will make sure the necessary departments involved receive your notes regarding your stay as the feedback is very valuable especially during this pre-opening stage.   Our Construction Team will be installing additional lighting throughout the property but I agree it shouldn’t distract from the stargazing which is so peaceful in the canyon. Thank you again and we hope you’ll come back to visit us again soon once the resort is complete.   Happy Holidays!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: This wonderful hideaway was so peaceful and refreshing. I enjoyed the mountain backdrop and canal view from front door. The room was clean and the shower was very spacious. There is a little construction going on, but you won't hear it from the inside of your room. I will definitely return...can't wait!
Manager Response: LD P,  Thank you for choosing to stay at RLB and for your feedback! We absolutely cannot wait to have the resort 100% guest ready. Come back to visit soon!   Happy Holidays!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a beautifully remodeled property in a unique setting.  Don’t let the drive in detour you.    Once there you will enjoy green canyon views from the perfect pool area, central lodge, or your room depending on its location.  We didn’t want to leave.   All areas are expertly done with quality materials.    While top notch with a large bathroom, the standard room I saw was on the smaller side.    Because the property was still under construction, a King suite was unavailable but based on pictures would be perfect.  The two-bedroom unit has awesome space but it is on two levels; living space and powder room on level 1 and bedrooms and bath on two.  Ours had gorgeous views from patios on both levels.  The Ranch is across the street and down a curvy road
Manager Response: Joan,  Thank you for the amazing review!  We are so glad you enjoyed your visit with us.  Your kind words describing your stay are exactly what we are striving for! We will share your comments with our staff .    Please know we are eager to be your "light at the end of a tunnel" anytime you are in Laguna Beach.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best,  The RanchLB Staff

Summary: Wife got adventurous and chose this not yet finished resort. More like a modern summer camp with really nice amenities and 9 hole golf course. My wife and I couldn't help, but feel like we were at summer camp minus the counsellors.   Just a 5-10 minute walk to the beach situated in the hills/canyon of Laguna Beach. Great landscape and fresh air. Close to fantastic restaurants and shops in town.   Everything in the resort is brand new, but we didn't like the pillows. Also, didn't like that I couldn't smoke a cigar, but considering the fire danger it is understandable.   All in all, a very quiet and nice get away in a completely renovated property. No joke the cabins could've been for campers back in the day, but they are entirely renovated very tastefully.
Manager Response: Ryan,   Thank you for choosing The Ranch LB or I guess we should thank your wife! Your feedback is critical to our team during this phase especially specifics like pillow preferences. Thank you for noting that. We are 100% channeling the adult summer camp vibe, our team stripped down the original building to upgrade everything but kept the existing buildings and minimized the footprint overall.   We hope you will make it back to The Ranch LB soon for more adventures!   Happy Holidays!  Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here and just loved it. Would've given it even higher rating but it's not quite finished yet!   Nice little 9hole golf course, outdoor dining with scenic views and the staff are terrific. Fantastic service. We will definitely go back.
Manager Response: Donna,  Thank you for the review of your stay. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the golf course views and the service was excellent. We still have some work to do with construction throughout and are scheduled for everything to be completed in May/ June of 2016.  We hope you’ll stay with us again soon!   Happy Holidays!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: The location is awesome and quiet but not too secluded. The rooms are awesome with the new renovations that included comfy beds and huge TV's. Don't have to worry being disconnected in the canyon cause the wifi is super strong and fast. Golf course is right next to the rooms and restraunt right up the hill. Overall it was amazing and the best hotel I've ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Jonas,  Wow!   Thank you for reviewing your stay. The canyons gives the resort a peaceful, hidden feel but also close enough to enjoy the Laguna Beaches. Our IT Team will be happy to hear that the wifi was up to par!   It is such a compliment to say that The Ranch LB is the best hotel you’ve stayed at and I’ll make sure our team sees this. We hope you’ll venture back soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: I spend a weekend in this beautiful renovated property in Laguna.  2 minutes form the beach at the middle of a valley. Very peacefull and at the same time 5 minutes away from downtown Laguna Beach! The staff and the GM were extremely nice and welcoming. You feel at home.  The heated big pool  with its bar was great. A lot of small attentions that make your stay memorable: welcome platters, chips and sunscreen around the pool... The studios are just perfect! You enjoy your living room as well as a nice private terrasse overlooking the hill and the beautiful golf course. The décors are stunning, with floated wood, leather and a touch of modern. I definately recommend this property!!!
Manager Response: Ana,  Thank you for choosing The Ranch LB for your vacation! It was a pleasure to have you with us and our team will be proud to know that you found the resort peaceful and relaxing! We hope you’ll stay with us again soon and thank you again for your kind thoughts.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary Heading: The perfect place to get away and relax.
Summary: My family and I recently stayed at The Ranch and was overwhelmed by the customer service and comfort of the room.  From the moment you arrive, staff is ready to help and make sure you have everything you need to have an enjoyable stay. At check in, each of us was given our choice between a "Meet me at the Ranch" t-shirt or hat. When we arrived in our room there was a nice card from the GM, Kurt Bjorkman, welcoming us. Later in the afternoon, we received a call from the front desk asking if there was anything we required. The room was beautiful, we had a 2 bedroom, 2 story unit.  Each room was plush and high tech. We were offered turn down service, where they left water and filled our ice bucket. The views from our patio were amazing.  We were only there 2 nights but it was a
Manager Response: GardenGirl L.,  Thank you for reviewing your stay with us! Our team puts 100% into making sure our guests enjoy their time and they will be so pleased to hear that you enjoyed a relaxing weekend. That is really all we can hope for! Please visit us again soon especially once Sycamore Spa is finished, we think you’ll love it!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: We've been coming to this hotel resort forever. When we found out it had gone through some renovations and we wanted to see the changes they made. I couldn't believe how much work and $$$$ they put into this place! I'm pretty sure they stripped it down to the frame and built it back up, every detail of this place has been renovated and they did an awesome job. It was always a hassle to walk to and from the beach but now they have these huge Fantasy Island style golf carts that take you to and from, nice!! This place also has a pretty nice inexpensive golf course too. By the way, just a little secret, November is the best time to go to Laguna. There's no traffic, empty beaches and 85 degrees! If you're planning a family trip to SoCal you should consider staying here, it's
Manager Response: Shawn,  Your review means so much to myself and our team! Our construction team has been working nonstop to get the resort ready for our guests. They will be especially excited to hear that one of our regulars approves! Also, we are happy you enjoyed the beach shuttle service. More activities and updates to come Spring of 2016. Thank you again for your kind thoughts and we look forward to seeing you again soon!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: My partner and I flew down from San Francisco for the weekend and after researching hotels in Laguna Beach decided on The Ranch. We could not have made a better decision. Just across the road from a beautiful beach and tucked behind clusters of trees, The Ranch offers a secluded experience for ultimate relaxation.   Parking is ample with staff eager to welcome you. Although the golf course is front and center, it is unassuming hugged by the mountains and often filled with deer, yes deer, roaming its grounds. Our room felt more like more like a guest house rather than a hotel; unique, rustic and welcoming. Although vacations are meant to be filled with activities, it would be easy to get lost in a book on the porch with a glass of wine or even on the bed! We only snacked at their
Manager Response: Rae,  Thank you for your kind feedback on your stay. We are so glad that you had a relaxing stay and enjoyed the resort and canyon. We’ll take the relaxation next level when Sycamore Spa opens Spring of next year so we hope you visit us again soon!  Sincerely, Caitlin and RLB Team

Summary: Last minute getaway with the family. Could not have been happier.  Cant wait until they have everything done, really want to go to their new spa!  They treated our kids like royalty and pampered our entire family.  The grounds and resort are amazing, but the staff are even better....which is saying a lot!!  We will return.
Manager Response: Aesopfans,  Thank you for taking the time to review our resort and team. That is really what it is all about, we are delighted that the family was taken care of and your kids had fun! We are so looking forward to the spa and having the family back for more good times. Thank you again.  Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary Heading: Great Service, Fair Setting, Enjoyable During Renovations
Summary: Resort is currently under renovations, turning an old inn into a 4-star full-service resort. Judging by photos of the previous inn, they've already done wonders upgrading the place.   Positives: -Rooms are beautiful, warm, and very comfortable, with all modern amenities. Feels like your own little beach cottage, and we loved it.  -Service is very welcoming and attentive. All staff is very friendly, and ready to help with any requests at any time.  -Setting within a steep canyon is very pretty and feels "away from everything."   Negatives: -We thought that the layout of the buildings/rooms could do more to take advantage of the natural serenity of the place. It seems as though they've had to work with some poorly designed pre-existing structures (which is understandable), so
Manager Response: Aph28,  Thank you for your honest feedback, our team takes our reviews seriously especially as we head into final construction.  Unfortunately, we were limited with the layout of the existing buildings and parking, we had to keep the same footprint of the previous hotel, we actually removed 11,000 sq. ft. of old carports to create a more inviting space.   We hoped that the rooms would feel like a cottage or beach residence and are happy to hear that you agree! Our staff is working hard to get everything finished by Spring 2016 so we hope you head south to see that final Ranch LB!   Thank you again for your kind words and notes.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: The Ranch is less well known then the Montage, and Surf and Sand as It sits on the canyon side of Coast Highway, but offers ocean views, and canyon views that feel like Kauai.  It's perhaps the best value in Laguna with large room and great food + its own Golf course.
Manager Response: Tony,  Thank you for the review! The canyon is spectacular and we are happy that you enjoyed the dining, golf course and room. We hope you’ll visit us again soon.   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: This unassuming, miss the street if you're not looking closely, tucked far back in the mountains, fantastic retreat for the soul is a hidden gem to be experienced at least once in your life! When driving up to this place, you're senses are tricked into thinking there are no luxuries in sight...until you get closer. And start to notice the golf course. And canopy of trees. And clean, well groomed grounds. And the quiet whispers of the mountains. And then your senses are treated to the interior of these quiet bungalows. Something out of HGTV, or a newly completed model home you get to stay in. It's really unbelievable. The staff is super friendly and can accommodate most requests. The pool is quiet and relaxing. My only qualms of living and breathing in a digital age is that the
Manager Response: Kidjazzz,  Thank you for taking the time to review The Ranch LB! It is very easy to miss the drive – which will be easier to locate once we have construction complete but for now, we think it provides a little extra character.  It means so much to read your review, our team and Tuvalu work hard to create a relaxing retreat. The internet is also something that will improve as we complete construction but we agree, sometimes it is nice to sign off.   We sincerely appreciate your feedback and hope you’ll join us again soon!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: There are the most spectacular sunsets from the outdoor bar, the surfers in the ocean below the hotel provide incredible entertainment entertainment, and enjoy the service and hospitality of the hotel. Fabulous spot for a wedding!
Manager Response: Sandra,  Thank you for joining us at The Ranch LB! The surfers  and skimboarders at Aliso Beach are incredible to watch especially early in the morning, I’ll have our front desk team mention that for future guests to check out! Also, we are delighted that you enjoyed the service here. I’ll make sure our team knows they did a great job. We hope you’ll stay with us again soon, especially when the resort is complete!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: My husband and I decided to book a weekend getaway with our son at the last minute. Everywhere was sold out so we luckily stumbled upon this gem of a property. It's still in its preview stage so the only rooms available were the 2 bedroom cottage. It was absolutely lovely and perfect. We've been fortunate to travel and stay at great places but I have to say, this is probably at the top of my list because of the staff, accommodations and how peaceful it is. There won't be a need to leave the property once all their restaurants open for dinner. We ate breakfast and lunch here and it was great. I so have to rave about the team here. They really go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable. Down to the housekeeping. They are attentive, friendly and all the little extras from
Manager Response: Tina,  Thank you for the review! The property here is so peaceful and our team has really done an excellent job. We are so lucky that you found your way here! Please visit us again soon and thank you again.   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Ok, this place is a hidden gem. As soon as the word gets out on The Ranch at Laguna Beach it will stay booked all year long.  To start with the entire staff is amazing, they bend over backwards to provide excellent service. The rooms are new and the decor is quoint and well done. Beds are very, did I say very comfortable.  The grounds especially around the pool area are beautiful and relaxing ..... All this while they are still finishing the build.  Do yourself a favor and book for a stay. Close to the beach and in the canyon; we just had 3 deer walk by our room while we were out on the patio. A treat you don't get in Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Don, Thank you for your kind words! We hope to be booked all year long also! It means alot to our team that you stayed during our preview period and hope you’ll be back soon for another staycation and deer sightings!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary Heading: Great hide away for a get away
Summary: Our experience started from the time we drove down the entrance from PCH! The winding driveway opens up to the entrance to the resort! You're greeted by a a staff member who is more than willing to help you with all your needs, our room was over looking the pool area, and you didn't feel like you were in a hotel room, it felt more like you were in a guest house, with easy access to the pool, restaurant, and golf club. While having breakfast on the patio we had a spectacular view of the first tee box and the putting green on the ninth hole, amazing views!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful stay at the ranch during their preopening. Staff is very attentive with great customer service. With no resort fee or pay for valet this place is going to be a big hit. Can't wait to spend more time there after the grand opening! Gorgeous grounds as well and spacious rooms.
Manager Response: WorldTraveler2112112,  Thank you for staying with us and your review means so much to the team. We are blessed with our staff and I will send them your feedback on the attention to detail and customer service! Looking forward to future adventures!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary Heading: Can i move in?? Move out of the way Ritz and Montage The Ranch is in town!!
Summary: You ever leave a vacation or getaway not wanting to go home? You can expect that when you stay at The Ranch. I am not the type to post on trip advisor but after a night with my wife on our anniversary at The Ranch, I just have to share.  Here is why I liked it:  1. Customer Service- From the booking agent on the phone, to the bell man who greets you on your entrance, to the front desk, maids, you name it every single person make me feel like i was royalty. They knew are names, anniversary, and set up the room so when we arrived we had some champagne to celebrate. The concierge even printed up local hiking paths as when I booked I mentioned we were going to look for a fun hike. These guys nailed every interaction!!!  2. The Rooms- OMG! Nailed it! My vote for most comfortable bed
Manager Response: Hi John,  Your review means so much to us, thank you! Our team is working fast and furious to get the Lodge and Harvest dinner service ready for our guests. The Ranch LB is definitely a special place to work and visit so I am most excited that you were able to feel the energy of this new adventure.   Tuvalu designed our rooms and decor and we agree they completely nailed it! We appreciate your feedback and cannot wait to have you and your wife back at The Ranch and hope it is very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: This hidden gem is just off PCH behind Aliso Creek Beach.  Rooms are beautifully appointed and when the resort upgrade is finished it will be fabulous.  Hotel staff were fantastic - really helpful.  While this is a fair way south of the Laguna Beachfront, there is a free trolley bus shuttle at the weekends, and staff will take you to PCH by golf cart if you need (although the walk is only 10-12 mins).  The resort is in a canyon by Aliso Creek, so feels cool by comparison with the beating sun of Laguna Beach. I loved it!!  Thank you to the team - it was still a pre-opening weekend - but I'll definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Hi Fifeb,  Thank you for your feedback! We are so glad that you were able to be one of our first guests during the "preview" period. I'll make sure the staff see your comments and we hope you'll make it back to the West Coast very soon!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: We visited the ranch to attend a wedding. The food was absolutely incredible! The gorgeous lay out of this outdoor event was simply stunning,  and the cocktail hour down in the trees on the gold course was very unique!  We will be staying at the hotel next time we visit laguna beach!
Manager Response: Sara,  Thank you for your feedback! That wedding was absolutely stunning. It was great to have you here and would love to have you stay with us next time you are in town.   Sincerely, Caitlin and The Ranch LB Team

Summary: Wow! What a find! We spent our anniversary weekend at The Ranch, by recommendation of some friends who are locals—and we are overjoyed that we did!   Not only was the staff so welcoming for our special weekend; the room was just so comfortable! We had beautiful views of the mountains and the golf course in the back - and we even saw deer! It was a magical time.  When visiting, be sure to enjoy breakfast on the patio dining area and spend an afternoon at the pool—the view is spectacular. It was also so wonderful to be just a 5min walk away from the beach (or 2min in a golf cart!), and have our own private space to come home to afterwards. Perfect place for those who are looking for an intimate retreat right next to beautiful Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: Paulina,  Thank you for the review! It means everything to our team that you enjoyed your stay. Seeing the deer is such a treat! That is one of the best parts of being in the canyon. We hope to see you again soon and thank you for spending this special celebration with us!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch at Laguna Beach Team

Summary Heading: Spartan on the outside - spacious and romantic on the inside.
Summary: In a pre-opening weekend, we jumped to stay in the canyon closer to nature and off Pacific Coast Highway. The Ranch looks like barracks or bunkhouses from the outside - brown to match the eco-look, with big spacious room on the inside. High ceilings, great rustic chandelier, and a super shower (more than enough room for two!). Lots of room to work in the room without bothering your partner and very dark and quiet nights. After a night at the Pageant of the Masters, we drove back in and watched a skunk dash across the road (very cool). Slept in until past 12... refreshed...
Manager Response: Hi Tom and Tina,  Thank you for visiting us at The Ranch! You are correct we wanted to maintain the original look of the exterior of the buildings to blend with nature and canyon views. We are thrilled that you enjoyed our Tuvalu –Home designed interiors.  We are also delighted that you had a relaxing stay, and left refreshed. That is so important to us and we hope to see you again very soon!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch at Laguna Beach Team

Summary: We were seeking a beach resort for some R&R. After considering the many options we decided on The Ranch at Laguna. We weren't looking for uptight and pretentious, just Five-Star and Wonderful. We found The Ranch to be enchanting with a little summer camp vibe. It's located in a canyon tucked off PCH, but you can easily stroll to the beach or golf at the resorts 9 par. The new pool is great for morning laps or afternoon relaxing in the spa. We stayed before the grand opening, so the grounds are still a work in progress however, it didn't distract from enjoying the gorgeous guest room and delicious breakfast on the patio. The staff is top-notch, friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing The Ranch evolve into a great family friendly getaway destination. We will return in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had heard that The Ranch at Laguna Beach, formerly Aliso Creek, had been completely renovated and upgraded..  Since it has a great location (5 min walk to Aliso Creek Beach, easy ride to downtown Laguna Beach, attached to a great 9 hole golf course, near the Montage) I thought we'd try it when we were in Laguna Beach for a friends birthday party.  The place is unbelievable.  The rooms a large and well furnished.  The service is great.  The staff was eager to help.  Walking around the place at night felt more like the serenity of being in the mountains than the beach.  My wife and I loved it.  It is extremely private and relaxing.  The birthday celebration for my friend was held there at an outdoor venue overlooking the golf course and in a canyon.  The venue was as nice as
Manager Response: Elliott,  Thank you for your feedback on the property! We love how private the resort is but still close enough to experience the beach. It is our pleasure to host you and your friends and family here and hope to see you soon as more of the resort is finished. Thank you again, this means a lot to our team!  Sincerely, Caitlin

Summary Heading: Definitively the "Coolest Hotel in Laguna Beach"
Summary: If you have yet to see The Ranch at Laguna Beach (formerly Aliso Creek Inn) since the remodel you won’t believe it’s the same place.  The buildings and grounds look fantastic and evoke the Ranch theme. The hotel room interiors are comfortably furnished and decorated to make you feel like you are the guest in someone’s posh beach bungalow.   The beds are extremely comfortable and air conditioning is so quiet yet very efficient.  After spending a day at the Sawdust Festival and exploring the town my wife and I relaxed sitting in the rocking chairs on the patio as the sun set, watching the lighting and color changes in the canyon and deer grazing on the golf course.  We found the hotel staff all extremely courteous, friendly and efficient.  We really enjoyed having breakfast at the
Manager Response: Bob,  Thank you for your kind feedback! Our team has worked hard to make our guests feel at home and they will be delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay here.  We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to review the Ranch LB and hope to see you and your family again soon!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch at Laguna Beach Team

Summary Heading: A "Coastal Ranch" setting...with golf...in Laguna Beach / Orange County...amazing!
Summary: 'Room was so tastefully decorated & furnished, extremely quiet, top quality, yet understated as far as "flash and show" goes… Even the number and placement of the electric sockets (some that were "high up" on top of the night stands)- very well thought out for charging up our "digital device lives"!  The bed/mattress was exceptionally comfortable.  The bathroom layout was perfect, very "roomy".  'Very nice "in-room" coffee maker!  Beautiful grounds, and everywhere we looked we could see so much attention to all of the details.  We were warmly and professionally greeted  And the food / dining was great, at a location where you can enjoy a beautiful, tranquil golf course and canyon view...
Manager Response: Jeff,  Thank you for noticing our attention to detail – our design team spent a lot of time thinking about the Guest Experience!  I will make sure our team receives your feedback – We hope to see you again soon!  Best,  Caitlin

Summary: I used to stay here when it was the old Aliso Creek Inn.  I saw that they are reopen as the Ranch at Laguna Beach so I gave them a try on a last minute mini vacation.  Holy cow - what a difference!  They are not quite done yet - that was made clear when I called in - I guess I was a member of the Preview Crew!  It was obvious that the resort is not done yet - but the rooms are incredible and the pool is awesome.  The new team is really trying to up their game and it is obviosly working.  Give this place a try while they still have rooms to rent!  I will be coming back when they open up the spa for sure.
Manager Response: Hi Jeffery,  It was a pleasure having you stay with us this weekend! Your feedback means a lot to our team as we strive to be the “Coolest Hotel in Laguna Beach.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon!   Sincerely, Caitlin and The RLB Team

Summary: The Ranch at Laguna Beach is a Jewel! We felt like we were invited into someone's beautiful home. We stayed in one of the two story rooms that slept six people comfortably! Upstairs had two private bedrooms, one with a king size and the other a queen size bed... And downstairs in the large living room there was a queen size foldout bed! In the morning, what a pleasure, sipping my coffee and reading the complementary newspaper, while sitting out on the patio with an incredible view watching a family of dear grazing just off in the distance was special. The gym/exercise room was open 24 hours. The brand new pool and spa were one of my highlights of the weekend. The staff were all very kind and courteous and went out of their way to make sure that my wife, two sons, and mother and
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We were honored to have your family as one of our first guests on property. We also love the 2 bedroom cottages and hoped they'd work well for families. You arrived at the perfect time as our pool and gym just opened a couple weeks ago. We hope to see you and your family again soon. Thanks again!  Sincerely, Caitlin

Summary Heading: A great little get a way... dining is awesome!
Summary: The new owners have done an amazing job of upgrading the grounds. The restaurant is simply delicious with a great view of the golf course. For a nice quaint get away, this is your place. We highly recommend the cinnamon bun (sharing!!!) and Chorizo Enchilada's are delicious... All the dishes looked very good!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A wonderful new addition to Laguna Beach!
Summary: We were going to drive up to LA to stay at the Mondrian for the weekend because our friends wanted to use our house for a party. I was dreading the drive after a long day of work so we changed our plans, and decided to stay locally at The Ranch at Laguna.  We are so glad we did! It was just minutes away from our house yet we felt like we were somewhere far away. It's nestled in the Aliso beach creek where Ben Brown's used to be. The rooms are huge and so beautifully furnished. All the hardware is top of the line everything. Fleetwood sliding doors, powerful yet super silent Fujitsu A/C units, etc.... They give you See's candy and Aveda products in your room!  Very nice classy touch! A very comfortable bed with crisp linens and big fluffy towels, too. We took a tour of the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is absolutely wonderful! I would recommend this place to everyone staying in Laguna Beach. This is why I gave this place 4 stars-  Pros-  1. This location is really nice! Its surrounded by mountains, next to the beach and close to the downtown area! Its really nice to walk around the property!  2. The rooms were bigger than I expected and it was nice having a kitchen!  Cons-   1. This hotel is a little outdated, but its not a big deal!
Manager Response: TravelDiva50,  Thank you for your review! We aspire to be wonderful and enchanting for each and every guest. We do have some work left to do and are slated to be fully open beginning of next year. I’ll make sure the restaurant and rooms team are aware of their great work. Thank you again, your feedback is very appreciated.     We hope to have you back at The Ranch LB soon!   Sincerely,  Caitlin and The Ranch at Laguna Beach Team

Summary: Stayed at Aliso Creek Inn recently for 4 nights as our house was renovated.  Perfect location just a stroll to the beach.  Really nice full kitchens with utensils, large closets with generous storage space. We especially appreciated TV and DVD players in living room and bedroom as well.  The patios are enclosed and private with access to the pool and hot tub area.  The hotel is a bit dated and in need of some remodeling, but the location, amenities, hotel grounds and friendly and helpful staff make up for it. They have a wonderful pet policy with one-time $50 fee.  We had our kitty with us and we all felt like home and really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Irena, thank you for taking the time to post a review on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay at Aliso Creek Inn and Golf Course. We value the opinions of our guests and appreciate your feedback. We are thrilled to see how much you enjoyed the location of our resort along with the amenities that were offered.   Thank you for the kind words regarding the customer service you received from our staff. That is our number one priority and we are glad that it was delivered! Our hotel rooms are all currently closed for renovation, so this will definitely address your comment about the facilities needing remodeling. Please stay tuned and come stay with us again once we reopen in 2014 at a date to be announced later!

Summary: We have frequented this location since our children were infants.  The rooms have been perfect for all ages and stages.  The true comfort of home..away from home with a feeling of escape.  Not to mention the beauty of wildlife in your golf course view. A nice walk to the beach and a pool to cool off in at the end of the day...for young and old!  Keep the prices competitive and you will have customers coming like us for life.  Keep some towels out at the pool for swimmers who forgot their room towels.  See ya next year!
Manager Response: Lydia, thank you for taking the time to post a review on TripAdvisor. We value the opinions of our guests and appreciate your feedback! We are thrilled to see that you have been able to spend some quality family time at our property for many years! We are also glad to see how much you enjoy the scenery and wildlife at ACI and Aliso Beach Park! Thank you for your continued business and we look forward to your return!
